OVERVIEW: The Impact Chroma Background Kit is an affordable and reliable way to set up a studio background for either a headshot or video interview. This system sets up and collapses with ease. The backdrop comes in a see-thru bag for easy identification of contents. The system is comprised of a one-piece chroma blue and chroma green backdrop as well as an Impact Multi Boom Lightstand and Reflector Holder (B&H #s: IMBGCCBG57 and IMLSRH).
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Chroma Background Kit is an affordable and reliable way to set up a studio background for either a headshot or video interview. This system sets up and collapses with ease. The backdrop comes in a see-thru bag for easy identification of contents.

The system is comprised of a one-piece chroma blue and chroma green backdrop as well as an Impact Multi Boom Lightstand and Reflector Holder (B&H #s: IMBGCCBG57 and IMLSRH).

OVERVIEW: This Impact Desktop Shooting Table Studio Two Light Kit includes two Impact IMVA902 three bulb fluorescent fixtures with bulbs, a small shooting table and Impact air cushioned light stands.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact Desktop Shooting Table Studio Two Light Kit includes two Impact IMVA902 three bulb fluorescent fixtures with bulbs, a small shooting table and Impact air cushioned light stands.

OVERVIEW: This is an Impact JCD Lamp - 300W, 120V for the Impact Qualite 300 tungsten-halogen fixture. It uses a 2-pin GY9.5 base.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is an Impact JCD Lamp - 300W, 120V for the Impact Qualite 300 tungsten-halogen fixture. It uses a 2-pin GY9.5 base.

OVERVIEW: This is a B&H Exclusive Impact One Light Boom Desktop Studio Kit. It is built around the VA903 three-bulb fluorescent flood light. The VA902 is an economical fluorescent head that draws only 90 watts, yet delivers 4,500 lumens, and is 5500°K daylight balanced without the need for color conversion filters. The Desktop Shooting Table consists of a frame and sheet of white translucent plexiglass.Overhead lighting is possible with the Impact Convertible Boom Arm/Light Stand. As a light stand, it can support a small or medium light head to a height of 13' (4 m). Raise the second section completely, click, and it is a boom stand.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This is a B&H Exclusive Impact One Light Boom Desktop Studio Kit. It is built around the VA903 three-bulb fluorescent flood light. The VA902 is an economical fluorescent head that draws only 90 watts, yet delivers 4,500 lumens, and is 5500°K daylight balanced without the need for color conversion filters.

The Desktop Shooting Table consists of a frame and sheet of white translucent plexiglass.

Overhead lighting is possible with the Impact Convertible Boom Arm/Light Stand. As a light stand, it can support a small or medium light head to a height of 13' (4 m). Raise the second section completely, click, and it is a boom stand.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 7" Grid (10 Degree) helps you control your light more precisely: this honeycomb grid, which will fit any standard 7" grid reflector (other than Broncolor or Profoto), gives you a very narrow 10° beam of light, perfect for an accent light or spot. A tension spring can stretch or arch to fit the reflector.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Qualite 300 Two Light Kit is centered around the Impact Qualite 300 Focusing Flood Light. The QL300 provides 300 watts of even light. It has a cool-touch handle for aiming the fixture, and the beam ranges from 21-40°. Each QL300 comes with a 4 leaf barndoor set, safety glass and 300W bulb. Each fixture sets up quickly on the included Impact Air Cushioned Light Stands. The 33" translucent umbrellas allow you to soften the light emitted from the fixtures, for better portraits, and more even lighting for still-life subjects.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Qualite 300 Two Light Kit is centered around the Impact Qualite 300 Focusing Flood Light. The QL300 provides 300 watts of even light. It has a cool-touch handle for aiming the fixture, and the beam ranges from 21-40°. Each QL300 comes with a 4 leaf barndoor set, safety glass and 300W bulb. Each fixture sets up quickly on the included Impact Air Cushioned Light Stands.

The 33" translucent umbrellas allow you to soften the light emitted from the fixtures, for better portraits, and more even lighting for still-life subjects.

OVERVIEW: Impact Background Support Kit (Chroma Green) - You go on a shoot and need to throw up a quick background for a headshot. Impact makes this muslin fabric background that is perfect for the job. This chroma green, 10 x 12' (3 x 3.6 m) muslin background is great for any kind of film or video production. It can easily be folded and stored in the supplied see-thru carrying bag. And, if you own more than one, the see-thru feature allows you to quickly choose which Impact background you need without having to open several bags. The Impact Background Support System will support background rolls up to 11' in width, as well as accommodate the 12' width of any brand of muslin background. The system consists of 2 heavy-duty professional support stands with 3 positive locking knobs and tubular legs, a sturdy 4 piece crossbar that snaps together with positive button locking devices, and a heavy-duty canvas carry bag.It is suggested to secure the stands with gaffer tape, or weight bags when using any background setup where there are several people, or active children on the set.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Impact Background Support Kit (Chroma Green) - You go on a shoot and need to throw up a quick background for a headshot. Impact makes this muslin fabric background that is perfect for the job.

This chroma green, 10 x 12' (3 x 3.6 m) muslin background is great for any kind of film or video production. It can easily be folded and stored in the supplied see-thru carrying bag. And, if you own more than one, the see-thru feature allows you to quickly choose which Impact background you need without having to open several bags.

The Impact Background Support System will support background rolls up to 11' in width, as well as accommodate the 12' width of any brand of muslin background.

The system consists of 2 heavy-duty professional support stands with 3 positive locking knobs and tubular legs, a sturdy 4 piece crossbar that snaps together with positive button locking devices, and a heavy-duty canvas carry bag.

It is suggested to secure the stands with gaffer tape, or weight bags when using any background setup where there are several people, or active children on the set.

OVERVIEW: This Locking Adhesive-Backed Accessory Shoe is a replacement part for the Impact PowerSync16 DC remote control system. The accessory shoe is made of durable plastic and can hold a full assortment of photo gear that has a male or female shoe. It has a thumbwheel lock and can be mounted on the DC version of the remote control receiver, allowing you to use most major brands of flash, either on-camera or remotely. This accessory shoe will support up to 8 oz (227 g) in weight.

Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e and D810

OVERVIEW: This Impact Diffuser Sock is a heat-resistant (see note), 13" nylon fabric light softener ringed with strong elastic for a snug fit around metal strobe head reflectors. The diffuser softens the light output and reduces it by 1 stop.Diffuser Socks are stackable, offering the opportunity to increase the diffusion effect while reducing the light output.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Diffuser Sock is a heat-resistant (see note), 13" nylon fabric light softener ringed with strong elastic for a snug fit around metal strobe head reflectors. The diffuser softens the light output and reduces it by 1 stop.

Diffuser Socks are stackable, offering the opportunity to increase the diffusion effect while reducing the light output.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Intended for use on flash heads or fluorescent sources. Do not use on continuous hot light sources.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Quikbox (15 x 15") is a great way to expand the capabilities of your on-camera, shoe-mount flash. The Quikbox lives up to its name by popping open and assembling in a couple of minutes. Just pop open the softbox, add the diffusers and included adapter ring and shoe adapter, mount on a lightstand and you're ready to shoot. Using a softbox with your shoe-mounted flash will help to diffuse and to evenly distribute the light output of the flash. This will help to reduce those harsh shadows which are often the result of flash photography. Also included is an internal diffuser, to minimize the possibility of hotspots. In addition, the recessed front face helps to control light spill. The included flash bracket is adjustable vertically, and features a universal shoe which is adjustable horizontally. These adjustments make this unit compatible with virtually all standard flash units (incl. Nikon SB-900 & SB-910), as well as radio receivers. In addition, for those receivers that do not feature a bottom shoe connector, the bracket shoe is removable to expose a male 1/4"-20 screw. There are also three plastic washers included in the shoe assembly, to accommodate receivers of various sizes.

OVERVIEW: You might be surprised at how many photo assignments you can handle with a compact, lightweight monolight like the Impact Digital Monolight 400W/s (120VAC). It's got 400w/s of power in an easily transportable package, and light output that can be varied in 1/10 stop stages over a 4-stop range, accessible through the digital readout. The 150W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts S-type monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. Perfect for portraits, small still-lifes, and much more.
OVERVIEW_RAW: You might be surprised at how many photo assignments you can handle with a compact, lightweight monolight like the Impact Digital Monolight 400W/s (120VAC). It's got 400w/s of power in an easily transportable package, and light output that can be varied in 1/10 stop stages over a 4-stop range, accessible through the digital readout.  The 150W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts S-type monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. Perfect for portraits, small still-lifes, and much more.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Diffusion/Grid Set for On-Camera Flash Beauty Dish is an accessory set of grids and filters used to modify the light of the Impact Strobros Beauty Dish. Using the honeycomb grids, you can confine the spread of the light from the Beauty Dish. A neutral filter allows you to control the amount of light, and the three color filters give you the tools to use color more expressively with your on-camera flash and the Beauty Dish.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Diffusion/Grid Set for On-Camera Flash Beauty Dish is an accessory set of grids and filters used to modify the light of the Impact Strobros Beauty Dish. Using the honeycomb grids, you can confine the spread of the light from the Beauty Dish. A neutral filter allows you to control the amount of light, and the three color filters give you the tools to use color more expressively with your on-camera flash and the Beauty Dish.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact Interview Green Screen Kit has everything you need for creative color key photography or videography. 
Impact Qualite 300 focusing floodlights (2x) offer a variable beam angle of 21 to 40° and come complete with barndoors. The included 33" translucent umbrellas may be used in bounce or shoot-through mode to soften the light, their shafts slipping into convenient receptacles in the light's mount. Once inserted, umbrellas with 7 or 8mm (standard size) shafts are locked into place by tightening the fixture's tilting knob. 
The Impact Multiboom stand is a useful support capable of holding a reflector as well as providing hair light or back light, while the inclusion of 2 additional stands ensure a variety of potential setups. 
A collapsible 5 x 7' Chroma Green Background folds to approximately 1/3 its open size to fit in its own zippered slip case. to top it off, the kit includes Westcott's Photo Creator Kit. The main component in this kit is the software that automatically extracts the green background to enable the substitution of your choice of alternate digital background. The software comes with a library of 720 digital backgrounds designed to appeal to a broad spectrum of ages and interests. Simply drop in a distant locale or landmark that places your subject far from where you took the photo.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Interview Green Screen Kit has everything you need for creative color key photography or videography.

 

Impact Qualite 300 focusing floodlights (2x) offer a variable beam angle of 21 to 40° and come complete with barndoors. The included 33" translucent umbrellas may be used in bounce or shoot-through mode to soften the light, their shafts slipping into convenient receptacles in the light's mount. Once inserted, umbrellas with 7 or 8mm (standard size) shafts are locked into place by tightening the fixture's tilting knob.  

The Impact Multiboom stand is a useful support capable of holding a reflector as well as providing hair light or back light, while the inclusion of 2 additional stands ensure a variety of potential setups. 

A collapsible 5 x 7' Chroma Green Background folds to approximately 1/3 its open size to fit in its own zippered slip case. to top it off, the kit includes Westcott's Photo Creator Kit. The main component in this kit is the software that automatically extracts the green background to enable the substitution of your choice of alternate digital background. The software comes with a library of 720 digital backgrounds designed to appeal to a broad spectrum of ages and interests. Simply drop in a distant locale or landmark that places your subject far from where you took the photo.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 5-Lamp Fluorescent Cool Light Diffusion Kit gives you great flexibility at an excellent price: 2 daylight-balanced fluorescent light heads (variable across 3 f-stops), 2 light stands, and 2 diffusers to soften the light. Each light head holds 5 lamps (for a total of 150 watts), and each lamp can be turned on/off separately to increase or decrease the overall light output. An 18.5" reflector provides wide, even coverage, and an included internal diffusion panel can be used to further soften the light. A fabric diffusion sock that fits over the front of the light is included for further light diffusion, with a 1/2-stop loss of light.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact 5-Lamp Fluorescent Cool Light Diffusion Kit gives you great flexibility at an excellent price: 2 daylight-balanced fluorescent light heads (variable across 3 f-stops), 2 light stands, and 2 diffusers to soften the light. Each light head holds 5 lamps (for a total of 150 watts), and each lamp can be turned on/off separately to increase or decrease the overall light output. An 18.5" reflector provides wide, even coverage, and an included internal diffusion panel can be used to further soften the light. A fabric diffusion sock that fits over the front of the light is included for further light diffusion, with a 1/2-stop loss of light.

OVERVIEW: Two lights, 2 stands, 2 softboxes. The Impact Qualite 300 Focusing Flood 2 Light Soft Kit has the basics you need for a wide range of photo assignments in the studio or on location. Start with two Qualite 300 focusing floodlights - each head gives you 300 watts of even light, with a beam from 21° to 40° and a cool-touch handle for aiming the light. The aluminum light stands feature air cushioning, so if you forget to tighten a section, it will slooowly come down, giving you time to save your equipment from damage. Each included Impact Luxbanx Duo Softbox is 16 x 22 x 13" (41 x 56 x 33 cm) and has a silver interior for a softening effect that will still produce specular highlights on reflective surfaces. The kit also includes the two necessary speed rings with which to attach the softboxes to the light head.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Two lights, 2 stands, 2 softboxes. The Impact Qualite 300 Focusing Flood 2 Light Soft Kit has the basics you need for a wide range of photo assignments in the studio or on location. Start with two Qualite 300 focusing floodlights - each head gives you 300 watts of even light, with a beam from 21° to 40° and a cool-touch handle for aiming the light. The aluminum light stands feature air cushioning, so if you forget to tighten a section, it will slooowly come down, giving you time to save your equipment from damage. Each included Impact Luxbanx Duo Softbox is 16 x 22 x 13" (41 x 56 x 33 cm) and has a silver interior for a softening effect that will still produce specular highlights on reflective surfaces. The kit also includes the two necessary speed rings with which to attach the softboxes to the light head.

OVERVIEW: How many kinds of photo assignments can you can handle with an outfit like the Impact Three Light Portrait Boom Kit (120VAC)? You'd be surprised. It's got 2 VS-LCD 400w/s digital monolights, one Impact EX100A 100w/s monolight, a versatile stand that can be used as a boom or hold a reflector, two white umbrellas, two 10' light stands, a radio slave transmitter and receiver, and a kit bag to hold everything. Light output can be varied in 1/10-stop stages over a 4-stop range with the VS-LCD, accessible through the digital readout. The 100W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts Bowens monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. The EX100A monolight kit adds an additional 100w/s of light and included 24x24" softbox.The white umbrellas soften and broaden the light. The Impact aluminum light stands extend to 10' in 4 sections, with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten a section with your light mounted, the light comes down slowly, thanks to the air-cushioning. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap. The convertible boom arm/light stand can be used as a 13' light stand, a boom for a small light, or to hold a reflector up to 60" in diameter. The radio slave transmitter and receiver let's you trigger the strobes without being connected to a sync cord. And you can pack it all into the included kit bag.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Light output can be varied in 1/10-stop stages over a 4-stop range with the VS-LCD, accessible through the digital readout. The 100W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts Bowens monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. The EX100A monolight kit adds an additional 100w/s of light and included 24x24" softbox.

The white umbrellas soften and broaden the light. The Impact aluminum light stands extend to 10' in 4 sections, with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten a section with your light mounted, the light comes down slowly, thanks to the air-cushioning. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap. The convertible boom arm/light stand can be used as a 13' light stand, a boom for a small light, or to hold a reflector up to 60" in diameter. The radio slave transmitter and receiver let's you trigger the strobes without being connected to a sync cord. And you can pack it all into the included kit bag.

OVERVIEW: How many kinds of photo assignments can you can handle with a compact outfit like the Impact VS-LCD 2 400W/s Digital Monolight Softbox Kit You'd be surprised. It's got 2 VS-LCD 400w/s digital monolights--800w/s of power in an easily transportable package, two 10' light stands, two 26x26" softboxes, and a kit bag to hold everything.Light output in the monolights can be varied in 1/10-stop stages over a 4-stop range, accessible through the digital readout. The 100W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts Bowens monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. In addition, this kit also includes the Impact PowerTrigger 16 Channel AC Transmitter and Receiver System. Sixteen channels offer more than ample avoidance of local radio interference, and total freedom from dragging around a sync cord. Sixteen channels also provide the opportunity to assign different groupings of lights their own channel, to be triggered by switching the channel in the transmitter that mounts on a camera's hot shoe. The two 26x26" Impact softboxes with silver interiors will diffuse the light with less loss of light than white interiors, with a more spectral light quality compared to larger softboxes, and faster fall-off from highlight to shadow areas. Included are also the two required speedrings. The Impact aluminum light stands extend to 10' in 4 sections, with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten a section with your light mounted, the light comes down slowly, thanks to the air-cushioning. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap. The Impact Light Kit Bag is a soft, padded nylon case which easily accommodates the entire kit. It has overlapping carrying handles and an included shoulder strap.

Sixteen channels offer more than ample avoidance of local radio interference, and total freedom from dragging around a sync cord. Sixteen channels also provide the opportunity to assign different groupings of lights their own channel, to be triggered by switching the channel in the transmitter that mounts on a camera's hot shoe.

The two 26x26" Impact softboxes with silver interiors will diffuse the light with less loss of light than white interiors, with a more spectral light quality compared to larger softboxes, and faster fall-off from highlight to shadow areas. Included are also the two required speedrings. The Impact aluminum light stands extend to 10' in 4 sections, with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten a section with your light mounted, the light comes down slowly, thanks to the air-cushioning. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap. The Impact Light Kit Bag is a soft, padded nylon case which easily accommodates the entire kit. It has overlapping carrying handles and an included shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW: How many kinds of photo assignments can you can handle with a compact outfit like the Impact VS-LCD400 400W Digital Monolight 1-Light Kit? You'd be surprised. It's got a VS-LCD 400w/s digital monolight--400w/s of power in an easily transportable package--one light stand and one white translucent umbrella. Light output can be varied in 1/10-stop stages over a 4-stop range, accessible through the digital readout. The 150W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts S-type monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. The white umbrella softens and broadens the light. An air cushioned light stand provides protection from impact damage while adjusting its height. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap.

It's got 2 VS-LCD 400w/s digital monopods, one Impact EX100A 100W/s monopod, two white umbrellas, two 10' light stands,  one 3' backlight stand, a radio slave transmitter and receiver, and a kit bag to hold everything.

Light output can be varied in 1/10-stop stages over a 4-stop range with the VS-LCD, accessible through the digital readout. The 100W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts Bowens monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. The EX100A monopod kit adds an additional 100w/s of light and included 24x24" softbox.

The white umbrellas soften and broaden the light. The Impact aluminum light stands extend to 10' in 4 sections, with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten a section with your light mounted, the light comes down slowly, thanks to the air-cushioning. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap. The 3' backlight stand can be used on a floor or table--particularly useful for a backlight. The radio slave transmitter and receiver let's you trigger the strobes without being connected to a sync cord. And you can pack it all into the included kit bag.

OVERVIEW: How many kinds of photo assignments can you can handle with a compact outfit like the Impact Two Digital Monolight Kit without Case (120VAC)? You'd be surprised. It's got 2 VS-LCD 400w/s digital monolights--800w/s of power plus two light stands, and two white translucent umbrellas. Light output in the monolights can be varied in 1/10-stop stages over a 4-stop range, accessible through the digital readout. The 150W modeling light can be coupled to the flash, getting brighter or dimmer to match the actual light output, or independently set to the level you want. The monolight accepts S-type monolight reflectors and head accessories. It also has a limited Auto Dump function, firing the strobe when you reset to a different power level (so the strobe is automatically set to the correct setting for the next flash). A built-in optical slave allows the monolight to be triggered using another flash. The white umbrellas soften and broaden the light. The aluminum light stands lock with sure-twist section locks, and if you forget to tighten a section with your light mounted, the light comes down slowly, thanks to the air-cushioning. And the light stands will accept casters, which makes positioning the lights a snap.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Flashtube for VS-LCD400 Monolight is a user-replaceable, 400 Ws tube with a UV coating and a color temperature of 5500-5800K. When changing the tube unplug the unit. Handle the tube with gloves, plastic or paper to avoid residue that might shorten the life of the tube.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Flashtube for EX 100 Monolight is a user-replaceable 100Ws flashtube that's easily plugged into the EX 100 monolight--with careful handling, the flashtube should last for thousands of flashes with normal use.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Umbrella Bracket with Adjustable Shoe is a versatile, lightweight metal bracket that will fit on almost any light stand. It includes a removable, reversible female stud to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". An additional removable, reversible male stud mounts to the included flash shoe at the 1/4"-20 end, or to another accessory at the 3/8" end. The metal shoe features a knurled locking knob for secure mounting of all standard shoe-mount flashes, including the Nikon SB-900 and SB-910.A receptacle with its own locking knob accommodates an umbrella which may be tilted to the angle of your choice via the bracket's locking joint. Umbrellas larger than 45" in diameter are not recommended.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Umbrella Bracket with Adjustable Shoe is a versatile, lightweight metal bracket that will fit on almost any light stand. It includes a removable, reversible female stud to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". An additional removable, reversible male stud mounts to the included flash shoe at the 1/4"-20 end, or to another accessory at the 3/8" end. The metal shoe features a knurled locking knob for secure mounting of all standard shoe-mount flashes, including the Nikon SB-900 and SB-910.

A receptacle with its own locking knob accommodates an umbrella which may be tilted to the angle of your choice via the bracket's locking joint. Umbrellas larger than 45" in diameter are not recommended.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Strobros Portrait Kit offers a comprehensive set of on-camera flash accessories to enable users a convenient way to create professional-looking portraits.
This kit includes the Strobros Impact Beauty Dish Reflector for on-camera flash units. It uses an ingenious mounting system that works for virtually any on-camera flash, and spreads out the flash to produce a creamy, more uniform light with soft shadows. It comes with three interior reflector discs (soft gold, soft silver, and silver) for warm, slightly cool, or cool color, respectively. Also included is the Strobros Impact Diffusion/Grid Set for use on the reflector. It includes three color filters, a neutral filter to reduce light output, and three grids to reduce light spill and project different honeycomb patterns. The Strobros Impact Snoot creates a narrow, defined circle of light. Previously, it was difficult if not impossible to achieve the defined circle-of-light "spotlight" look that this snoot delivers, without studio strobes.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Strobros Portrait Kit offers a comprehensive set of on-camera flash accessories to enable users a convenient way to create professional-looking portraits.

This kit includes the Strobros Impact Beauty Dish Reflector for on-camera flash units. It uses an ingenious mounting system that works for virtually any on-camera flash, and spreads out the flash to produce a creamy, more uniform light with soft shadows. It comes with three interior reflector discs (soft gold, soft silver, and silver) for warm, slightly cool, or cool color, respectively. Also included is the Strobros Impact Diffusion/Grid Set for use on the reflector. It includes three color filters, a neutral filter to reduce light output, and three grids to reduce light spill and project different honeycomb patterns. The Strobros Impact Snoot creates a narrow, defined circle of light. Previously, it was difficult if not impossible to achieve the defined circle-of-light "spotlight" look that this snoot delivers, without studio strobes.

OVERVIEW:
If you're ready to take the plunge into chroma key photography--photographing a person against a background of solid blue or green and then digitally inserting a different photo in the background (say, a beach in Mexico, or the Eiffel Tower)-- then the Impact EX100 Ultimate Creative Portrait Kit (120VAC) may be just what you need. It combines two basic one-monolight (100Ws) kits, each including one light stand and one 24 x 24" (61 x 61 cm) softbox, with one white umbrella and a green screen photo kit including a 5 x 7' (1.5 x 2.1 m) chroma green background (with grommets and hooks for hanging the screen) and software that automatically removes the green background. The software then allows you to simply drop in a distant locale or landmark background that places your subject far from where you took the photo. The software includes 720 digital backgrounds to choose from.

A kit bag is also included for storage and transport. This kit is supplied for use with 120VAC.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
If you're ready to take the plunge into chroma key photography--photographing a person against a background of solid blue or green and then digitally inserting a different photo in the background (say, a beach in Mexico, or the Eiffel Tower)-- then the Impact EX100 Ultimate Creative Portrait Kit (120VAC) may be just what you need. It combines two basic one-monolight (100Ws) kits, each including one light stand and one 24 x 24" (61 x 61 cm) softbox, with one white umbrella and a green screen photo kit including a 5 x 7' (1.5 x 2.1 m) chroma green background (with grommets and hooks for hanging the screen) and software that automatically removes the green background. The software then allows you to simply drop in a distant locale or landmark background that places your subject far from where you took the photo. The software includes 720 digital backgrounds to choose from.

A kit bag is also included for storage and transport. This kit is supplied for use with 120VAC.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 7" Grid Set (10/20/30/40 Degree) helps you control your light more precisely. This set of 4 honeycomb grids, which fit any standard 7" grid reflector (other than Broncolor or Profoto), gives you a choice of a 10°, 20°, 30°, or 40° beam of light, to match your specific needs, perfect for an accent light or spot. A tension spring can stretch or arch to fit the reflector.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Sync Cord Male PC to Sub Mini is an 18" (45 cm) cable. It features a sub-mini plug at one end, and a male PC (post connection) plug at the other end. This allows radio remote control receivers (e.g. MicroSync Receiver) to be connected to the Canon 580EX II or Nikon SB-26, SB-28, SB-80, SB-800, and SB-900 flashes for remote triggering. It can also be used with lightmeters, which usually use a PC male cord. In addition, it can be used to trigger small flash units like Morris or SP brands from the camera.

OVERVIEW: The Impact PowerSync16 AC Radio Slave System is designed for triggering flash units or cameras up to 590' (180 m) away indoors, or 200' (60 m) outdoors using the battery-operated transmitter and 120VAC-powered receiver. PowerSync16 has 16 digitally coded channels available so you can even work at events with other photographers without flash or radio interference. You can trigger as many flashes or cameras as you like from one transmitter, as long as they're all on the same frequency and have a PowerSync16 AC or optional DC receiver. Flash sync speeds of up to 1/250 second are possible with PowerSync16. The transmitter operates on one 3V CR2450 battery, and the receiver requires a connection to 120VAC. The PowerSync16 system is not designed to perform in TTL mode with flash units - camera and flash must be set to Manual Mode.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
The Impact PowerSync16 DC Radio Slave System is designed for triggering flash units and cameras up to 590' (180m) away indoors, or 200' (60m) outdoors using the included battery-operated transmitter and receiver.
PowerSync16 has 16 digitally coded channels available so you can even work at events with other photographers without flash or radio interference. You can trigger as many flashes or cameras as you like from one transmitter, as long as they're all on the same frequency and have this PowerSync16 DC or optional AC receiver. Flash sync speeds of up to 1/250 second are possible with PowerSync16.
The transmitter operates on one 3V CR2450 battery, and the receiver uses 2x AA batteries (included). Included in the kit are a mini to mini cable, a mini to phono adapter, and a submini to pc cable. Impact offers a selection of other compatible sync cables and camera release cables as well. The PowerSync16 system is not designed to perform in TTL mode with flash units - camera and flash must be set to Manual Mode.

OVERVIEW: The Impact PowerSync16 Transmitter is one-half of the PowerSync16 radio slave system for triggering flash units up to 590' (180 m) away indoors, or 200' (60 m) outdoors using the AC receiver or the DC receiver (both available separately). PowerSync16 has 16 digitally coded channels available so you can even work at events with other photographers without flash or radio interference. You can trigger as many flashes or cameras as you like from this one transmitter, as long as they're all on the same frequency and have a PowerSync16 receiver. Flash sync speeds of up to 1/250 second are possible with PowerSync16. The transmitter features a hot shoe mount and can be triggered directly from the camera. In addition, a PC sync cord is included, which allows the transmitter to be positioned off-camera to be triggered via the camera's PC socket. The transmitter operates on one 3V CR2450 battery. The PowerSync system is not designed to perform in TTL mode with flash units - camera and flash must be set to Manual Mode.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact PowerSync16 Transmitter is one-half of the PowerSync16 radio slave system for triggering flash units up to 590' (180 m) away indoors, or 200' (60 m) outdoors using the AC receiver or the DC receiver (both available separately).

PowerSync16 has 16 digitally coded channels available so you can even work at events with other photographers without flash or radio interference. You can trigger as many flashes or cameras as you like from this one transmitter, as long as they're all on the same frequency and have a PowerSync16 receiver. Flash sync speeds of up to 1/250 second are possible with PowerSync16.

The transmitter features a hot shoe mount and can be triggered directly from the camera. In addition, a PC sync cord is included, which allows the transmitter to be positioned off-camera to be triggered via the camera's PC socket. The transmitter operates on one 3V CR2450 battery.

The PowerSync system is not designed to perform in TTL mode with flash units - camera and flash must be set to Manual Mode.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: This remote does not provide high-voltage sync protection, and is not recommended for use with flash units that have a trigger voltage of more than 6V.

OVERVIEW: The Impact PowerSync16 DC Receiver (100-240VAC) is one-half of the PowerSync 16 radio slave system for triggering flash and camera units up to 590' (180 m) away indoors, or 200' (60 m) outdoors using the PowerSync16 Transmitter (available separately). PowerSync16 has 16 digitally coded channels available so you can even work at events with other photographers without flash or radio interference. You can trigger as many flashes or cameras as you like from a single transmitter, as long as they're all on the same frequency and have this PowerSync16 DC receiver or the optional AC receiver. Flash sync speeds of up to 1/250 second are possible with PowerSync16. Combine this receiver with a camera release cable to match your particular camera model and you can use the PowerSync16 system as a wireless camera remote control. This receiver operates on 2x AA batteries. The PowerSync system is not designed to perform in TTL mode with flash units - the flash must be set to Manual Mode.

OVERVIEW: The Impact EYH Lamp is a 250W, 120V ceramic base, tungsten halogen lamp commonly used in photo or video lighting fixtures. It has an approximate color temperature of 3000 K and lamp life of 150 hours. It is also known as EYH/FKT.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact EYH Lamp is a 250W, 120V ceramic base, tungsten halogen lamp commonly used in photo or video lighting fixtures. It has an approximate color temperature of 3000 K and lamp life of 150 hours. It is also known as EYH/FKT.

OVERVIEW: This Impact FXL Lamp is a 410W MR-16 quartz halogen reflector lamp commonly used in video and film projectors as well as small light fixtures. Color temperature is 3300 K.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact FXL Lamp is a 410W MR-16 quartz halogen reflector lamp commonly used in video and film projectors as well as small light fixtures. Color temperature is 3300 K.

OVERVIEW: The Impact I-100 (100W / 12V) is a quartz halogen bulb used in small light fixtures such as Lowel's "i" and "id" lights. It has a color temperature of 3050K and an average life of 50 hours.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact I-100 (100W / 12V) is a quartz halogen bulb used in small light fixtures such as Lowel's "i" and "id" lights. It has a color temperature of 3050K and an average life of 50 hours.

OVERVIEW: The Impact I-55 (55W, 12V) is a quartz halogen bulb used in small light fixtures such as Lowel's "i" and "id" lights. It has a color temperature of 3000K and an average life of 150 hours.

OVERVIEW: The Impact LiteTrek 4.0 DC Flash Head offers a wide array of advanced studio and DSLR-friendly features in a lightweight (2.6 lb) head intended for use in the field where AC power is unavailable.Starting with strong core specs like 400W/s of power delivered promptly in 2 seconds at full power, the head offers 5 stops of output variability with action-stopping flash durations as low as 1/14000 sec.Consistency is stressed at every stage of production, evident in the tight +/-100K tolerance in its 5500K flash tube. The Autodump feature automatically "bleeds" extra power from the capacitors when powered down.Advanced features include Multi Mode which allows you to utilize stroboscopic technology for motion studies or sports, as well as Quick Mode which automatically powers down the flash to permit focal plane shooting at shutter speeds as short as 1/13,000 sec.Convenience features include a removable power cord and stand mount for easy packing. The LiteTrek 4.0 requires a power source and requires the optional Impact LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack system which offers 650 maximum power flashes or 3500 minimum power flashes on a single charge.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact LiteTrek 4.0 DC Flash Head offers a wide array of advanced studio and DSLR-friendly features in a lightweight (2.6 lb) head intended for use in the field where AC power is unavailable.

Starting with strong core specs like 400W/s of power delivered promptly in 2 seconds at full power, the head offers 5 stops of output variability with action-stopping flash durations as low as 1/14000 sec.

Consistency is stressed at every stage of production, evident in the tight +/-100K tolerance in its 5500K flash tube. The Autodump feature automatically "bleeds" extra power from the capacitors when powered down.

Advanced features include Multi Mode which allows you to utilize stroboscopic technology for motion studies or sports, as well as Quick Mode which automatically powers down the flash to permit focal plane shooting at shutter speeds as short as 1/13,000 sec.

Convenience features include a removable power cord and stand mount for easy packing. The LiteTrek 4.0 requires a power source and requires the optional Impact LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack system which offers 650 maximum power flashes or 3500 minimum power flashes on a single charge.

OVERVIEW: Whether it's fashion, wedding or portrait photography, the best way to achieve professional-looking results in the field is by adding flash to the ambient light. The Impact Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack provides DC juice to your Impact LiteTrek 4.0 portable flash or select Nikon and Canon flashes with optional power cords as well as Quantum flashes without adaptation.Simply plug the DC cord which comes with the LiteTrek 4.0 into Outlet A on the Mini LT's top panel (Outlet B is for other brands). The panel features a "fuel gauge" indicator to display available power. The LiteTrek 4.0 will give you an impressive 650 full power flashes or 3,500 1/64th power flashes on a single 4 hour charge. Recycling times are from 1.0 - 3.5 seconds. Unlike other battery systems, the Mini LT's battery separates from the power module with a simple "push and slide" action which is reminiscent of a camera quick release. You can pack additional batteries alone without the extra weight of a second or third full battery system. Besides reducing the weight this also reduces the cost; the battery alone is less than ½ the price of the complete system.The Battery pack set comes with a separate power module, battery pack, multi-voltage charger and a case with a shoulder strap. With most compatible flash units, an additional flash cable is required to connect the battery pack to the flash.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Whether it's fashion, wedding or portrait photography, the best way to achieve professional-looking results in the field is by adding flash to the ambient light. The Impact Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack provides DC juice to your Impact LiteTrek 4.0 portable flash or select Nikon and Canon flashes with optional power cords as well as Quantum flashes without adaptation.

Simply plug the DC cord which comes with the LiteTrek 4.0 into Outlet A on the Mini LT's top panel (Outlet B is for other brands). The panel features a "fuel gauge" indicator to display available power. The LiteTrek 4.0 will give you an impressive 650 full power flashes or 3,500 1/64th power flashes on a single 4 hour charge. Recycling times are from 1.0 - 3.5 seconds. Unlike other battery systems, the Mini LT's battery separates from the power module with a simple "push and slide" action which is reminiscent of a camera quick release. You can pack additional batteries alone without the extra weight of a second or third full battery system. Besides reducing the weight this also reduces the cost; the battery alone is less than ½ the price of the complete system.

The Battery pack set comes with a separate power module, battery pack, multi-voltage charger and a case with a shoulder strap. With most compatible flash units, an additional flash cable is required to connect the battery pack to the flash.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery is a power source for the Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack system. It’s always wise to pack an extra battery for large shoots or out of the way places without access to AC power. The swappable battery instantly slips onto the Mini LT power module like a quality quick release mount. Capacity is 650 full power flashes or 3,500 1/64th power flashes with the Impact LiteTrek 4.0 monohead.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery is a power source for the Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack system. It’s always wise to pack an extra battery for large shoots or out of the way places without access to AC power. The swappable battery instantly slips onto the Mini LT power module like a quality quick release mount. Capacity is 650 full power flashes or 3,500 1/64th power flashes with the Impact LiteTrek 4.0 monohead.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Requires Mini LiteTrek (LT) power module and charger for use

OVERVIEW: The Impact AC Charger for Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack is required to recharge the Impact LiteTrek (LT) Portable Power Pack battery. Full charge is reached in about 4 hours. The charger will operate on 100-240VAC, and can be adapted for worldwide use by adding the appropriate plug adapter.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact AC Charger for Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack is required to recharge the Impact LiteTrek (LT) Portable Power Pack battery. Full charge is reached in about 4 hours. The charger will operate on 100-240VAC, and can be adapted for worldwide use by adding the appropriate plug adapter.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Flashtube for LiteTrek 4.0 is a replacement for the tube that ships as a standard component of the LiteTrek 4.0 flash head. The user-replaceable flashtube has a 400W/s capacity.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact Flashtube for LiteTrek 4.0 is a replacement for the tube that ships as a standard component of the LiteTrek 4.0 flash head. The user-replaceable flashtube has a 400W/s capacity.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Octacool-6 Fluorescent Light Kit with Octabox (6 Lamps) is a great choice for the photographer or videographer seeking a broad, flattering light source with unique fall-off characteristics for portraiture, fashion or events. Octagonal-shaped light sources have long had a reputation as the preferred portrait-shooter's light source. The shape offers an especially large surface area which produces that legendary "wrap-around" light, which envelopes the subject while creating natural-looking catchlights in the eyes. The kit is comprised of a separate 6-lamp Octacool light head and removable Octabox. Each of the daylight-balanced 32W lamps outputs 1,400 lumens of light for a total of 8,400 lumens measured at 3.3 feet. Three switches on the rear of the fixture control 2 lamps each allowing you to vary the output in 2,800 lumen increments. The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a huge variety of light stands and gripware with 5/8" studs.The included Octabox has a removable inner baffle and front face allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light head also comes with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, contrasty lighting option.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Octacool-6 Fluorescent Light Kit with Octabox (6 Lamps) is a great choice for the photographer or videographer seeking a broad, flattering light source with unique fall-off characteristics for portraiture, fashion or events.

Octagonal-shaped light sources have long had a reputation as the preferred portrait-shooter's light source. The shape offers an especially large surface area which produces that legendary "wrap-around" light, which envelopes the subject while creating natural-looking catchlights in the eyes.

The kit is comprised of a separate 6-lamp Octacool light head and removable Octabox. Each of the daylight-balanced 32W lamps outputs 1,400 lumens of light for a total of 8,400 lumens measured at 3.3 feet. Three switches on the rear of the fixture control 2 lamps each allowing you to vary the output in 2,800 lumen increments. The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a huge variety of light stands and gripware with 5/8" studs.

The included Octabox has a removable inner baffle and front face allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light head also comes with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, contrasty lighting option.

The shape offers an especially large surface area which produces that legendary "wrap-around" light, which envelopes the subject while creating natural-looking catchlights in the eyes.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 7-in-1 Collapsible Reflector Disc offers versatile light control with a variety of reflective colors. It's a 42" (106.7 cm) diameter spring steel frame covered with a heavy-duty pliable nylon blend translucent fabric, with additional fabric covers that slip over the reflector and provide white, gold, silver, and silver-gold reflectors, plus chroma green and chroma blue covers to provide small chroma backgrounds. The translucent material is used to diffuse light, producing a broad light source and a soft, wraparound effect that's perfect for outdoor portraits or whenever a softer light is needed. White produces an even, neutral-colored bounce light that works beautifully as a fill light source for both product shots and indoor/outdoor portraits. Gold produces a natural, golden fill that is great for jewelry and indoor portraits. Silver increases the specular highlights and yields a high-contrast image. Silver-gold gives you more contrast than gold, and warmer color than the silver. The blue and the green chroma-key fabrics turn the reflector into a small chroma-key background. The frame folds down to approximately 1/3 of its full size, for convenient storage and transport.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact Daylight 12" Reflector Two-Floodlight Light Kit consists of two complete daylight balanced floodlight kits. Each kit includes a ceramic socket with wooden handle, 12" aluminum reflector, a light stand, and a 500 watt screw-in daylight balanced bulb. The reflectors are made of heavy-grade brushed aluminum to maximize the light output. 
The light socket features a high heat ceramic socket and all high heat metal that won't melt like units with plastic sockets. It also features a wooden control handle that stays cool, and includes a built-in adjustable umbrella mount. The attached cord comes with an in-line switch, and the adjustable metal mount features a 5/8" receiver for light stands and an 8mm umbrella receptacle.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Daylight 12" Reflector Two-Floodlight Light Kit consists of two complete daylight balanced floodlight kits. Each kit includes a ceramic socket with wooden handle, 12" aluminum reflector, a light stand, and a 500 watt screw-in daylight balanced bulb. The reflectors are made of heavy-grade brushed aluminum to maximize the light output.

The light socket features a high heat ceramic socket and all high heat metal that won't melt like units with plastic sockets. It also features a wooden control handle that stays cool, and includes a built-in adjustable umbrella mount. The attached cord comes with an in-line switch, and the adjustable metal mount features a 5/8" receiver for light stands and an 8mm umbrella receptacle.

OVERVIEW: This Impact D-1000 1,000W AC Dimmer Control gives you stepless 1-100% power control over your quartz halogen or incandescent light source up to 1,000W. Unlike other models, the dimmer is equipped with a 3-prong US grounded plug with heavy-gauge 6'4" cord, as well as a 3-prong input for the light to be dimmed. The lightweight plastic D-1000 features a simple sliding rheostat control that can be operated by hand or foot.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact D-1000 1,000W AC Dimmer Control gives you stepless 1-100% power control over your quartz halogen or incandescent light source up to 1,000W. Unlike other models, the dimmer is equipped with a 3-prong US grounded plug with heavy-gauge 6'4" cord, as well as a 3-prong input for the light to be dimmed. The lightweight plastic D-1000 features a simple sliding rheostat control that can be operated by hand or foot.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Not for use with fluorescent fixtures

OVERVIEW: The Impact Universal Filter Holder is an ideal accessory for achieving diffusion, color correction or special color effects with any light, whether it's quartz, HMI, photoflood or flash. It can also hold polarizing filters or gobos. Using a grip-like mount, it clamps onto the riser of most light stands and adjusts to various distances in front of the light via its 3-section, 16" adjustable arm.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Universal Filter Holder is an ideal accessory for achieving diffusion, color correction or special color effects with any light, whether it's quartz, HMI, photoflood or flash. It can also hold polarizing filters or gobos. Using a grip-like mount, it clamps onto the riser of most light stands and adjusts to various distances in front of the light via its 3-section, 16" adjustable arm.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Porcelain Socket with Umbrella Mount (500W) is a cost effective way to utilize a wide variety of E26 (Edison) based lamps for photo or video work. Options include simple household lamps as well as photoflood and quartz halogen bulbs. This highly versatile product has an adjustable metal mount with a 5/8" receiver for light stands and an 8mm umbrella receptacle. The Floodlight Socket tilts and locks in place at the desired angle by grasping the stay-cool wooden handle and releasing the locking knob. Lamps up to 500W won't melt the ceramic base which is impervious to heat. The socket also accepts screw-on reflectors of various sizes.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Octacool-9 Fluorescent 1 Light Kit with Octabox (9 Lamps) is a great choice for the photographer or videographer seeking a broad, flattering light source with unique fall-off characteristics for portraiture, fashion or events.Octagonal-shaped light sources have long had a reputation as the preferred portrait-shooter's light source. The shape offers an especially large surface area which produces that legendary "wrap-around" light, which envelopes the subject while creating natural-looking catchlights in the eyes.
The kit is comprised of a separate 9-lamp Octacool light head and removable Octabox, and a light stand. Each of the provided daylight-balanced 27 - 32W (depending on supply) lamps outputs 1,400 lumens of light for a total of 12,600 lumens measured at 3.3 feet. Five switches on the rear of the fixture allow individual control of lamps allowing 1 - 9 of them to be switched on or off, varying output in 1,400 lumen increments. The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a huge variety of light stands and gripware with 5/8" studs. A sturdy 9.5' air-cushioned light stand rounds out the kit.
The included Octabox has a removable inner baffle and front face allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light head also comes with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, contrasty lighting option.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Octacool-9 Fluorescent 1 Light Kit with Octabox (9 Lamps) is a great choice for the photographer or videographer seeking a broad, flattering light source with unique fall-off characteristics for portraiture, fashion or events.

Octagonal-shaped light sources have long had a reputation as the preferred portrait-shooter's light source. The shape offers an especially large surface area which produces that legendary "wrap-around" light, which envelopes the subject while creating natural-looking catchlights in the eyes.

The kit is comprised of a separate 9-lamp Octacool light head and removable Octabox, and a light stand. Each of the provided daylight-balanced 27 - 32W (depending on supply) lamps outputs 1,400 lumens of light for a total of 12,600 lumens measured at 3.3 feet. Five switches on the rear of the fixture allow individual control of lamps allowing 1 - 9 of them to be switched on or off, varying output in 1,400 lumen increments. The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a huge variety of light stands and gripware with 5/8" studs. A sturdy 9.5' air-cushioned light stand rounds out the kit.

The included Octabox has a removable inner baffle and front face allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light head also comes with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, contrasty lighting option.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: The Octacool is not recommended for hot lights.

Each of the provided daylight-balanced 27 - 32W (depending on supply) lamps outputs 1,400 lumens of light for a total of 8,400 lumens measured at 3.3 feet. Three switches on the rear of the fixture control 2 lamps each allowing you to vary the output in 2,800 lumen increments. The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a huge variety of light stands and gripware with 5/8" studs.The included Octaboxes have removable inner baffles and front faces allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light heads also each come with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, contrasty lighting option. Two sturdy 9.5' (2.9 m) air-cushioned light stands round out the kit.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Octacool-6 Fluorescent 2 Light Kit with Octabox (6 Lamps) is a great choice for the photographer or videographer seeking a broad, flattering light source with unique fall-off characteristics for portraiture, fashion or events.

Octagonal-shaped light sources have long had a reputation as the preferred portrait-shooter's light source. The shape offers an especially large surface area which produces that legendary "wrap-around" light, which envelopes the subject while creating natural-looking catchlights in the eyes.

The kit is comprised of 2 separate 6-lamp Octacool light heads, each with a removable Octabox, and a light stand. Each of the provided daylight-balanced 27 - 32W (depending on supply) lamps outputs 1,400 lumens of light for a total of 8,400 lumens measured at 3.3 feet. Three switches on the rear of the fixture control 2 lamps each allowing you to vary the output in 2,800 lumen increments. The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a huge variety of light stands and gripware with 5/8" studs.

The included Octaboxes have removable inner baffles and front faces allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light heads also each come with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, contrasty lighting option. Two sturdy 9.5' (2.9 m) air-cushioned light stands round out the kit.

OVERVIEW:
Whether it's fashion, wedding or portrait photography, the best way to achieve professional-looking results in the field is by adding flash to the ambient light. The Impact Mini LiteTrek (LT) Battery Pack and Charger With CKE Nikon Cable provides DC juice to your Impact LiteTrek 4.0 portable flash, select Nikon, Contax and Nissin flashes, as well as Quantum flashes without adaptation.
Simply plug the DC cord which comes with the LiteTrek 4.0 into Outlet A on the Mini LT's top panel (Outlet B is for other brands). The panel features a "fuel gauge" indicator to display available power. The LiteTrek 4.0 will give you an impressive 650 full power flashes or 3,500 1/64th power flashes on a single 4-hour charge. Recycling times are from 1.0 - 3.5 seconds. Unlike other battery systems, the Mini LT's battery separates from the power module with a simple "push and slide" action which is reminiscent of a camera quick release. You can pack additional batteries alone without the extra weight of a second or third full battery system. Besides reducing the weight this also reduces the cost; the battery alone is less than ½ the price of the complete system.
The Battery pack set comes with separate power module, battery pack, multi-voltage charger, a dedicated cable for Nikon flash units, plus a case with a shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW: The black Light Kit Bag #2 (34 x 13.5 x 12") from Impact makes transporting your lighting kit easy and secure. The bag is designed to hold three monolights along with their reflectors (such as Impact VC500LR), four stands, boom, umbrellas, cables and other support gear but can also be used to hold other lighting equipment instead. You'll have plenty of room to take along enough lighting gear for a portrait session - all packed in an organized and accessible way. A touch fastened divider tray separates the stands, boom and umbrellas from the lights preventing them from bumping together and causing scratches or damage. For additional smaller equipment such as cables and small accessories, there are three interior 10.5 x 8.0" zippered mesh pockets.The bag is made from soft, padded water-resistant nylon and contains six movable touch fastened interior dividers (6 large, 2 small) that will permit you to configure the bag to accommodate the gear you need that day. The Light Kit Bag is carried by its two 2" wide overlapping top carry handles that can easily be extended into dual shoulder straps. The contents are accessed via dual zippers that when placed together will accept a user-supplied lock. For even more protection, the bottom of the bag contains three rubber feet for when the bag is placed on the ground. And the bag folds down to a quarter of its height for convenient storage and easy setup. Whether for storage or transport, the Impact Light Kit Bag will serve both pro or amateur well.

OVERVIEW: The 10 x 12' dark gray Solid Muslin Background from Impact is made from a high-quality 100% cotton material. Suitable for video or still photography, the fabric is one-piece so there's never a concern of a seam showing in the shot. The background has a 4" rod pocket and five eyelets on the top to make hanging it from your background system a breeze. The material is manufactured to help absorb light and assist in the elimination of any reflections. If the fabric becomes soiled, it is machine washable on a gentle cycle using a mild detergent. Wash it separately in cold water.

OVERVIEW: The Cross Pole for Uncored Paper or Fabric Backgrounds from Impact is a 9 foot long cross pole meant to hold paper or fabric background rolls that do not have cores. The pole is constructed of lightweight aluminum and comes in two pieces which are easily assembled. The pole is specifically designed to be used with the Varidrive or Manfrotto Expan Drive background rolling systems, but can also be placed across two Varipoles to hang lights or grip equipment. To utilize with the background rolling systems, simply insert the pole into the roll of paper or fabric and insert the expandable cores of the Varidrive or Manfrotto Expan Drive into both ends of the cross pole.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Cross Pole for Uncored Paper or Fabric Backgrounds from Impact is a 9 foot long cross pole meant to hold paper or fabric background rolls that do not have cores. The pole is constructed of lightweight aluminum and comes in two pieces which are easily assembled. The pole is specifically designed to be used with the Varidrive or Manfrotto Expan Drive background rolling systems, but can also be placed across two Varipoles to hang lights or grip equipment. To utilize with the background rolling systems, simply insert the pole into the roll of paper or fabric and insert the expandable cores of the Varidrive or Manfrotto Expan Drive into both ends of the cross pole.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 59"Varipole Extension Set consists of two 59" (1.5 m) extension poles that can be used with the Varipole Support System. You can use the two poles of the extension set to extend two separate Varipole systems, or you can combine them to create one single extension pole. The maximum reach of the basic Varipole is 12.1' (3.7 m), and if that is not long enough for your needs, use the Varipole Extension Set. The Varipole Support System mounts between floors, ceilings or walls to provide support for grip accessories, reflectors or lights. This extension bar can also be used as a background crossbar (with the addition of optional hooks or clamps). Varipole Extension bars come in lengths of 59" (1.5 m) and 78" (2 m), and in either a black powder or a brushed aluminum silver finish.  The Varipole Extension is solidly built and easy to set up. Simply remove the spring-loaded tube from the top of the Varipole and insert the narrow end of the Varipole Extension. Replace the tube of the Varipole and you now have more reach capability for that higher ceiling or farther wall.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact 59"Varipole Extension Set consists of two 59" (1.5 m) extension poles that can be used with the Varipole Support System. You can use the two poles of the extension set to extend two separate Varipole systems, or you can combine them to create one single extension pole. The maximum reach of the basic Varipole is 12.1' (3.7 m), and if that is not long enough for your needs, use the Varipole Extension Set.

The Varipole Support System mounts between floors, ceilings or walls to provide support for grip accessories, reflectors or lights. This extension bar can also be used as a background crossbar (with the addition of optional hooks or clamps). Varipole Extension bars come in lengths of 59" (1.5 m) and 78" (2 m), and in either a black powder or a brushed aluminum silver finish.

The Varipole Extension is solidly built and easy to set up. Simply remove the spring-loaded tube from the top of the Varipole and insert the narrow end of the Varipole Extension. Replace the tube of the Varipole and you now have more reach capability for that higher ceiling or farther wall.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 59"Varipole Extension Set consists of two 59" (1.5 m) extension poles that can be used with the Varipole Support System. You can use the two poles of the extension set to extend two separate Varipole systems, or you can combine them to create one single extension pole. The maximum reach of the basic Varipole is 12.1' (3.7 m), and if that is not long enough for your needs, use the Varipole Extension Set. The Varipole Support System mounts between floors, ceilings or walls to provide support for grip accessories, reflectors or lights. This extension bar can also be used as a background crossbar (with the addition of optional hooks or clamps). Varipole Extension bars come in lengths of 59" (1.5 m) and 78" (2 m), and in either a black powder or a brushed aluminum silver finish.  The Varipole Extension is solidly built and easy to set up. Simply remove the spring-loaded tube from the top of the Varipole and insert the narrow end of the Varipole Extension. Replace the tube of the Varipole and you now have more reach capability for that higher ceiling or farther wall.

OVERVIEW: This is an Impact Set of 4 Varipole Foot Covers. The foot of the Varipole is made of black rubber, which might cause "skid marks" on light-colored floors or ceilings. This white rubber cover for the foot which prevents this from occurring. These foot covers are compatible with all Manfrotto/Bogen Autopoles.

This white rubber cover for the foot which prevents this from occurring. These foot covers are compatible with all Manfrotto/Bogen Autopoles.

OVERVIEW: This is a pair of black U-Hook Cross Bar Holders for Super Clamp from Impact. They are meant to hold up the cross bar of your background support system. The hex head studs on the U-Hook Holders fit neatly into your two optional Super Clamps that are then connected to your background system uprights. The Impact U-Hooks are made from solid aluminum.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is a pair of black U-Hook Cross Bar Holders for Super Clamp from Impact. They are meant to hold up the cross bar of your background support system. The hex head studs on the U-Hook Holders fit neatly into your two optional Super Clamps that are then connected to your background system uprights. The Impact U-Hooks are made from solid aluminum.

OVERVIEW: The adjustable Deluxe Varipole Support System - Silver from Impact easily and quickly mounts between floor and ceiling providing a stable support system for backgrounds, reflectors, lights and grip accessories. With a strong tension mechanism and locking system, the Varipole is secured by its own force of pressure between solid walls or floors and ceilings. Adjustable between 6'11" (2.1 m) and 12'1" (3.7 m), the Deluxe Varipole is capable of turning most rooms into a photo studio without damage to walls or ceilings. The Varipole is available in black powder or brushed aluminum silver finishes.

OVERVIEW: The adjustable Deluxe Varipole Support System (Pair) from Impact offers two Varipoles to create a functional studio backdrop and grip system. The Varipole easily and quickly mounts between floor and ceiling providing stable support for backdrops, reflectors, lights and grip accessories. With a strong tension mechanism and locking system, the Varipole is secured by its own force of pressure between solid walls or floors and ceilings. Adjustable between 6'11" (2.1 m) and 12'1" (3.7 m), the Deluxe Varipole is capable of turning most rooms into a photo studio without damage to walls or ceilings. The Varipole is available in black powder or brushed aluminum silver finishes.This Varipole set comes with two Varipoles of the same color at a budget-friendly price and will allow you more capability and load bearing strength. Purchase a cross-bar to hang a complex lighting set-up for portraiture or even stage lighting.

OVERVIEW: Part of the Varidrive system for easy raising and lowering of seamless paper, the Varidrive with Black Chain from Impact has adjustable inserts that tightly grip each side of the various sized seamless paper rolls. The Varidrive is then inserted into hooks like the Impact ME-122, ME-123 or the triple hook VPD-H3W. With the exception of ME-122 which fits in a Super Clamp, the other hook sets are bolted onto the wall.You can load three rolls for example, onto the VPD-H3W. Each roll requires another Varidrive kit. You can purchase color-coded units to clearly identify which roll you're raising and lowering. The Varidrive can handle seamless rolls measuring up to 9' wide and weighing up to 22 lb. To strengthen large coreless rolls and prevent bowing, Cross Poles (VPC-5) are available from Impact.

OVERVIEW: This is a pack of two black Background Triple Hooks from Impact. These hooks are used to hold up three rolls of background paper. When secured to your wall with the included mounting hardware, these hooks become a permanent installation to your studio. Your background paper can then be hung using either a simple optional cross bar or Impact's optional Varidrive units that come with expandable cores and chains. These hooks will hold 3 rolls of 9 feet x 12 yards of seamless paper.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is a pack of two black Background Triple Hooks from Impact. These hooks are used to hold up three rolls of background paper. When secured to your wall with the included mounting hardware, these hooks become a permanent installation to your studio. Your background paper can then be hung using either a simple optional cross bar or Impact's optional Varidrive units that come with expandable cores and chains. These hooks will hold 3 rolls of 9 feet x 12 yards of seamless paper.

OVERVIEW: This is a set of two black Triple Background Hooks with Two Superclamps from Impact. This system allows you to hang up to three rolls of seamless on your optional background support system. The two Superclamps attach to the uprights of the support system and two Triple Hooks attach to the Superclamps using the included hardware.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is a set of two black Triple Background Hooks with Two Superclamps from Impact. This system allows you to hang up to three rolls of seamless on your optional background support system. The two Superclamps attach to the uprights of the support system and two Triple Hooks attach to the Superclamps using the included hardware.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Super Clamp with Ratchet Handle is a versatile grip tool made of lightweight cast alloy. With a load capacity of 33 lb, the clamp can hold a wide variety of items such as cameras, lights, umbrellas, hooks, shelves, plate glass, cross bars, even other Super Clamps.The Super Clamp can be securely mounted on any tube or pipe from 0.5" to 2.1" and is supplied with a wedge insert for clamping onto flat surfaces. The ratchet handle allows you to disengage it and tighten it down from any angle; a very handy feature when you're using the clamp in tight quarters. A built-in socket holds 5/8" accessories such as the supplied SRP-102 Hex Stud with 1/4"-20 male thread.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Super Clamp with Ratchet Handle is a versatile grip tool made of lightweight cast alloy. With a load capacity of 33 lb, the clamp can hold a wide variety of items such as cameras, lights, umbrellas, hooks, shelves, plate glass, cross bars, even other Super Clamps.

The Super Clamp can be securely mounted on any tube or pipe from 0.5" to 2.1" and is supplied with a wedge insert for clamping onto flat surfaces. The ratchet handle allows you to disengage it and tighten it down from any angle; a very handy feature when you're using the clamp in tight quarters. A built-in socket holds 5/8" accessories such as the supplied SRP-102 Hex Stud with 1/4"-20 male thread.

OVERVIEW: This is the Standard Stud for Super Clamp with 1/4"-20 Male Threads from Impact. It features a male 1/4"-20 on one end, and snaps into a Super Clamp socket on the other end. It can be used to mount cameras or other accessories that feature a 1/4"-20 socket directly to the Super Clamp. Constructed from durable brass.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is the Standard Stud for Super Clamp with 1/4"-20 Male Threads from Impact. It features a male 1/4"-20 on one end, and snaps into a Super Clamp socket on the other end. It can be used to mount cameras or other accessories that feature a 1/4"-20 socket directly to the Super Clamp. Constructed from durable brass.

OVERVIEW: This is a Short Double Female Stud for Super Clamps with 1/4"-20 & 3/8" Threads from Impact. It is a double ended 5/8" diameter brass stud that has a 1/4"-20 female thread on one side and a 3/8" female thread on the other side. It can be used directly with a Super Clamp, or to extend an existing threaded stud.

It is a double ended 5/8" diameter brass stud that has a 1/4"-20 female thread on one side and a 3/8" female thread on the other side. It can be used directly with a Super Clamp, or to extend an existing threaded stud.

OVERVIEW: This is the Standard Stud for Super Clamp with 3/8" Male Threads from Impact. It features a male 3/8" on one end, and snaps into a Super Clamp socket on the other end. It can be used to mount cameras or other accessories that feature a 3/8" socket directly to the Super Clamp. Constructed from durable brass.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is the Standard Stud for Super Clamp with 3/8" Male Threads from Impact. It features a male 3/8" on one end, and snaps into a Super Clamp socket on the other end. It can be used to mount cameras or other accessories that feature a 3/8" socket directly to the Super Clamp. Constructed from durable brass.

OVERVIEW: This is a 4.7" (11.9 cm) black 5/8" Snap-in Pin for Super Clamps from Impact. It has a 5/8" (16 mm) spigot (non-threaded) attachment one end, and the hexagonal Super Clamp type fitting on the other end. It can be used to connect a lighting fixture that has a 5/8" female receptor to a Super Clamp. It is constructed from aluminum, and comes finished in black.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is a 4.7" (11.9 cm) black 5/8" Snap-in Pin for Super Clamps from Impact. It has a 5/8" (16 mm) spigot (non-threaded) attachment one end, and the hexagonal Super Clamp type fitting on the other end. It can be used to connect a lighting fixture that has a 5/8" female receptor to a Super Clamp. It is constructed from aluminum, and comes finished in black.

OVERVIEW: This Joining Stud for 2 Super Clamps from Impact is a double hex head pin that joins 2 Super Clamps together with a 6-step fixed-rotation connection. It is compatible with clamps that have 16mm hexagonal + M5 and 1/4" threads.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Joining Stud for 2 Super Clamps from Impact is a double hex head pin that joins 2 Super Clamps together with a 6-step fixed-rotation connection. It is compatible with clamps that have 16mm hexagonal + M5 and 1/4" threads.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Multiclip is a versatile pair of connected clips that can be used to clip a reflector card, gobo, prop, leaf, etc., to a stand, branch or shelf. Both clips rotate to provide greater positioning flexibility. Total length is 4.25".
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Multiclip is a versatile pair of connected clips that can be used to clip a reflector card, gobo, prop, leaf, etc., to a stand, branch or shelf. Both clips rotate to provide greater positioning flexibility. Total length is 4.25".

OVERVIEW: This Large Clip Clamp with 5/8" Receptor and 3/8" Female Threads from Impact clamps onto bars up to 1.6" (40mm) in diameter. It is a handy multi-purpose clamp that is handy to keep around in the studio. It can be used to hold gobos, flats, or reflectors with complete security. It has a 5/8" male stud and a 3/8" female socket.
