It has a 5/8" male stud and a 3/8" female socket.

OVERVIEW: This is the Large Clip Clamp with Ball Head Shoe Mount from Impact. It clamps onto bars up to 1.6" in diameter. The clamp has a 5/8" male stud and a 3/8" female socket. The attached mini ball head features a shoe mount, which can be used to hold a flash or other shoe mountable accessory.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is the Large Clip Clamp with Ball Head Shoe Mount from Impact. It clamps onto bars up to 1.6" in diameter. The clamp has a 5/8" male stud and a 3/8" female socket. The attached mini ball head features a shoe mount, which can be used to hold a flash or other shoe mountable accessory.

OVERVIEW: This Double End Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" Male Threads from Impact has a universal 5/8" (16mm) diameter and features both 1/4"-20 and 3/8" male thread sizes.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Double End Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" Male Threads from Impact has a universal 5/8" (16mm) diameter and features both 1/4"-20 and 3/8" male thread sizes.

OVERVIEW: This aluminum Rapid Baby to 1/4"-20 Male Threaded Adapter from Impact converts a 5/8" (16mm) light stand tip, or baby stud, to a 1/4"-20 thread. It will allow vertical or horizontal mounting of a light fixture, flash, or camera that has a 1/4"-20 threaded receptor. A locking knob will keep the mounted accessory firmly in place.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This aluminum Rapid Baby to 1/4"-20 Male Threaded Adapter from Impact converts a 5/8" (16mm) light stand tip, or baby stud, to a 1/4"-20 thread. It will allow vertical or horizontal mounting of a light fixture, flash, or camera that has a 1/4"-20 threaded receptor. A locking knob will keep the mounted accessory firmly in place.

OVERVIEW: This aluminum Rapid Baby to 3/8" Male Threaded Adapter from Impact converts a 5/8" (16mm) light stand tip, or baby stud, to a 3/8" thread. It will allow vertical or horizontal mounting of a light fixture, flash, or camera that has a 3/8" threaded receptor. A locking knob will keep the mounted accessory firmly in place.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This aluminum Rapid Baby to 3/8" Male Threaded Adapter from Impact converts a 5/8" (16mm) light stand tip, or baby stud, to a 3/8" thread. It will allow vertical or horizontal mounting of a light fixture, flash, or camera that has a 3/8" threaded receptor. A locking knob will keep the mounted accessory firmly in place.

OVERVIEW: The Small 3/8" Female Threaded Adapter to 1/4"-20 Male Threaded Post from Impact converts a 3/8" male threaded screw to a 1/4"-20 screw. The adapter is made of brass.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Small 3/8" Female Threaded Adapter to 1/4"-20 Male Threaded Post from Impact converts a 3/8" male threaded screw to a 1/4"-20 screw. The adapter is made of brass.

OVERVIEW: The Impact CA-106 Junior to Baby Pin Adapter fits into heavy duty aluminum or steel light stands with combo heads or the turtle base of a C-Stand and can be used with other grip accessories as a baby or junior stud. Either end of the adapter will allow use of lights or accessories with baby or junior receivers.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact CA-106 Junior to Baby Pin Adapter fits into heavy duty aluminum or steel light stands with combo heads or the turtle base of a C-Stand and can be used with other grip accessories as a baby or junior stud. Either end of the adapter will allow use of lights or accessories with baby or junior receivers.

OVERVIEW: The Short Adapter Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" Female Threads from Impact is a brass 0.6" (16mm) long universal adapter spigot that features a 1/4"-20 female thread at one end and a 3/8" female thread at the other end. In addition, it can also be used to convert a 1/4"-20 or 3/8" screw into a 5/8" stud.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Short Adapter Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" Female Threads from Impact is a brass 0.6" (16mm) long universal adapter spigot that features a 1/4"-20 female thread at one end and a 3/8" female thread at the other end. In addition, it can also be used to convert a 1/4"-20 or 3/8" screw into a 5/8" stud.

OVERVIEW:
This is a Short Double Male Stud for Super Clamps - with 1/4"-20 & 3/8" Threads from Impact. It is a double ended 5/8" diameter brass stud that has a 1/4"-20 male screw on one end and a 3/8" male screw on the other end. It can be used with Super Clamps, Varipoles, light stands, boompoles, etc. 
Constructed from solid brass.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This is a Short Double Male Stud for Super Clamps - with 1/4"-20 & 3/8" Threads from Impact. It is a double ended 5/8" diameter brass stud that has a 1/4"-20 male screw on one end and a 3/8" male screw on the other end. It can be used with Super Clamps, Varipoles, light stands, boompoles, etc. Constructed from solid brass.

OVERVIEW: The Short Double-Male Round Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" Threads from Impact has a 5/8" (16mm) diameter and is made of brass. It fits 5/8" receivers, and can be used as a replacement for the adapters that come included with many swivel umbrella adapters.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Short Double-Male Round Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" Threads from Impact has a 5/8" (16mm) diameter and is made of brass. It fits 5/8" receivers, and can be used as a replacement for the adapters that come included with many swivel umbrella adapters.

OVERVIEW: This Impact 6.0" Pin with Collar is a 6.0" long, 5/8" diameter stud with a 7/8" collar. The collar acts as an anchor to prevent the pin from sliding completely through your grip clamp.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact 6.0" Pin with Collar is a 6.0" long, 5/8" diameter stud with a 7/8" collar. The collar acts as an anchor to prevent the pin from sliding completely through your grip clamp.

OVERVIEW: The Zack Arias OneLight Accessory Kit by B&H contains all the accessories you need to support and maximize the performance of your flash or hot light; all you need to do is add the light.The foundation of the kit is a sturdy light stand which has the ideal weight and footprint to handle the kit's 60" umbrella with black backing. It's a great size for fashion or full length portraiture. Use in the classic bounce mode or take the black backing off and pump the light through it like a softbox for a crisper look. An umbrella bracket is included to mount the light and the umbrella on the stand.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Zack Arias OneLight Accessory Kit by B&H contains all the accessories you need to support and maximize the performance of your flash or hot light; all you need to do is add the light.

The foundation of the kit is a sturdy light stand which has the ideal weight and footprint to handle the kit's 60" umbrella with black backing. It's a great size for fashion or full length portraiture. Use in the classic bounce mode or take the black backing off and pump the light through it like a softbox for a crisper look. An umbrella bracket is included to mount the light and the umbrella on the stand.

OVERVIEW: This aluminum Impact 5/8" Receiver to 5/8" Pin Adapter mounts to an aluminum stand stud with threaded top, adding at least double the gripping length for the light's receiver. This allows the secure mounting that larger lights need, particularly those with a deep receiver.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This aluminum Impact 5/8" Receiver to 5/8" Pin Adapter mounts to an aluminum stand stud with threaded top, adding at least double the gripping length for the light's receiver. This allows the secure mounting that larger lights need, particularly those with a deep receiver.

OVERVIEW: The 10 x 24' gray mist Crushed Muslin Background from Impact is made from a high-quality 100% cotton material. Suitable for video or still photography, the fabric is one-piece so there's never a concern of a seam showing in the shot. The crushed material displays a textured, crinkled design that enhances the feeling of the image. The background has a 4" rod pocket and five eyelets on the top to make hanging it from your background system a breeze. The material is manufactured to help absorb light and assist in the elimination of any reflections. If the fabric becomes soiled, it is machine washable on a gentle cycle using a mild detergent. Wash it separately in cold water.

OVERVIEW: The 10 x 24' slate gray Tie-Dye Muslin Background from Impact is made from a high-quality 100% cotton material. Suitable for video or still photography, the fabric is one-piece so there's never a concern of a seam showing in the shot. The tie-dye pattern is a gentle blend of slate grays that creates a subtle mood. The tie-dye effect is achieved by binding the material with string or rubber and then applying the dye that adheres to different parts of the fabric. The background has a 4" rod pocket and five eyelets on the top that make hanging it from your background system a breeze. The material is manufactured to help absorb light and assist in the elimination of any reflections. If the fabric becomes soiled, it is machine washable on a gentle cycle using a mild detergent. Wash it separately in cold water.

OVERVIEW: The Impact VSD300 Digital 300W/s 2 Monolight Softbox Kit (120VAC) is proof that a 300 watt/second monolight does not need to be expensive. The VSD300 provides enough stored power to easily light a portrait or small still-life setup. It has features found on monolights that cost twice as much. This monolight has a digital readout coupled with its four-stop power variator. It accepts Bowens monolight reflectors and head accessories. The VSD300 has cushioned touch-pad function control buttons. Power is adjustable in 1/10 stop increments, from full to 1/8 power. Its model light intensity may be controlled coupled to, or independent from the strobe power levels you select. The kit, which is a great core lighting system, includes two VSD300 monolights. Also included is a 24 x 32" softbox that's ideal for both portraiture and product work.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact VSD300 Digital 300W/s 2 Monolight Softbox Kit (120VAC) is proof that a 300 watt/second monolight does not need to be expensive. The VSD300 provides enough stored power to easily light a portrait or small still-life setup. It has features found on monolights that cost twice as much.

This monolight has a digital readout coupled with its four-stop power variator. It accepts Bowens monolight reflectors and head accessories. The VSD300 has cushioned touch-pad function control buttons. Power is adjustable in 1/10 stop increments, from full to 1/8 power. Its model light intensity may be controlled coupled to, or independent from the strobe power levels you select.

The kit, which is a great core lighting system, includes two VSD300 monolights. Also included is a 24 x 32" softbox that's ideal for both portraiture and product work.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Atom Clamp is a smaller version of the popular Impact Super Clamp. Weighing in at a mere 4.0 oz, the Atom Clamp can support a payload of over 15 lb. This, and the fact that it comes with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" female sockets, makes it ideal for use with most standard camera and grip accessories. It's ideal for small sets or tabletop photography. 
The Atom Clamp is made of lightweight aluminum and features a textured, non-slip jaw grip that is optimized to work with poles or flat objects.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Atom Clamp is a smaller version of the popular Impact Super Clamp. Weighing in at a mere 4.0 oz, the Atom Clamp can support a payload of over 15 lb. This, and the fact that it comes with 1/4"-20 and 3/8" female sockets, makes it ideal for use with most standard camera and grip accessories. It's ideal for small sets or tabletop photography.

The Atom Clamp is made of lightweight aluminum and features a textured, non-slip jaw grip that is optimized to work with poles or flat objects.

OVERVIEW: The beauty dish reflector is a legendary light shaping tool popularized by fashion and portrait photographers. This Impact 16" Beauty Dish Reflector lives up to its potential by offering a bridge between softboxes and umbrellas that yields a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portrait subjects. The secret is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. The Beauty Dish fits most major brands with the separate purchase of an adapter. The Beauty Dish can also be used in combination with a diffuser sock or honeycomb grid, which allows for further modification of the light output.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The beauty dish reflector is a legendary light shaping tool popularized by fashion and portrait photographers. This Impact 16" Beauty Dish Reflector lives up to its potential by offering a bridge between softboxes and umbrellas that yields a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portrait subjects. The secret is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. The Beauty Dish fits most major brands with the separate purchase of an adapter.

The Beauty Dish can also be used in combination with a diffuser sock or honeycomb grid, which allows for further modification of the light output.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Beauty Dishes are not recommended for use with continues tungsten lights over 300 watts.

OVERVIEW: The beauty dish reflector is a legendary light shaping tool popularized by fashion and portrait photographers. This Impact 40° Honeycomb Grid for 16" Beauty Dish Reflector alters the shape and light output of the reflector by tunneling the light forward into a narrower 40° beam. The grid offers slightly increased contrast, directionality and spill light control. It's an ideal tool for achieving Rembrandt-like lighting effects.

OVERVIEW: This  Impact Background Reflector for Impact/Bowens Mount Strobes is a sconce-shaped light modifier that outputs an oval, fan-like beam of light that is ideal for placing behind the subject for even lighting of the background. Alternately, you can place it closer to the background for a corona or graduated effect or backlight the subject to separate him or her from the background. The reflector has handy clips to attach gels and diffusion material and a rotation mechanism that allows you to vary the direction of the light. The Background Reflector is compatible with Impact Monolights, Bowens, Travelite, Cowboy, Interfit Stellar, JTL, Photoflex, Rime Lite, and Westcott flash heads.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Background Reflector for Impact/Bowens Mount Strobes is a sconce-shaped light modifier that outputs an oval, fan-like beam of light that is ideal for placing behind the subject for even lighting of the background. Alternately, you can place it closer to the background for a corona or graduated effect or backlight the subject to separate him or her from the background. The reflector has handy clips to attach gels and diffusion material and a rotation mechanism that allows you to vary the direction of the light.

The Background Reflector is compatible with Impact Monolights, Bowens, Travelite, Cowboy, Interfit Stellar, JTL, Photoflex, Rime Lite, and Westcott flash heads.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Beauty Dish Adapter for Paul C. Buff Alien Bee, Einstein, White Lightening, Zeus, Balcar Flashpoint Flash Heads features durable steel construction and mounts quickly onto the flash head, allowing you to use 16", 20", 22", and 27" Impact Beauty Dishes on your studio flash. It is compatible with Paul C. Buff Alien Bee, Einstein, White Lightening, Zeus, Balcar and Flashpoint flash heads.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Beauty Dish Adapter for Novatron Flash Heads features durable steel construction and mounts quickly onto the flash head, allowing you to use 16", 20", 22", and 27" Impact Beauty Dishes on your studio flash. It is compatible with Novatron CL04, 2103-C, 2103-FC, 2150-C, 2150-FC, 2153-C, 2030, M300 Monolite, M500 (bare tube) and M600 (bare tube) flash heads.

OVERVIEW: The Impact CC-128 Double Super Clamp features two Super Clamps that are screwed together to form a 90 degree angle. The Double Clamp is handy when used in pairs for mounting a length of pipe or an Alu-Core to Varipoles, Autopoles or other uprights for use as a crossbar. The clamp is made of lightweight cast alloy and will mount to pipe or truss poles up to 2.1" in diameter.

The clamp is made of lightweight cast alloy and will mount to pipe or truss poles up to 2.1" in diameter.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Grip Head for Lights and Accessories - 2.5" Diameter (Black) mounts lights, light modifiers, scrims, flags, cutters, and other lighting accessories onto C-stands or butterfly frames. When trying to get the perfect shot, you often have various lighting accessories such as flags, scrims and cutters set up around your subject. A grip head holds each in a precise position, making it a fairly common piece of equipment on most any set.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Grip Head for Lights and Accessories - 2.5" Diameter (Black) mounts lights, light modifiers, scrims, flags, cutters, and other lighting accessories onto C-stands or butterfly frames.

When trying to get the perfect shot, you often have various lighting accessories such as flags, scrims and cutters set up around your subject. A grip head holds each in a precise position, making it a fairly common piece of equipment on most any set.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Grip Head with Fixed Super Clamp allows you to hang flags and scrims in positions that C-stands can't reach. The Super Clamp's jaws open to 2.16" while the head's non-slip channels lock securely for precision control of accessories. The grip head can accept grip arms, studs or pins up to 5/8" in diameter. The Grip Head and Super Clamp can be detached.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Swivel Umbrella Adapter is a sturdy, well thought out piece of grip equipment that allows you mount a light and umbrella on stands up to 5/8" diameter. The tilt handle is a ratcheting type that allows you to reposition it as you tighten it down- a very handy feature in restricted spaces. 

Two reversible 5/8" threaded studs are included. One is a female 1/4"-20 to female 3/8" that can be used as a stand adapter and the other is a male 1/4"-20 to male 3/8"-16 that can be screwed into a flash with a female tap. The studs are tightened down with a large sliding T-handle while the swivel tightens onto the stand with a large knob. The Swivel Adaptor's umbrella receptacle will accept 7mm and 8mm umbrella shafts.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Two reversible 5/8" threaded studs are included. One is a female 1/4"-20 to female 3/8" that can be used as a stand adapter and the other is a male 1/4"-20 to male 3/8"-16 that can be screwed into a flash with a female tap. The studs are tightened down with a large sliding T-handle while the swivel tightens onto the stand with a large knob. The Swivel Adaptor's umbrella receptacle will accept 7mm and 8mm umbrella shafts.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Female 1/4"-20 to Male 3/8" Thread Adapter features a ¼"-20 female thread on one side, and a 3/8"-16 male thread on the other side.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Female 1/4"-20 to Male 3/8" Thread Adapter features a ¼"-20 female thread on one side, and a 3/8"-16 male thread on the other side.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Holder for Collapsible Reflectors is a very handy mounting adapter that attaches to a standard light stand and mounts anything from a piece of cardboard or foamcore used as a flag to a pop-out style reflector or background up to 9/16" in thickness. The holder has a 5/8" receiver for light stands with a 5/8" top stud. The entire adapter measures only 2.12" high and 2.87" long, making it easy to take along anywhere.

OVERVIEW: Constructed of chrome-plated steel, this Impact 3.0" Baby Pin Wall Plate is a handy accessory on any type of production set. All that's needed is a flat surface for its base and optional screws to mount it to walls, ceilings or floors. It's often gaffer-taped to apple boxes or the floor to temporarily support lighting equipment at a very low angle. The industry standard 5/8" diameter pin fits a very wide variety of lights and other gear with a matching 5/8" receiver.

OVERVIEW: Constructed of chrome-plated steel, this Impact Wall Plate with Right Angle Baby Pin is a handy accessory on any type of production set. All that's needed is a flat surface for its base and optional screws to mount it to walls, ceilings or floors. The industry standard 5/8" diameter pin fits a very wide variety of lights and other gear with a matching 5/8" receiver. The pin has a 90 degree bend to give large lights some distance from the mounting surface or to serve as a hook or anchor for rigging.

OVERVIEW: This Impact 5/8" Male to 1/4"-20 Male Screw Adapter allows you to convert cameras or accessories with a female 1/4"-20 threaded socket to a 5/8" (16 mm) stud which will mount to a 5/8" female stand or accessory.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact 5/8" Male to 1/4"-20 Male Screw Adapter allows you to convert cameras or accessories with a female 1/4"-20 threaded socket to a 5/8" (16 mm) stud which will mount to a 5/8" female stand or accessory.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 3/8" and 1/4"-20 Adapter Spigot allows you to convert a stand or accessory with a female 3/8" thread to a male 1/4"-20 thread and conversely, a stand or accessory with a female 1/4"-20 thread to a male 3/8" thread. It has a hex nut center section for tightening.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact 3/8" and 1/4"-20 Adapter Spigot allows you to convert a stand or accessory with a female 3/8" thread to a male 1/4"-20 thread and conversely, a stand or accessory with a female 1/4"-20 thread to a male 3/8" thread. It has a hex nut center section for tightening.

OVERVIEW: Most lighting fixtures accept the standard top stud on light stands, which measures 5/8" inches in diameter. For those fixtures that accept nothing larger than 3/8" studs the Impact 5/8" Receptor to Long 3/8" Diameter Stud will make the conversion.

OVERVIEW:
The FA-300HS Triple-Flash Hot Shoe Adapter Mount from Impact allows you to mount, sync and fire up to three flashes from this single adapter. You can fire the flashes at full power for greater light output or, for faster recycle times, fire them at half power to conserve the energy. This unique adapter features a female 1/4"-20 thread for universal mounting, and may be combined with an umbrella or other similar lighting accessories (all sold separately).

The mount has a 3.5mm jack that allows you to use a sync cord to connect the adapter to your camera or wireless receiver. If you own an Impact PowerSync DC Radio Slave System or a similar wireless unit, you can fire them all with a single receiver attached to the adapter. While not designed for use with high-voltage flashes, you can mix and match flashes from most major digital camera manufacturers without issue - though the electrical requirements should always be considered beforehand.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: This 6" Extension Arm with Spigot for Super Clamp by Impact is an ideal solution for mounting lights and accessories to uprights while saving floor space. The arm features a 5/8" receiver and a removable double-ended spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 male threads. The arm terminates in a twist-proof hex fitting that snaps into an Impact Super Clamp or similar clamp.

OVERVIEW: The Micro Clamp from Impact is a handy accessory that can be used in a myriad of ways around the studio or on location. Lightweight and sturdy, it can clamp onto tubes with a maximum diameter of 1.38" (35 mm) and has a load capacity of 2.2 lbs (1.0kg). It features a 5/8" (16 mm) socket at its base. Optional accessories include Impact's CA100 Double Ended Spigot with 1/4"-20 and many other adapters and spigots.

Optional accessories include Impact's CA100 Double Ended Spigot with 1/4"-20 and many other adapters and spigots.

OVERVIEW: The 2-Section Articulated Arm from Impact is a handy accessory with a 23.8" reach for precise positioning of a small camera, light, flag, or other item up 3.3 lb. Optional accessories include Impact's CC-106R and CC-106T Super Clamps, CC-101 Clip Clamp, and BHE-104 Camera Platform.

OVERVIEW: This Impact 1/4"-20 Female to 3/8"-16 Male Adapter with 1 1/8" Flange is also known as a bushing. It is used when a camera, lighting fixture or accessory with a 3/8"-16 female thread needs to be mounted on a tripod or light stand with a top screw of 1/4"-20.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Turtle Base C Stand features a detachable base with twist and release locking legs that are easily removed to facilitate transportation or to replace the riser with an alternate size. A light head can be mounted to the base directly with the aid of a stand adapter.The base allows individual legs to be set at any angle, and can be positioned in locations not possible with standard designed stands.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Turtle Base C Stand features a detachable base with twist and release locking legs that are easily removed to facilitate transportation or to replace the riser with an alternate size. A light head can be mounted to the base directly with the aid of a stand adapter.

The base allows individual legs to be set at any angle, and can be positioned in locations not possible with standard designed stands.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Master Century C Stand Kit (10.75') is comprised of a C-stand, 2.5" grip head and 40" extension arm. The stand features a patented locking mechanism that allows the legs to swing out and lock into place for easy setup and collapse flat for storage. The included extension grip arm fits neatly into the stand's removable 2.5" grip head, allowing you to offset the stand and cantilever flags, gobos or lights out of the way of the action. The stand has a low center of gravity which allows mounting of heavy equipment without tipping. The legs are perfectly shaped for saddlebag-type sandbags. The kit is also often used as a short boom.For complete specs on the items included in this kit please click on the links below:

The stand has a low center of gravity which allows mounting of heavy equipment without tipping. The legs are perfectly shaped for saddlebag-type sandbags. The kit is also often used as a short boom.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 40" Extension Grip Arm (Black) is a staple of any film, video or photo production set. An ideal mate to an optional C-Stand, the 40" non-skid bar slips neatly into an optional grip head mounted to the stand allowing you to offset it and cantilever a flag, gobo, light or other accessory in front of it. The 40" bar has a permanently attached 2.5" grip head with a large ergonomic T-handle. The Grip Arm is often used as a short boom.

The 40" bar has a permanently attached 2.5" grip head with a large ergonomic T-handle. The Grip Arm is often used as a short boom.

OVERVIEW: The silver 20" Grip Arm with Big Handle from Impact is a 2.5" grip head mounted on the end of a 20" steel tube with a diameter of 5/8". It has a rough non-slip surface with aluminum and steel construction.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The silver 20" Grip Arm with Big Handle from Impact is a 2.5" grip head mounted on the end of a 20" steel tube with a diameter of 5/8". It has a rough non-slip surface with aluminum and steel construction.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Diffuser Sock is a heat-resistant (see note), 27" nylon fabric light softener ringed with strong elastic for a snug fit around metal strobe head reflectors. The diffuser softens the light output and reduces it by 1 stop.Diffuser Socks are stackable, offering the opportunity to increase the diffusion effect while reducing the light output.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Diffuser Sock is a heat-resistant (see note), 27" nylon fabric light softener ringed with strong elastic for a snug fit around metal strobe head reflectors. The diffuser softens the light output and reduces it by 1 stop.

Diffuser Socks are stackable, offering the opportunity to increase the diffusion effect while reducing the light output.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Intended for use on flash heads or fluorescent sources. Do not use on continuous hot light sources.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Twin Metal Umbrella Bracket allows you to use 2 shoe mount flashes to a single stand while doubling the light output and diffusing it with an umbrella (preferably up to 45" wide). The aluminum bracket features a 180 degree tilt mount with a 5/8" receiver and an umbrella shaft for standard (7-8 mm) umbrella shafts.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Twin Metal Umbrella Bracket allows you to use 2 shoe mount flashes to a single stand while doubling the light output and diffusing it with an umbrella (preferably up to 45" wide). The aluminum bracket features a 180 degree tilt mount with a 5/8" receiver and an umbrella shaft for standard (7-8 mm) umbrella shafts.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Lightbar Tilt Bracket with 4 Locking Shoes is a convenient accessory that allows you to double or quadruple your flash power while softening the output and widening its coverage with an umbrella. The T-shaped Lightbar has 4 insulated locking accessory shoes for mounting up to 4 flash units or a combination of flash units, batteries and radio receivers. You can also use any of the shoes for an LED or quartz modeling light or for four constant light sources. The shoes are easily removable if desired. 

The 5/8" stand mount tilts 180 degrees and has an umbrella receptacle for standard 7-8 mm umbrella shafts. It can also be attached to a tripod via an included reversible spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8-16" female threads. Flash units not included.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Lightbar Tilt Bracket with 4 Locking Shoes is a convenient accessory that allows you to double or quadruple your flash power while softening the output and widening its coverage with an umbrella. The T-shaped Lightbar has 4 insulated locking accessory shoes for mounting up to 4 flash units or a combination of flash units, batteries and radio receivers. You can also use any of the shoes for an LED or quartz modeling light or for four constant light sources. The shoes are easily removable if desired.

The 5/8" stand mount tilts 180 degrees and has an umbrella receptacle for standard 7-8 mm umbrella shafts. It can also be attached to a tripod via an included reversible spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8-16" female threads. Flash units not included.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Multi Shoe Bracket With 2 Adjustable Shoes is a good choice for the multi-tasking photographer or videographer who wants to travel light. The aptly-named bracket has a total of 5 shoes - 3 on the crossbar of the T shaped bracket alone. The center one is fixed while each of the end shoes has 1" of lateral movement and 360 degrees of rotation. The end shoes each have a 1/4"-20 threaded socket for independent mounting to standard accessories, as they are removable from the T bar. Directly under the center shoe is an umbrella receptacle for 7 or 8 mm shafts in case you want to mount the bracket on a light stand to use an umbrella to diffuse your light source. Alternatively, the removable bottom male shoe allows you to slip it into a photo or video camera's female shoe. The shoe has a 1/4"-20 female tap for mounting on a tripod or other accessory with a male 1/4'-20 screw. The Double Flash Bracket's tilting stage describes a full 180 degrees with lockable click detents, to offer maximum flexibility. You could conceivably mount this bracket to a stand with 3 flashes, an umbrella, and radio receiver. It's also useful for small LED lights.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

You could conceivably mount this bracket to a stand with 3 flashes, an umbrella, and radio receiver. It's also useful for small LED lights.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Not recommended for use with Canon 600EX-RT.

OVERVIEW: The FA-330L Adjustable Locking Triple Flash Adapter with Umbrella Socket by  Impact allows you to triple your on-camera flash power when using an umbrella. You can fire the flashes at full power for greater light output or, for faster recycle times, fire them at half power to conserve the energy. The adapter features 3 insulated, locking flash shoes with knurled, screw-down locking pins for secure mounting. The central umbrella socket is compatible with all Impact umbrellas and with most other brands. This allows it to be used combined with an umbrella, light panel, or other lighting accessories. The Triple Flash Adapter has a brass 1/4"-20 female thread for mounting on light stands having a 1/4"-20 male threaded top stud or adapter.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The FA-330L Adjustable Locking Triple Flash Adapter with Umbrella Socket by Impact allows you to triple your on-camera flash power when using an umbrella. You can fire the flashes at full power for greater light output or, for faster recycle times, fire them at half power to conserve the energy. The adapter features 3 insulated, locking flash shoes with knurled, screw-down locking pins for secure mounting. The central umbrella socket is compatible with all Impact umbrellas and with most other brands. This allows it to be used combined with an umbrella, light panel, or other lighting accessories. The Triple Flash Adapter has a brass 1/4"-20 female thread for mounting on light stands having a 1/4"-20 male threaded top stud or adapter.

OVERVIEW: The  Adjustable Twin Shoe Umbrella Bracket from Impact is a convenient accessory that allows you to double your flash or LED light's power. The LB-230L's T-Shaped aluminum bar has 2 insulated flash shoes connected to locking knobs that allow lateral movement of each flash along two channels in the bar.The 5/8" stand mount tilts 180 degrees and has an umbrella receptacle for standard 7-8 mm umbrella shafts. At 15" the LB-230L is long enough for 2 flash units or shoe mount LED lights of approximately 6" in width each. To add additional lights please see Impact# LB-430L which has 4 shoes. The LB-230L can also be attached to a tripod via an included reversible spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8-16" female threads.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Adjustable Twin Shoe Umbrella Bracket from Impact is a convenient accessory that allows you to double your flash or LED light's power. The LB-230L's T-Shaped aluminum bar has 2 insulated flash shoes connected to locking knobs that allow lateral movement of each flash along two channels in the bar.

The 5/8" stand mount tilts 180 degrees and has an umbrella receptacle for standard 7-8 mm umbrella shafts. At 15" the LB-230L is long enough for 2 flash units or shoe mount LED lights of approximately 6" in width each. To add additional lights please see Impact# LB-430L which has 4 shoes. The LB-230L can also be attached to a tripod via an included reversible spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8-16" female threads.

OVERVIEW: This  Impact Background Reflector for Elinchrom Mount Strobes is a sconce-shaped light modifier that outputs an oval, fan-like beam of light that is ideal for placing behind the subject for even lighting of the background. Alternately, you can place it closer to the background for a corona or graduated effect or backlight the subject to separate him or her from the background. The reflector has handy clips to attach gels and diffusion material and a rotation mechanism that allows you to vary the direction of the light. The Background Reflector is compatible with Elinchrom, Impact EX, Calumet Genesis, and Interfit EX flash heads.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Alternately, you can place it closer to the background for a corona or graduated effect or backlight the subject to separate him or her from the background. The reflector has handy clips to attach gels and diffusion material and a rotation mechanism that allows you to vary the direction of the light.

The Background Reflector is compatible with Elinchrom, Impact EX, Calumet Genesis, and Interfit EX flash heads.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Snoot for Select Impact/Bowens S-Mount Strobes fits over the head and narrows the output into a soft circle that is smaller as you move closer to your subject and grows larger as you move it away. For a still smaller circle of light removable grid is included. The snoot is ideal for creative effects on backgrounds or for a hair or accent light. The included filters can be slid into the filter holder for creative color or diffusion effects.

The snoot is compatible with Impact Monolights (except EX100A), Bowens, Travelite, Cowboy, Interfit Stellar, JTL, Photoflex, Rime Lite, and Westcott flash heads.

The snoot is compatible with Elinchrom, Impact EX, Calumet Genesis, and Interfit EX flash heads.

OVERVIEW: This chrome-plated, 5.9' Impact Turtle Base C-Stand features a patented locking mechanism that allows the legs to swing out and lock into place for easy setup and collapse flat for storage. The stand has a low center of gravity which allows mounting of heavy equipment without tipping. The legs are perfectly shaped for saddlebag-type sandbags. A light head can be mounted to the base directly with the aid of an optional stand adapter. The base allows individual legs to be set at any angle, and can be positioned in locations not possible with standard design stands.

A light head can be mounted to the base directly with the aid of an optional stand adapter. The base allows individual legs to be set at any angle, and can be positioned in locations not possible with standard design stands.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Turtle Base C-Stand & 20˝ Grip Arm Kit - 5.9' (Chrome) is comprised of a C-stand, 2.5" grip head attached to a 20" extension arm and a separate grip head for the stand. The stand features a patented locking mechanism that allows the twist and releasy locking legs to swing out and lock into place for easy setup and collapse flat for storage. The included grip head extension arm slips neatly into the stand's 2.5" grip head allowing you to offset the stand and cantilever flags, gobos and lights out of the way of the action. The stand has a low center of gravity which allows mounting of heavy equipment without tipping. The legs are perfectly shaped for saddlebag-type sandbags. The kit is also often used as a short boom.

A light head can be mounted to the base directly with the aid of a stand adapter.The base allows individual legs to be set at any angle, and can be positioned in locations not possible with standard designed stands.

OVERVIEW: This Impact BHE-108 Flex Arm for Super Clamp is ideal for supporting small lights, reflectors or other items up to 1.1 lb . Made of flexible aluminum, the 18 mm diameter arm measures 21.65" long and can be twisted into configurations that would be impossible with a jointed articulating arm. One end of the arm has a 3/8" female tapped hex stud to prevent torsion in the Super Clamp. The other end terminates in a 1/4"-20 screw on a 5/8" stud.

One end of the arm has a 3/8" female tapped hex stud to prevent torsion in the Super Clamp. The other end terminates in a 1/4"-20 screw on a 5/8" stud.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Double Ball Joint Head is an handy accessory for mounting lights or other gear in various situations where space and weight concerns are paramount. With an optional super clamp (Impact CC-106R) and camera platform 
(Impact BHE-104) you can mount a DSLR or video camera weighing up to 5.5 lb, on a pole or other support.

With an optional super clamp (Impact CC-106R) and camera platform (Impact BHE-104) you can mount a DSLR or video camera weighing up to 5.5 lb, on a pole or other support.

OVERVIEW: The Impact SRP-113 Long Double Stud measures 6" long and is fabricated from zinc-plated steel. It is ideal for use with a super clamp or other grip and mounting accessories with a locking 5/8" (16mm) receiver.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact SRP-113 Long Double Stud measures 6" long and is fabricated from zinc-plated steel. It is ideal for use with a super clamp or other grip and mounting accessories with a locking 5/8" (16mm) receiver.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Scissor Mount for Drop Ceilings enables attachment of small lights and accessories to the grid that supports drop ceiling panels in offices schools and many other areas.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Scissor Mount for Drop Ceilings enables attachment of small lights and accessories to the grid that supports drop ceiling panels in offices schools and many other areas.

OVERVIEW: The Wall Plate with 5/8" Baby Swivel from Impact is a steel plate with a swiveling 5/8" Baby pin and a large T-handle that allows precise positioning of a light or accessory. The plate has eight anchor points for nails or screws. Hardware is not included.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Wall Plate with 5/8" Baby Swivel from Impact is a steel plate with a swiveling 5/8" Baby pin and a large T-handle that allows precise positioning of a light or accessory. The plate has eight anchor points for nails or screws. Hardware is not included.

OVERVIEW: These four Wedge Inserts from Impact are a replacement or spare part set for the Super Clamp. They change the shape of the clamp's bottom grip from a triangular shape to a flat shape. By adding a wedge, the Super Clamp has more surface area and a better grip when clamped onto a flat surface, such as a table.
OVERVIEW_RAW: These four Wedge Inserts from Impact are a replacement or spare part set for the Super Clamp. They change the shape of the clamp's bottom grip from a triangular shape to a flat shape. By adding a wedge, the Super Clamp has more surface area and a better grip when clamped onto a flat surface, such as a table.

OVERVIEW: This  Heavy Duty Swivel Pin from Impact adds articulation to your stand or boom. One end slips onto a male 5/8" pin while the other supports a light or accessory with a 5/8" receiver. The ball joint allows 180° swivel of the fixture, while the large, rubber-covered T-handle provides secure locking in your chosen position. The barrel at the receiver end measures 1 1/8". Removing the tightening knob from it allows you to drop it into a 1 1/8" receiver.

Removing the tightening knob from it allows you to drop it into a 1 1/8" receiver.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Baby Drop Down Pin is used on the end of a boom arm to maintain a constant downward angle of a mounted light fixture as the angle of the boom arm is changed. The 5/8" diameter pin has a 5/8" female receiver.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Baby Drop Down Pin is used on the end of a boom arm to maintain a constant downward angle of a mounted light fixture as the angle of the boom arm is changed. The 5/8" diameter pin has a 5/8" female receiver.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Background System Kit with 10x12' Chroma Green and Chroma Blue Muslins is a complete, lightweight and portable system. The support system will support seamless paper up to 11' in width, as well as accommodate the 12' width of any brand of muslin background. Total weight distributed across the length of the crossbar should not exceed 20 lb. The system consists of 2 heavy-duty professional support stands with 3 positive locking knobs and tubular legs, a sturdy 4 piece crossbar that snaps together with positive button locking devices, and a heavy-duty canvas carry bag.It is suggested to secure the stands with gaffer tape, or weight bags when using any background setup where there are several people, or active children on the set.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Impact Background System Kit with 10x12' Chroma Green and Chroma Blue Muslins is a complete, lightweight and portable system. The support system will support seamless paper up to 11' in width, as well as accommodate the 12' width of any brand of muslin background. Total weight distributed across the length of the crossbar should not exceed 20 lb.

The system consists of 2 heavy-duty professional support stands with 3 positive locking knobs and tubular legs, a sturdy 4 piece crossbar that snaps together with positive button locking devices, and a heavy-duty canvas carry bag.

It is suggested to secure the stands with gaffer tape, or weight bags when using any background setup where there are several people, or active children on the set.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Colors depicted may vary slightly, due to differences in computer monitors, printed media, and variances in manufacturer's dyes or paints

OVERVIEW: The Impact Quikbox Softbox Kit (24 x 24") is a great way to expand the capabilities of your shoe mount stand flash unit. The Quikbox lives up to its name by popping open and assembling in a couple of minutes. Just pop open the softbox, add the diffusers and included adapter ring and shoe adapter. Mount to the included umbrella bracket, slip it onto the provided air-cushioned light stand and you're ready to shoot. Using a softbox with your shoe-mounted flash will help to diffuse and to evenly distribute the light output of the flash. This will help to reduce those harsh shadows which are often the result of flash photography. Also included is an internal diffuser, to minimize the possibility of hotspots. In addition, the recessed front face helps to control light spill. The included flash bracket is adjustable vertically, and features a universal shoe which is adjustable horizontally. These adjustments make this unit compatible with virtually all standard flash units (incl. Nikon SB-900 & SB-910), as well as radio receivers. In addition, for those receivers that do not feature a bottom shoe connector, the bracket shoe is removable to expose a male 1/4"-20 screw. There are also three plastic washers included in the shoe assembly, to accommodate receivers of various sizes.

OVERVIEW: This Small C-Clamp With Baby Pin from Impact is a useful grip accessory that allows you to clamp lights or other gear with a 5/8" receiver to stands, pipes, shelves, etc. up to 1.87" in thickness. The clamp's 5/8" stud pivots and locks in two positions and has a 1/4"-20 tap for items with a matching screw.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Small C-Clamp With Baby Pin from Impact is a useful grip accessory that allows you to clamp lights or other gear with a 5/8" receiver to stands, pipes, shelves, etc. up to 1.87" in thickness. The clamp's 5/8" stud pivots and locks in two positions and has a 1/4"-20 tap for items with a matching screw.

OVERVIEW: The Impact C210 Baby Pipe Clamp fastens to pipes with diameters of 0.39 to 2.16". It has a 5/8" mounting stud and a load capacity of 220.46 lb (100 kg). A safety cable is included.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact C210 Baby Pipe Clamp fastens to pipes with diameters of 0.39 to 2.16". It has a 5/8" mounting stud and a load capacity of 220.46 lb (100 kg). A safety cable is included.

OVERVIEW: This Impact CC-125 Adjustable Gaffer Clamp features one permanent 5/8" Baby stud and one removable Baby pin for mounting lights or other accessories with a 5/8" female receiver. You can also leave the pin out and use the clamp's 5/8" receiver to mount the clamp directly to Baby studs and pins on other accessories The clamp's jaws adjust from 0.98 to 2.55" and are rubber cushioned so as not to damage furniture, poles, pipes or overhead beams on set or on location.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact CC-125 Adjustable Gaffer Clamp features one permanent 5/8" Baby stud and one removable Baby pin for mounting lights or other accessories with a 5/8" female receiver. You can also leave the pin out and use the clamp's 5/8" receiver to mount the clamp directly to Baby studs and pins on other accessories The clamp's jaws adjust from 0.98 to 2.55" and are rubber cushioned so as not to damage furniture, poles, pipes or overhead beams on set or on location.

OVERVIEW: The Impact BHE-104 Camera Platform for Flex Arm supports lightweight cameras up to 1.0 lb on the Impact Flex Arm or similar accessory. The platform features a captive, sliding 1/4"-20 camera screw and a non-slip surface. There are two 5/8" receivers for the arm or a stud.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact BHE-104 Camera Platform for Flex Arm supports lightweight cameras up to 1.0 lb on the Impact Flex Arm or similar accessory. The platform features a captive, sliding 1/4"-20 camera screw and a non-slip surface. There are two 5/8" receivers for the arm or a stud.

OVERVIEW: This Impact BHE-108 Flex Arm for Super Clamp is ideal for supporting small lights, reflectors or other items up to 0.66 lb . Made of flexible aluminum, the 13 mm diameter arm measures 21.65" long and can be twisted into configurations that would be impossible with a jointed articulating arm. One end of the arm has a 3/8" female tapped hex stud to prevent torsion in the Super Clamp. The other end terminates in a 1/4"-20 screw on a 5/8" stud.

One end of the arm has a 3/8" female tapped hex stud to prevent torsion in the Super Clamp. The other end terminates in a 1/4"-20 screw on a 5/8" stud.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 4.5" Grip Head with Junior Pin is designed to allow a Junior stand to support butterfly and overhead frames in the jaws of the grip head. The grip head has an oversized T-handle, a Junior pin and receiver.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact 4.5" Grip Head with Junior Pin is designed to allow a Junior stand to support butterfly and overhead frames in the jaws of the grip head. The grip head has an oversized T-handle, a Junior pin and receiver.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 6" End Jaw Vise Grip provides strong, solid gripping of round, square, or rectangular tubing and many other common or irregular shapes. At one end of the steel shaft are the fixed end jaws and at the other a 5/8" Baby pin for mounting fixtures or other grip items.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact 6" End Jaw Vise Grip provides strong, solid gripping of round, square, or rectangular tubing and many other common or irregular shapes. At one end of the steel shaft are the fixed end jaws and at the other a 5/8" Baby pin for mounting fixtures or other grip items.

OVERVIEW: The Impact 2.0" End Jaw Vise Grip is a fast way to mount a light or accessory with a 5/8" Baby receiver to pipe or other tubular support up to 2.0" in diameter. The Vise Grip's shaft is made of chrome-plated steel and its aluminum alloy jaws are rubber padded to protect mounting surfaces from damage.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact 2.0" End Jaw Vise Grip is a fast way to mount a light or accessory with a 5/8" Baby receiver to pipe or other tubular support up to 2.0" in diameter. The Vise Grip's shaft is made of chrome-plated steel and its aluminum alloy jaws are rubber padded to protect mounting surfaces from damage.

OVERVIEW: Featuring a large spin handle and a 5/8" stud, the Impact Center Jaw Vise Grip has a 5/8" pin and adjustable jaws that allow you to securely mount lights or other gear with a 5/8" receiver to pipes or shelving up to 3" in thickness or diameter. The jaws have a non-abrasive coating to prevent scratching.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Featuring a large spin handle and a 5/8" stud, the Impact Center Jaw Vise Grip has a 5/8" pin and adjustable jaws that allow you to securely mount lights or other gear with a 5/8" receiver to pipes or shelving up to 3" in thickness or diameter. The jaws have a non-abrasive coating to prevent scratching.

OVERVIEW: If you had to choose a single light shaping tool, you might do well to pick the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella (Silver).First of all it's a really huge, broad light source that wraps light around your subject yielding clean highlights and rich open shadows. But due to the special shape of the umbrella there's a unique mix of soft enveloping light with the kind of crisp detail you only get from reflectors. Put another way, if you combined a beauty dish with a softbox, you'd have a parabolic umbrella.This umbrella has a unique design structurally as well. The shaft is reinforced for strength and instead of bendable metal, the 16 inner ribs are made of durable fiberglass. The fixed black backing ensures that all of the light output is on your subject instead of through the umbrella. The silver interior provides a more specular and contrasty look than a white umbrella. You can also vary the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft for a harder or softer light. This silver version is ideal for throwing the light over a long distance. Two of them, for instance could light an entire auditorium or a large graduating class. With the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella less is definitely more.

OVERVIEW: If you had to choose a single light shaping tool, you might do well to pick the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella (Translucent White).First of all it's a really huge, broad light source that wraps light around your subject yielding clean highlights and rich open shadows. But due to the special shape of the umbrella there's a unique mix of soft enveloping light with the kind of crisp detail you only get from reflectors. This umbrella has a unique design structurally as well. The shaft is reinforced for strength and instead of bendable metal, the 16 inner ribs are made of durable fiberglass.The white translucent version of this umbrella yields the softest light. Used in standard bounce mode, some of the light escapes through the material, slightly raising the ambient light level and lowering contrast while most of it is directed towards your subject. If you want a harder light, turn the umbrella around and aim the convex side at your subject and punch your light source through it. In both modes you can vary the light quality and output by changing the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft.You can also use this umbrella as a scrim over your subject to diffuse harsh light sources like the sun in situations like fashion catalog work outdoors or at the beach. Any way you use it, with the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella less is definitely more.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
If you had to choose a single light shaping tool, you might do well to pick the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella (Translucent White).

First of all it's a really huge, broad light source that wraps light around your subject yielding clean highlights and rich open shadows. But due to the special shape of the umbrella there's a unique mix of soft enveloping light with the kind of crisp detail you only get from reflectors. This umbrella has a unique design structurally as well. The shaft is reinforced for strength and instead of bendable metal, the 16 inner ribs are made of durable fiberglass.

The white translucent version of this umbrella yields the softest light. Used in standard bounce mode, some of the light escapes through the material, slightly raising the ambient light level and lowering contrast while most of it is directed towards your subject. If you want a harder light, turn the umbrella around and aim the convex side at your subject and punch your light source through it. In both modes you can vary the light quality and output by changing the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft.

You can also use this umbrella as a scrim over your subject to diffuse harsh light sources like the sun in situations like fashion catalog work outdoors or at the beach. Any way you use it, with the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella less is definitely more.

OVERVIEW: The Impact SF-AE80 AC Flash is a handy light source that screws into any household fixture, E26 socket or photo fixture with an E26 (Edison) base. A jack-of-all-trades, the 5,600K SF-AE80 can be used in lamps or home fixtures when lighting interiors with flash, especially during the daytime. Make your own super-lightweight portable flash kit with an optional Impact Porcelain Socket with Umbrella Mount (IMSPUM). Use it as a background light, hair light or accent light. The SF-AE80 can be used in either the master or slave mode thanks to its optical sensor and sync outlet. Trigger it from the camera via the included 11' 3.5mm mini jack sync cord or trigger several of them as slaves responding to the camera's master flash.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact SF-AE80 AC Flash is a handy light source that screws into any household fixture, E26 socket or photo fixture with an E26 (Edison) base. A jack-of-all-trades, the 5,600K SF-AE80 can be used in lamps or home fixtures when lighting interiors with flash, especially during the daytime. Make your own super-lightweight portable flash kit with an optional Impact Porcelain Socket with Umbrella Mount (IMSPUM). Use it as a background light, hair light or accent light. The SF-AE80 can be used in either the master or slave mode thanks to its optical sensor and sync outlet. Trigger it from the camera via the included 11' 3.5mm mini jack sync cord or trigger several of them as slaves responding to the camera's master flash.

OVERVIEW: Designed to hold a light fixture or accessory in place, the Impact Pivot Arm 20? with Locking Lever is a space-saving grip tool for a variety of applications. It's a great matchup with a super clamp, for instance, with an optional camera platform for highly mobile work. The lever at the arm's elbow locks down securely in the position you've chosen and will support gear weighing up to 8 lb.

The wheel at the arm's elbow is capable of tension adjustment so that you can easily secure gear weighing up to 8 lb in the position you've chosen.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Grip Kit is a great set of core gripware for single shooters or small production crews. The 40" Grip Arm is a great extension arm for extra lift or reach. It can hold a small light head, a flag, gobo, or reflector. The 2.5" Grip Head is designed to hold scrims, flags, floppies, cutters, etc. or mount on Century stands or butterfly frames. The Impact Super Clamp will securely mount to pipe or other items that are 1.2 - 2 1/8" in diameter. It accepts the included Snap-in Pin which has a 5/8" diameter, making it perfect for standard "baby" receiver lights and accessories.

OVERVIEW: Varipoles are a great way to support backdrop materials or other accessories while saving the floor space taken up when using stands. All that's required is a firm surface for the pole top to grip. But what if your room has a drop ceiling? Impact has the answer.The Impact Drop Ceiling Adaptor clamps scissor-like to an intersection of your drop ceiling support frame. Simply remove the Varipole's rubber top and the spring top adapter and insert the top of the Varipole into the adaptor's receiver. An Allen screw is included for additional tightening if necessary. Note: use of Allen screw requires use of an optional 3.0 mm Allen key.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Varipoles are a great way to support backdrop materials or other accessories while saving the floor space taken up when using stands. All that's required is a firm surface for the pole top to grip. But what if your room has a drop ceiling? Impact has the answer.

The Impact Drop Ceiling Adaptor clamps scissor-like to an intersection of your drop ceiling support frame. Simply remove the Varipole's rubber top and the spring top adapter and insert the top of the Varipole into the adaptor's receiver. An Allen screw is included for additional tightening if necessary. Note: use of Allen screw requires use of an optional 3.0 mm Allen key.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Varipole Top Rubber Foot is a spare or replacement for the one that comes with each Varipole. The soft rubber foot fits snugly into the open tube end of the Varipole and prevents damage to the ceiling when tension is applied to secure it.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Qualite 300W 2 Light Soft Kit (120VAC) is a great core kit for a wide range of photo assignments in the studio or on location. The kit is built around two Qualite 300 focusing floodlights. Each head gives you 300W of even light, with a beam from 21 to 40° and a cool-touch handle for aiming the light without gloves. The aluminum light stands feature air cushioning, so if you forget to tighten a section, it will descend slowly thus saving your equipment from shock damage. The 2 included Creative Light 1.3 x 2.0' softboxes feature removable internal baffles and front faces and come with mounts for the lights.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Qualite 300W 2 Light Soft Kit (120VAC) is a great core kit for a wide range of photo assignments in the studio or on location. The kit is built around two Qualite 300 focusing floodlights. Each head gives you 300W of even light, with a beam from 21 to 40° and a cool-touch handle for aiming the light without gloves. The aluminum light stands feature air cushioning, so if you forget to tighten a section, it will descend slowly thus saving your equipment from shock damage. The 2 included Creative Light 1.3 x 2.0' softboxes feature removable internal baffles and front faces and come with mounts for the lights.

OVERVIEW:
The 9 x 9" Impact Micro Quikbox is a great way to expand the capabilities of your on-camera, shoe-mount flash. The Quikbox lives up to its name by opening and assembling in seconds. Just pop open the softbox, add the diffusers, fasten your flash to it with the softbox's touch-fasteners, slip the flash into the camera's hot shoe and you're ready to shoot. 

Using a softbox with your shoe-mounted flash will help to diffuse and to evenly distribute the light output of the flash. This will help to reduce those harsh shadows which are often the result of direct flash photography. Also included is an internal diffuser baffle, to minimize the possibility of hotspots. In addition, the recessed front face helps to control light spill and makes feathering easier.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

This will help to reduce those harsh shadows which are often the result of direct flash photography. Also included is an internal diffuser baffle, to minimize the possibility of hotspots. In addition, the recessed front face helps to control light spill and makes feathering easier.

OVERVIEW:
This Strobros Beauty Dish Version II for On-Camera Flash from Impact is part of their Strobros line of accessories for on-camera speedlights. Using a combination of touch-fasteners and variously sized spacers you can attach it to the head of most on-camera speedlights. The 6.0" beauty dish spreads the flash output to produce softer shadows and a more uniform spread of light, while the different colored reflectors can be swapped out to change the color temperature of the light produced.

This light is much more flattering than the harsh light produced by a bare flash, which is why it's referred to as a beauty dish. The package includes the 6.0" beauty dish, four spacers in two different sizes, an instruction guide, and three colored reflector discs for the interior reflector (silver, soft silver and soft gold). An accessory set of honeycomb grids, color filters and a neutral filter is available, and sold separately.

OVERVIEW:
This Strobros Snoot for On-Camera Flash (Version II) from Impact is part of the Strobros line of universal on-camera flash accessories. Using a snoot on your flash will allow you to narrow and focus the spread of light from the flash unit. Also included are 10° and 20° grids, which allow you to narrow the spread even more. Using a snoot is especially ideal for portrait and product photography. 
The Strobros line of light modifiers use a combination of touch-fasteners and variously sized spacers, which allow you to attach them to the head of most on-camera flash units.

OVERVIEW: The Strobros Globe Diffuser for Shoe Mount Flash from Impact is a full-dome, globe-shaped flash diffuser that securely slips over the front of the flash head. The 4 included attachment spacers will adapt it to fit most on-camera shoe mount flash units. The globe design allows for a larger diffusion surface and spreads the light evenly and over a larger area, producing the effect of a much larger and softer light source. The diffuser supports TTL flash exposure.

The diffuser supports TTL flash exposure.

OVERVIEW: The Strobros Touch Fastener Strip and Rubber Kit contains replacement touch fasteners and spacers for the ones that ship with the Strobros Snoot, Globe Diffuser and Beauty Dish. The kit includes four rubber attachment spacers and a touch fastener strip.

OVERVIEW: The  Impact Pre-Trigger Cable for Canon Sub-mini Connection connects to the camera's remote cable socket and keeps your camera awake, as if your finger was depressing the shutter release halfway, so that the PowerSync Radio Slave can trigger it immediately to catch the action. There is an on/off switch on the cable so that it can be used as a simple trigger for the camera without waking and pre-focusing it.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Duo Small Rectangular Softbox from Impact is a versatile 16 x 22" light shaping tool for strobe, LED, and fluorescent lights. It's also useable with quartz lights up to 750W due to its heat resistant textured silver interior. When using the Luxbanx Duo with strobes, both the front diffuser and inner baffle can be used for maximum softening of the output. When using it with hot lights the inner baffle should be removed. Open face lights can be used as is but it's recommended that you use the flood setting rather than spot on Fresnel sources. The soft box has 4 forward-opening vents to dissipate heat. Removing the front and inner diffuser essentially turns the Luxbanx Duo into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The versatile Luxbanx Duo has an additional control via an optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill light and adding directional control to the Luxbanx Duo's attributes. The shape and size of the softbox makes it ideal for fill-lighting, hair-lighting, table top and small object photography or run-and-gun video. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your light's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands. When using hot lights the inner baffle should be removed.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Impact Fabric Grid for 15 x 15" Quikbox gives you all of the benefits of a soft, low-contrast light source with the addition of the control and directionality you would normally get from a reflector. The grid tunnels the light forward, reducing spill light that might compromise your background lighting or produce flare. It attaches via simple touch fasteners and quickly folds flat to a fraction of its open size for storage.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Duo Small Square Softbox from Impact is a versatile 16 x 16" light shaping tool for strobe, LED, and fluorescent lights. It's also useable with quartz lights up to 750W due to its heat resistant textured silver interior. When using the Luxbanx Duo with strobes, both the front diffuser and inner baffle can be used for maximum softening of the output. When using it with hot lights the inner baffle should be removed. Open face lights can be used as is but it's recommended that you use the flood setting rather than spot on Fresnel sources. The soft box has 4 forward-opening vents to dissipate heat. Removing the front and inner diffuser essentially turns the Luxbanx Duo into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The versatile Luxbanx Duo has an additional control via an optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill light and adding directional control to the Luxbanx Duo's attributes. The shape and size of the softbox make it ideal for fill-lighting, hair-lighting, table top and small object photography or run-and-gun video. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your light's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands. When using hot lights the inner baffle should be removed.

OVERVIEW: The Background Kit with 10 x 24' Tie-Dyed Slate Gray Muslin Backdrop from Impact consists of a support system and stylish muslin backdrop. The backdrop system includes two support stands and a four-piece snap-together crossbar. The tubular stand legs are sturdy. Setup and break down are easy. The tie-dyed backdrop is made from a high-quality 100% cotton material. The subtle blending of grays makes for an intriguing pattern that can create a mood to enhance your subject's appearance. The muslin is washable in cold water if it gets soiled.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Extra Large Rectangular Softbox from Impact is an economical 54 x 72" light shaping tool for strobes that's ideal for fashion or full body portraiture, illustrating larger products or even hanging from the ceiling for car or motorcycle photography. When you need a soft quality of light combined with wide coverage, this is the softbox for you. The softbox features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The versatile Luxbanx has an additional control via an optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.

The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.

The Luxbanx Extra Small Rectangular Softbox from Impact is an economical 12 x 16" light shaping tool for strobes that's ideal for portraits, fashion and products. It's small enough for tabletop shooting or for use as a hairlight and great for adding fill light, especially with an optional grid. The softbox features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast.

It's often the used in product photography to edge light the subject and render an attractive shape-defineing highlight on reflective objects. It's also a great choice for rim lighting in portraiture, hairlighting and lighting a background from the top or bottom. OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Duo Small Strip Softbox from Impact is a versatile 12 x 36" light shaping tool for strobe, LED, and fluorescent lights. It's also useable with quartz lights up to 750W due to its heat resistant textured silver interior. When using the Luxbanx Duo with strobes, both the front diffuser and inner baffle can be used for maximum softening of the output. When using it with hot lights the inner baffle should be removed. Open face lights can be used as is but it's recommended that you use the flood setting rather than spot on Fresnel sources. The soft box has 4 forward-opening vents to dissipate heat. Removing the front and inner diffuser essentially turns the Luxbanx Duo into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The versatile Luxbanx Duo has an additional control via an optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill light and adding directional control to the Luxbanx Duo's attributes. The long, narrow shape of the softbox make it ideal for side-lighting and hair-lighting in portraiture, tabletop work and up-lighting backgrounds. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your light's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands. When using hot lights the inner baffle should be removed.

OVERVIEW: The Background Kit with 10 x 12' Solid Light Gray Muslin Backdrop from Impact consists of a support system and stylish muslin backdrop. The backdrop system includes two support stands and a four-piece snap-together crossbar. The tubular stand legs are sturdy. Setup and break down are easy. The muslin backdrop is made from a high-quality 100% cotton material. The fabric is one-piece with a 4" rod pocket and five eyelets for convenient hanging. The muslin is washable in cold water if it gets soiled.

The Background Kit with 10 x 12' Charcoal/Smoke Gray Reversible Muslin Backdrop from Impact consists of a support system and a stylish, reversible muslin backdrop. The backdrop system includes two support stands and a four-piece snap-together crossbar. The tubular stand legs are sturdy. Setup and break down are easy.

This two-sided backdrop is made from a high-quality 100% cotton material. The reversibility of the backdrop gives you two options for shooting your portrait or product shot. It also saves you the expense of having to buy and carry around two separate backdrops. The muslin is washable in cold water if it gets soiled.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Colors depicted may vary slightly, due to differences in computer monitors, printed media, and variances in manufacturer's fabrics, dyes or paints

OVERVIEW: The Speed Ring for Paul C. Buff, Balcar, Flashpoint Series 1 from Impact features indexed flex rod holes that allow you to effortlessly mount any square, rectangular, strip or octagonal Luxbanx softbox to Paul C. Buff White Lightning and Balcar flash heads. The ring will also fit most other brands of softbox. The sturdy all-metal ring rotates 360 degrees to facilitate orientation or to clear obstacles in tight quarters. It has 3/8"-16 taps on two sides to allow mounting directly to grip gear such as Impact's Swivel Umbrella Adapter, 3 Section Double Articulated Arm, Super Clamp, and more.

OVERVIEW: The Impact LSA-BC Light Stand Boom Clamp allows mounting of a boom arm such as Impact's Mini Boom Arm, to a heavy duty stand. It permits tilt and swivel adjustment.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Super Clamp with T-Handle is a staple on any set or shoot. Like gaffer's tape, this is a piece of gear that you'll always find a use for. Its strong rubber-padded jaws open up to 2.16", then lock securely with the short, ergonomic knob. For better grip on flat surfaces, a furniture wedge is included . The Super Clamp has 1/4"-20 female threads and a push-button, locking 5/8" hexagonal female receiver. A hex-base 5/8" Baby stud with a 1/4"-20 male threads on top is included for camera and light accessories.

OVERVIEW: The Single Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a lightweight fixture in a polycarbonate housing designed to accept Edison-base compact fluorescent lamps. It can be used with up to 105W CFL bulbs. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory.

OVERVIEW: The 4 Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a lightweight fixture in a polycarbonate housing that accepts Edison-base compact fluorescent lamps up to 50W, for a four-socket total of 200W. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory, and also accepts standard photo umbrellas.

OVERVIEW: The 50 x 50 cm Softbox for Fluorescent Fixtures by Impact is a light modifier that softens the output from Impact FF-S1 and FF-S4 single- and four-socket fluorescent fixtures, as well as Impact's SF-ABRL160 Slave Flash. Installation is easy - no speed ring is needed; each of these heads has four receptacles located around the face of the fixture. The softbox can be used with up to four 50W fluorescent lamps for a total of 200W.

OVERVIEW_NOTE: When used within a softbox, a total maximum of 200W is suggested.

OVERVIEW:
The  Impact SF-ABRL160 Stand Mount Flash with LED Modeling Light is a lightweight monolight with straightforward features that make it ideal for most applications. The 160 watt second strobe features a bright LED modeling lamp that, unlike its quartz counterparts, is virtually maintenance-free. And instead of lasting 100 hours, the LED typically lasts approximately 25,000 hours.

The SF-ABRL160 has a built-in optical slave for wireless triggering, a sync cord for direct firing from your camera, a built-in umbrella receptacle, and a 5/8" standard stand mount. It accepts Impact's 50 x 50 cm (FF-SB50) and 50 x 70 cm (FF-SB70) Softboxes without a speed ring thanks to the head's built-in flex rod holes. An easy-to-mount barndoor set with filters, filter frame, and a honeycomb grid (SF-BDK) are available as optional accessories, as is a snoot (SF-SNT) with its own removable grid. Selectable flash output is full and 1/2 power.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Selectable flash output is full and 1/2 power.

OVERVIEW: The  Impact Barndoor Kit for SF-ABRL160 Flash is comprised of a snap-on 4-leaf barndoor set, a filter frame, 3 colored gels and a diffusion gel. The barndoors shape and direct the SF-ABRL160's light output while the gels can be used to change the color or the softness of the light output.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Barndoor Kit for SF-ABRL160 Flash is comprised of a snap-on 4-leaf barndoor set, a filter frame, 3 colored gels and a diffusion gel. The barndoors shape and direct the SF-ABRL160's light output while the gels can be used to change the color or the softness of the light output.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Snoot for SF-ABRL160 Flash Head fits over the head and narrows the output into a soft circle that is smaller as you move closer to your subject and grows larger as you move it away. For a still smaller circle of light, a removable 30-degree honeycomb grid is included. The snoot is ideal for creative effects on backgrounds or for a hair or accent light. Gels can be taped over it for creative color effects.

For a still smaller circle of light, a removable 30-degree honeycomb grid is included. The snoot is ideal for creative effects on backgrounds or for a hair or accent light. Gels can be taped over it for creative color effects.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Qualite 300 V-2012 Focusing Flood Light provides 300W of 3,100K output which is focusable from 21-40° via its beam focus knob. The fixture has a cool-touch handle for safe adjustments while the included 4-way barndoor set accepts 5 5/8" filters, scrims and accessories. The Qualite 300 has a 12.5' power cable with an in-line switch and a grounded 3-prong US plug.
