The Qualite 300 has a 12.5' power cable with an in-line switch and a grounded 3-prong US plug.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact QuikStik Telescopic Handle adds flexibility and functionality to your shoe-mount flash or small strobe with light modifiers such as Impact's Quikboxes or umbrellas. Ideal for use as a hair light, fill light or backlight, the QuikStik allows you to extend light sources weighing up to 5.0 lb as much as 5.25' overhead. 


The QuikStik features a comfortable foam grip and includes a webbed nylon flag holder-type strap that allows you to shift the weight to your hip for use over an extended period of time. 

The QuikStik's top stud accepts any standard 5/8" female accessory such as the Impact Umbrella Bracket and Multi-shoe Bracket. It is topped with a screw that also permits use of 1/4"-20 accessories.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact QuikStik Telescopic Handle adds flexibility and functionality to your shoe-mount flash or small strobe with light modifiers such as Impact's Quikboxes or umbrellas. Ideal for use as a hair light, fill light or backlight, the QuikStik allows you to extend light sources weighing up to 5.0 lb as much as 5.25' overhead.

The QuikStik features a comfortable foam grip and includes a webbed nylon flag holder-type strap that allows you to shift the weight to your hip for use over an extended period of time. The QuikStik's top stud accepts any standard 5/8" female accessory such as the Impact Umbrella Bracket and Multi-shoe Bracket. It is topped with a screw that also permits use of 1/4"-20 accessories.

OVERVIEW: The Impact QuikStik+ Telescopic Handle adds flexibility and functionality to your shoe-mount flash or small strobe with light modifiers, such as Impact's Quikboxes or umbrellas. Ideal for use as a hair light, fill light or backlight, the QuikStik+ allows you to extend light sources weighing up to five pounds as high as 5.25' overhead.The QuikStik+ features an adjustable swivel handle with several unique features that promote comfort and precise placement of your light source. Using the QuickStick+ with two hands allows the hand grasping the swivel handle to act as a fulcrum on which the telescopic section pivots, in order to adjust the height. Since the handle can be moved along the length of the pole section, you're able to adjust the center of gravity for ideal balance. What sounds technical is really fast, simple, and intuitive, with the bottom line being overall comfort. You can make your handle adjustment in less time than it took to read this sentence.The included webbed nylon flag holder-type strap adds another level of comfort. The holder, in conjunction with the swivel handle, allows you to shift nearly all of the weight to your hip for one-hand operation over an extended period of time, leaving your other hand free for multi-tasking. The top stud accepts any standard 5/8" female accessory, such as the Impact Umbrella Bracket or Multi-Shoe Bracket. It is topped with a screw that also permits the use of 1/4"-20 accessories.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Quikbox Softbox (15 x 15") is a great way soften the output of your studio or battery powered flash unit. The Quikbox lives up to its name by popping open and assembling in a minute or two. Just open the softbox, add the diffusers and the required speed ring that fits your strobe, mount it on a light stand and you're ready to shoot. Using a softbox with your strobe will help to diffuse and evenly distribute the light output of the flash. This will help to reduce those harsh shadows which are often the result of open flash photography. The Quikbox design solves the problem by using an internal diffuser to minimize the possibility of hotspots from the strobe source while the recessed front face helps to control spill light. The Quikbox requires separate purchase or use of a standard speed ring insert matched to your brand of strobe head. Note: all standard speedrings have 2 parts that can be separated: the outer support ring that accepts the softbox poles and the inner insert with your strobe's mount. Since the Quikbox is free-standing, you need only pull the separated insert through aperture at the back of the box and mount it to the strobe.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Small Octagonal Softbox from Impact is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. This 36" diameter softbox is large enough to exhibit the wrap-around light quality that this octagonal shape is known for, yet small enough to use in tight spaces. The softbox features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The octa Luxbanx has an additional control via the optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. The large surface area of this octagonal-shaped softbox gives you a unique wrap-around quality of light that gains emphasis as you move it closer. Catchlights in the eyes of your subject are round and natural. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Medium Octagonal Softbox from Impact is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. This 60" diameter softbox demands a bit more space than the smaller version put the payoff is a lot more wrap in the light quality even when use significantly off access. The softbox features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The octa Luxbanx has an additional control via the optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. The large surface area of this octagonal-shaped softbox gives you a unique wrap-around quality of light that gains emphasis as you move it closer. Catchlights in the eyes of your subject are round and natural. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Large Octagonal Softbox from Impact is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. This 84" diameter softbox requires a bit more space than the smaller versions put the payoff is the ultimate in wrap around light quality and a kind of painterly look when used extremely off axis and close up. OVERVIEW: The Impact Luxbanx Duo Small Octagonal Softbox is a versatile 36" diameter light shaping tool with a textured silver interior for high output, removable front diffuser and a removable interior baffle. It's compatible with strobe lights, fluorescent or LED light sources. It's also compatible with hot lights up to 1,000W. When using it with hot lights remove the interior baffle. The Duo Octa's shape renders a signature quality of soft wrap-around light due to its large surface area and creates round, natural catchlights in your subject's eyes, making it ideal for portraiture and fashion. Separate purchase of a speed ring is required for use and Impact makes models to fit most popular brands. Do not use inner baffle with hot lights.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Reflector Panel is a light shaping tool consisting of 4 aluminum rods and a geared bracket that hold its 28 x 39" (71 x 99 cm) fabric taut without a frame. Two reversible reflective fabrics are included; black/white and gold/silver. The silver material is the most specular of the surfaces - ideal for long throw applications and bright enough to mimic an additional light source. Gold adds a warm hue to the subject and is especially valuable in cool-toned open shade or to create sunset effects. White is the softest most neutral surface is most often used to gently fill in shadows and adjust lighting ratios. The tilting bracket accepts stands with a 5/8" top stud and rotates 360 degrees so that you can turn the panel horizontally, vertically or any angle in between. A carry bag is included to store and transport the panel.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact LB-QL300 Luxbanx Duo Softbox is a 16 x 22" heat resistant softbox that can handle any flash and hot light sources such as Impact's Qualite 300 up to 300W . The Duo features a high output silver interior, a removable front diffuser and 4 vent flaps secured with touch fasteners that can be opened to dissipate heat. 

This size is ideal for small objects and tabletop photography and videography, as well as use as a hair light, fill light or rim light in the studio or on the road. Optional fabric grids can also be used to further narrow the softbox's beam spread and control spill light. 

Note: Separate purchase of a speedring to match your brand head is required for use.

This size is ideal for small objects and tabletop photography and videography, as well as use as a hair light, fill light or rim light in the studio or on the road. Optional fabric grids can also be used to further narrow the softbox's beam spread and control spill light.

Note: Separate purchase of a speedring to match your brand head is required for use.

OVERVIEW: This Impact BHE-108 Flex Arm for Super Clamp is ideal for supporting small lights, reflectors or other items up to 0.66 lb . Made of flexible aluminum, the 13 mm diameter arm measures 21.65" long and can be twisted into configurations that would be impossible with a jointed articulating arm. One end of the arm has a 3/8" female tapped hex stud to prevent torsion in the Super Clamp. The other end terminates in a 1/4"-20 screw on a 5/8" stud.

OVERVIEW:
If you had to choose a single light shaping tool, you might do well to pick the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella (Silver) With Light Stand Kit from B&H Photo. In addition to the large 7' umbrella, this kit includes a 9.5' light stand, a triple-flash adapter mount, and an umbrella bracket with an adjustable shoe.
This 7' parabolic umbrella is a really huge, broad light source that wraps light around your subject, yielding clean highlights and rich open shadows. But due to the special shape of the umbrella there's a unique mix of soft enveloping light with the kind of crisp detail you only get from reflectors. Put another way, if you combined a beauty dish with a softbox, you'd have a parabolic umbrella.
This umbrella has a unique design structurally as well. The shaft is reinforced for strength and instead of bendable metal, and the 16 inner ribs are made of durable fiberglass. The fixed black backing ensures that all of the light output is on your subject instead of through the umbrella. The silver interior provides a more specular and contrasty look than a white umbrella. You can also vary the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft for a harder or softer light. This silver version is ideal for throwing the light over a long distance. Two of them, for instance could light an entire auditorium or a large graduating class. With the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella less is definitely more.
The Impact 9.5' light stand is heavy-duty black aluminum, with sure-twist section locks and air cushioning. Air cushioning gently lowers the light, preventing damage to light fixtures and fingers when section locks have not been properly tightened.
The Impact FA-300HS Triple-Flash Hot Shoe Adapter Mount allows you to mount, sync and fire up to three flashes from this single adapter. You can fire the flashes at full power for greater light output or, for faster recycle times, fire them at half power to conserve the energy. This unique adapter features a female 1/4"-20 thread for universal mounting, and may be combined with an umbrella, light panel, or other lighting accessories (all sold separately).
The Impact Umbrella Bracket with Adjustable Shoe is a versatile, lightweight metal bracket that includes a removable, reversible female stud to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". An additional removable, reversible male stud mounts to the included flash shoe at the 1/4"-20 end, or to another accessory at the 3/8" end. The metal shoe features a knurled locking knob for secure mounting of all standard shoe-mount flashes.

OVERVIEW:
If you had to choose a single light shaping tool, you might do well to pick the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella (White Diffusion) With Light Stand Kit from B&H Photo. In addition to the large 7' umbrella, this kit includes a 9.5' light stand, a triple-flash adapter mount, and an umbrella bracket with an adjustable shoe.
This 7' parabolic umbrella is a really huge, broad light source that wraps light around your subject, yielding clean highlights and rich open shadows. But due to the special shape of the umbrella there's a unique mix of soft enveloping light with the kind of crisp detail you only get from reflectors. Put another way, if you combined a beauty dish with a softbox, you'd have a parabolic umbrella.
This umbrella has a unique design structurally as well. The shaft is reinforced for strength and instead of bendable metal, and the 16 inner ribs are made of durable fiberglass. The white translucent version of this umbrella yields the softest light. Used in standard bounce mode, some of the light escapes through the material, slightly raising the ambient light level and lowering contrast while most of it is directed towards your subject. If you want a harder light, turn the umbrella around and aim the convex side at your subject and punch your light source through it. In both modes you can vary the light quality and output by changing the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft.
You can also use this umbrella as a scrim over your subject to diffuse harsh light sources like the sun in situations like fashion catalog work outdoors or at the beach. Any way you use it, with the Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella less is definitely more. 
The Impact 9.5' light stand is heavy-duty black aluminum, with sure-twist section locks and air cushioning. Air cushioning gently lowers the light, preventing damage to light fixtures and fingers when section locks have not been properly tightened.
The Impact FA-300HS Triple-Flash Hot Shoe Adapter Mount allows you to mount, sync and fire up to three flashes from this single adapter. You can fire the flashes at full power for greater light output or, for faster recycle times, fire them at half power to conserve the energy. This unique adapter features a female 1/4"-20 thread for universal mounting, and may be combined with an umbrella, light panel, or other lighting accessories (all sold separately).
The Impact Umbrella Bracket with Adjustable Shoe is a versatile, lightweight metal bracket that includes a removable, reversible female stud to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". An additional removable, reversible male stud mounts to the included flash shoe at the 1/4"-20 end, or to another accessory at the 3/8" end. The metal shoe features a knurled locking knob for secure mounting of all standard shoe-mount flashes.

An additional removable, reversible male stud mounts to the included flash shoe at the 1/4"-20 end, or to another accessory at the 3/8" end. The metal shoe features a knurled locking knob for secure mounting of all standard shoe-mount flashes.

OVERVIEW: The 2 Section Double Articulated Arm without Camera Bracket from Impact is a handy accessory with a 24.5" reach for precise positioning of a camera, light, flag or other item up 11 lb. The arm features a distinctive design that allows either section to be positioned anywhere along the length of the other and secured with large butterfly knobs. The sections terminate in 5/8" pins, one with a hex collar and the other with a 3/8" female thread. Optional accessories include Impact's CC-106R and CC-106T Super Clamps, and BHE-104 Camera Platform.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Combo Boom Stand is a clever lighting support solution that provides you with a strong, 12.5' stand with a 19.8 lb load capacity when used in the traditional way or a 6.25' boom that supports 4.4 lb, when fully extended. The legs feature heavy duty bracing and a wide footprint of 43" for extra stability. The black anodized aluminum Combo Boom Stand ships with a 5/8" reversible spigot and an empty cordura nylon sandbag counterweight capable of holding 15 lb of ballast.

The legs feature heavy duty bracing and a wide footprint of 43" for extra stability. The black anodized aluminum Combo Boom Stand ships with a 5/8" reversible spigot and an empty cordura nylon sandbag counterweight capable of holding 15 lb of ballast.

OVERVIEW: This  Impact 1/4"-20 Threaded 3/8" Stud for Stand Top attaches to any stand with a 1/4"-20 male threaded top stud so that any Impact-type crossbar or other portable background crossbar with 3/8" mounting holes at each end can be used with the stand.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact 1/4"-20 Threaded 3/8" Stud for Stand Top attaches to any stand with a 1/4"-20 male threaded top stud so that any Impact-type crossbar or other portable background crossbar with 3/8" mounting holes at each end can be used with the stand.

OVERVIEW: This Impact LS-RL7 7.2' Reverse Legs Light Stand is a lightweight support that's ideal for location work or in the studio for use with a small lights or to hold reflectors. This is one of the few stands to be able to sit completely flush to the floor where they can be taped down or sandbagged to stabilize its load. The LS-RL7's unique design allows the legs to fold up around the central risers somewhat like an inverted umbrella. The result is a 7.2' light stand that breaks down to only 19.5" - short enough to fit in even the smallest light kit bags. The stand is topped with a 5/8" mounting stud with 3/8" threads, a 3/8" 1/4"-20 adapter, and weighs just 2.6 lb.

OVERVIEW:
The 5x7' Collapsible Background Kit from Impact contains a 13' Multiboom Light Stand and Reflector Holder as well as a reversible 5x7' black and white background. The boom can be used to hold a small or medium light head or even a reflector up to 60" using its included clips. The boom accepts an optional counterweight for additional balance and stability. Set up is quick and easy. 


The collapsible, reversible background saves you the time and expense of having to purchase two separate backgrounds. The real advantage is that the dual-sided background allows you to quickly set up for two different looks during one session. It comes in its own handy see-thru storage bag.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The 5x7' Collapsible Background Kit from Impact contains a 13' Multiboom Light Stand and Reflector Holder as well as a reversible 5x7' black and white background. The boom can be used to hold a small or medium light head or even a reflector up to 60" using its included clips. The boom accepts an optional counterweight for additional balance and stability. Set up is quick and easy.

The collapsible, reversible background saves you the time and expense of having to purchase two separate backgrounds. The real advantage is that the dual-sided background allows you to quickly set up for two different looks during one session. It comes in its own handy see-thru storage bag.

OVERVIEW: The silver Deluxe Varipole Support System from Impact is a kit that provides you with a complete studio system for shooting everything from portraits to product shots. The kit includes two silver Varipoles as well as two Triple Background Hooks with Superclamps and one each of gray, black and red Chain Sets and Weights. The multi-colored chain sets will help you distinguish each of your backdrops and eliminate any mistakes when you want to change the color of the background. The system will accommodate three user-supplied backdrops. The beauty of this system is that you'll be able to exchange the backdrops without having to dismantle the entire system to re-hang a backdrop. This saves time and makes your shooting session more cost-effective and time-efficient. It also allows you to give your client three different "looks" to the shot. Set up is easy since the Chain Drives provide a quick way to raise and lower your backgrounds. The Varipoles grip the floor and ceiling securely. The Varidrives are placed within both ends of your background and expand to fit tightly. This entire system gives you an entire studio set up in one complete package. All the components for a home or studio background system are included. All you need supply are the backgrounds.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Fabric Grid for Small Square Luxbanx is a 16 x 16" light modifier that attaches quickly to the softbox's recessed front via touch-fasteners. The 40 degree grid narrows the beam spread from your softbox to control spill light and add directionality similar to a reflector, while maintaining a soft quality of light. Unlike unwieldy rigid grids, Impact fabric grids are extremely light weight and fold flat for transport in the included carry case.

OVERVIEW: The Impact READY COOL 2 Lamp Fluorescent Fixture is an economical light source that combines an efficient reflector with built-in hammered aluminum reflective barndoors to give you a fixture capable of an impressive output equivalent to a 500W hot light. However, unlike tungsten lights, the FRC-22 has a very low power draw and emits very little heat, meaning reduced operational costs and minimal potential harm to your set or talent. Additionally, with lamp life up to 8,000 hours the FRC-22 is virtually maintenance-free. The FRC-22 comes with the fixture, lamps, power cord, flexible gooseneck stand mount with 5/8" receiver and a padded carrying bag to transport or store it all. The FRC-22 is a muti voltage fixture that can be used anywhere in the world with 110-220V, 50/60Hz. An optional plug adapter will be needed for outlets outside of the U.S.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact READY COOL 2 Lamp Fluorescent Fixture is an economical light source that combines an efficient reflector with built-in hammered aluminum reflective barndoors to give you a fixture capable of an impressive output equivalent to a 500W hot light. However, unlike tungsten lights, the FRC-22 has a very low power draw and emits very little heat, meaning reduced operational costs and minimal potential harm to your set or talent. Additionally, with lamp life up to 8,000 hours the FRC-22 is virtually maintenance-free.

The FRC-22 comes with the fixture, lamps, power cord, flexible gooseneck stand mount with 5/8" receiver and a padded carrying bag to transport or store it all.

The FRC-22 is a muti voltage fixture that can be used anywhere in the world with 110-220V, 50/60Hz. An optional plug adapter will be needed for outlets outside of the U.S.

OVERVIEW:
If you had to choose a single light shaping tool, you might do well to pick an Impact 7' Parabolic Umbrella. Each of the 3 versions has its attributes and benefits, so which should you choose? Well, now you don't have to; this Impact 7' Parabolic 3 Umbrella Kit has them all - white interior with black backing, silver interior with black backing and white translucent.

What all of them have in common is that they're really huge, broad light sources that wrap light around your subject yielding clean highlights and rich open shadows. Due to the special shape of the umbrellas there's a unique mix of soft enveloping light with the kind of crisp detail you only get from reflectors.

7' Parabolic Umbrella (White/Black) 


The fixed black backing on the white/black version ensures that all of the light output is on your subject instead of through the umbrella. You can also vary the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft for a harder or softer look or for longer throw capability.

7' Parabolic Umbrella (Silver) 


The silver interior version provides a more specular and contrasty look than the white umbrella. Again, you can also vary the light-to-umbrella distance along the shaft for a harder or softer light. This silver version is ideal for throwing the light over a long distance. Two of them, for instance could light an entire auditorium or a large graduating class.

7' Parabolic Umbrella (White Diffusion) 


The white translucent version of this umbrella yields the softest light. Used in standard bounce mode, some of the light escapes through the material, slightly raising the ambient light level and lowering contrast while most of it is directed towards your subject. If you want a harder light, turn the umbrella around and aim the convex side at your subject and punch your light source through it.

Used in standard bounce mode, some of the light escapes through the material, slightly raising the ambient light level and lowering contrast while most of it is directed towards your subject. If you want a harder light, turn the umbrella around and aim the convex side at your subject and punch your light source through it.

OVERVIEW: The Syl Arena Strobros On-Camera Flash Light-Modifier Kit from B&H Photo combines a number of on-camera flash accessories to give you a comprehensive set of light modifying tools for your speedlight. Included in the kit is a 6.0" Beauty Dish to spread and soften the flash's light, a diffusion/grid set to further control the light's spread and color, a snoot to direct a narrow light beam and a globe diffuser to spread and diffuse light. Also included is a set of color correction filters and a cinch strap to securely attach accessories to your flash's head. This set of items provides a full range of light control and coloring options to better explore the creative potential of on-camera flash.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Syl Arena Strobros On-Camera Flash Light-Modifier Kit from B&H Photo combines a number of on-camera flash accessories to give you a comprehensive set of light modifying tools for your speedlight. Included in the kit is a 6.0" Beauty Dish to spread and soften the flash's light, a diffusion/grid set to further control the light's spread and color, a snoot to direct a narrow light beam and a globe diffuser to spread and diffuse light. Also included is a set of color correction filters and a cinch strap to securely attach accessories to your flash's head. This set of items provides a full range of light control and coloring options to better explore the creative potential of on-camera flash.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact 22" Beauty Dish Reflector Kit is comprised of the Impact 22" Beauty Dish with a deflector, diffusion sock and a honeycomb grid. The kit is configured to provide photographers with a creative means to augment this unique light shaping tool.

The Beauty Dish offers a bridge between a softbox and an umbrella that yields soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portrait subjects. The secret is a included deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. This reflector renders natural-looking round catchlights in the subject's eyes rather than square or rectangular ones.

For a bit more control affix the provided grid to the Beauty Dish for increased directionality and spill light management. The grid gathers the light output into a large soft spot that allows you to create intricately lit background details and painterly effects.

Yet another kind of light is available by removing the grid and slipping on the Diffusion Sock. This gives the dish a wider angle of coverage and softer detail while it masks the deflector which might be seen in the catchlights in extreme closeups.

Note: The Beauty Dish requires separate purchase of an adapter for use.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Wall Mounting Kit for Paper Roll consists of three Varidrive sets with cores, chains and weights. It also contains two triple wall hooks on which you mount the drives. The three color-coded chains allow you to locate which of your three backgrounds is secured to which core. The three included weights hold the chains straight. Once installed, it will be easy to raise and lower your optional backdrops with a minimum of effort. The cores insert into each end of the backdrop and expand to stay firmly in place. The chains are able to be placed on either the left or right side of the wall hooks depending on your working preference.

OVERVIEW: The Impact SF-AE56 AC Master/Slave 2 Flash Kit includes 2 SF-AE56 AC Slaves that screw into the provided umbrella sockets or any household fixture. Two umbrellas have been provided as well as two 6.0' light stands to support them. Since the flash can be used as either a master or slave, a 15' 3.5 mm mini jack sync cord is included with each flash in the kit to trigger your master flash from the camera which will in turn trip the second SF-AE56. This lightweight, flexible lighting setup is appropriate for just about any type of photography.

OVERVIEW: Designed for overhead lighting, this chrome-plated steel Boom Arm from Impact telescopes from 46 - 86" and supports up to 8 lb at maximum extension. Features include a ratcheting pivot clamp handle and rubber-coated section above its counterweight hook for comfortable, secure height adjustment. The boom has a 5/8" receiver and is an ideal match for heavy duty wheeled stands like Impact's LSP-SW10 9.5' Steel Roller.

OVERVIEW: The 48" LS-K4 Micro Kit Stand from Impact is a versatile, lightweight support that's an ideal choice as a backlight stand for lighting backgrounds or for providing light under a shooting table or other translucent surface. At 1.7 lb with a folded length of just 16" the LS-K4 easily becomes an indispensible element of your location kit. The stand is topped with a 5/8" stud with 3/8"-16 threads and includes a removable 3/8"-16 to 1/4"-20 adapter.

OVERVIEW: The 6.5' Combo Steel Stand from Impact is a short, heavy-duty, chrome-plated steel light stand with three sections, two risers, and a maximum height of 6.5'. The stand has a combination retractable 5/8" Baby top stud with a 1 1/8" Junior receiver, and can support up to 66 pounds.

OVERVIEW: The 8.5' Folding Wheeled Base Stand from Impact is a heavy duty, black and chrome-plated steel and aluminum alloy support that features a low base for extra stability, braking wheels, two risers, and a 5/8" baby stud. The legs fold for transport and storage. It will support 26.46 lb.

OVERVIEW: The 4' Lowboy Folding Base Stand with Combo Head from Impact is a heavy duty, chrome-plated steel support that features a low base for extra stability, braking wheels, two risers and both a female 1/1/8" Junior receiver and a 5/8" Baby retractable stud. The legs fold up to 27.5" against the column for transport and storage. The Lowboy supports a maximum load of 55 lb.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Counter Weight is a 10 lb painted iron weight to be used as a counter balance. It has a long locking handle that tightens the rubber-lined grip on any tube between 13 and 30mm in diameter.

OVERVIEW:
This set of 3 Locking Casters from Impact is made for light stands with 22mm diameter legs. The casters slip over the end of the legs, and are locked into place by tightening a thumbscrew. The wheels can be locked by stepping down on a locking lever, and released by lifting the end of the lever with your foot.
In general, these casters are not designed to work with C-stands. The angle of the casters will not match up with those of C-stands.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Locking Caster Set for Light Stands with 25mm Tubular Leg Ends features 3" (75 mm) rubber padded wheels that adapt to most light stand legs that have a diameter of 25mm. The wheels rotate 360 degrees and have foot-activated brakes for safety.

In general, these casters are not designed to work with C-stands. The angle of the casters will not match up with those of C-stands.

OVERVIEW: The Tilting Boom Pivot Clamp from Impact is a pivoting clamp for use with booms or poles with a diameter 1.37" (35 mm). The clamp has a large ratcheting handle and will mount to 5/8" baby pin or 1-1/8" junior receiver.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact 3 Light Green Screen Kit is a kit that combines three Qualite 300W Focusing Flood Lights, three light stands, a 16 x 22" softbox with adapter, two 33' white translucent umbrellas, and a background support system to set the stage for some Chroma Key magic. 


Without leaving your home or studio you can key in exotic, historic or scenic backgrounds behind you or your chosen subject using stock photos or photos you've shot yourself. Secure the included 10 x 12' Chroma Green fabric to the background support system and light the background evenly with two of the lights and the subject with the 3rd. You can also purchase additional lights for the background and use this kit's light's for a three-point lighting setup.

Without leaving your home or studio you can key in exotic, historic or scenic backgrounds behind you or your chosen subject using stock photos or photos you've shot yourself. You can also purchase additional lights for the background and use this kit's light's for a three-point lighting setup.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Desktop Shooting Table with 24 x 36" Translucent Plexiglas Sheet is ideal for small product photography, ecommerce shooting, still life, art objects or food. It's a great fit for a boardroom table, desk or kitchen table. Two 7" legs elevate the glossy translucent Plexiglas sheet allowing you to backlight it and light from underneath as well as from the front. The shooting table is delivered flat in a box, sets up and breaks down quickly, and at only 6.9 lb, is eminently portable. The sheet features glossy and matte surfaces, and can be assembled either way. The STS-DT is also available in kits with lights and stands.

OVERVIEW: The  Impact Handytop Shooting Table with 19.5 x 39 x 19.5" Translucent Plexiglas Sheet is ideal for small to medium product photography, ecommerce shooting, still life, art objects or food. At 19.5 x 39" you'll be able to photograph vertical objects without seeing the top of the shooting surface. Folding legs integrated into the design elevate the translucent Plexiglas sheet 19.5", allowing you to backlight it and light from underneath as well as from the front. The shooting table sets up and breaks down quickly - simply slide each end of the Plexi under the tabs built in for that purpose and start shooting. The sheet features glossy and matte surfaces.

OVERVIEW: The 9.5' Steel Roller with Low Base and Braking Wheels is a heavy duty, chrome-plated steel and aluminum alloy support that features a low base for extra stability, braking wheels, two risers and a 5/8" Baby stud. It will support over 26 lb.

OVERVIEW: This Impact 500W 2-Light Flood Kit With 6' Stands is built around the Impact flood fixture comprised of a 10" reflector with a high-heat ceramic socket. Each light's wooden control handle stays cool, and each has a cord with an in-line switch. The kit includes two 250W lamps and two 6' light stands.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact 500W 2-Light Flood Kit With 6' Stands is built around the Impact flood fixture comprised of a 10" reflector with a high-heat ceramic socket. Each light's wooden control handle stays cool, and each has a cord with an in-line switch. The kit includes two 250W lamps and two 6' light stands.

OVERVIEW: The Impact READY COOL 4 Lamp Fluorescent Fixture is an economical light source that combines an efficient reflector with built-in hammered aluminum reflective barndoors to give you a fixture capable of an impressive output equivalent to a 1,000W hot light. However, unlike tungsten lights, the FRC-24 has a very low power draw and emits very little heat, meaning reduced operational costs and minimal potential harm to your set or talent. Additionally, with lamp life up to 8,000 hours the FRC-24 is virtually maintenance-free. One of the FRC-24's most useful features is 2-lamp/4-lamp switching, that allows you to reduce the power to 50% for low light shooting. It's also possible to install both tungsten balanced and daylight-balanced lamps for dual color capability. The FRC-24 comes with the fixture, lamps, power cord, flexible gooseneck stand mount with 5/8" receiver and a padded carrying bag to transport or store it all. The FRC-24 is a muti voltage fixture that can be used anywhere in the world with 110-220V, 50/60Hz. An optional plug adapter will be needed for outlets outside of the U.S.

The FRC-24 is a muti voltage fixture that can be used anywhere in the world with 110-220V, 50/60Hz. An optional plug adapter will be needed for outlets outside of the U.S.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Soft and Natural Single Socket 2 Light Kit was put together to help image makers who need a lightweight setup for a wide variety of subjects. The two included Impact Single Socket Fluorescent Fixtures accept lamps up to 105W and have built-in tilting brackets and 5/8" receivers for the included 6.0' light stands. Instead of a speed ring, these lights have four receptacles around the head that accept the poles from the included 20 x 20" softboxes. The kit includes two digital-friendly CFL fluorescent lamps with E26 screw-in bases and a daylight Kelvin temperature of 5,000.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Soft and Natural Single Socket 2 Light Creator Kit was put together to help image makers who need a lightweight setup for a wide variety of subjects. The two included Impact Single Socket Fluorescent Fixtures accept lamps up to 105W and have built-in tilting brackets and 5/8" receivers for the included 6.0' light stands. Instead of a speed ring, these lights have four receptacles around the head that accept the poles from the included 20 x 20" softboxes. The kit includes two digital-friendly CFL fluorescent lamps with E26 screw-in bases and a daylight Kelvin temperature of 5,000.

The kit also includes a Photo Creator Green Screen Kit from Savage. Just photograph a subject in front of the included 5.0 x 7.0' green chromakey background, upload the photos and the kit's software will allow you to drop one of 720 exotic or photogenic backgrounds behind the subject. The software is compatible with both Mac and PC.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Soft and Natural 4 Socket 3 Light Kit was put together to help image makers who need a lightweight setup for a wide variety of subjects. The three included Impact 4 Socket Fluorescent Fixtures accept lamps up to 50W and have built-in tilting brackets and 5/8" receivers for the included 6.0' light stands. Instead of a speed ring, these lights have four receptacles around the head that accept the poles from the included 20 x 27.5" softboxes. The kit includes 12 digital-friendly CFL fluorescent lamps with E26 screw-in bases and a daylight Kelvin temperature of 5,000. It all fits in the provided nylon carry bag.

Instead of a speed ring, these lights have four receptacles around the head that accept the poles from the included 20 x 27.5" softboxes. The kit includes 12 digital-friendly CFL fluorescent lamps with E26 screw-in bases and a daylight Kelvin temperature of 5,000. It all fits in the provided nylon carry bag.

OVERVIEW: This Impact FEL-M2 Lamp (1,000W/120V) is a tungsten halogen bulb with a G9.5 metal base that is compatible with light fixtures with at least a 1,000W capacity. It has a color temperature of 3,200K and an average life of 300 hours.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact FEL-M2 Lamp (1,000W/120V) is a tungsten halogen bulb with a G9.5 metal base that is compatible with light fixtures with at least a 1,000W capacity. It has a color temperature of 3,200K and an average life of 300 hours.

OVERVIEW: The Speed Ring Flash Bracket from Impact is made for the Impact Quikbox. The bracket is vertically adjustable and the cold shoe is adjustable on the horizontal plane. These adjustments allow you to fine tune the bracket to fit most standard speedlights. Some speedlights such as Sony and Minolta may require a shoe adapter. All adjustments are secured by thumb-screws, including the bottom light stand mount.The cold shoe is removable so that you can mount remote receivers or hot shoes from a TTL cord on the 1/4"-20 threaded screw. Three spacer washers are included to further fine tune adjustments for speedlights or receivers of various sizes.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Speed Ring Flash Bracket from Impact is made for the Impact Quikbox. The bracket is vertically adjustable and the cold shoe is adjustable on the horizontal plane. These adjustments allow you to fine tune the bracket to fit most standard speedlights. Some speedlights such as Sony and Minolta may require a shoe adapter. All adjustments are secured by thumb-screws, including the bottom light stand mount.

The cold shoe is removable so that you can mount remote receivers or hot shoes from a TTL cord on the 1/4"-20 threaded screw. Three spacer washers are included to further fine tune adjustments for speedlights or receivers of various sizes.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Atom Clamp with 1/4"-20 to 3/8"-16 Adapter is a combination that allows the Atom Clamp to be mounted to gear or accessories with 1/4"-20 or 3/8"-16 female taps. Possible uses include clamping a camera to a pipe or piece of furniture. Although the clamp weighs only 4.0 oz, it can support a payload of over 15 lb.

Possible uses include clamping a camera to a pipe or piece of furniture. Although the clamp weighs only 4.0 oz, it can support a payload of over 15 lb.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Studio Kit offers 2 monolights with a total of 600Ws of power and enough supports and light shaping tools to handle a wide variety of subject matter.


The 2 included VSD300 Monolights each have a digital readout and accept S-type monolight reflectors and head accessories, such as the included Impact Background Reflector and Snoot. The flash heads feature cushioned touch-pad function control buttons and power control that is adjustable in 1/10 stop increments, from full to 1/8 power. The 100W modeling lamps can be set to proportional so that you can easily preview your lighting effects or adjusted manually to any light intensity that you wish. Two air-cushioned light stands provide protection from impact damage while adjusting their height. Besides a sync cord and spare fuse, each light ships with a 7.0" grid reflector that accepts the included 40 degree grid.

The kit's 24 x 32" softbox is ideal for portrait or product work while the included White Translucent Umbrella offers a choice of traditional bounce diffusion or a "shoot through" option that is similar to the effect of the softbox. It all fits in the provided Impact Light Kit Bag that features a zippered closure, adjustable internal dividers and carry handles that convert to a shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Fashion Beauty Dish Kit is an ideal choice for a main light for portraits, fashion, head shots or advertising work. 


The VS-LCD400 Monolight has a digital readout and accepts S-type monolight reflectors and head accessories such as the included Impact Beauty Dish. Power is adjustable in 1/10 stop increments, from full to 1/8 power over a 4 stop range. Its 150W modeling lamp can be set to proportional so that you can easily preview your lighting effects or adjusted manually to any light intensity that you wish. An air cushioned light stand provides protection from impact damage while adjusting its height.


The Impact 22" Beauty Dish Reflector provides a bridge between a softbox and an umbrella, yielding a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portrait subjects. The secret is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. For an even softer effect slip the included Diffuser Sock over the front of the Beauty Dish. The sock also masks hot spots that might be visible in reflective objects. The provided honeycomb grid offers yet another option, adding control and directionality to the light source while thwarting spill light that might otherwise compromise your background lighting.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact SF-ABRL Flash Head Kit offers a lightweight 160W/s stand mounted flash head with 2 key light modifiers for creative control.


The included Impact SF-ABRL160 Stand Mount Flash has a 160W/s output and features a bright LED modeling lamp that, unlike its quartz counterparts, is virtually maintenance-free. And instead of lasting 100 hours, the LED typically lasts approximately 25,000 hours. The SF-ABRL160 has a built-in optical slave for wireless triggering, a sync cord for direct firing from your camera, a built-in umbrella receptacle, and a 5/8" standard stand mount.

The included Impact Barndoor Kit is comprised of a snap-on 4-leaf barndoor set, filter frame, 3 colored gels and a diffusion gel. The barndoors shape and direct the SF-ABRL160's light output. The SF-ABRL Flash Head Kit includes an additional light-shaping tool. The Impact Snoot fits over the head and narrows the output into a soft circle that is smaller as you move closer to your subject and grows larger as you move it away. For a still smaller circle of light, a removable 30-degree honeycomb grid is included. The snoot is ideal for creative effects on backgrounds or for a hair or accent light. Gels can be taped over it for creative color effects.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Food Photography Kit offers a compact, basic setup with a fluorescent lamp head and a versatile stand that will allow you to shoot your own cuisine or a wide variety of tabletop items. You can enhance the head's quality of light with an optional diffusion source such as Impact's 33" or 43" White Translucent Umbrella or one of Impact's line of collapsible reflectors. 

The Impact Convertible Boom Arm/Light Stand is a triple-duty support that can serve as a 13' light stand or as an overhead boom capable of supporting a small light head such as the included fluorescent fixture at an extension of almost 3.0' from the center of the stand. Alternately, you can bounce the light off of a reflector or pump it through diffusers up to 60" by supporting them with the stand's spring clips. 


The Single Socket Fluorescent Fixture comes with a 26W compact fluorescent lamp with a daylight balanced color temperature of 5,000K. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact 1250W Three Light Mini Boom Kit was put together by B&H to offer a universal lighting solution for anything from portraiture to product photography. Three lights are included in the kit; each built around a high heat-resistant porcelain socket with a stay-cool wooden handle capable of using up to 500W. 

Two 12" reflectors mount to 2 of the sockets and include 500W lamps. The third socket is matched with a narrow beam 5" reflector and supplied with a 250W flood lamp. Although the socket can handle 500W the size of the reflector limits it to 250W. All three lights have a 10' cable with an inline switch and U.S. plug.

The lights are supported by 3 Impact 8' light stands with air cushioning that gently lowers the lights when making height adjustments to prevent damage from sudden drops. The included Mini Boom comes with a 1.0 lb counterweight and can support any of the lights. One scenario among many for this versatile kit combines the 500W lights with the kit's 43" white umbrellas and the 5" 250W light on the boom for use as a hair light or rim light. The entire kit fits in the provided padded, water-resistant carry bag that features inner partitions, zippered closure and hand straps that convert to a shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW: The SF-32-120 Impact Spiral Fluorescent Lamp is a 32W/120V E26 medium screw-base lamp that fits Impact fixtures such as the Octacool and VA902 as well as many other lamp head brands. The lamp is daylight color balanced and has an average lamp life of 10,000 hours.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The SF-32-120 Impact Spiral Fluorescent Lamp is a 32W/120V E26 medium screw-base lamp that fits Impact fixtures such as the Octacool and VA902 as well as many other lamp head brands. The lamp is daylight color balanced and has an average lamp life of 10,000 hours.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Basic Varipole Support System is comprised of a pair of Varipoles, 2 super clamps that accept the included U-Hooks and a crossbar that will hold seamless rolls up to 107".

The Varipole easily and quickly mounts between floor and ceiling providing stable support for backdrops, reflectors, lights and grip accessories. With a strong tension mechanism and locking system, the Varipole is secured by its own force of pressure between solid walls or floors and ceilings. Adjustable between 6'11" (2.1 m) and 12'1" (3.7 m), the Deluxe Varipole is capable of turning most rooms into a photo studio without damage to walls or ceilings. Simply snap the U-Hooks into the Super Clamps to provide a cradle for the crossbar, add optional seamless paper and shoot.

OVERVIEW: The QuikBalance Collapsible 12" Gray Panel from Impact is a convenient tool to ensure that your photos and videos are accurately exposed and color balanced. One side of the panel is 18% gray, while the other side is neutral white. By taking a photo or video of either the white or gray side of the panel in the same lighting conditions as your final image, you can accurately adjust exposure and color balance in camera, or in your post-production software.

OVERVIEW: The QuikBalance Tri-Fold Panel (12 x 36") from Impact is a convenient tool to ensure that your photos and videos are accurately exposed and color balanced. It has a neutral white panel, a neutral black panel and an 18% gray panel- each with a silver reflector on the reverse side. The panels can be folded so that you can use one color at a time, or unfolded to use two, or all three. The same feature applies to the reflectors on the reverse sides, giving you a small, medium, and large sized reflector.By taking a photo or video of either the white, black, or gray panels in the same lighting conditions as your final image, you can accurately adjust exposure and color balance in camera, or in your post production software.

It has a neutral white panel, a neutral black panel and an 18% gray panel- each with a silver reflector on the reverse side. The panels can be folded so that you can use one color at a time, or unfolded to use two, or all three. The same feature applies to the reflectors on the reverse sides, giving you a small, medium, and large sized reflector.

By taking a photo or video of either the white, black, or gray panels in the same lighting conditions as your final image, you can accurately adjust exposure and color balance in camera, or in your post production software.

OVERVIEW: The Panel Frame Reflector Kit from Impact includes a reversible zebra patterned reflector panel, an aluminum alloy frame with crossbars, and a padded shoulder bag. It is designed to turn harsh direct sunlight into well-balanced fill light.Both sides of the panel fabric have a zebra stripe pattern; one side is gold and silver, the other is silver and white. The silver side gives off a neutral colored specular light with moderate contrast, while the gold side produces a warmer color with slightly less contrast.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact 35 lb Pro Sandbag Kit from B&H is a set of 6 black, double zippered bags that ship empty to allow you a choice of weighty material and to save on shipping costs. 

Impact Sandbags come in a variety of shapes and weights. A staple of any studio or location shoot, their saddlebag design is ideal for draping over light stand and C Stand legs. The strong webbed handle makes transporting easy and allows you to hang the bag from a hook or arm. The sandbag weighs 35 lb when filled with sand and ounces when empty.

OVERVIEW: The black 9' Adjustable Background Crossbar from Impact is a 3-section telescoping crossbar that adjusts from 47 to 118". It is meant to hold a 9' roll of seamless paper or smaller cored roll, or any 10' muslin background (adjustable pole maximum width for fabric is 118"). It fits on top of two stands with 5/8" studs. Two thumb screws secure the crossbar onto the 5/8" studs.

The background features a 4" rod pocket for background stand crossbars that runs along its 6' width, and a see-through bag for easy identification, storage and transport. The background can be machine washed separately in cold water.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Flash Tube for the Astral Extreme AS-X-400 Monolight is a spare or replacement for the flash tube that ships with the light. The tube is easily user-replaceable in seconds.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact Flash Tube for the Astral Extreme AS-X-400 Monolight is a spare or replacement for the flash tube that ships with the light. The tube is easily user-replaceable in seconds.

OVERVIEW: When describing the aptly-named 400Ws Astral Extreme AS-X-400 Monolight from  Impact the operative word is speed. The light is designed so you'll never miss a shot while waiting for it to recycle. Recycling time is a fast 0.4 seconds at full power, flash duration is an impressive 1/5,000 of a second, and continuous shooting speed can reach a rapid-fire 10 frames per second. This strong emphasis on speed makes the Astral Extreme a smart choice for fashion and event shooting and since it's fast enough to capture almost any movement at its peak, it's ideal for high-speed photography. You can even bring the Astral Extreme on location, powering it from a generator or inverter if there's no AC power available.Easy might be the next way to describe AS-X-400. Adjustments are easily made on the light's back panel which incorporates a carry handle. Soft push buttons control the modeling light, ready beep, and optical slave on/off function. The slave allows you set Instant-Fire or Skip Pre-flash modes and trigger the flash head at distances up to 33'. You can also hard wire the AS-X-400 to your camera via the included 1/4" phono sync cord, or easier still, use an optional wireless radio system such as Impact's ControlSync 16 to trigger the flash from up to 150' away and remotely control its power, modeling and audible alert.The Astral Extreme's power level, which is adjustable in 1/10 stops over a 6 stop range is displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. Both power and modeling lamp intensity are adjustable via simple knobs. The 150W modeling light dims when the flash is triggered while a switchable beep indicates full recycling.A handy feature of the AS-X-400 is the adjustable mounting bracket that allows you to find the center of gravity for better balance when using heavy front accessories such as large softboxes. A built-in receiver can support umbrella shafts up to 8mm and umbrellas up to 7' in diameter. The speedring/reflector mount is S-type, providing you with a wide range of choices, not only from Impact but from the many manufacturers who have standardized on this mount. Impact includes a reflector that accepts 7" grids.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
When describing the aptly-named 400Ws Astral Extreme AS-X-400 Monolight from Impact the operative word is speed. The light is designed so you'll never miss a shot while waiting for it to recycle. Recycling time is a fast 0.4 seconds at full power, flash duration is an impressive 1/5,000 of a second, and continuous shooting speed can reach a rapid-fire 10 frames per second. This strong emphasis on speed makes the Astral Extreme a smart choice for fashion and event shooting and since it's fast enough to capture almost any movement at its peak, it's ideal for high-speed photography. You can even bring the Astral Extreme on location, powering it from a generator or inverter if there's no AC power available.

Easy might be the next way to describe AS-X-400. Adjustments are easily made on the light's back panel which incorporates a carry handle. Soft push buttons control the modeling light, ready beep, and optical slave on/off function. The slave allows you set Instant-Fire or Skip Pre-flash modes and trigger the flash head at distances up to 33'. You can also hard wire the AS-X-400 to your camera via the included 1/4" phono sync cord, or easier still, use an optional wireless radio system such as Impact's ControlSync 16 to trigger the flash from up to 150' away and remotely control its power, modeling and audible alert.

The Astral Extreme's power level, which is adjustable in 1/10 stops over a 6 stop range is displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. Both power and modeling lamp intensity are adjustable via simple knobs. The 150W modeling light dims when the flash is triggered while a switchable beep indicates full recycling.

A handy feature of the AS-X-400 is the adjustable mounting bracket that allows you to find the center of gravity for better balance when using heavy front accessories such as large softboxes. A built-in receiver can support umbrella shafts up to 8mm and umbrellas up to 7' in diameter. The speedring/reflector mount is S-type, providing you with a wide range of choices, not only from Impact but from the many manufacturers who have standardized on this mount. Impact includes a reflector that accepts 7" grids.

OVERVIEW:
The ControlSync 16 Receiver from Impact is an advanced 16 channel, 16 group radio triggering device that can fire your compatible remote flash at sync speeds up to 1/250 second at distances up to 150' as well as control its power level.

Operating on the 433 MHz frequency and powered by the host device, the receiver, when used with its separately purchased Impact CS-16-T transmitter, can raise and lower the power of the slave flash in 1/10 or 1/3 stop increments as well as turn modeling lights and audio alerts on and off. It's also capable of turning the AF assist on or off on flash units that have this feature.

The ControlSync16 Receiver is compatible with the Impact AS-X-400 Astral Extreme 400Ws moonlight and Interfit Strobies flash heads.

It's also capable of turning the AF assist on or off on flash units that have this feature.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Compact Fluorescent Kit 1 provides a basic lighting setup that is ideal for anything from portraiture to products to video applications. The kit includes a wooden-handled, stay-cool umbrella socket that is compatible with lamps up to 500W, a daylight-balanced 105W screw-in fluorescent lamp, air-cushioned light stand and a high-output 43" beaded silver umbrella.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Compact Fluorescent Kit 1 provides a basic lighting setup that is ideal for anything from portraiture to products to video applications. The kit includes a wooden-handled, stay-cool umbrella socket that is compatible with lamps up to 500W, a daylight-balanced 105W screw-in fluorescent lamp, air-cushioned light stand and a high-output 43" beaded silver umbrella.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Compact Fluorescent Kit 2 was put together by B&H to provide a basic lighting setup with extra power that is ideal for anything from portraiture to larger products to groups and video applications. The kit includes a wooden-handled, stay-cool umbrella socket that is compatible with lamps up to 500W, a single socket to four socket adapter, four 42W daylight compact fluorescent lamps, a 9.5' air-cushioned, heavy-duty light stand and a high-output 43" beaded-silver umbrella. Each socket on the adapter can handle up to 150W but the total wattage should not exceed the 500W rating of the Porcelain Socket Umbrella Mount.

OVERVIEW:
The  Impact READY COOL 2 Lighting Kit was put together to offer a portable daylight-balanced lighting solution for photography and videography. The kit includes 2 READY COOL 2 fixtures, 2 AC cables, 2 55W daylight fluorescent lamps for each fixture, 2 light stand adapters, 4 spare fuses, 2 padded carrying cases and 2 air-cushioned 8' light stands. 

The FRC-22 READY COOL Fixture features built-in hammered-aluminum reflective barndoors, very low power draw and heat emission and lamp life up to 8,000 hours. The Impact 8' light stand features air-cushioning for smooth height adjustments and a 5/8" top stud with a 1/4"-20 accessory screw.

The kit includes 2 READY COOL 2 fixtures, 2 AC cables, 2 55W daylight fluorescent lamps for each fixture, 2 light stand adapters, 4 spare fuses, 2 padded carrying cases and 2 air-cushioned 8' light stands.

The FRC-22 READY COOL Fixture features built-in hammered-aluminum reflective barndoors, very low power draw and heat emission and lamp life up to 8,000 hours. The Impact 8' light stand features air-cushioning for smooth height adjustments and a 5/8" top stud with a 1/4"-20 accessory screw.

OVERVIEW: The TVMP Yoke to Baby or Junior Adapter from Impact is a yoke-to-stand adapter that allows light fixtures that have no stud or socket to be mounted on a standard Baby or Junior light stand top. The adapter has a 5/8" (16 mm) socket to fit onto light stands with a 5/8" stud. Alternatively, since its outer dimensions are 1 1/8", you can remove the T-handle and use it a junior pin to fit onto a stand with a 1 1/8" receiver. The adapter is constructed of zinc-plated steel and has a 1/2"-13 bolt with a washer.

Alternatively, since its outer dimensions are 1 1/8", you can remove the T-handle and use it a junior pin to fit onto a stand with a 1 1/8" receiver. The adapter is constructed of zinc-plated steel and has a 1/2"-13 bolt with a washer.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Loosening or transferring of the set-screw requires the use of an M4 type Allen key (optional)

OVERVIEW:
The Impact 16" Beauty Dish Reflector with Honeycomb Grid Kit was put together by B&H to give image makers the benefit of this diffused but crisp quality of light. The kit includes a 16" Beauty Dish and a 16" Honeycomb grid.Beauty Dish
The beauty dish reflector is a light shaping tool popularized by fashion and portrait photographers. This Impact 16" Beauty Dish Reflector lives up to its potential by offering a bridge between softboxes and umbrellas that yields a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portrait subjects. The secret is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. The Beauty Dish fits most major brands with the separate purchase of an adapter.Honeycomb Grid
The Impact 40° Honeycomb Grid for 16" Beauty Dish Reflector alters the shape and light output of the reflector by tunneling the light forward into a narrower 40° beam. The grid offers slightly increased contrast, directionality and spill light control. It's an ideal tool for achieving Rembrandt-like lighting effects.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
The Impact CC-123 Hook Beak Duo Flex Clamp is a small clamp set accessory that features a "hook beak" pipe fitting clamp on one end of a flexible 8" cable with a flat-jawed 1" clip clamp on the other end. This device is useful to holding paper, reflective material, light gobos, or any other lightweight tools up to 6 ounces in weight for helping you get your setup just right. 

The Duo Flex Clamp has an aluminum construction and can attach to pipes from 0.5 to 1.5" in diameter with the hook beak end and items up to 2" wide with the clip clamp. It also weights just 0.6 pounds making it easy to store and carry.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Flex Arm Super Clamp Kit is an ideal combination for placing grip gear in unusual or hard to reach places.

The cast alloy clamp has a load capacity of 33 lb and can clamp and hold a wide variety of items such as cameras, lights, umbrellas, hooks, shelves, plate glass, cross bars, even other Super Clamps.

The aluminum Heavy Duty Flex Arm measures 0.7" diameter and 21.65" in length and can be twisted into configurations that would be impossible with a jointed articulating arm. One end of the arm has a 3/8" female tapped hex stud to prevent torsion in the Super Clamp. The other end terminates in a 1/4"-20 screw on a 5/8" stud. The arm can hold 1.1 lb

The aluminum arm features female threaded 5/8" studs at each end, (1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16) one of which mounts to the included camera bracket. The other fits into your choice of Impact Super Clamps or Clip Clamps.

OVERVIEW: The FF-0F4 Octa 4-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a four Edison socket base that accepts CFL fluorescents up to 85W. Individual socket rating is 105 watts. The back panel has dual rocker switches, each of which control on/off function for two lights allowing the creation of a light ratio. The FF-0F4 has a multi-voltage power supply for worldwide use (with addition of optional adapter plug) and has a standard 5/8" receiver for light stands and accessories. The FF-0F4 is meant for use with the Impact FF-OSB60 24" Octa Softbox which is purchased separately, or with a standard photo umbrella that fits through the fixture's umbrella receptacle.

OVERVIEW:
The multi-use Small Clip Clamp with Rubber Rivet Jaw from Impact 
has rubber-padded jaws that can attach to pipe, light stands, shelves or ceiling supports up to 1.38" in thickness or diameter. The clamp has a 5/8" receiver for mounting to a light stand, articulating arm or other accessory, as well as a 5/8" stud with 3/8"-16 tap and 1/4"-20 bushing for gear with threaded studs or 5/8" receivers.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Speed Ring for Lowel Tota-light from Impact has 4 FlexRod holes that allow you to easily mount a medium, large or extra large square, rectangular or strip Luxbanx Duo softbox to a Lowel Tota-light. The ring will also fit most other brands of softbox. It includes a tilting heavy duty stand adapter with a 5/8" receiver that mounts directly on a stand.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Luxbanx Speed Ring for Lowel Tota-light from Impact has 4 FlexRod holes that allow you to easily mount a medium, large or extra large square, rectangular or strip Luxbanx Duo softbox to a Lowel Tota-light. The ring will also fit most other brands of softbox. It includes a tilting heavy duty stand adapter with a 5/8" receiver that mounts directly on a stand.

OVERVIEW:
For the photographer who's going places, the LKB-JR Light Kit Bag Jumbo Roller from Impact will store and protect two fully-assembled OctaCool 6 or 9 lights, two softboxes, cables, gels, and related accessories. The inside of the bag features two compartments separated by a padded, touch-fastening divider. To simplify transport and eliminate lengthy assembly time, each compartment is designed to hold one OctaCool 6 or 9 light with installed CFL lamps, and reflector. Lights are secured by two padded, touch-fastening stabilizer panels with keyhole cutouts designed to fit over the back of each light. 

Underneath the lid are three zippered, mesh pockets. Two of the pockets will accommodate an OctaCool 6 or 9 softbox, with the third reserved for 2 light handles, 2 power cords, gels, and other accessories. 

The bag may be rolled on a pair of wheels, lifted by the handles or shoulder strap, and stored in an upright position on a set of rubber feet. For security, the heavy-duty zipper has twin metal pulls which may be connected with an optional padlock (user supplied).

For protection and durability, the bag features heavy-duty plastic walls encased in a thick layer of high-density foam, and covered with a shell of water-resistant 600D nylon. And for easy identification, the side of the bag has a clear slip-in ID pocket.

OVERVIEW: The  PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver from  Impact is a combination wireless transmitter/receiver with 80 channels for elimination of interference, as well as 4 groups that can each handle multiple devices that can be triggered individually or simultaneously. Besides remote flash triggering, with the appropriate optional cable, the PowerSync 16-80 can focus and trigger your camera in single, continuous, and bulb modes or be used as a wireless shutter release.The PowerSync 16-80 is used with at least 1 other unit. In its most basic mode, one transceiver slides onto the camera's hot shoe or is mounted to a bracket's cold shoe and is connected to the camera using the included 2.5mm to PC cable. A second transceiver acts as a receiver and accepts a shoe mount flash using its built-in hot shoe or is wired to the flash in the case of power packs or monolight. The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'. You can even extend the range further by adding a third intermediate transceiver to extend the range to 1,440'.A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using an optional dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-tranceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.The grouping function allows you to assign each light in a portrait setup to one of the 4 groups allowing you to use all of the lights in unison or to add or subtract an accent, hairlight or backlight, for example, at will for different effects. Alternatively, you can assign a channel to 4 different lighting setups in a large studio and move from setup to setup for different looks or products. Each setup would require at least 1 transceiver wired to a master light to set off the optical slaves on the other units. With its reasonable cost you could, of course, wire a transceiver to each flash in the studio.The PowerSync 16-80 runs on 2 included, easily-sourced AA batteries. Also included are 2.5 mm to PC and 3.5 mm to 3.5 mm flash sync cables, a lanyard, pouch case, self-adhering accessory shoe, and a 3.5 mm to 1/4" phono adapter. The PowerSync 16-80 is backward compatible with PowerSync 16 but limited to 16 channels.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver from Impact is a combination wireless transmitter/receiver with 80 channels for elimination of interference, as well as 4 groups that can each handle multiple devices that can be triggered individually or simultaneously. Besides remote flash triggering, with the appropriate optional cable, the PowerSync 16-80 can focus and trigger your camera in single, continuous, and bulb modes or be used as a wireless shutter release.

The PowerSync 16-80 is used with at least 1 other unit. In its most basic mode, one transceiver slides onto the camera's hot shoe or is mounted to a bracket's cold shoe and is connected to the camera using the included 2.5mm to PC cable. A second transceiver acts as a receiver and accepts a shoe mount flash using its built-in hot shoe or is wired to the flash in the case of power packs or monolight. The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'. You can even extend the range further by adding a third intermediate transceiver to extend the range to 1,440'.

A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using an optional dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.

The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-tranceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.

Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.

The grouping function allows you to assign each light in a portrait setup to one of the 4 groups allowing you to use all of the lights in unison or to add or subtract an accent, hairlight or backlight, for example, at will for different effects. Alternatively, you can assign a channel to 4 different lighting setups in a large studio and move from setup to setup for different looks or products. Each setup would require at least 1 transceiver wired to a master light to set off the optical slaves on the other units. With its reasonable cost you could, of course, wire a transceiver to each flash in the studio.

The PowerSync 16-80 runs on 2 included, easily-sourced AA batteries. Also included are 2.5 mm to PC and 3.5 mm to 3.5 mm flash sync cables, a lanyard, pouch case, self-adhering accessory shoe, and a 3.5 mm to 1/4" phono adapter. The PowerSync 16-80 is backward compatible with PowerSync 16 but limited to 16 channels.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Compatible with all cameras that feature the standard universal hot shoe (incl. Sony Multi-Interface Shoe).
Compatible with all flashes (set to Manual mode), except for Sony brand Multi-Interface Shoe series flashes (e.g. HVL-F60M etc.)

OVERVIEW:
The 24" FF-OSB60 Octa Softbox from Impact is an 8-sided light modifier supported by 8 flexrods which are attached to the separately purchased FF-OF4 4-socket fixture.

The Octa features a highly reflective pebbled interior and a removable front face that attaches with simple touch-fasteners. In use, it renders the signature wrap-around look that it's well known for, as well as natural circular catch-lights in your subjects eyes. This 24" Octa is made to be used with the FF-OF4 fixture and fluorescent lamps only.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The 24" FF-OSB60 Octa Softbox from Impact is an 8-sided light modifier supported by 8 flexrods which are attached to the separately purchased FF-OF4 4-socket fixture.

The Octa features a highly reflective pebbled interior and a removable front face that attaches with simple touch-fasteners. In use, it renders the signature wrap-around look that it's well known for, as well as natural circular catch-lights in your subjects eyes. This 24" Octa is made to be used with the FF-OF4 fixture and fluorescent lamps only.

OVERVIEW: The PowerTrigger 16 Channel AC Transmitter and Receiver Set from Impact contains everything you'll need to wirelessly trigger your studio AC flash units at distances up to 75'. The set includes a 16 channel transmitter and receiver as well as a 2.5mm sub-mini to PC cable, a 3.5mm to 1/4" monoplug adapter and a pre-installed battery for the transmitter.The low-profile 1.2 x 1.6 x 2.8" PowerTrigger transmitter has a hot shoe for your camera, a test button, and 16 separate channels operating on the 433 MHz frequency to prevent interference from other devices. Channels are chosen on both the transmitter and receiver by configuring 4 DIP switches in 1 of 16 permutations on both the transmitter or receiver for wireless triggering from up to 75' away with flash sync speeds of up to 1/200 second. The transmitter runs on a pre-installed, 23A battery that can last up to 2 years with normal use.Unlike the transmitter, the PowerTrigger receiver doesn't use batteries and is instead powered by the same AC cord that's used for your monolight. Think of it as an in-line receiver. Simply plug the end of the power cord into the receiver then plug the receiver's power cord into the head's power outlet. Finally, plug the PowerTrigger's attached 3.5mm sync cable into the flash. A 1/4" mono plug adapter is provided if the head doesn't have 3.5mm input. If you don't know what your flash head's sync voltage is, or if you're using an older unit you might want to purchase a Wein Safe-Sync adapter (MFR# 990-510) to insure that the sync voltage remains under 6V. The Safe Sync's monoplug attachment can be easily adapted to 3.5mm if necessary.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The PowerTrigger 16 Channel AC Transmitter and Receiver Set from Impact contains everything you'll need to wirelessly trigger your studio AC flash units at distances up to 75'. The set includes a 16 channel transmitter and receiver as well as a 2.5mm sub-mini to PC cable, a 3.5mm to 1/4" monoplug adapter and a pre-installed battery for the transmitter.

The low-profile 1.2 x 1.6 x 2.8" PowerTrigger transmitter has a hot shoe for your camera, a test button, and 16 separate channels operating on the 433 MHz frequency to prevent interference from other devices. Channels are chosen on both the transmitter and receiver by configuring 4 DIP switches in 1 of 16 permutations on both the transmitter or receiver for wireless triggering from up to 75' away with flash sync speeds of up to 1/200 second. The transmitter runs on a pre-installed, 23A battery that can last up to 2 years with normal use.

Unlike the transmitter, the PowerTrigger receiver doesn't use batteries and is instead powered by the same AC cord that's used for your monolight. Think of it as an in-line receiver. Simply plug the end of the power cord into the receiver then plug the receiver's power cord into the head's power outlet. Finally, plug the PowerTrigger's attached 3.5mm sync cable into the flash. A 1/4" mono plug adapter is provided if the head doesn't have 3.5mm input. If you don't know what your flash head's sync voltage is, or if you're using an older unit you might want to purchase a Wein Safe-Sync adapter (MFR# 990-510) to insure that the sync voltage remains under 6V. The Safe Sync's monoplug attachment can be easily adapted to 3.5mm if necessary.
