OVERVIEW:
Lightweight and literally a snap to set up, the 35 x 35 x 35" Giant Digital Light Shed from Impact is a shooting enclosure that will give you clean detailed photos while others are still grappling with seamless paper and reflectors.


Impact makes it easy in several ways. The white translucent cube has a removable front panel that facilitates positioning of the item to be photographed inside, which is then closed and sealed via touch-fasteners. Long front and top zippered openings offer a wide range of camera angles, and since all sides are translucent, 360 degree lighting is possible with your choice tungsten, LED, or fluorescent fixtures. You can even light a propped-up shed from underneath for a floating effect. Impact provides both white and black fabric sweeps that attach with touch fasteners for even more creative options. When finished shooting, simply collapse the panels upon themselves and twist as instructed into a disc that's about 1/3 its open size. A soft case is provided for storage and transport.

OVERVIEW: This Background Set for the Small Digital Shed from Impact is comprised of a black and a white replacement background for the ones that ship with the Light Shed, as well as a gray background. The black cloth is a good choice for isolating mid- to light-toned objects against a detail-less background. The white does the same for darker objects while the medium gray is a good, neutral all-purpose choice.

OVERVIEW:
The Ringbox Ringlight Softbox from Vello is a quick and easy way to convert your shoe-mount flash into a ringlight with its characteristic soft shadowless quality so often see in everything from fashion spreads and to macro photography.
 
Setup is as simple as unfolding five magnetic rods to prop the ring open and then attaching it to normal or telephoto lenses up to 127mm in diameter via a set of pentagonally configured stretch cords. The ring's ultra-lightweight construction and soft mount eliminate any risk of damaging or scratching the lens or flash and the best part is that no external power supply is needed - the light runs on your flash's batteries.

The Ringbox collapses to an 8" disc and weighs under a pound, so you can take it nearly anywhere you take your camera. It's compatible with most DSLRs and speedlights, making it a great fit for the gear you already own.

It's compatible with most DSLRs and speedlights, making it a great fit for the gear you already own.

OVERVIEW:
The 7' Parabolic Umbrella Diffuser from Impact is a translucent light modifier that fits over the Parabolic Umbrella and converts it to a large softbox with just a 1/2 stop loss of output. The resulting soft, flattering quality of light is well-suited to portraiture, group shots or any subject that requires open shadows and low contrast. The diffuser is designed to fit the Impact 7' silver, white and translucent versions of the umbrella (Impact UP-7S, UP-7WB,
UP-7T). It can also be used with most other brand 7' parabolic umbrellas (e.g. Westcott, Photoflex, etc.).

The resulting soft, flattering quality of light is well-suited to portraiture, group shots or any subject that requires open shadows and low contrast. The diffuser is designed to fit the Impact 7' silver, white and translucent versions of the umbrella (Impact UP-7S, UP-7WB, UP-7T). It can also be used with most other brand 7' parabolic umbrellas (e.g. Westcott, Photoflex, etc.).

OVERVIEW: The 60" Impact Luxbanx Medium Octagonal Softbox with Fabric Grid was put together by B&H to provide optimal performance and control of this Luxbanx light shaper.The Impact Luxbanx Medium Octagonal Softbox is a versatile light shaping tool for strobes that features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast.The 40 degree fabric grid attaches quickly via touch-fasteners and narrows the beam spread from your softbox to control spill light and add directionality similar to a reflector, while maintaining a soft quality of light. Unlike unwieldy rigid grids, Impact fabric grids are extremely light weight and fold flat for transport in the included carry case.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
The 60" Impact Luxbanx Duo Medium Octagonal Softbox with Fabric Grid was put together by B&H to provide optimal performance and control of this Luxbanx light shaper.


The Impact Luxbanx Duo Medium Octagonal Softbox has a textured silver interior for high output, removable front diffuser and a removable interior baffle. It's compatible with strobe lights, fluorescent or LED light sources. It's also compatible with hot lights up to 1,500W. When using it with hot lights remove the interior baffle. The Duo Octa's shape renders a signature quality of soft wrap-around light due to its large surface area and creates round, natural catchlights in your subject's eyes, making it ideal for portraiture and fashion. Separate purchase of a speed ring is required for use and Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.

The 40 degree fabric grid attaches quickly via touch-fasteners and narrows the beam spread from your softbox to control spill light and add directionality similar to a reflector, while maintaining a soft quality of light. Unlike unwieldy rigid grids, Impact fabric grids are extremely light weight and fold flat for transport in the included carry case.

OVERVIEW: Connect the Impact LiteTrek Portable Power Pack to your Nikon-type flash with the CKE2 HV Cable with Locking Mechanism from Impact. This cable features a coiled design that offers a relaxed length of 28" that can stretch up to 9.2' when needed. This allows users to set up their flash in a variety of situations, including on a bracket or light stand, without issue. Also, the cable has a locking mechanism that is compatible with Bolt- and Quantum-style locking collars to ensure a secure connection. Additionally, it has a weather seal at the point of the flash to prevent rain, snow, and other elements from damaging your equipment.

OVERVIEW:
The Hexi 24 Speedlight Softbox from Impact is a 24" diameter, bracket-mounted light modifier designed to work with hot shoe speedlight-type flashes of any type or size, with or without radio slaves.

Ideal for run-and-gun photography, the Hexi includes a bracket mount that allows it to be handheld while the 5/8" receiver on its handle offers a stand-mounted option for stationary subjects. 


The Hexi 24's removable inner baffle and front diffuser can be used in any combination or not at all to offer a quality of light ranging from low contrast and soft to hard and specular. The Hexi's high-output reflective silver interior minimizes light loss when both diffuser and baffle are in place. Optional accessories include a 40-degree grid. A carrying case is included for storage and transport.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Grid for Hexi 24 Speedlight Softbox from Impact is designed to enable you to light a specific area of a set or subject. This durable fabric grid narrows the beam spread from your softbox and controls the light spill while it adds directional control. The touch-fastener surface and included carrying case make the grid extremely easy to setup and fold flat for transport.

The touch-fastener surface and included carrying case make the grid extremely easy to setup and fold flat for transport.

OVERVIEW: The 24 x 36" Parabox Softbox from Impact features a durable dual-rod umbrella-type construction that dramatically shortens setup and takedown time. Compatible with hot-shoe flash speedlights, compact studio strobes or portable battery-powered strobe systems, the Parabox features zippered panels on the long and short side of the softbox for your flash head to offer the option of vertical or horizontal orientation. The softbox's 8mm shaft fits any standard umbrella mount or stand adapters with an umbrella receiver.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The 24 x 36" Parabox Softbox from Impact features a durable dual-rod umbrella-type construction that dramatically shortens setup and takedown time. Compatible with hot-shoe flash speedlights, compact studio strobes or portable battery-powered strobe systems, the Parabox features zippered panels on the long and short side of the softbox for your flash head to offer the option of vertical or horizontal orientation. The softbox's 8mm shaft fits any standard umbrella mount or stand adapters with an umbrella receiver.

OVERVIEW: The Impact VC-500WL 2-500Ws Monolight with Transmitter Kit is built around 2 enhanced, redesigned VC-500WL flash heads. Each head comes with a reflector, flashtube, 250W modeling lamp, power cable, sync cord and a 9.4' air-cushioned light stand. The included 16-channel, 4-group radio transmitter triggers the head's built-in receivers from up to 328' away. Two white umbrellas with black backing, a 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and speedring, and a wheeled case are also included.The VC-500WL 500Ws monolights have full to 1/32 power range adjustable over 6 stops in 1/10 stop increments, very fast recycling time (1.5 seconds @ full power) and Proportional, Independent and Off settings for the 250W modeling light. Flash durations as short as 1/1200 sec. freeze action with moving subjects while the VC-500WL's 5,600K color temperature remains constant within +/- 100K regardless of power setting.You can freely mix and match your remote flash units with the VC-500WL. The flash's 7 optical slave modes allow it to interface with an on-camera TTL flashes, triggering with up to 5 pre-flashes when needed. The VC-500WL's Time Frame and Block Time functions enlarge the unit's circle of compatibility with the many brands available by effectively adapting for the differences in their pre-flash durations.A number of systems are employed to increase the VC-500WL's longevity and ensure safety. The fan-cooled housing with adaptive thermal control protects the flash heads CMOS circuitry and the user-replaceable modeling lamp and flash tube.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact VC-500WL 2-500Ws Monolight with Transmitter Kit is built around 2 enhanced, redesigned VC-500WL flash heads. Each head comes with a reflector, flashtube, 250W modeling lamp, power cable, sync cord and a 9.4' air-cushioned light stand. The included 16-channel, 4-group radio transmitter triggers the head's built-in receivers from up to 328' away. Two white umbrellas with black backing, a 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and speedring, and a wheeled case are also included.

The VC-500WL 500Ws monolights have full to 1/32 power range adjustable over 6 stops in 1/10 stop increments, very fast recycling time (1.5 seconds @ full power) and Proportional, Independent and Off settings for the 250W modeling light. Flash durations as short as 1/1200 sec. freeze action with moving subjects while the VC-500WL's 5,600K color temperature remains constant within +/- 100K regardless of power setting.

You can freely mix and match your remote flash units with the VC-500WL. The flash's 7 optical slave modes allow it to interface with an on-camera TTL flashes, triggering with up to 5 pre-flashes when needed. The VC-500WL's Time Frame and Block Time functions enlarge the unit's circle of compatibility with the many brands available by effectively adapting for the differences in their pre-flash durations.

A number of systems are employed to increase the VC-500WL's longevity and ensure safety. The fan-cooled housing with adaptive thermal control protects the flash heads CMOS circuitry and the user-replaceable modeling lamp and flash tube.

OVERVIEW:
Upgrade your lighting kit or studio with the versatile VC-500WL 500Ws Digital Monolight from Impact, featuring a 6-stop power range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop increments for excellent control over your light output. Stopping motion is made easy with a flash duration of 1/1,200 to 1/800 second and a fast recycle time of just 1.5 seconds at full power ensures you won't miss the shot. In addition to these capabilities, the light has a built-in 16-channel 2.4 GHz wireless radio receiver with a 328' range for remote triggering using an optional transmitter.

Advanced CMOS Chip Circuitry enables a variety of advanced features, such as the ability to program pre-flash modes for use with your on-camera flashes and reduces the amount of heat generated during operation. The internal temperature is further kept under control with Adaptive Thermal Control technology that keeps the fan working during long sessions. Also, the light has soft-start circuitry that gradually raises the modeling light's brightness upon startup to prolong its lifespan.

The VC-500WL is equipped with a 1/4" port for synchronization using the included 11' cable and it has a low 5V trigger voltage to protect the electronics of both the light and camera. Accessories are easily attached via the S-type mount and it comes with an umbrella reflector that lines up the with umbrella mount on the adjustable 5/8" stand mount for additional stability.

OVERVIEW: Take wireless control of your Impact VC-500WL Monolights with this VC-500WLXMT Wireless 2.4 GHz Transmitter. Easily mounted to the hot shoe of most cameras, this powerful unit allows the user to control and trigger multiple studio flashes from up to 328' away. It also has access to 16 channels and 4 groups for elaborate lighting setups and can be used to adjust modeling light output. Additionally, a test flash button is available to trigger all lights on the same channel and the unit is equipped with a 3.5mm input port for connecting to a camera using the included 3.5mm to PC sync cable.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Take wireless control of your Impact VC-500WL Monolights with this VC-500WLXMT Wireless 2.4 GHz Transmitter. Easily mounted to the hot shoe of most cameras, this powerful unit allows the user to control and trigger multiple studio flashes from up to 328' away. It also has access to 16 channels and 4 groups for elaborate lighting setups and can be used to adjust modeling light output. Additionally, a test flash button is available to trigger all lights on the same channel and the unit is equipped with a 3.5mm input port for connecting to a camera using the included 3.5mm to PC sync cable.

OVERVIEW: The SR-SHOE-D Speed Ring for Dual Shoe Mount Flashes from Impact is a portable, highly mobile accessory that allows you to double your flash power while creating flattering, soft lighting with equipment that you already own.SR-SHOE-D has multiple benefits and convenience features aimed at making it an effective light shaping tool as well as a pleasure to use. Its four shoe mounts, allow use of 2 flash units along with separate radio receivers. The 360-degree rotating aluminum ring is labeled for easy installation of extra small to medium sized rectangular, square, strip, or octagonal softboxes. You can use 1 flash or add a second flash to double your power. If the power of the single flash is sufficient but you want faster recycling, set them both to 1/2 power and use the second flash as a "booster" to halve your recycling time. Dual brackets let you manipulate the angles and depth of the speedlights within the softbox to adjust the light spread.Lastly, the sturdy unit has a 5/8" receiver for industry-standard light stands and tilting adjustment is made possible via the ratcheting-locking tilting handle.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The SR-SHOE-D Speed Ring for Dual Shoe Mount Flashes from Impact is a portable, highly mobile accessory that allows you to double your flash power while creating flattering, soft lighting with equipment that you already own.

SR-SHOE-D has multiple benefits and convenience features aimed at making it an effective light shaping tool as well as a pleasure to use. Its four shoe mounts, allow use of 2 flash units along with separate radio receivers. The 360-degree rotating aluminum ring is labeled for easy installation of extra small to medium sized rectangular, square, strip, or octagonal softboxes. You can use 1 flash or add a second flash to double your power. If the power of the single flash is sufficient but you want faster recycling, set them both to 1/2 power and use the second flash as a "booster" to halve your recycling time. Dual brackets let you manipulate the angles and depth of the speedlights within the softbox to adjust the light spread.

Lastly, the sturdy unit has a 5/8" receiver for industry-standard light stands and tilting adjustment is made possible via the ratcheting-locking tilting handle.

OVERVIEW: The 10.8' Impact Pro Light Stand is a versatile, lightweight black aluminum alloy stand with a sturdy permanent baby pin mount and large locking T-knobs that make it easy for you to quickly secure each section. The Pro Stand rises to a maximum height of 10.8' and folds down to 34.8". It has a maximum load capacity of 20 lb.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The 10.8' Impact Pro Light Stand is a versatile, lightweight black aluminum alloy stand with a sturdy permanent baby pin mount and large locking T-knobs that make it easy for you to quickly secure each section. The Pro Stand rises to a maximum height of 10.8' and folds down to 34.8". It has a maximum load capacity of 20 lb.

OVERVIEW: The 11' Folding Wheeled Base Stand from Impact is a heavy duty, black and chrome-plated steel and aluminum alloy support that features a low base for extra stability, braking wheels, two risers, and a 5/8" baby stud. The legs fold for transport and storage. It will support 26.46 lb.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The 11' Folding Wheeled Base Stand from Impact is a heavy duty, black and chrome-plated steel and aluminum alloy support that features a low base for extra stability, braking wheels, two risers, and a 5/8" baby stud. The legs fold for transport and storage. It will support 26.46 lb.

OVERVIEW: The Octa Soft and Natural Creator Kit was put together by B&H to enhance a mini-studio of lighting equipment with the creative potential available with chroma key technology. The kit includes two 4-socket fluorescent fixtures, eight daylight-balanced spiral fluorescent lamps, two 24" Octa softboxes with 8' air-cushioned light stands and a Savage Photo Creater Kit with a 5x7' green screen, chroma key software and 720 digital backgrounds.The Octa 4-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a four Edison socket base that accepts CFL fluorescent bulbs up to 85W. The back panel features dual rocker switches, each of which control on/off function for two lights allowing the creation of a light ratio. The fixture has a multi-voltage power supply for worldwide use (with addition of optional adapter plug) and has a standard 5/8" receiver for light stands and accessories. The matching Octa Softbox features a highly reflective, pebbled interior and a removable front face that attaches with simple touch-fasteners. In use, it renders the signature wrap-around look that it's well known for, as well as natural circular catch-lights in your subject's eyes. The softboxes are supported by Impact 8' stands that gently lower the lights during height adjustments thanks to their air-cushioning.Using green screen technology, and the included software, the Savage Photo Creator Kit permits you to take a simple photograph against the included green screen cloth and simply drop in a distant locale or landmark that places your subject far from where you took the photo without ever boarding a plane.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Octa Soft and Natural Creator Kit was put together by B&H to enhance a mini-studio of lighting equipment with the creative potential available with chroma key technology. The kit includes two 4-socket fluorescent fixtures, eight daylight-balanced spiral fluorescent lamps, two 24" Octa softboxes with 8' air-cushioned light stands and a Savage Photo Creater Kit with a 5x7' green screen, chroma key software and 720 digital backgrounds.

The Octa 4-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a four Edison socket base that accepts CFL fluorescent bulbs up to 85W. The back panel features dual rocker switches, each of which control on/off function for two lights allowing the creation of a light ratio. The fixture has a multi-voltage power supply for worldwide use (with addition of optional adapter plug) and has a standard 5/8" receiver for light stands and accessories. The matching Octa Softbox features a highly reflective, pebbled interior and a removable front face that attaches with simple touch-fasteners. In use, it renders the signature wrap-around look that it's well known for, as well as natural circular catch-lights in your subject's eyes. The softboxes are supported by Impact 8' stands that gently lower the lights during height adjustments thanks to their air-cushioning.

Using green screen technology, and the included software, the Savage Photo Creator Kit permits you to take a simple photograph against the included green screen cloth and simply drop in a distant locale or landmark that places your subject far from where you took the photo without ever boarding a plane.

OVERVIEW:
The Octa Fluorescent Kit was put together by B&H to provide a core lighting setup suitable for product photography, portraiture and numerous other creative endeavors. The kit includes a four-socket fluorescent fixture, four daylight-balanced spiral fluorescent lamps and a 24" Octa softbox with an 8' air-cushioned light stand. 

The Octa Four-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a four Edison socket base that accepts CFL fluorescents up to 85W. The base has dual rocker switches, each of which control on/off function for two lamps allowing the creation of a light ratio. The fixture has a multi-voltage power supply for worldwide use (with addition of optional adapter plug) and has a standard 5/8" receiver for light stands and accessories. 
The matching Octa Softbox features a highly reflective pebbled interior and a removable front face that attaches with simple touch-fasteners. In use, it renders the signature wrap-around look that it's well known for, as well as natural circular catch-lights in your subject's eyes. The softbox is supported by an Impact 8' stand that gently lowers the light during height adjustments thanks to its air-cushioning.

The Octa Fluorescent Kit was put together by B&H to provide a core lighting setup suitable for product photography, portraiture and numerous other creative endeavors. The kit includes a four-socket fluorescent fixture, four daylight-balanced spiral fluorescent lamps and a 24" Octa softbox with an 8' air-cushioned light stand.

The Octa Four-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a four Edison socket base that accepts CFL fluorescents up to 85W. The base has dual rocker switches, each of which control on/off function for two lamps allowing the creation of a light ratio. The fixture has a multi-voltage power supply for worldwide use (with addition of optional adapter plug) and has a standard 5/8" receiver for light stands and accessories.

The matching Octa Softbox features a highly reflective pebbled interior and a removable front face that attaches with simple touch-fasteners. In use, it renders the signature wrap-around look that it's well known for, as well as natural circular catch-lights in your subject's eyes. The softbox is supported by an Impact 8' stand that gently lowers the light during height adjustments thanks to its air-cushioning.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact ControlSync 16 Transmitter and Receiver Kit was put together by B&H to provide photographers with a wireless solution for triggering their Impact AS-X-400 Astral Extreme or Interfit Strobies flashes at distances up to 150'. The kit includes a 16 channel, 16 group transmitter with built-in antenna and hot shoe and a 16 channel, 16 group receiver that is powered by its host flash without using batteries.

Operating on the 433 MHz frequency, the ControlSync 16 Transmitter can raise and lower the power of the slave flash in 1/10 or 1/3 stop increments as well as turn modeling lights and audio alerts on and off. It's also capable of turning the AF assist on or off on flash units that have this feature. The ControlSync 16 transmitter runs on 2 AA batteries and is intended for use with the CS-16-R receiver that's included in this kit. Besides triggering your flash from up to 150' away, the ControlSync 16 transmitter can be used as a handheld remote controller to adjust the settings on all your compatible flash units that are connected to a ControlSync receiver, even if you use a different device or method to trigger them. 

Powered by the host device via USB instead of batteries, the included ControlSync 16 Receiver accepts a signal from one of 16 user-selected channels for triggering and function control of the flash.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
This Impact Astral Extreme AS-X-400 2-Monolight Kit was put together by B&H to allow photographers to take the lights' studio quality of light and high speed features on the road. The kit includes 2 AS-X-400 monolights, each with a flash tube, 150W modeling lamp, power cord, sync cord, 7" reflector, black/white convertible umbrella and 10' air-cushioned light stand, and a soft-sided, padded system bag.


When describing the aptly-named 400Ws Astral Extreme the operative word is speed. The light is designed so you'll never miss a shot while waiting for it to recycle. Recycling time is a fast 0.4 seconds at full power, flash duration is an impressive 1/5,000 of a second, and continuous shooting speed can reach a rapid-fire 10 frames per second. This strong emphasis on speed makes the Astral Extreme a smart choice for fashion and event shooting and since it's fast enough to capture almost any movement at its peak, it's ideal for high-speed photography. You can even bring the Astral Extreme on location, powering it from a generator or inverter if there's no AC power available.

Easy might be the next way to describe AS-X-400. Adjustments are easily made on the light's back panel which incorporates a carry handle. Soft push buttons control the modeling light, ready beep, and optical slave on/off function. The slave allows you set Instant-Fire or Skip Pre-flash modes and trigger the flash head at distances up to 33'. You can also hard wire the AS-X-400 to your camera via the included 1/4" phono sync cord, or easier still, use an optional wireless radio system such as Impact's ControlSync 16 to trigger the flash from up to 150' away and remotely control its power, modeling light and audible alert.

 
The Astral Extreme's power level, which is adjustable in 1/10 stops over a 6 stop range, is displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. Both power and modeling lamp intensity are adjustable via simple knobs. The 150W modeling light dims when the flash is triggered while a switchable beep indicates full recycling.

A handy feature of the AS-X-400 is the adjustable mounting bracket that allows you to find the center of gravity for better balance when using heavy front accessories such as large softboxes. A built-in receiver can support umbrella shafts up to 8mm and umbrellas up to 7' in diameter. The speedring/reflector mount is S-type, giving you a wide range of choices, not only from Impact but from the many manufacturers who have standardized on this mount. Impact includes a reflector that accepts 7" grids.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Three Light Fluorescent Cool Light Kit with Stands was put together by B&H to provide image-makers with a versatile lighting setup that can be configured for different situations as they arise. The kit includes three VA902 3-lamp fixtures with 13" reflectors and 27/30W lamps, two 8' air-cushioned light stands, and one Multiboom combination light stand, boom, and reflector holder. The Impact VA902 Three-Lamp Cool Light is an economical fluorescent head that delivers 4,500 lumens while drawing only 90W using 3CFL 5,500K daylight-balanced lamps without the need for color conversion filters. The fixture's included 13" reflector renders a wide, even spread of light, that can be softened like a beauty dish by using the provided translucent diffuser. The VA902 has a 5/8" stand mount and is easily tilted via a convenient handle. A detachable, 13', grounded power cord is included.The versatile Multiboom can be used as a standard 13' light stand to support 5lb of gear or when pivoted horizontally, used as an overhead boom that will support up to 3lb. Yet another use for the Multiboom is as a holder for reflectors up 60" in width, thanks to its attached spring-clamps. The Impact air-cushioned 8' light stand has a 5/8" stud and lowers slowly to avoid damage during height adjustments.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
Ideal for still photographers who want to attach a softbox to a battery-powered flash head, the Speed Ring for Bolt VB, Quantum Q & Lumedyne Series Flashes from Impact softens the output of the flash while ensuring the softbox won't stress or damage the head.

The speed ring features labeled flex rod holes for effortless mounting of most rectangular, square, strip, or octagonal softboxes to a Bolt VB series flash head, as well as Quantum, Lumedyne and Norman portable bare bulb heads. 

The sturdy all-metal ring rotates 360 degrees, thereby avoiding reorientation down time, while the self-locking outer ring prevents movement or slipping once the position of the softbox is set. Convenient 3/8' threaded accessory holes facilitate mounting your softbox directly to accessories such as umbrella adapters, articulated arms, or clamps.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Ideal for still photographers who want to attach a softbox to a battery-powered flash head, the Speed Ring for Bolt VB, Quantum Q & Lumedyne Series Flashes from Impact softens the output of the flash while ensuring the softbox won't stress or damage the head. The speed ring features labeled flex rod holes for effortless mounting of most rectangular, square, strip, or octagonal softboxes to a Bolt VB series flash head, as well as Quantum, Lumedyne and Norman portable bare bulb heads.

The sturdy all-metal ring rotates 360 degrees, thereby avoiding reorientation down time, while the self-locking outer ring prevents movement or slipping once the position of the softbox is set. Convenient 3/8' threaded accessory holes facilitate mounting your softbox directly to accessories such as umbrella adapters, articulated arms, or clamps.

OVERVIEW: The 40" Impact Silver Folding Beauty Dish provides a solution for photographers who love the signature light quality of these modifiers, but are frustrated by the transport options available with traditional metal reflectors. This Impact beauty dish sets up in seconds while shooters with traditional reflectors are still pulling their dish units out of cumbersome cases.Made for strobes, monolights and monolight-shaped LEDs, the beauty dish features a silver interior for maximum output and a crisp, cool quality of light. An integrated fiberglass frame and a metal inner deflector bounces the direct light output backwards and distributes it across the broad flat arc of the dish. If you want to soften the punchy look of the beauty dish further, you can simply slip on the included cap-style front diffuser.A favorite of portrait and fashion shooters, beauty dishes are usually used quite close up, where the flattened light wraps around the subject while bringing out details in makeup and clothing. The octagonal shape renders natural looking catchlights in the eyes of the model that are not possible with rectangular softboxes. Used up close, this large size covers full length single or small group shots routinely seen in catalogs.The Folding Beauty Dish comes with an Impact/Bowens S-Type adapter for the many brands that use this mount. It can be easily swapped out with adapters available for most major brands. A soft case is included.

OVERVIEW_RAW:
The 28" Impact Silver Folding Beauty Dish provides a solution for photographers who love the signature light quality of these modifiers, but are frustrated by the transport options available with traditional metal reflectors. This Impact beauty dish sets up in seconds while shooters with traditional reflectors are still pulling their dish units out of cumbersome cases.

Made for strobes, monolights and monolight-shaped LEDs, the beauty dish features a silver interior for maximum output and a crisp, cool quality of light. An integrated fiberglass frame and a metal inner deflector bounces the direct light output backwards and distributes it across the broad flat arc of the dish. If you want to soften the punchy look of the beauty dish further, you can simply slip on the included cap-style front diffuser.

A favorite of portrait and fashion shooters, beauty dishes are usually used quite close up, where the flattened light wraps around the subject while bringing out details in makeup and clothing. The octagonal shape renders natural looking catchlights in the eyes of the model that are not possible with rectangular softboxes. This small size is a life-saver in tight spaces and provides a bit more contrast than the larger versions. Pulled back at a distance, it's also great with the front diffuser off and used as an open reflector to maintain detail in group shots.

The Folding Beauty Dish comes with an Impact/Bowens S-Type adapter for the many brands that use this mount. It can be easily swapped out with adapters available for most major brands. A soft case is included.

OVERVIEW: The Impact PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver 2-Pack Kit was put together by B&H to provide a complete wireless triggering solution for photographers on location or in the studio. The kit includes 80-channel PowerSync transceivers both of which, as the name implies, can be used as a receiver or a transmitter. Each unit comes with a lanyard, pouch case, 3.5 mm and 2.5 mm synch cables, 3.5 to 1/4" adapter, 2 AA batteries and a self-adhering accessory shoe.The PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver is a combination wireless transmitter/receiver with 80 channels for elimination of interference, as well as 4 groups that can each handle multiple devices that can be triggered individually or simultaneously. Besides remote flash triggering, with the appropriate optional cable, the PowerSync 16-80 can focus and trigger your camera in single, continuous, and bulb modes or be used as a wireless shutter release.The PowerSync 16-80 is used with at least one other unit. In its most basic mode, one transceiver slides onto the camera's hot shoe or is mounted to a bracket's cold shoe and is connected to the camera using the included 2.5mm to PC cable. A second transceiver acts as a receiver and accepts a shoe mount flash using its built-in hot shoe or is wired to the flash in the case of power packs or monolight. The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'. You can even extend the range further by adding a third intermediate transceiver to extend the range to 1,440'.A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using an optional dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-tranceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver 2-Pack Kit was put together by B&H to provide a complete wireless triggering solution for photographers on location or in the studio. The kit includes 80-channel PowerSync transceivers both of which, as the name implies, can be used as a receiver or a transmitter. Each unit comes with a lanyard, pouch case, 3.5 mm and 2.5 mm synch cables, 3.5 to 1/4" adapter, 2 AA batteries and a self-adhering accessory shoe.

The PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver is a combination wireless transmitter/receiver with 80 channels for elimination of interference, as well as 4 groups that can each handle multiple devices that can be triggered individually or simultaneously. Besides remote flash triggering, with the appropriate optional cable, the PowerSync 16-80 can focus and trigger your camera in single, continuous, and bulb modes or be used as a wireless shutter release.

The PowerSync 16-80 is used with at least one other unit. In its most basic mode, one transceiver slides onto the camera's hot shoe or is mounted to a bracket's cold shoe and is connected to the camera using the included 2.5mm to PC cable. A second transceiver acts as a receiver and accepts a shoe mount flash using its built-in hot shoe or is wired to the flash in the case of power packs or monolight. The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'. You can even extend the range further by adding a third intermediate transceiver to extend the range to 1,440'.

A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using an optional dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.

The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-tranceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.

Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Compatible with all cameras that feature the standard universal hot shoe (incl. Sony Multi-Interface Shoe).
Compatible with all flashes (set to Manual mode), except for Sony brand Multi-Interface Shoe series flashes (e.g. HVL-F60M etc.)

OVERVIEW: Made of braided stainless steel, this 32" x 1.5mm Impact Safety Cable 3-Pack was put together by B&H to offer a secure safety provision for lights mounted on overhead pipes, drop ceilings and grids.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Made of braided stainless steel, this 32" x 1.5mm Impact Safety Cable 3-Pack was put together by B&H to offer a secure safety provision for lights mounted on overhead pipes, drop ceilings and grids.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Soft n' Natural Kit #3 by B&H is a 2-light kit created to be a lighting solution for virtually any kind of imaging-making from ecommerce to portraiture, fashion, product or large groups.
The kit contains one 24" Octa softbox with a 4-socket fixture and an 8' air-cushioned light stand and a 20 x 27.5" rectangular softbox with a 4-socket fixture and a 6' light stand. Eight 26W spiral fluorescent lamps with a daylight color balance of 5,000K are included for the fixtures.

The Impact Octa fixture in this kit is sturdily constructed and has a 5/8" stand mount, ceramic Edison sockets and multi-voltage capability. The fixture also has rocker-switch lamp control and comes with an Octa softbox with removable inner baffle and front diffuser. The light modifier displays a distinct wrap-around light quality and reflects natural catchlights in your subject's eyes. It's supported by an 8' air-cushioned stand that lets your light down slowly when making height adjustments to avoid damage.

Built similarly to the Octa fixture, the included 4-lamp fixture with rectangular 20 x 27.5" softbox also features a removable inner baffle and front diffuser and is ideal for head and shoulders or product photography, especially with reflective objects.

OVERVIEW:
This 6 x 7' Impact Black and White Background kit was put together by B&H to provide image makers with the 2 colors most used by amateurs and professionals alike. The lightweight backdrops can be used for portraiture, products, e-commerce and general video or still photography.


The background features a 4" rod pocket for backdrop stand crossbars that runs along its 6' width and a see-through bag for easy identification, storage and transport. The background can be machine washed separately in cold water.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Double Ball Joint Head with Camera Platform Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers and videographers a camera support option to a traditional tripod. 

The Camera Platform has two 5/8" receivers for the head or other accessory with a matching stud. A 1/4"-20 threaded camera stud is pre-installed. The head has two 5/8" studs that can be tilted +/- 180 degrees rotated 360 degrees. One stud has a 1/4"-20 tap and the other a 3/8"-16 tap for stands and accessories that have matching screws. The studs fit into a wide variety of grip gear with 5/8" receivers. Separate purchase of an Impact Super Clamp (IMCC106R), for instance, will allow you mount to supports and poles from 0.5 - 2.1" thick. Once in position you can lock the head into place with its large ratcheting handle. The system will support cameras up to 5 lb.

OVERVIEW: The Impact VS-LCD400 400Ws Monolight 3 Point Kit was assembled by B&H to maximize creative choices with a single light source. The kit is built around three VS-LCD400 400Ws monolights that each ship with a grid reflector, 100W modeling lamp, flashtube, power cord and PC cord. The kit also includes 3 10' air-cushioned light stands, 3 white umbrellas with black backing, a Luxbanx Duo 26x26" softbox with speedring and a kit case to transport it all.VS-LCD400 400Ws Monolight has touchpad controls and a digital readout that gives you power and modeling light status. The flash recycles to full power in 2 seconds and down to fractions of a second as you dial down the power across a 4-stop range. The VS-LCD400 has a Type-S accessory mount that accepts the included 7" grid reflector and the wide array of light shapers available from numerous manufacturers that have standardized on this mount.The included umbrellas have a white interior and a removable black backing that thwarts light transmission. Removing the backing completely allows you to pump light through the umbrella like a makeshift softbox. Partially removing it allows some spill light to add to the ambient light level.The Luxbanx Duo 26 x 26" Softbox is a light-softening tool for strobe, LED, and fluorescent lights. It's also useable with quartz lights up to 1,000W due to its heat-resistant interior. It features a reflective, high-output interior, removable inner baffle and front diffuser and accepts optional fabric grids. The included speedring has color coded sockets that match the Flex Rods in any shape Luxbanx softbox. The included three 10' lights stands are air-cushioned for smooth and safe height adjustment. The stands fold down to 34" to fit in the included kit bag along with the other items in the kit. The nylon bag has carry handled that convert to a shoulder strap.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact VS-LCD400 400Ws Monolight 3 Point Kit was assembled by B&H to maximize creative choices with a single light source. The kit is built around three VS-LCD400 400Ws monolights that each ship with a grid reflector, 100W modeling lamp, flashtube, power cord and PC cord. The kit also includes 3 10' air-cushioned light stands, 3 white umbrellas with black backing, a Luxbanx Duo 26x26" softbox with speedring and a kit case to transport it all.

VS-LCD400 400Ws Monolight has touchpad controls and a digital readout that gives you power and modeling light status. The flash recycles to full power in 2 seconds and down to fractions of a second as you dial down the power across a 4-stop range. The VS-LCD400 has a Type-S accessory mount that accepts the included 7" grid reflector and the wide array of light shapers available from numerous manufacturers that have standardized on this mount.

The included umbrellas have a white interior and a removable black backing that thwarts light transmission. Removing the backing completely allows you to pump light through the umbrella like a makeshift softbox. Partially removing it allows some spill light to add to the ambient light level.

The Luxbanx Duo 26 x 26" Softbox is a light-softening tool for strobe, LED, and fluorescent lights. It's also useable with quartz lights up to 1,000W due to its heat-resistant interior. It features a reflective, high-output interior, removable inner baffle and front diffuser and accepts optional fabric grids. The included speedring has color coded sockets that match the Flex Rods in any shape Luxbanx softbox. The included three 10' lights stands are air-cushioned for smooth and safe height adjustment. The stands fold down to 34" to fit in the included kit bag along with the other items in the kit. The nylon bag has carry handled that convert to a shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Astral Extreme 2 Light Portrait Kit was put together by B&H to provide an out of the box solution for photographers doing portraits, groups, or fashion. The kit is built around two 400Ws flash heads that recycle to full power in 0.4 sec., each with reflectors, flash tubes, and a 10' air-cushioned light stand. A 45" umbrella with a removable black back and a 39" Luxbanx Duo deep octagonal softbox with speedring and grid are also included.When describing the Astral Extreme AS-X-400 Monolight from Impact the key word is speed. Recycling time is a fast 0.4 seconds at full power, flash duration is an impressive 1/5,000 of a second, and continuous shooting speed can reach a rapid-fire 10 frames per second. This strong emphasis on speed makes the Astral Extreme a smart choice for fashion and event shooting, and since it's fast enough to capture almost any movement at its peak, it is ideal for high-speed photography. You can even bring the Astral Extreme on location, powering it from a generator or inverter if there's no AC power available. The Astral Extreme's power level, which is adjustable in 1/10 stops over a 6-stop range is displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. Both power and modeling lamp intensity are adjustable via simple knobs. A handy feature of the Astra is the adjustable mounting bracket that allows you to find the center of gravity for better balance when using heavy front accessories such as large softboxes. A built-in receiver can support umbrella shafts up to 8mm and umbrellas up to 7' in diameter.The Luxbanx Duo Small/Deep Octagonal Softbox is a versatile 39" diameter light shaping tool with a textured silver interior for high output, removable front diffuser and a removable interior baffle. It's compatible with strobe lights, fluorescent or LED light sources. The Duo Octa's shape renders a signature quality of soft wrap-around light due to its large surface area and creates round, natural catchlights in your subject's eyes, making it ideal for portraiture and fashion. Additional control is available via the fabric grid included in this kit. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. As an additional benefit the softbox reflects round, natural catchlights in your subject's eyes.The Impact 45" white satin umbrella has a removable black backing that allows the umbrella to be used in the traditional way when or used as a makeshift softbox when removed.Lastly, the 4-section heavy duty LS-10AB light stand rises to a height of 10' and folds down to 34" for packing. The stand can support 8.5 lb at full extension which makes the 7.15 lb Astral Extreme a great match with along with a softbox or umbrella.

A 45" umbrella with a removable black back and a 39" Luxbanx Duo deep octagonal softbox with speedring and grid are also included.

When describing the Astral Extreme AS-X-400 Monolight from Impact the key word is speed. Recycling time is a fast 0.4 seconds at full power, flash duration is an impressive 1/5,000 of a second, and continuous shooting speed can reach a rapid-fire 10 frames per second. This strong emphasis on speed makes the Astral Extreme a smart choice for fashion and event shooting, and since it's fast enough to capture almost any movement at its peak, it is ideal for high-speed photography. You can even bring the Astral Extreme on location, powering it from a generator or inverter if there's no AC power available. The Astral Extreme's power level, which is adjustable in 1/10 stops over a 6-stop range is displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. Both power and modeling lamp intensity are adjustable via simple knobs. A handy feature of the Astra is the adjustable mounting bracket that allows you to find the center of gravity for better balance when using heavy front accessories such as large softboxes. A built-in receiver can support umbrella shafts up to 8mm and umbrellas up to 7' in diameter.

The Luxbanx Duo Small/Deep Octagonal Softbox is a versatile 39" diameter light shaping tool with a textured silver interior for high output, removable front diffuser and a removable interior baffle. It's compatible with strobe lights, fluorescent or LED light sources. The Duo Octa's shape renders a signature quality of soft wrap-around light due to its large surface area and creates round, natural catchlights in your subject's eyes, making it ideal for portraiture and fashion. Additional control is available via the fabric grid included in this kit. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. As an additional benefit the softbox reflects round, natural catchlights in your subject's eyes.

The Impact 45" white satin umbrella has a removable black backing that allows the umbrella to be used in the traditional way when or used as a makeshift softbox when removed.

Lastly, the 4-section heavy duty LS-10AB light stand rises to a height of 10' and folds down to 34" for packing. The stand can support 8.5 lb at full extension which makes the 7.15 lb Astral Extreme a great match with along with a softbox or umbrella.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Parabox Speedlight Kit was put together by B&H to maximize the potential of up to 3 on-camera flashes. The kit includes a 24 x 36" Parabox easy-setup softbox, an umbrella stand adapter, locking triple flash adapter and a 10' air-cushioned light stand.

The Impact Parabox Softbox uses a durable dual-rod umbrella-type construction that dramatically shortens setup and takedown time. Compatible with hot-shoe flash speedlights, compact studio strobes or portable battery-powered strobe systems, the Parabox features zippered panels on the long and short side of the softbox for your flash head to offer the option of vertical or horizontal orientation. The softbox's 8mm shaft fits any standard umbrella mount or stand adapters with an umbrella receiver.

The Umbrella Bracket with Adjustable Shoe is a versatile, lightweight metal bracket that will fit on almost any light stand. It includes a removable, reversible female stud to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". An additional removable, reversible male stud mounts to the included flash shoe at the 1/4"-20 end, or to another accessory at the 3/8" end. The metal shoe features a knurled locking knob for secure mounting of all standard shoe-mount flashes, including the Nikon SB-900 and SB-910.

The FA-330L Adjustable Locking Triple Flash Adapter with Umbrella Socket by Impact allows you to triple your on-camera flash power when using an umbrella or compatible softbox. The adapter features 3 insulated, locking flash shoes with knurled, screw-down locking pins for secure mounting. The central umbrella socket is compatible with the Parabox and all Impact umbrellas and with most other brands. The adapter has a brass 1/4"-20 female thread for mounting on light stands having a 1/4"-20 male threaded top stud or adapter.

The aluminum IMLS10AB Impact Light Stand is a 4-section support that extends to 10' and folds down to 34". Its air-cushioning ensures a "soft landing" for your gear when lowering it.

OVERVIEW: The Telescopic Disc Reflector Holder Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers and videographers a hands-free solution for reflective fill lighting. The kit includes a 42" 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector, 8' air-cushioned light stand and a Telescopic Reflector Holder.An asset on location or in the studio, especially for solo shooters, the 5-in-1 Collapsible Reflector has a translucent white disc as its core. It's ideal for softening direct sunlight or for quickly diffusing studio lights. Zip-on covers are proved that offer a choice of silver, white, gold and silver/gold. White provides a neutral soft reflection. Silver offers a bright specular quality. Gold offers a late afternoon sun effect and silver/gold provides a light quality similar to putting a warming filter on your lens.The 8' Air-cushioned Light Stand is especially valuable with heavy items. The air-cushioning gently lowers the stand sections when making height adjustments.The Telescopic Collapsible Reflector Holder is made for mounting reflectors up to 60" on a light stand. It connects to any stand with a 5/8" diameter top stud and also includes a 5/8" stand adapter with female 3/8"-16 and 1/4"-20 threads for stands topped with those threads.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Telescopic Disc Reflector Holder Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers and videographers a hands-free solution for reflective fill lighting. The kit includes a 42" 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector, 8' air-cushioned light stand and a Telescopic Reflector Holder.

An asset on location or in the studio, especially for solo shooters, the 5-in-1 Collapsible Reflector has a translucent white disc as its core. It's ideal for softening direct sunlight or for quickly diffusing studio lights. Zip-on covers are proved that offer a choice of silver, white, gold and silver/gold. White provides a neutral soft reflection. Silver offers a bright specular quality. Gold offers a late afternoon sun effect and silver/gold provides a light quality similar to putting a warming filter on your lens.

The 8' Air-cushioned Light Stand is especially valuable with heavy items. The air-cushioning gently lowers the stand sections when making height adjustments.

The Telescopic Collapsible Reflector Holder is made for mounting reflectors up to 60" on a light stand. It connects to any stand with a 5/8" diameter top stud and also includes a 5/8" stand adapter with female 3/8"-16 and 1/4"-20 threads for stands topped with those threads.

OVERVIEW:
This PowerSlave Wireless Flash Receiver is an extra receiver for the PowerSlave flash trigger set. It must be used with the PowerSlave transmitter, which is available separately.

The receiver can be triggered from up to 150' away. It operates on the 2.4 GHz reduced interference frequency, and has 16 channels to choose from, helping to avoid interference. It has a sync speed of 1/200 sec, and features a built-in Wake-Up function that allows you to wake a flash from standby mode simply by depressing your camera's shutter release halfway. A 2.5mm jack facilitates use with a studio flash.

The receiver is designed to fit onto the flash bracket of the Impact Quikbox, enabling you to shoot without line-of-sight when the flash is mounted in the softbox. Included with the receiver are two sync cables for a variety of lights, an elastic light stand cold-shoe mount, and two AAA batteries.

The PowerSlave flash trigger is compatible with most manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which feature manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe systems are not compatible. The wake up feature will only work for select Nikon and Canon models.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This PowerSlave Wireless Flash Receiver is an extra receiver for the PowerSlave flash trigger set. It must be used with the PowerSlave transmitter, which is available separately.

The receiver can be triggered from up to 150' away. It operates on the 2.4 GHz reduced interference frequency, and has 16 channels to choose from, helping to avoid interference. It has a sync speed of 1/200 sec, and features a built-in Wake-Up function that allows you to wake a flash from standby mode simply by depressing your camera's shutter release halfway. A 2.5mm jack facilitates use with a studio flash.

The receiver is designed to fit onto the flash bracket of the Impact Quikbox, enabling you to shoot without line-of-sight when the flash is mounted in the softbox. Included with the receiver are two sync cables for a variety of lights, an elastic light stand cold-shoe mount, and two AAA batteries.

The PowerSlave flash trigger is compatible with most manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which feature manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe systems are not compatible. The wake up feature will only work for select Nikon and Canon models.

OVERVIEW: The 18" Miniphone Male (3.5mm) to PC Male Sync Cord from Impact is used to trigger flash units with a 3.5mm (miniphone) input from a cameras with a PC outlet.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The 18" Miniphone Male (3.5mm) to PC Male Sync Cord from Impact is used to trigger flash units with a 3.5mm (miniphone) input from a cameras with a PC outlet.

OVERVIEW:
This 16" Beauty Dish Kit for Speedlights and VC/VS-VSD Monolights was put together by B&H to allow photographers to use this unique light shaper with a shoe mount speedlight or an Impact flash head. 

The Impact 16" Beauty Dish offers a bridge between softboxes and umbrellas that yields a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portraiture subjects. The secret is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. The Beauty Dish fits most major brands with the separate purchase of an adapter.


The aluminum alloy Impact Adapter for the Beauty Dish mounts quickly and securely onto Impact VC/VS-VSD monolights, allowing you to use the kit's 16" reflector, as well optional 20", 22" and 27" Impact Beauty Dishes. With its Bowens S-type design, the adapter also fits Calumet Travelite, Bowens, Cowboy, Interfit Stellar, JTL, Photoflex, Rime Lite and Westcott Photo Basics flash heads.


As digital cameras perform increasingly better at higher ISOs, the speedlight is increasingly found on a light stand to achieve a studio look. This Raya Reflector Adapter for Speedlights featuring a sliding shoe mount and 5.1" riser. The adapter allows you to use a wide range of flashes, including bare-bulb units with a wireless trigger attached. It also utilizes the versatile Bowens S-type accessory mount to enable the attachment of light modifiers like the kit's beauty dish.

OVERVIEW:
This 20" Beauty Dish Kit for Speedlights and VC/VS-VSD Monolights was put together by B&H to allow photographers to use this unique light shaper with a shoe mount speedlight or an Impact flash head. 

The Impact 20" Beauty Dish offers a bridge between softboxes and umbrellas that yields a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portraiture subjects. The secret is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. The Beauty Dish fits most major brands with the separate purchase of an adapter. You can use the reflector with any strobe and with hot lights up to 300W. An optional 40-degree grid and diffuser sock are also available.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Backlight Stand Base is a sturdy, all-steel lighting accessory that is ideal for low-angle applications such as mounting lighting fixtures and other accessories close to the floor or at table level. A 5/8" Baby receiver is built-in for mounting a light stand riser. With a footprint diameter of 20 inches, the rubber-tipped, tri-leg base provides stability and prevents slipping on a smooth surface. It sets up quickly, and the legs fold flat for easy moving and storage.

With a footprint diameter of 20 inches, the rubber-tipped, tri-leg base provides stability and prevents slipping on a smooth surface. It sets up quickly, and the legs fold flat for easy moving and storage.

OVERVIEW:
The 15 x 20 x 12" "  LKB-4B Light Kit Bag from  Impact is a light but durable case that is designed to safely transport and protect lighting equipment. Ideally sized for LED panels, it is also suitable for studio strobe systems, continuous light systems, and a variety of equipment needed in the studio or on location.

The outer shell and interior walls are all reinforced with heavy-duty plastic panels to ensure the structural integrity of the bag. Adjustable dividers can be configured to your needs within the 18.5 x 13.5 x 10.5" interior to keep your lights and gear organized and secure. A generous zippered mesh storage compartment provides plenty of room for cables and other small accessories.

The LKB-4B has a weather resistant, heavy-duty 600 denier ballistic nylon shell fitted with anti-slip rubber feet. Carrying options include a detachable adjustable shoulder strap, overlapping top handles, and rubber grip side handles. For added security, the heavy-gauge dual zippers accept an optional lock.

OVERVIEW:
Meant for the Genaray Essential 360 and Studio 1000 Series, the Light Kit Bag #5B from Impact is a weather-resistant carry case with plastic-reinforced sides, top, bottom and interior padded dividers that gives your gear the protection of a hard case without the weight. The outer sides have touch-fastening strips at the top, which for improved rigidity attach to corresponding strips located on the inside of the shell. The dividers are adjustable to allow a variety of configurations to suit Genaray and other equipment combinations.

The bag has heavy duty zippered closure, comes with a removable shoulder strap and has dual strap handles that wrap completely around the bag and join at the top for added strength.

OVERVIEW:
The Micro Clamp with Double-Ended Spigot Kit was put together by B&H to provide a lightweight grip solution that's especially useful for clamping lights to pipe and other supports on location without a light stand.


The Micro Clamp is a handy accessory that can be used in a myriad of ways around the studio or on location. Lightweight and sturdy, it can clamp onto tubes with a maximum diameter of 1.38" (35mm), and has a load capacity of 2.2 lb (1.0kg). It features a 5/8" (16mm) socket at its base.

The Double-Ended Spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 male threads is a commonly used 5/8" (16mm) diameter stud that features both 1/4"-20 and 3/8" male threads for attachment to other accessories.

OVERVIEW: The Luxbanx Extra-Small Deep Octagonal Softbox from Impact is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. This extra-small 18" diameter softbox allows photographers to pinpoint a light source to separate a subject from the background and is well suited for controlling light placement for close-up head and shoulder poirtraits while retaining the wrap-around light and circular catchlights created by larger octaboxes. Also, this model utilizes a 12" deep parabolic design that provides a long throw and directionality that is great for portraits and minimizes light spill. The softbox features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast. The octa Luxbanx has an additional control via the optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. The large surface area of this octagonal-shaped softbox gives you a unique wrap-around quality of light that gains emphasis as you move it closer. Catchlights in the eyes of your subject are round and natural. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.

OVERVIEW: The SCS-M18 Mini Plug to Hot Shoe Sync Cord from Impact is designed to let you trigger an on-camera flash made by Canon, Nikon, Panasonic, Fujifilm, Samsung or Olympus with a radio receiver. The hot shoe has a mechanism that allows you to securely lock down your flash while its 12" cable offers a comfortable working distance when setting up the flash. A 1/4"-20 female thread on the bottom cold shoe enables mounting on a flash bracket, light stand or other accessory with a matching male screw.

OVERVIEW:
This Impact Double Ended Spigot with 5/8" Stud and 1/4"-20 Threads 

is a replacement for the stud in Impact's Gaffer Clamp or Manfrotto's Sky Hook Gaffer Clamp. This solid brass accessory fits into the clamp's 5/8" receiver providing compatibility with cameras or accessories with a 1/4"-20 threaded socket. In reverse position, it accommodates lighting accessories with a 5/8" (16 mm) baby pin receiver.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Wall Mounting Kit with Metal Chain for Roll Paper is a convenient way to support and rapidly swap out three seamless paper backgrounds up to 9' in length. The kit includes a pair of Triple Background Hooks and 3 Varidrives with metal chains to raise and lower the backgrounds.


The included Triple Background Hooks are simply anchored 9' feet apart with screws. It is recommended that you anchor to a stud for each hook section. The three included Varidrives with Metal Chains each have two expandable core units and a flattened metal chain. One side of each of the drives has a large toothed gear to which the chain affixes to allow Venetian blind-like raising and lowering of the background paper roll. The other side of the drive provided tension control.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Impact Deluxe Varipole Support System with Metal Chain Kit from B&H is a convenient way to support and rapidly swap out 3 seamless paper backgrounds up to 9' in length. One of the system's best features the ability to quickly break it down to its component parts to relocate it elsewhere. The kit includes 2 silver-finished Varipoles and a pair of Background Hooks with Superclamps to attach them to the Varipoles. Three Varidrives with black metal chains are provided to raise and lower the backgrounds.The Varipoles easily and quickly mount between floor and ceiling providing stable support for backdrops, reflectors, lights and grip accessories. With its strong tension mechanism and locking system, the Varipole is secured by its own force of pressure between solid walls, floors and ceilings. Adjustable between 6'11" (2.1 m) and 12'1" (3.7 m), the Deluxe Varipole is capable of turning most rooms into a photo studio without damage to walls or ceilings.The included Triple Background Hooks with Two Superclamps allow you to hang up to three rolls of seamless paper. The two Superclamps attach to the uprights of the included Varipoles and two Triple Hooks in turn attach to the Superclamps.The 3 included Varidrives with Metal Chains each have two expandable core units and a flattened metal chain. One side of each of the drives has a large toothed gear to which the chain affixes to allow Venetian blind-like raising and lowering of the background paper roll. The other side of the drive provided tension control.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Deluxe Varipole Support System with Metal Chain Kit from B&H is a convenient way to support and rapidly swap out 3 seamless paper backgrounds up to 9' in length. One of the system's best features the ability to quickly break it down to its component parts to relocate it elsewhere. The kit includes 2 silver-finished Varipoles and a pair of Background Hooks with Superclamps to attach them to the Varipoles. Three Varidrives with black metal chains are provided to raise and lower the backgrounds.

The Varipoles easily and quickly mount between floor and ceiling providing stable support for backdrops, reflectors, lights and grip accessories. With its strong tension mechanism and locking system, the Varipole is secured by its own force of pressure between solid walls, floors and ceilings. Adjustable between 6'11" (2.1 m) and 12'1" (3.7 m), the Deluxe Varipole is capable of turning most rooms into a photo studio without damage to walls or ceilings.

The included Triple Background Hooks with Two Superclamps allow you to hang up to three rolls of seamless paper. The two Superclamps attach to the uprights of the included Varipoles and two Triple Hooks in turn attach to the Superclamps.

The 3 included Varidrives with Metal Chains each have two expandable core units and a flattened metal chain. One side of each of the drives has a large toothed gear to which the chain affixes to allow Venetian blind-like raising and lowering of the background paper roll. The other side of the drive provided tension control.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Octacool-6 Fluorescent 2-Light Kit with Case and Stands was put together by B&H to offer photographers and videographers a studio lighting solution in a location-friendly rolling case format. The kit includes 2 Octacool-6 fluorescent fixtures with removable aluminum reflectors, 2 Octaboxes with 29.5" diameters, and twelve 32W daylight fluorescent lamps and a specially partitioned 37.5 x 18.0 x 16.0" Jumbo Roller bag to take it all on the road. The Octacool-6 paired with its 29.5" Octabox is a great choice for the photographer or videographer seeking a broad, versatile, flattering light source. Long the preferred light shaper of portrait and fashion shooters, the octagonal shape offers a large surface area that produces a signature wrap-around quality of light with the added benefit of natural-looking catchlights in the eyes of your subject. Each daylight-balanced 32W lamp outputs 1,400 lumens of light measured at 3.3' for a total of 8,400 lumens. Switches on the rear of the fixture each provide selective on/off lamp control of to vary the output . The head's standard 5/8" receiver mounts to a large variety of light stands such as the included 9.5' air-cushioned stands as well as gripware with 5/8" studs. The Octabox has a removable inner baffle and front face allowing even greater flexibility from hard to ultra-soft light. The light head also comes with a removable aluminum reflector for a bright, crisp direct lighting option.

Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Luxbanx Compact Octagonal Softbox from Impact is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. This compact 24" diameter softbox cast a soft and even look while retaining the wrap-around quality of larger softboxes The softbox features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast.

The octa Luxbanx has an additional control via the optional fabric grid which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The grid narrows and concentrates the light's beam forward, controlling spill and adding directional control to the Luxbanx's attributes. The large surface area of this octagonal-shaped softbox gives you a unique wrap-around quality of light that gains emphasis as you move it closer. Catchlights in the eyes of your subject are round and natural. Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare Flex Rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Fabric Grid for Compact Octagonal Luxbanx is a 24" light modifier that attaches quickly to the softbox's recessed front via touch-fasteners. The 40 degree grid narrows the beam spread from your softbox to control spill light and add directionality similar to a reflector, while maintaining a soft quality of light. Unlike unwieldy rigid grids, Impact fabric grids are extremely light weight and fold flat for transport in the included carry case.

OVERVIEW: The Grip Head For Wide Diameter Tubes from Impact is a versatile grip accessory that allows you to mount lights or light shapers to stands. The grip head features non-slip locking teeth and a wide tube diameter range of 8, 16, 19 or 28mm and will work with Impact, Sunbounce, or Skylite panel reflector crossbars. An oversized T-handle makes tightening easy while the industry-standard 5/8" receiver accepts a wide range of light stands.
