An oversized T-handle makes tightening easy while the industry-standard 5/8" receiver accepts a wide range of light stands.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Pro Trigger Kit for Canon Sub Mini Port DSLRs was put together by B&H for photographers who want to trigger their Canon DSLR remotely at distances up to 720'. The kit includes 2 of Impact's 80 channel PowerSync 16-80 Transceivers and an Impact PowerSync Pre-Trigger cable. TransceiverThe PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver is a combination wireless transmitter/receiver with 80 channels for elimination of interference, as well as 4 groups that each handle multiple devices that can be triggered individually or simultaneously. Besides remote flash triggering, with the appropriate optional cable, the PowerSync 16-80 can focus and trigger your camera in single, continuous, and bulb modes or be used as a wireless shutter release.The PowerSync 16-80 is used with at least 1 other unit. In its most basic mode, one (included in kit) transceiver slides onto the camera's hot shoe or is mounted to a bracket's cold shoe and is connected to the camera using the included 2.5mm to PC cable. A second (included in kit) transceiver acts as a receiver and accepts a shoe mount flash using its built-in hot shoe or is wired to the flash in the case of power packs or monolight. The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'.A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using the included dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-transceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.The grouping function allows you to assign each light in a portrait setup to one of the 4 groups allowing you to use all of the lights in unison or to add or subtract an accent, hairlight or backlight, for example, at will for different effects. Alternatively, you can assign a channel to 4 different lighting setups in a large studio and move from setup to setup for different looks or products. Each setup would require at least 1 transceiver wired to a master light to set off the optical slaves on the other units. With its reasonable cost you could, of course, wire a transceiver to each flash in the studio.The PowerSync 16-80 runs on 2 included, easily-sourced AA batteries. Also included are 2.5mm to PC and 3.5mm to 3.5mm flash sync cables, a lanyard, pouch case, self-adhering accessory shoe, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter. The PowerSync 16-80 is backward compatible with PowerSync 16 but limited to 16 channels. Trigger CableThe included Impact Pre-Trigger Cable for Canon DSLRs with a Sub-Mini port connects to the camera's remote cable socket and keeps your camera awake, as if your finger was depressing the shutter release halfway, so that the PowerSync Radio Slave can trigger it immediately to catch the action. There is an on/off switch on the cable so that it can be used as a simple trigger for the camera without waking and pre-focusing it.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Pro Trigger Kit for Canon Sub Mini Port DSLRs was put together by B&H for photographers who want to trigger their Canon DSLR remotely at distances up to 720'. The kit includes 2 of Impact's 80 channel PowerSync 16-80 Transceivers and an Impact PowerSync Pre-Trigger cable.

Transceiver

The PowerSync 16-80 Transceiver is a combination wireless transmitter/receiver with 80 channels for elimination of interference, as well as 4 groups that each handle multiple devices that can be triggered individually or simultaneously. Besides remote flash triggering, with the appropriate optional cable, the PowerSync 16-80 can focus and trigger your camera in single, continuous, and bulb modes or be used as a wireless shutter release.

The PowerSync 16-80 is used with at least 1 other unit. In its most basic mode, one (included in kit) transceiver slides onto the camera's hot shoe or is mounted to a bracket's cold shoe and is connected to the camera using the included 2.5mm to PC cable. A second (included in kit) transceiver acts as a receiver and accepts a shoe mount flash using its built-in hot shoe or is wired to the flash in the case of power packs or monolight. The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'.

A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using the included dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.

The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-transceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.

Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.

The grouping function allows you to assign each light in a portrait setup to one of the 4 groups allowing you to use all of the lights in unison or to add or subtract an accent, hairlight or backlight, for example, at will for different effects. Alternatively, you can assign a channel to 4 different lighting setups in a large studio and move from setup to setup for different looks or products. Each setup would require at least 1 transceiver wired to a master light to set off the optical slaves on the other units. With its reasonable cost you could, of course, wire a transceiver to each flash in the studio.

The PowerSync 16-80 runs on 2 included, easily-sourced AA batteries. Also included are 2.5mm to PC and 3.5mm to 3.5mm flash sync cables, a lanyard, pouch case, self-adhering accessory shoe, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter. The PowerSync 16-80 is backward compatible with PowerSync 16 but limited to 16 channels.

 

Trigger Cable

The included Impact Pre-Trigger Cable for Canon DSLRs with a Sub-Mini port connects to the camera's remote cable socket and keeps your camera awake, as if your finger was depressing the shutter release halfway, so that the PowerSync Radio Slave can trigger it immediately to catch the action. There is an on/off switch on the cable so that it can be used as a simple trigger for the camera without waking and pre-focusing it.

The connected flash will fire at distances up to 720'.

A similar technique is used to fire your camera remotely by connecting a transceiver to it using the included dedicated cable - a handy feature for macro photography. Add another handheld PowerSync 16-80 to trigger the camera remotely, like a wireless cable release. Pressing the release button halfway focuses the camera; fully depressing it triggers the shutter. Taking this a step further, you can fire the camera and a flash remotely with just 3 transceivers - one connected to the camera, one to the flash, and one handheld acting as a transmitter.

The long exposure mode brings you into the realm of the unit's additional features. With a wired transceiver or a wireless 2-transceiver setup, depressing the bulb button activates a digital stopwatch on the LCD screen that indicates elapsed time. Stop the exposure by depressing the button fully.

Ideal for surveillance or wildlife photography using a remote camera, Continuous Focus Lock minimizes triggering lag time by locking the camera into focus mode, similar to depressing the camera's focus release button half way. With the PowerSync 16-80, you'll never have to miss a shot because you had to wake a sleeping camera.

The grouping function allows you to assign each light in a portrait setup to one of the 4 groups allowing you to use all of the lights in unison or to add or subtract an accent, hairlight or backlight, for example, at will for different effects. Alternatively, you can assign a channel to 4 different lighting setups in a large studio and move from setup to setup for different looks or products. Each setup would require at least 1 transceiver wired to a master light to set off the optical slaves on the other units. With its reasonable cost you could, of course, wire a transceiver to each flash in the studio.

The PowerSync 16-80 runs on 2 included, easily-sourced AA batteries. Also included are 2.5mm to PC and 3.5mm to 3.5mm flash sync cables, a lanyard, pouch case, self-adhering accessory shoe, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter. The PowerSync 16-80 is backward compatible with PowerSync 16 but limited to 16 channels.

 

Trigger Cable

The included Impact Pre-Trigger Cable for Nikon DSLRs with a DSR/DC2 port connects to the camera's remote cable socket and keeps your camera awake, as if your finger was depressing the shutter release halfway, so that the PowerSync Radio Slave can trigger it immediately to catch the action. There is an on/off switch on the cable so that it can be used as a simple trigger for the camera without waking and pre-focusing it.

OVERVIEW: The Impact ControlSync 16 Transmitter provides photographers with a wireless solution for triggering their select flash head at distances up to 150'. The ControlSync 16 is compatible only with Impact's AS-X-400 Astral Extreme and its kits. It also works with Interfit's Strobies line of flashes and the Angler Q-400. The 16-channel, 16-group transmitter has a built-in antenna and hot shoe and uses a separately purchased 16-channel, 16-group receiver that is powered by its host flash without using batteries.Operating on the 433 MHz frequency, the ControlSync 16 Transmitter can raise and lower the power of the slave flash in 1/10 or 1/3 stop increments as well as turn modeling lights and audio alerts on and off. It's also capable of turning the AF assist on or off on flash units that have this feature. The ControlSync 16 transmitter runs on 2 AA batteries and is intended for use with the CS-16-R receiver. Besides triggering your flash from up to 150' away, the ControlSync 16 transmitter can be used as a handheld remote controller to adjust the settings on all your compatible flash units that are connected to a ControlSync receiver, even if you use a different device or method to trigger them.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The 12.9' Pro Backdrop Support Kit from Impact is a sturdy, secure way of hanging cloth backgrounds or seamless paper rolls weighing up to 38 lb. The kit comes with two stands and a telescoping crossbar. The stands have a maximum height of 12.5' - enough to give you headroom for low-angle shooting. Their minimum height is 3.6'. The crossbar telescopes from 4.8 to 12.9' - more than enough to handle rolls of 9' seamless paper and canvas backdrops. Reversible spigots with 1/4" and 3/8" mounting posts are included, allowing you to use the stands with other gear when not using the crossbar. It all fits in a provided deluxe padded case.

Reversible spigots with 1/4" and 3/8" mounting posts are included, allowing you to use the stands with other gear when not using the crossbar. It all fits in a provided deluxe padded case.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together the Impact Shooting Tent Kit to provide soft, clean lighting for professionals and enthusiasts alike who are looking for fast setup and breakdown and quality product, still life or ecommerce photos. The kit is comprised of a 35 x 35 x 35" Giant Impact Digital Light Shed, 2 VA903 5-lamp fluorescent fixtures and 2 air-cushioned light stands to support them. Giant Digital Light ShedLightweight and literally a snap to set up, the 35x35x35" Giant Digital Light Shed is a shooting enclosure that will give you clean detailed photos while others are still grappling with seamless paper and reflectors.Impact makes it easy in several ways. The white translucent cube has a removable front panel that facilitates positioning of the item to be photographed inside, which is then closed and sealed via touch-fasteners. Long front- and top-zippered openings offer a wide range of camera angles, and since all sides are translucent, 360-degree lighting is possible with your choice of tungsten, LED, or fluorescent fixtures. You can even light a propped-up shed from underneath for a floating effect. Impact provides both white and black fabric sweeps that attach with touch fasteners for even more creative options. When finished shooting, simply collapse the panels upon themselves and twist as instructed into a disc that's about 1/3 its open size. A soft case is provided for storage and transport. Five Lamp Fluorescent Cool LightThis Impact fixture accepts screw-in compact fluorescent lamps. Independent switches on the rear of the unit vary light output across a three f-stop range, by selecting between one, two, three, four, or all five lamps. The 150W fluorescent head provides 7,500 5500K, daylight balanced lumens without the need for conversion filters. The VA903's head angle is easily adjusted with its tilting 5/8" light stand mount and convenient positioning handle. 8' Air-Cushioned Light StandThis aluminum 8' Impact stand is a 4-section light support with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm during busy photo sessions.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together the Impact Shooting Tent Kit to provide soft, clean lighting for professionals and enthusiasts alike who are looking for fast setup and breakdown and quality product, still life or ecommerce photos. The kit is comprised of a 35 x 35 x 35" Giant Impact Digital Light Shed, 2 VA903 5-lamp fluorescent fixtures and 2 air-cushioned light stands to support them.

Giant Digital Light Shed

Lightweight and literally a snap to set up, the 35x35x35" Giant Digital Light Shed is a shooting enclosure that will give you clean detailed photos while others are still grappling with seamless paper and reflectors.

Impact makes it easy in several ways. The white translucent cube has a removable front panel that facilitates positioning of the item to be photographed inside, which is then closed and sealed via touch-fasteners. Long front- and top-zippered openings offer a wide range of camera angles, and since all sides are translucent, 360-degree lighting is possible with your choice of tungsten, LED, or fluorescent fixtures. You can even light a propped-up shed from underneath for a floating effect. Impact provides both white and black fabric sweeps that attach with touch fasteners for even more creative options. When finished shooting, simply collapse the panels upon themselves and twist as instructed into a disc that's about 1/3 its open size. A soft case is provided for storage and transport.

Five Lamp Fluorescent Cool Light

This Impact fixture accepts screw-in compact fluorescent lamps. Independent switches on the rear of the unit vary light output across a three f-stop range, by selecting between one, two, three, four, or all five lamps. The 150W fluorescent head provides 7,500 5500K, daylight balanced lumens without the need for conversion filters. The VA903's head angle is easily adjusted with its tilting 5/8" light stand mount and convenient positioning handle.

8' Air-Cushioned Light Stand

This aluminum 8' Impact stand is a 4-section light support with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm during busy photo sessions.

OVERVIEW: The Impact EX Portrait Kit was put together by B&H as an almost textbook example of the many creative options that you can achieve with only one light source and the right modifiers. The kit is built around the 100Ws EX-100A monolight, which comes with a 7" reflector, 24 x 24" softbox with speedring, and a sync cord. An 8' light stand is provided to support the kit's 67" telescopic arm with built-in spring clips to hold the included Impact 32" 5-in-1 reflector. Impact One Monolight KitThe Impact One Monolight Kit is an economical 100Ws monolight with modeling light and power variator. This kit includes a 24 x 24"softbox with mounting ring to soften the light output. Telescoping ArmThe Telescopic Collapsible Reflector Holder is ideal for mounting reflectors up to 60" to a light stand. It mounts to any stand that has a 5/8" diameter top stud and includes a 5/8" female stand adapter with female 3/8" and 1/4"-20 threads for stands topped with those threads. Alternately, with the addition of an optional adapter, it can hold a small light head to an extension of almost 3' from the center of your light stand. 32" 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector DiscThe Impact 5-in-1 Collapsible Reflector Disc is versatile in the field and in the studio, providing shadow-lightening detail in your subject, using available, or studio lighting. It starts out as a translucent white disc - ideal for softening direct sun or lights without diffusion. Use the removable, reversible zippered slipcover to reflect light into shadow areas of your subject. Your choice of color: silver, gold, white, or silver/gold mix will be determined by the lighting conditions and your personal preference. Impact 8' Air-Cushioned Light StandThis aluminum 8' Impact Air-cushioned Light Stand is a 4-section support with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm during busy photo sessions.

32" 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector Disc

The Impact 5-in-1 Collapsible Reflector Disc is versatile in the field and in the studio, providing shadow-lightening detail in your subject, using available, or studio lighting. It starts out as a translucent white disc - ideal for softening direct sun or lights without diffusion. Use the removable, reversible zippered slipcover to reflect light into shadow areas of your subject. Your choice of color: silver, gold, white, or silver/gold mix will be determined by the lighting conditions and your personal preference.

Impact 8' Air-Cushioned Light Stand

This aluminum 8' Impact Air-cushioned Light Stand is a 4-section support with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm during busy photo sessions.

OVERVIEW: Stabilize your light stands, boom arms, backgrounds, and more with the 5 lb black Impact Empty Saddle Sandbag. Easily transport the empty saddlebag to your location where it can be filled with available sand, dirt, or rocks and securely zipped shut. When your shoot is over, simply empty the contents to make your load lighter for the commute back home. Weather- and water-resistant cordura fabric stands up to the elements and use over time, while the double-zipper design provides an extra level of security to prevent the contents from spilling. Upper and lower handles made of durable nylon webbing allow multiple options for transport and hanging as a counterweight.

OVERVIEW: Made of thick, black weather and water-resistant Cordura nylon, the 5 lb Impact Saddle Sandbag is a staple in studios or on location for stabilizing light stands, booms, tripods, and backgrounds. The bag features rugged and durable assembly throughout. A double-zipper design is employed to safely contain its sand and allow its removal if necessary, as well as a webbed handle for hanging or moving.

OVERVIEW: Made of thick, black weather and water-resistant Cordura nylon, the 35 lb Impact Saddle Sandbag is a staple in studios or on location for stabilizing light stands, booms, tripods, and backgrounds. The bag features rugged and durable assembly throughout. A double-zipper design is employed to safely contain its sand and allow its removal if necessary, as well as a webbed handle for hanging or moving.

OVERVIEW:
The 16" Impact Beauty Dish with Impact EX100 / Elinchrom / Interfit EX Mount was put together by B&H to make the unique quality of light produced by this reflector available to users of these lights. The kit includes the Beauty Dish and an adapter specific to the lights.

Popularized by fashion and portrait photographers, the beauty dish reflector offers a bridge between softboxes and umbrellas that yields a soft but crisp light with snappy contrast and a textural quality that flatters makeup on models and accentuates character in portrait subjects. The key to its light quality is a built-in deflector that bounces the flash's direct output backwards, filling the shallow dish and casting a wide beam of soft light forward. The Beauty Dish can also be used in combination with an optional diffuser sock or honeycomb grid, which allows for further modification of the light output. The Beauty Dish in this kit fits Impact EX100, Elinchrom, Interfit EX and Calumet Genesis flash heads. Optional adapters are available for most major brands.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The Beauty Dish in this kit fits Impact EX100, Elinchrom, Interfit EX and Calumet Genesis flash heads. Optional adapters are available for most major brands.

OVERVIEW: Useful for when you are shooting full length portraits or groups, the 65" X-Large Deep Silver Umbrella from Impact is a unique light shaping tool with a deeper than normal profile. The exaggerated depth makes for a narrower beam than a standard umbrella, while still retaining some of an umbrella's wrap around qualities. Additional control can be achieved by fine-tuning the "focus" of the beam by varying the flash head's position along the umbrella's shaft. The 16-rib design, coupled with the reflective silver interior, results in a crisp even beam at all head positions.

OVERVIEW: Photographers who place a premium on being well-prepared will want at least one 50mm-long Female Threaded 3/8" to Male 5/8" Stud Adapter from Impact. This indispensable adapter will give you additional mounting options resulting in faster set-ups. The bottom of the adapter features a 3/8" threaded opening for attaching to the 3/8" screw on a light stand or other item. With the adapter attached to a stand, you can mount a light or other gear with a 5/8" receiver. For strength and durability, the adapter is made of chrome-plated steel. And at only 3.2 oz, it is easy to pack one for each light or stand.

The bottom of the adapter features a 3/8" threaded opening for attaching to the 3/8" screw on a light stand or other item. With the adapter attached to a stand, you can mount a light or other gear with a 5/8" receiver. For strength and durability, the adapter is made of chrome-plated steel. And at only 3.2 oz, it is easy to pack one for each light or stand.

OVERVIEW: The 12" Smoothy 360 Degree Globe Diffuser from Impact fits most S-mount flash heads and LED fixtures. The 360° beam angle is a great solution for shooting in confined spaces like offices. Hung overhead on a boom, it is ideal at lighting meetings, round table discussions, and panels. In video and cinema, it's great at mimicking the type of overhead lighting you get in bars, clubs, restaurants, and diners.

OVERVIEW: The  Fresnel Spot S-Mount Attachment 10-40° from Impact is a clever light shaper that allows you to do sharp shadow, long throw or old-style Hollywood effects with your S-Mount LED head or monolight flash head. A simple rotation of the barrel adjusts the focusing range from 10° spot for maximum crispness to 40° flood for wider coverage. Four colored gels are provided and snap into place for additional creative effects.

A simple rotation of the barrel adjusts the focusing range from 10° spot for maximum crispness to 40° flood for wider coverage. Four colored gels are provided and snap into place for additional creative effects.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this Ready Cool 3 Point Kit to provide photographers with a cool-running soft lighting setup that's as useful on the road as it is in the studio. The kit includes 3 FRC-122 two-lamp fluorescent fixtures with daylight-balanced lamps and an air-cushioned 8' light stand for each fixture.Kit components:The Impact Ready Cool 2 Lamp Fluorescent Fixture provides the light output of a 500W tungsten lamp head while drawing just 110W of power. The 22.25 x 7.0 x 3.25" light has built-in textured silver barn doors that reduce harshness while maintaining reflectivity while its 5/8" receiver accepts most industry standard light stands and accessories. Low generated heat allows you to use the FRC-22 at close range to your subject and provides a long lamp life of over 8,000 hours making it almost maintenance-free. The multi-voltage FRC-22 comes with the fixture, lamps, power cord, flexible gooseneck stand mount with 5/8" receiver and a padded carrying bag.The 8', black anodized aluminum Impact Air-Cushioned Light Stand has 4 sections and a 5/8" top stud. The stand accepts casters and folds down to 27" for transport and storage. Air-cushioning allows each section to descend slowly when making height adjustments to avoid equipment damage.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together this Ready Cool 3 Point Kit to provide photographers with a cool-running soft lighting setup that's as useful on the road as it is in the studio. The kit includes 3 FRC-122 two-lamp fluorescent fixtures with daylight-balanced lamps and an air-cushioned 8' light stand for each fixture.

Kit components:

The Impact Ready Cool 2 Lamp Fluorescent Fixture provides the light output of a 500W tungsten lamp head while drawing just 110W of power. The 22.25 x 7.0 x 3.25" light has built-in textured silver barn doors that reduce harshness while maintaining reflectivity while its 5/8" receiver accepts most industry standard light stands and accessories. Low generated heat allows you to use the FRC-22 at close range to your subject and provides a long lamp life of over 8,000 hours making it almost maintenance-free. The multi-voltage FRC-22 comes with the fixture, lamps, power cord, flexible gooseneck stand mount with 5/8" receiver and a padded carrying bag.

The 8', black anodized aluminum Impact Air-Cushioned Light Stand has 4 sections and a 5/8" top stud. The stand accepts casters and folds down to 27" for transport and storage. Air-cushioning allows each section to descend slowly when making height adjustments to avoid equipment damage.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together a kit using predominantly Impact gear that's a great economical solution for your Photo Portrait Studio needs. The kit includes3 fluorescent fixtures with 40W daylight-balanced lamps, two 6' stands, a 3' backlight stand, 2 white translucent umbrellas, 2 silver-beaded umbrellas and a stand and umbrella case. Kit Components:The Single Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a lightweight fixture in a polycarbonate housing designed to accept Edison-base compact fluorescent lamps. It can be used with up to 105W CFL bulbs. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory.The 3-section 6' Impact Black Light Stand is an economical support with an industry-standard 5/8" stud top with a 1/4"-20 thread. The stand folds down to 26.3" and weighs 1.8 lb.This 3' black anodized aluminum Impact Back Light Stand consists of a base and riser. Use the lower part as a base to place a mounted light at floor or table level. Add the extension to the base to raise the height of the light to a maximum of 3'.The 33" Impact Translucent White Umbrella both reflects light and allows it to pass through. Used in the traditional bounce mode, some of the light is reflected onto your subject while the rest is transmitted, increasing the room's ambient light level, adding fill and reducing contrast. Used in "shoot through" mode, the outside of the umbrella is pointed toward the subject with the light source behind it. This allows you to shoot much closer than normal to render a very soft look.The Impact 33" Beaded Silver Umbrella strikes a good compromise between high output and soft light quality. The black backing prevents light leakage and provides directional control while the beading breaks up the specular quality that standard silver umbrellas have.The padded nylon Stand and Umbrella Case measures 36 x 9 x 9" and allows you to carry up to 25 lb of gear. It has a webbed double carry handle that is stitched completely around the outside of the case, as well a removable shoulder strap.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together a kit using predominantly Impact gear that's a great economical solution for your Photo Portrait Studio needs. The kit includes3 fluorescent fixtures with 40W daylight-balanced lamps, two 6' stands, a 3' backlight stand, 2 white translucent umbrellas, 2 silver-beaded umbrellas and a stand and umbrella case.

 

Kit Components:

The Single Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a lightweight fixture in a polycarbonate housing designed to accept Edison-base compact fluorescent lamps. It can be used with up to 105W CFL bulbs. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory.

The 3-section 6' Impact Black Light Stand is an economical support with an industry-standard 5/8" stud top with a 1/4"-20 thread. The stand folds down to 26.3" and weighs 1.8 lb.

This 3' black anodized aluminum Impact Back Light Stand consists of a base and riser. Use the lower part as a base to place a mounted light at floor or table level. Add the extension to the base to raise the height of the light to a maximum of 3'.

The 33" Impact Translucent White Umbrella both reflects light and allows it to pass through. Used in the traditional bounce mode, some of the light is reflected onto your subject while the rest is transmitted, increasing the room's ambient light level, adding fill and reducing contrast. Used in "shoot through" mode, the outside of the umbrella is pointed toward the subject with the light source behind it. This allows you to shoot much closer than normal to render a very soft look.

The Impact 33" Beaded Silver Umbrella strikes a good compromise between high output and soft light quality. The black backing prevents light leakage and provides directional control while the beading breaks up the specular quality that standard silver umbrellas have.

The padded nylon Stand and Umbrella Case measures 36 x 9 x 9" and allows you to carry up to 25 lb of gear. It has a webbed double carry handle that is stitched completely around the outside of the case, as well a removable shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW: Using predominantly Impact gear, B&H has put together this Photo Studio Light Kit that's a great solution for photographing everything from products to people or for ecommerce. The kit includes 2 fluorescent 4-lamp fixtures, eight 40W daylight-balanced lamps, two 6' stands, and a stand and umbrella case.Kit Components:The 4-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a lightweight fixture in a polycarbonate housing that accepts Edison-base compact fluorescent lamps up to 50W, for a four-socket total of 200W. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory, and also accepts standard photo umbrellas..The 3-section 6' Impact Black Light Stand is an economical support with an industry-standard 5/8" stud top with a 1/4"-20 thread. The stand folds down to 26.3" and weighs 1.8 lb.The 50 x 50 cm Softbox for Fluorescent Fixtures is a light modifier that softens the output from Impact FF-S1 and FF-S4 single and four-socket fluorescent fixtures, as well as Impact's SF-ABRL160 Slave Flash. Installation is easy - no speed ring is needed; each of these heads has four receptacles located around the face of the fixture. The softbox can be used with up to four 50W fluorescent lamps for a total of 200W.The padded nylon Stand and Umbrella Case measures 36 x 9 x 9" and allows you to carry up to 25 lb of gear. It has a webbed double carry handle that is stitched completely around the outside of the case, as well a removable shoulder strap.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Using predominantly Impact gear, B&H has put together this Photo Studio Light Kit that's a great solution for photographing everything from products to people or for ecommerce. The kit includes 2 fluorescent 4-lamp fixtures, eight 40W daylight-balanced lamps, two 6' stands, and a stand and umbrella case.

Kit Components:

The 4-Socket Fluorescent Fixture from Impact is a lightweight fixture in a polycarbonate housing that accepts Edison-base compact fluorescent lamps up to 50W, for a four-socket total of 200W. The fixture's bracket tilts and locks into position and features a standard 5/8" receiver that mounts on any 5/8" stud or accessory, and also accepts standard photo umbrellas..

The 3-section 6' Impact Black Light Stand is an economical support with an industry-standard 5/8" stud top with a 1/4"-20 thread. The stand folds down to 26.3" and weighs 1.8 lb.

The 50 x 50 cm Softbox for Fluorescent Fixtures is a light modifier that softens the output from Impact FF-S1 and FF-S4 single and four-socket fluorescent fixtures, as well as Impact's SF-ABRL160 Slave Flash. Installation is easy - no speed ring is needed; each of these heads has four receptacles located around the face of the fixture. The softbox can be used with up to four 50W fluorescent lamps for a total of 200W.

The padded nylon Stand and Umbrella Case measures 36 x 9 x 9" and allows you to carry up to 25 lb of gear. It has a webbed double carry handle that is stitched completely around the outside of the case, as well a removable shoulder strap.

OVERVIEW: The Impact VC-500WL 2-500Ws Monolight with Transmitter Kit (220V) is built around 2 enhanced, redesigned VC-500WL flash heads. Each head comes with a reflector, flashtube, 250W modeling lamp, power cable, sync cord and a 9.4' air-cushioned light stand. The included 16-channel, 4-group radio transmitter triggers the head's built-in receivers from up to 328' away. Two white umbrellas with black backing, a 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and speedring, and a wheeled case are also included.The VC-500WL 500Ws monolights have full to 1/32 power range adjustable over 6 stops in 1/10 stop increments, very fast recycling time (1.5 seconds @ full power) and Proportional, Independent and Off settings for the 250W modeling light. Flash durations as short as 1/1200 sec. freeze action with moving subjects while the VC-500WL's 5,600K color temperature remains constant within +/- 100K regardless of power setting.You can freely mix and match your remote flash units with the VC-500WL. The flash's 7 optical slave modes allow it to interface with an on-camera TTL flashes, triggering with up to 5 pre-flashes when needed. The VC-500WL's Time Frame and Block Time functions enlarge the unit's circle of compatibility with the many brands available by effectively adapting for the differences in their pre-flash durations.A number of systems are employed to increase the VC-500WL's longevity and ensure safety. The fan-cooled housing with adaptive thermal control protects the flash heads CMOS circuitry and the user-replaceable modeling lamp and flash tube.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact VC-500WL 2-500Ws Monolight with Transmitter Kit (220V) is built around 2 enhanced, redesigned VC-500WL flash heads. Each head comes with a reflector, flashtube, 250W modeling lamp, power cable, sync cord and a 9.4' air-cushioned light stand. The included 16-channel, 4-group radio transmitter triggers the head's built-in receivers from up to 328' away. Two white umbrellas with black backing, a 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and speedring, and a wheeled case are also included.

The VC-500WL 500Ws monolights have full to 1/32 power range adjustable over 6 stops in 1/10 stop increments, very fast recycling time (1.5 seconds @ full power) and Proportional, Independent and Off settings for the 250W modeling light. Flash durations as short as 1/1200 sec. freeze action with moving subjects while the VC-500WL's 5,600K color temperature remains constant within +/- 100K regardless of power setting.

You can freely mix and match your remote flash units with the VC-500WL. The flash's 7 optical slave modes allow it to interface with an on-camera TTL flashes, triggering with up to 5 pre-flashes when needed. The VC-500WL's Time Frame and Block Time functions enlarge the unit's circle of compatibility with the many brands available by effectively adapting for the differences in their pre-flash durations.

A number of systems are employed to increase the VC-500WL's longevity and ensure safety. The fan-cooled housing with adaptive thermal control protects the flash heads CMOS circuitry and the user-replaceable modeling lamp and flash tube.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Backlight Stand with 5/8" Spigot Kit was put together by B&H to facilitate low-angle lighting or shooting. The kit comes with the flat-folding backlight stand and a spigot with male 1/4"-20 threads on one end and 3/8"-16 male threads on the other.The stand, when closed, folds flat into one piece of 13.25"-long steel. In use, the legs fan out to form a base with a stable footprint of 20". The exterior of the spigot measures 5/8", which is an industry standard size for mounting most light fixtures. The threads at each end of the spigot allow you to screw on accessories that have female 1/4"-20 or 3/8"-16 threads.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact Backlight Stand with 5/8" Spigot Kit was put together by B&H to facilitate low-angle lighting or shooting. The kit comes with the flat-folding backlight stand and a spigot with male 1/4"-20 threads on one end and 3/8"-16 male threads on the other.

The stand, when closed, folds flat into one piece of 13.25"-long steel. In use, the legs fan out to form a base with a stable footprint of 20". The exterior of the spigot measures 5/8", which is an industry standard size for mounting most light fixtures. The threads at each end of the spigot allow you to screw on accessories that have female 1/4"-20 or 3/8"-16 threads.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Fluorescent Hair Light Kit was put together by B&H to offer image makers a good starter kit for lighting technique. The kit includes a porcelain socket with an umbrella mount that can handle up to 500W, a 27W compact fluorescent lamp, 5" reflector, 6' stand, and a 5'3" mini boom arm. The boom arm allows variable tilting over your subject depending on their height.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Impact Fluorescent Hair Light Kit was put together by B&H to offer image makers a good starter kit for lighting technique. The kit includes a porcelain socket with an umbrella mount that can handle up to 500W, a 27W compact fluorescent lamp, 5" reflector, 6' stand, and a 5'3" mini boom arm. The boom arm allows variable tilting over your subject depending on their height.

OVERVIEW: This 14" Venture Grid from Impact is for use with the Impact Deep Dish Reflector. The 14" grid is spring-loaded for easy installation. It narrows the head's beam spread and contains unwanted spill light.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This 14" Venture Grid from Impact is for use with the Impact Deep Dish Reflector. The 14" grid is spring-loaded for easy installation. It narrows the head's beam spread and contains unwanted spill light.

OVERVIEW: This Venture Snoot with Built-In 40 Degree Grid from Impact is designed for use with the Venture TTL 600 monolight. This snoot includes a built-in 40° grid for a narrow flash beam. The closer you move to your subject, the smaller the circle of light will be. The snoot is ideal for creative effects on backgrounds or for use as a hair or accent light.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Venture Snoot with Built-In 40 Degree Grid from Impact is designed for use with the Venture TTL 600 monolight. This snoot includes a built-in 40° grid for a narrow flash beam. The closer you move to your subject, the smaller the circle of light will be. The snoot is ideal for creative effects on backgrounds or for use as a hair or accent light.

OVERVIEW: The 600Ws Flash Tube for Venture Flash Head from Impact is a spare or replacement for the one that comes with the head. The flash tube is user-replaceable, UV coated for accurate color, and has a color temperature of 5500 to 5600K.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The 600Ws Flash Tube for Venture Flash Head from Impact is a spare or replacement for the one that comes with the head. The flash tube is user-replaceable, UV coated for accurate color, and has a color temperature of 5500 to 5600K.

OVERVIEW: Impact's Venture Wireless Controller with Sony Multi-interface Shoe is the key to wireless triggering and TTL remote control of its Venture TTL-600 Battery-Powered Monolight. Operating on the 2.4 GHz bandwidth, the controller has 9 frequency channels, 3 groups per channel, and a range of up to 328' for TTL triggering. The controller allows for high speed sync and second curtain sync. You can also control each monolight's light intensity from full to 1/128 power as well as setting the modeling light brightness from 10% to 100%. The controller runs on 2 AAA batteries and features a Mini-USB connector that allows for firmware updates directly from Impact's website.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Impact's Venture Wireless Controller with Sony Multi-interface Shoe is the key to wireless triggering and TTL remote control of its Venture TTL-600 Battery-Powered Monolight. Operating on the 2.4 GHz bandwidth, the controller has 9 frequency channels, 3 groups per channel, and a range of up to 328' for TTL triggering. The controller allows for high speed sync and second curtain sync. You can also control each monolight's light intensity from full to 1/128 power as well as setting the modeling light brightness from 10% to 100%. The controller runs on 2 AAA batteries and features a Mini-USB connector that allows for firmware updates directly from Impact's website.

The controller allows for high speed sync and second curtain sync. You can also control each monolight's light intensity from full to 1/128 power as well as setting the modeling light brightness from 10% to 100%. The controller runs on 2 AAA batteries.

OVERVIEW: Take advantage of this Venture 14" Deep Dish Reflector with Diffuser from Impact when using the Venture TTL 600 Monolight for a wide beam spread that produces a soft light. The diffuser fits a reflector by way of an integrated drawstring.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Take advantage of this Venture 14" Deep Dish Reflector with Diffuser from Impact when using the Venture TTL 600 Monolight for a wide beam spread that produces a soft light. The diffuser fits a reflector by way of an integrated drawstring.

OVERVIEW:
For a fast, lightweight, and compact light, look no further than the Venture TTL-600 Battery-Powered Monolight from Impact. The Venture TTL-600 offers full support for Sony, Canon, and Nikon, allowing you to go fully mobile with your studio. Busy photographers can set up their monolight on a stand or hand it to an assistant, put the optional TTL transmitter onto their camera's hot shoe, and start shooting.

The Venture TTL-600 operates in two modes. The Quick Mode reduces your light's power to produce a short flash duration range of 1/455 - 1/19,500 seconds for a faster recycle rate of 1.2 seconds. The Power Mode allows you to increase the power output to produce a flash duration range of 1/380 - 1/18,500 seconds with a 3-second recycle rate. With a maximum of 600W/s output, this monolight provides an 8-stop power range control, which gives you a range of choices to achieve the exact shot you had in mind.

The proportional and independent modeling-light modes can both be set to Constant to be on continuously, or to Recycle Signal that turns off when the flash is triggered and turns back on when recycled. The adjustable 15W LED lamp allows you to adjust the lamp's brightness independently from the flash or proportional to the flash's output.

Weighing in at just over four pounds and measuring less than 9" in length, this monolight could be tucked into most backpacks if necessary. The Venture TTL-600 comes with a reflector, removable pistol grip, stand mount, battery, charger, PC cord, and an aluminum case with a nylon strap for added portability.

OVERVIEW: An easily installed replacement part, the Frosted Glass Dome for Venture 600 Monolight from Impact snaps into place and protects the head's flash tube and modeling light while slightly softening the output and distributing it evenly.
OVERVIEW_RAW: An easily installed replacement part, the Frosted Glass Dome for Venture 600 Monolight from Impact snaps into place and protects the head's flash tube and modeling light while slightly softening the output and distributing it evenly.

OVERVIEW: For wrapping light around your subject, take advantage of this 32" Venture Hex Softbox from Impact when using your Venture TTL-600 Monolight on location or in your studio. This Hex Softbox provides soft, flattering lighting and is easy to assemble and mount to the monolight thanks to the built-in mount and rods that quickly snap into place.
OVERVIEW_RAW: For wrapping light around your subject, take advantage of this 32" Venture Hex Softbox from Impact when using your Venture TTL-600 Monolight on location or in your studio. This Hex Softbox provides soft, flattering lighting and is easy to assemble and mount to the monolight thanks to the built-in mount and rods that quickly snap into place.

OVERVIEW: Create a more complete lighting kit with this Impact Quikbox Softbox Speedlight Solution Kit for Canon Cameras from B&H. It packs together the 24 x 24" Quikbox Softbox, a PowerSlave Wireless Flash Transmitter and Receiver Set, an umbrella bracket, and an 8' air-cushioned light stand. Popping open quickly from flat storage, the 24 x 24" Quikbox Softbox is a convenient tool for softening the output from a shoe-mounted flash. It offers a reflective silver interior for evenly distributing light while minimizing light loss as well as a removable front diffuser and inner baffle that will allow users to dial in how soft they need their setup to be. The Quikbox is equipped with a horizontally adjustable cold shoe and a vertically adjustable bracket, allowing users to set up a variety of different sized flashes within the single softbox. This will also provide compatibility with larger flashes and flashes mounted on radio receivers, such as the PowerSlave unit in this kit. Enabling reliable wireless triggering from a distance is the PowerSlave Wireless Flash Transmitter and Receiver Set, which can operate from distances up to 150'. It works on a 2.4 GHz frequency for reduced interference and can be set to one of sixteen channels to avoid conflicts with other radio systems. Also, the PowerSlave system has a sync speed of 1/200 sec, and features a built-in Wake-Up function that allows you to wake a flash from standby mode simply by depressing your camera's shutter release halfway. Further improving functionality is a 2.5mm jack on the receiver which allows for use with a studio flash. Included with this set are three sync cables, an elastic light stand cold-shoe mount, and batteries for both the transmitter and receiver. Alongside these powerful tools is an aluminum 8' air-cushioned light stand. It offers 4 sections for packing small, and the air-cushioned designed will prevent equipment from damage in the event one of the locks is accidentally released. And, the umbrella bracket allows for mounting your flash to this stand and then attaching an umbrella for another possible lighting setup.

OVERVIEW: Dramatically improve your flash lighting by getting your unit both off-camera and into a modifier with the Impact Hexi 24 Softbox Speedlight Solution Kit for Canon Cameras from B&H. It packs together the 24"-diameter Hexi 24 Speedlight Softbox, a PowerSlave Wireless Flash Transmitter and Receiver Set, and an 8' air-cushioned light stand. Optimized for run-and-gun operation with shoe-mounted flashes, the Hexi 24 softbox measures 24" in diameter and will soften the output of your speedlight. The silver interior minimizes light loss while evenly distributing light, and removable inner baffle and front diffuser allow users to dial in the overall softness of the light. This means users can achieve a range of soft to hard with a single modifier. A bracket mount with a contoured grip handle for use handheld and a 5/8" receiver enables stand mounting when desired. This bracket can be adjusted for different flash heights including use with or without the PowerSlave Wireless Flash Receiver. And, it can accept optional accessories, such as a grid. A carrying case is included for storage and transport. Enabling reliable wireless triggering from a distance is the PowerSlave Wireless Flash Transmitter and Receiver Set, which can operate from distances up to 150'. It works on a 2.4 GHz frequency for reduced interference and can be set to one of sixteen channels to avoid conflicts with other radio systems. Also, the PowerSlave system has a sync speed of 1/200 sec, and features a built-in Wake-Up function that allows you to wake a flash from standby mode simply by depressing your camera's shutter release halfway. Further improving functionality is a 2.5mm jack on the receiver which allows for use with a studio flash. Included with this set are three sync cables, an elastic light stand cold-shoe mount, and batteries for both the transmitter and receiver. Alongside these powerful tools is an aluminum 8' air-cushioned light stand. It offers 4 sections for packing small, and the air-cushioned designed will prevent equipment from damage in the event one of the locks is accidentally released.

OVERVIEW:
The 19" diameter Impact 3-Lamp Fluorescent Ring Light is a shoot-through light fixture with three concentric 5200K fluorescent lamps that render soft, nearly shadowless illumination which is cosmetically flattering to skin tones in glamour and close-up work. A fabric diffuser is included for increased diffusion and to mask the lamps reflected in the catchlights of the subject's eyes. Power level is controlled by an on/off switch for each lamp.

The Ring Light has its own stand mount but can also be supported with the included small, adjustable camera bracket which was designed for cameras with lenses up to 4.0" diameter.

OVERVIEW: The Fluorescent 19" Ring Light with Dimmer from Impact is a unique, constant light source with a natural daylight color balance of 5200K. Great for products and portraits, the ring light is meant for use with lighter weight cameras such as point and shoot or mirrorless cameras. A mini ball head and smartphone adapter are included for mounting cameras to the light. The ring light comes with a light stand swivel that accepts any 5/8" standard stud as well as a flexible arm to add versatility in positioning. The on-board dimmer allows you to vary the light intensity from 30-100%. The quality of light is soft, wrap-around, and nearly shadowless, but if you want it softer still, use the kit's snap on diffusers. There's also a 4-panel CTO filter for balancing with tungsten fixtures or creating warm lighting effects. A mirror attachment is included to help the subject prep for the shot.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Fluorescent 19" Ring Light with Dimmer from Impact is a unique, constant light source with a natural daylight color balance of 5200K. The ring light comes with a light stand swivel that accepts any 5/8" standard stud as well as a flexible arm to add versatility in positioning. The on-board dimmer allows you to vary the light intensity from 30-100%. The quality of light is soft, wrap-around, and nearly shadowless, but if you want it softer still, use the kit's snap on diffusers. There's also a 4-panel CTO filter for balancing with tungsten fixtures or creating warm lighting effects. A mirror attachment is included to help the subject prep for the shot.

OVERVIEW: This small Replacement Lamp for FRC-RL19 Ring Light from Impact is a 8", 22W spare or replacement lamp with a color temperature of 5200K, lamp life of 6,000 hours and a CRI of >85. It is one of the three lamps that complete the FRC-RL19 fixture.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This small Replacement Lamp for FRC-RL19 Ring Light from Impact is a 8", 22W spare or replacement lamp with a color temperature of 5200K, lamp life of 6,000 hours and a CRI of >85. It is one of the three lamps that complete the FRC-RL19 fixture.

OVERVIEW:
Store, transport, and protect your 19" ring light with the black FRC-RL19CASE Padded Carrying Case from impact. This well made case is designed to hold Impact and other manufacturer's LED or fluorescent ring lights, up to 19". Accessories may be stored in the exterior rear zippered pocket, and in the two interior zippered pockets. The case features a main compartment with a large padded slip-in pocket.

For strength and durability the case is made of tough, weather-resistant, 600D ballistic nylon. And for easy, comfortable carrying the case has two strap handles on top and a wide, adjustable shoulder strap with a sliding pad. Best of all, this lightweight case weighs in at only 2.3 pounds.

OVERVIEW: The Replacement Lamp for FRC-RLSL Ring Light from Impact is a spare or replacement for the one that comes with the ring light. It has a color temperature of 5200K, lamp life of 6,000 hours and a CRI of 90. The lamp consumes 65W of power and produces the tungsten equivalence of 260W.

OVERVIEW: Quickly create a beautiful soft color-accurate two-light setup by picking up this Impact LED Studio Kit from B&H. It features two simple porcelain sockets that will accept nearly any Edison base bulb up to 500W and have a stay-cool handle/stand mount that lets them easily fit onto the two included 8' air-cushioned light stands. These sockets are designed to accept umbrellas, such as the two 33" white translucent umbrellas bundled here, as well as optional screw-on reflectors, enabling users to take control over their lighting. To complete the setup, this kit features two 30W LED Studio Lamps that offer a high CRI of 90 for color accurate imaging and a daylight-balanced color temperature of 5500K. These bulbs will create a soft, flattering light and will save energy compared to tungsten offerings.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Quickly create a beautiful soft color-accurate two-light setup by picking up this Impact LED Studio Kit from B&H. It features two simple porcelain sockets that will accept nearly any Edison base bulb up to 500W and have a stay-cool handle/stand mount that lets them easily fit onto the two included 8' air-cushioned light stands. These sockets are designed to accept umbrellas, such as the two 33" white translucent umbrellas bundled here, as well as optional screw-on reflectors, enabling users to take control over their lighting. To complete the setup, this kit features two 30W LED Studio Lamps that offer a high CRI of 90 for color accurate imaging and a daylight-balanced color temperature of 5500K. These bulbs will create a soft, flattering light and will save energy compared to tungsten offerings.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact 20" Pivot Arm with Super Clamp Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers and videographers an articulating, hands-free solution to support a light or other grip accessory. The kit includes a 20" pivot arm with lever-type locking and a Super Clamp with a 5/8" stud, and 1/4"-20 male-to-male and 1/4"-20 to shoe mount adapters.

With a maximum extension of 20", the 2-section pivot arm offers a 5/8" rotating pin at each end with action that is locked down by the arm's central lever arm. One pin has a 1/4"-20 tap and the other has a 3/8"-16 to connect grip gear with matching male threads weighing up to 8 lb. In addition, this kit also includes a 1/4"-20 male-to-male adapter spigot and a 1/4"-20 to shoe mount adapter to allow you to mount lighter 1/4"-20 or shoe mount accessories. The Pivot Arm is a natural choice for use with a Super Clamp to free up floor space by clamping to a pole or other element on location such as a door. In total 360 degrees of movement is possible. 

 
The Super Clamp with Ratchet Handle is a versatile grip tool that can support 
cameras, lights, umbrellas, hooks, shelves, cross bars and other grip gear weighing up to 33 lb. The Super Clamp can be securely mounted on any tube or pipe from 0.5" to 2.1" and is supplied with a wedge insert for clamping onto flat surfaces. The ratchet handle allows you to disengage it and tighten it down from any angle; a very handy feature when you're using the clamp in tight quarters.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: This white Gaffer Tape from Impact, measuring 1' x 55 yd, is an indispensable expendable on any set, stage, or shoot, whether you're positioning light fixtures, taping down cables, or joining background material. Impact Gaffer Tape has a high tensile strength and clean adhesion that leaves no damage or residue when removed. The tape is hand tearable, weather resistant, and conforms well to irregular surfaces.

OVERVIEW:
B&H has put together the Impact 20" Pivot Arm with Camera Platform Kit to offer photographers and videographers a space-saving solution for camera support. The kit contains a pivot arm with a tension-control wheel and a camera platform.


Designed to hold a light fixture or accessory in place, the Impact 20" Pivot Arm is a space-saving grip tool with adjustable wheel lock control that's well-suited for a variety of applications. The wheel at the arm's elbow is capable of tension adjustment so that you can safely and easily secure gear weighing up to 8 lb in the position you've chosen. It's a great match-up with a super clamp, for instance or with the camera platform included in this kit.


The Impact Camera Platform supports lightweight cameras on the Pivot Arm or similar accessories. The platform features a captive, sliding 1/4"-20 camera screw and a non-slip surface. There are two 5/8" receivers for the arm or a stud.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together the Impact 20" Pivot Arm with Camera Platform Kit to offer photographers and videographers a space-saving solution for camera support. The kit contains a pivot arm with a tension-control wheel and a camera platform.

The wheel at the arm's elbow is capable of tension adjustment so that you can safely and easily secure gear weighing up to 8 lb in the position you've chosen. It's a great match-up with a super clamp, for instance or with the camera platform included in this kit.

The Impact Camera Platform supports lightweight cameras on the Pivot Arm or similar accessories. The platform features a captive, sliding 1/4"-20 camera screw and a non-slip surface. There are two 5/8" receivers for the arm or a stud.

OVERVIEW:
Save a lot of floor space with Impact's heavy-duty 7 ft Wall-Mounted Boom Arm.

Featuring two stabilizing tubes — with wider diameters for increased sturdiness — the Wall-Mounted Boom Arm telescopes from 3.9 to 7 ft in length and supports 12 lb loads at full extension. Other than lights, it can also be used to support a variety of other in-studio fixtures, including hanging fabrics for background. To further preserve space, the boom arm fully collapses against the wall in just a couple of quick steps.

The 7 ft Wall-Mounted Boom Arm comes with a removable 5/8" spigot that can be inserted on the end from the top or side. The spigot is reversible and offers 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 male threads on opposite ends.

When fully extended, the Boom Arm offers the flexibility of 180° of tilt and 170° of pan movement. Length is adjustable via a locking ratchet handle, and a locking knob on the support tube provides for extra reinforcement for your payload. A cable clamp is also included for keeping your cables safely organized.

The 7 ft Wall-Mounted Boom Arm comes with mounting screws and anchors and an Allen key for adjustments.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW_NOTE: The included mounting screws and anchors may not be the best mounting solution for your location. Please make sure your wall is strong enough to support the boom arm and payload.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this Impact kit of Six Empty 15 lb Black Saddle Sandbags for image makers who need to outfit a small studio or add variety to the sandbags they already own.Made of thick, black weather and water-resistant Cordura nylon, the 15 lb Saddle Sandbag is a staple in studios or on location for stabilizing light stands, booms, tripods, and backgrounds. The bag features rugged and durable assembly throughout. A double-zipper design is employed to safely contain its sand and allow its removal if necessary, as well as a webbed handle for hanging or moving.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this Off-Camera Flash Accessory Kit for photographers who want to maximize the capabilities of a pair of shoe-mount flashes. The kit includes two white translucent 32" umbrellas and umbrella brackets, and two 8' air-cushioned light stands.32" White UmbrellaThe Impact white umbrella broadens and diffuses the harsh light of the flash. It can be used in classic bounce mode or in "shoot through" mode by pumping the light through the umbrella with its convex side facing the subject.Umbrella BracketThe umbrella bracket will fit on almost any light stand. It includes two removable, reversible studs to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". This bracket tilts and swivels to make aiming the light or flash easy. It also includes a cold shoe mount, which will accept virtually any shoe-mount flash unit (except Minolta/Sony).Light StandThis aluminum 8' Impact Air-Cushioned Light Stand is 4-section light support with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together this Off-Camera Flash Accessory Kit for photographers who want to maximize the capabilities of a pair of shoe-mount flashes. The kit includes two white translucent 32" umbrellas and umbrella brackets, and two 8' air-cushioned light stands.

32" White Umbrella

The Impact white umbrella broadens and diffuses the harsh light of the flash. It can be used in classic bounce mode or in "shoot through" mode by pumping the light through the umbrella with its convex side facing the subject.

Umbrella Bracket

The umbrella bracket will fit on almost any light stand. It includes two removable, reversible studs to adapt to light stands with top studs smaller than the standard 5/8". This bracket tilts and swivels to make aiming the light or flash easy. It also includes a cold shoe mount, which will accept virtually any shoe-mount flash unit (except Minolta/Sony).

Light Stand

This aluminum 8' Impact Air-Cushioned Light Stand is 4-section light support with sure-twist section locks. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm.

OVERVIEW: The Comet to Bowens Adapter for Venture 600 from Impact converts the Impact Venture TTL-600 monolight's Comet-type reflector and accessory mount to a Bowens S-Type mount. Installed in seconds, the adapter gives the Venture access to the numerous light shapers made for Bowens by the many other manufacturers who use this popular mount.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Comet to Bowens Adapter for Venture 600 from Impact converts the Impact Venture TTL-600 monolight's Comet-type reflector and accessory mount to a Bowens S-Type mount. Installed in seconds, the adapter gives the Venture access to the numerous light shapers made for Bowens by the many other manufacturers who use this popular mount.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this Luxbanx Octa Softbox and Grid Kit to give image-makers a lighting solution with a flattering look, manageable contrast, and directional control.Octa SoftboxThe Luxbanx Compact Octagonal Softbox is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. The large surface area of this 24" octagonal-shaped softbox gives you a unique wrap-around quality of light that gains emphasis as you move it closer. Catchlights in the eyes of your subject are round and natural. The Octa features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast.Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare flex rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brandsFabric GridThe Octa Luxbanx has an additional control via the fabric grid, which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The 40-degree grid narrows the beam spread from your softbox to control spill light and add directionality similar to a reflector, while maintaining a soft quality of light. Unlike unwieldy rigid grids, Impact fabric grids are extremely lightweight and fold flat for transport in the included carry case.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together this Luxbanx Octa Softbox and Grid Kit to give image-makers a lighting solution with a flattering look, manageable contrast, and directional control.

Octa Softbox

The Luxbanx Compact Octagonal Softbox is a highly versatile tool for strobes, LEDs, and fluorescents. The large surface area of this 24" octagonal-shaped softbox gives you a unique wrap-around quality of light that gains emphasis as you move it closer. Catchlights in the eyes of your subject are round and natural. The Octa features a soft white interior, removable front diffuser and removable inner baffle. The diffuser and baffle can be used together for maximum softening of the output. Removing the inner baffle will give you a more crisp light quality with higher contrast, while shedding the front and inner diffusers turns the Luxbanx into a large reflector with maximum brightness and contrast.

Every Luxbanx comes with a carrying case and a spare flex rod. Separate purchase of a speed ring that matches your strobe's mount is required for use. Impact makes models to fit most popular brands

Fabric Grid

The Octa Luxbanx has an additional control via the fabric grid, which mounts to the recessed lip of the softbox with touch-fasteners. The 40-degree grid narrows the beam spread from your softbox to control spill light and add directionality similar to a reflector, while maintaining a soft quality of light. Unlike unwieldy rigid grids, Impact fabric grids are extremely lightweight and fold flat for transport in the included carry case.

OVERVIEW_RAW: This Impact Set of 3 Casters fits light stands with 22mm tubular legs. Each caster has a simple thumbscrew lock and requires no tools for installation.

OVERVIEW: This 24 x 36"  Fabric Grid for Parabox Softbox from Impact fits on the recessed front face of the Parabox via touch-fasteners. The grid narrows the softbox's beam while eliminating spill light and offering directional control of its output. The grid folds flat for storage and transport when not in use.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This 24 x 36" Fabric Grid for Parabox Softbox from Impact fits on the recessed front face of the Parabox via touch-fasteners. The grid narrows the softbox's beam while eliminating spill light and offering directional control of its output. The grid folds flat for storage and transport when not in use.

OVERVIEW:
Protect, store, and transport two C-stands with turtle bases, large light stands, boom arms up to 50" long, and a variety of related accessories with the sturdy, black LKB-RCS Light Kit Bag Rolling C-Stand Case from Impact. Photographers will appreciate the spacious main compartment that features a three-sided, dual zipper opening and two heavy-duty fabric fastening, interior tie-down straps for securing gear. The case's 51" interior length makes it possible to place two select turtle bases end to end, as well as accommodate gear that's too long to fit in many other cases.

Carry the case with the dual center straps and contoured ABS plastic interlocking handle, or with the padded haul handles located top and bottom. The case may also be rolled over level ground with the two flush-mounted, user-replaceable wheels on the bottom. Flush-mounted skateboard-style wheels make packing and maneuvering through narrow openings easy. Underneath the case are small skid plates for each wheel, and long rubber feet to help protect the bottom of the case from abrasions and water damage. For strength and durability, the case employs a rigid metal frame and styrene panel construction. The exterior shell is made of weather-resistant 600D ballistic nylon.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Protect, store, and transport two C-stands with turtle bases, large light stands, boom arms up to 50" long, and a variety of related accessories with the sturdy, black LKB-RCS Light Kit Bag Rolling C-Stand Case from Impact. Photographers will appreciate the spacious main compartment that features a three-sided, dual zipper opening and two heavy-duty fabric fastening, interior tie-down straps for securing gear. The case's 51" interior length makes it possible to place two select turtle bases end to end, as well as accommodate gear that's too long to fit in many other cases.

Carry the case with the dual center straps and contoured ABS plastic interlocking handle, or with the padded haul handles located top and bottom. The case may also be rolled over level ground with the two flush-mounted, user-replaceable wheels on the bottom. Flush-mounted skateboard-style wheels make packing and maneuvering through narrow openings easy. Underneath the case are small skid plates for each wheel, and long rubber feet to help protect the bottom of the case from abrasions and water damage. For strength and durability, the case employs a rigid metal frame and styrene panel construction. The exterior shell is made of weather-resistant 600D ballistic nylon.

OVERVIEW: Store, protect, and transport up to three compact strobe monolights, LED monolights, or battery strobe systems and related accessories with the black LKB-R1 Small Light Kit Roller Bag #1 from Impact. For strength, durability, and protection the LKB-R1 features unibody construction, a weather-resistant 600D nylon shell, and dual zippers that can accommodate an optional, user-supplied padlock. There's also a convenient business card/ID pocket on the top of the bag. Gear is easily organized with the three included touch-fastening dividers and floating inner lid. Bright yellow fabric lining the inside of the case and the dividers makes it easier to locate gear in low light. Store a few stands, umbrellas, and other accessories on top of the inner lid. A variety of accessories may be stored in the large mesh, zippered, inner accessory pocket. Carry your LKB-R1 with the heavy-duty folding plastic grip handle, twin hand straps with grip handle, or roll over flat ground with the heavy-duty, ball bearing casters. A long rubber skid plate helps protect the bottom of the bag. Upright standing is possible thanks to the two rubber feet located on the bottom of the bag, opposite the wheels.

OVERVIEW: The Impact VC-500WLN 3-500Ws Digital Monolight with Transmitter Kit is built around three VC-500WLN flash heads. Each head comes with a reflector, flashtube, 250W modeling lamp, power cable, sync cord, and light stand. The included 16-channel, 4-group radio transmitter triggers the head's built-in receivers from up to 328' away. Three white umbrellas with black backing, a 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and speedring, and a wheeled case are also included.The VC-500WLN 500Ws Digital monolights have full to 1/32 power range adjustable over 6 stops in 1/10 stop increments, very fast recycling time (1.5 seconds @ full power) and Proportional, Independent and Off settings for the 250W modeling light. Flash durations as short as 1/1200 sec freeze action with moving subjects while the VC-500WLN's 5600K color temperature remains constant within +/- 100K regardless of power setting.You can freely mix and match your remote flash units with the VC-500WLN. The flash's 7 optical slave modes allow it to interface with an on-camera TTL flashes, triggering with up to 5 pre-flashes when needed. The VC-500WLN's Time Frame and Block Time functions enlarge the unit's circle of compatibility with the many brands available by effectively adapting for the differences in their pre-flash durations. Selected settings are indicated on the VC-500WLN's digital display when activated by the user.A number of systems are employed to increase the VC-500WL's longevity and ensure safety. The fan-cooled housing with adaptive thermal control protects the flash heads CMOS circuitry and the user-replaceable modeling lamp and flash tube.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Impact VC-500WLN 3-500Ws Digital Monolight with Transmitter Kit is built around three VC-500WLN flash heads. Each head comes with a reflector, flashtube, 250W modeling lamp, power cable, sync cord, and light stand. The included 16-channel, 4-group radio transmitter triggers the head's built-in receivers from up to 328' away. Three white umbrellas with black backing, a 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and speedring, and a wheeled case are also included.

The VC-500WLN 500Ws Digital monolights have full to 1/32 power range adjustable over 6 stops in 1/10 stop increments, very fast recycling time (1.5 seconds @ full power) and Proportional, Independent and Off settings for the 250W modeling light. Flash durations as short as 1/1200 sec freeze action with moving subjects while the VC-500WLN's 5600K color temperature remains constant within +/- 100K regardless of power setting.

You can freely mix and match your remote flash units with the VC-500WLN. The flash's 7 optical slave modes allow it to interface with an on-camera TTL flashes, triggering with up to 5 pre-flashes when needed. The VC-500WLN's Time Frame and Block Time functions enlarge the unit's circle of compatibility with the many brands available by effectively adapting for the differences in their pre-flash durations. Selected settings are indicated on the VC-500WLN's digital display when activated by the user.

A number of systems are employed to increase the VC-500WL's longevity and ensure safety. The fan-cooled housing with adaptive thermal control protects the flash heads CMOS circuitry and the user-replaceable modeling lamp and flash tube.

OVERVIEW: Made of thick, orange weather and water-resistant Cordura nylon, this set of six 15 lb Impact Saddle Sandbags is a staple in studios or on location for stabilizing light stands, booms, tripods, and backgrounds. The bag features rugged and durable assembly throughout. A double-zipper design is employed to safely contain its sand and allow its removal if necessary, as well as a webbed handle for hanging or moving.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Made of thick, orange weather and water-resistant Cordura nylon, this set of six 15 lb Impact Saddle Sandbags is a staple in studios or on location for stabilizing light stands, booms, tripods, and backgrounds. The bag features rugged and durable assembly throughout. A double-zipper design is employed to safely contain its sand and allow its removal if necessary, as well as a webbed handle for hanging or moving.

OVERVIEW:
A handy group of items to have on location or in the studio, the  Impact Pivot Arm Kit was put together by B&H to offer the photographer various hands-free shooting and grip options. The kit includes a pivot arm, backlight stand base, super clamp and a camera platform.Pivot Arm
Designed to hold a light fixture or accessory in place, the 20" Impact Pivot Arm with Locking Lever is a space-saving grip tool for a variety of applications. It's a great matchup with a super clamp, for instance, with an optional camera platform for highly mobile work. The lever at the arm's elbow locks down securely in the position you've chosen and will support gear weighing up to eight pounds.Backlight Stand Base
The Impact Backlight Stand Base is a sturdy, all-steel lighting accessory that is ideal for low-angle applications such as mounting lighting fixtures and other accessories close to the floor or at table level. A 5/8" Baby receiver is built-in for mounting a light stand riser. With a footprint diameter of 20 inches, the rubber-tipped, tri-leg base provides stability and prevents slipping on a smooth surface. It sets up quickly, and the legs fold flat for easy moving and storage.Super Clamp
The Impact Super Clamp with Ratchet Handle is a versatile grip tool made of lightweight cast alloy. With a load capacity of 33 lb, the clamp can hold a wide variety of items such as cameras, lights, umbrellas, hooks, shelves, plate glass, cross bars, even other Super Clamps.The Super Clamp can be securely mounted on any tube or pipe from 0.5" to 2.1" and is supplied with a wedge insert for clamping onto flat surfaces. The ratchet handle allows you to disengage it and tighten it down from any angle; a very handy feature when you're using the clamp in tight quarters. A built-in socket holds 5/8" accessories such as the supplied SRP-102 Hex Stud with 1/4"-20 male thread.Camera Platform
The Impact Camera Platform supports lightweight cameras on the pivot arm or similar accessory. The platform features a captive, sliding 1/4"-20 camera screw and a non-slip surface. There are two 5/8" receivers for the arm or a stud.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The kit includes 2 Octacool-9 fixtures with lamps and stands and a Jumbo Roller Case to store and transport it all in.

OVERVIEW: This aluminum Impact Air-Cushioned Light Stand rises to a height of 8' and folds down to 29.6". The stand has sure-twist section locks and 4 sections and will support up to 8 lb. If you forget to tighten any section with your light mounted, the light slowly descends, thanks to the air-cushioned action. This useful feature saves equipment and fingers from harm during busy photo sessions.
