OVERVIEW: The Adjustable Twin Shoe Umbrella Bracket with 32" Convertible White Umbrella Kit was put together by B&H for photographers who want to travel light and maximize the use of two shoe-mount flashes off-camera. The kit includes a Twin Shoe Long Umbrella Bracket that will accept shafts up to 8mm and 5/8" light stands. The 15" T-Bar offers ample room for movement of the two flash shoes to fill modifiers like the included umbrella. The white umbrella has a removable black backing that allows you to bounce light off it or shoot light through it like a softbox.

It also includes a white umbrella with a removable black backing so you can bounce light off it in the traditional manner or aim the light through it like a softbox.

OVERVIEW: The Lightbar Tilt Umbrella Bracket with 60" Convertible White Umbrella was put together by B&H for photographers who want to travel light and maximize the use of up to four shoe-mount flashes off-camera. The kit includes a Lightbar Tilt Bracket that accepts shafts up to 8mm and 5/8" light stands. The 15" T-Bar offers ample room for movement of four flash units or a combination of flash units and a radio receiver to fill modifiers like the included umbrella. The white 60" umbrella has wide coverage, perfect for use with the Lightbar, and a removable black backing allows you to bounce light off it or shoot through it like a softbox.

The kit includes a Multi Shoe Umbrella Bracket that accepts shafts up to 8mm and 5/8" light stands. It has three shoes, and two of them are movable. The center shoe is ideal for a radio receiver or you can mount a third flash. A white umbrella with a removable black backing allows you to bounce light or shoot through it like a softbox.

OVERVIEW: The 100W/120V JDD Lamp from Impact is mostly used by photo studios as a modeling lamp for their photographic lights, and in order to see where the light falls onto a subject. Department stores will also use this type of lamp to illuminate showcases or store displays. The universal E26 / E27 Edison medium screw base fits most monolight strobes and fixtures that accept the standard Edison base.The double envelope T10 design is made to protect the actual lighting element of the bulb from contaminates. Such as hand oil residue; which can cause a bulb to overheat and explode. The frosted glass exterior provides a softer glow; distributing an even and pleasing light onto the subject. The color temperature of the lamp is 2,900K with an approximate lumens output of 1,200, and the average estimated life of the lamp is 2,000 hours.

OVERVIEW: Ideal for portraiture, the Octa Mask for EBO-0699 On-Camera Softbox from Impact creates octagonal-shaped catchlight reflections in a subject's eyes that are more natural-looking than those from a rectangular softbox. The mask quickly attaches to the softbox via touch-fasteners and can be used with or without its diffusers.

OVERVIEW: This set of three black Impact Casters for Light Stands with 25mm Tubular Leg Ends is designed to add functionality to any standard light stand with tubular 25mm diameter leg endings. They mount easily with a simple twist of the wing nuts, without tools. These casters are not designed to work with C-stands; the angle of the casters will not match up with those of C-stands.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this FF-S4 Three Light Daylight Softbox Light Kit to offer photographers and videographers a core lighting kit for products, portraiture or E-commerce. The kit includes three four-socket fluorescent fixtures each with 32W daylight balanced lamps, and three air cushioned light stands. A 24" Octa Softbox as well as 20 x 20" and a 20 x 27.5" softboxes are also provided. It all fits in the included kit case.

A 24" Octa Softbox as well as 20 x 20" and a 20 x 27.5" softboxes are also provided. It all fits in the included kit case.

OVERVIEW: Use your speedlights for a more traditional lighting approach with this Impact Dual Speedlight Modifier Kit from B&H. At the core of the kit is a Speed Ring capable of holding two flashes along with radio receivers for mounting more advanced modifiers. By using two flashes in a single rotatable speed ring, users will be able to double their light output and ensure a more even spread throughout the modifier, such as the 36" Luxbanx Small Octagonal Softbox included here. The softbox features a white interior as well as a removable front diffuser and inner baffle that will dramatically soften light output. The kit also includes a 40-degree fabric grid for the softbox that can be used to control spill light and narrow the beam spread. Additionally, an air-cushioned light stand is included to support the lighting system.

OVERVIEW: Upgrade your on-camera speedlight to a large, off-camera light source with this Impact Umbrella Flash Kit from B&H. It features a 45" convertible umbrella, an umbrella back with adjustable shoe and an air-cushioned light stand to get everything set up. The umbrella is extremely versatile as it offers a white satin fabric that can be used for shoot-through diffusion or a removable black backing to change it to bounce lighting.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this Impact Triple-Flash Hot Shoe Adapter Kit to give photographers the opportunity to create a 3-light setup from their shoe-mount flashes for triple the power. The kit comes with an FA-300HS Triple-Flash Hot Shoe Adapter Mount and a tilting, swiveling Umbrella Mount. The Umbrella Mount has a 5/8" receiver for a light stand and a large handle for tilting as well as an umbrella receptacle. With the Triple Mount fixed to the Umbrella Mount, you can support up to three shoe-mount flashes.

With the Triple Mount fixed to the Umbrella Mount, you can support up to three shoe-mount flashes.

OVERVIEW: The Small C-Clamp and Metal Spring Clamp Kit from B&H is a valuable asset at any set or studio for everything from hanging light fixtures to securing reflector board. The kit contains a metal Impact Small C-Clamp with 5/8" baby pin, as well as two inch and one inch Bessey Spring Clamps with vinyl tips and handles.

The kit contains a metal Impact Small C-Clamp with 5/8" baby pin, as well as two inch and one inch Bessey Spring Clamps with vinyl tips and handles.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Heavy-Duty Light Stand is a black anodized aluminum support that rises to a height of 13' and folds down to 46.5" for storage and transport. The stand will handle up to 10 lb and is topped with a removable, reversible 5/8" spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threads. It has a wide footprint of 52" for greater stability.

OVERVIEW: This Impact Air-Cushioned Heavy-Duty Light Stand is a black anodized aluminum support that rises to a height of 13' and folds down to 46.5" for storage and transport. The stand will handle up to 15 lb and is topped with a removable, reversible 5/8" spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threads. It has a wide footprint of 52" for greater stability. Air cushioning gently lowers the light when making height adjustments to protect equipment and fingers.

Air cushioning gently lowers the light when making height adjustments to protect equipment and fingers.

OVERVIEW: This two-handle 42" 5-1 Circular Collapsible Reflector with Handles from Impact adds a polished-looking quality of light to your photos or videos. The reflector is built around a translucent disc which doesn't reflect as much as the solid white surface, but does exhibit soft neutral reflection. Its primary purpose, however, is as a diffuser that will tame contrast by being held over a subject's head in the harsh noon-day sun. The disc can also be used in situations where you'd use a softbox. Using a disc holder or one of the 3/8" sockets, place your flash or constant light behind the suspended disc for soft, flattering light with open shadows.The 5-in-1 reflector has handy convenience features that make it easy to use and deliver impressive results, while saving space by folding down to approximately one third of its open size. Impact's smart design provides ergonomic handgrips that allow you to hold the disc in a flat or U-shaped position, or in any way that gets the job done. Each of the grips has additional 3/8"-16 threaded sockets for attachment to accessories or grip equipment. The 5-in-1 Reflector comes with a carry/storage case.The surfaces are available on two removable, reversible sleeves that slip over the disc. Silver offers very high reflective qualities that render a snappy high-contrast look with a cool color bias. Just the opposite, the Gold surface reflects a very warm quality; similar to late afternoon or sunset light. The Black fabric subtracts light from the subject, and can be used to block out unwanted light or to greatly reduce reflections on shiny or reflective surfaces. Finally, the flat White surface provides neutral reflectance with a soft quality of light.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: This Impact Heavy-Duty Air-Cushioned Light Stand is a black anodized aluminum support that rises to a height of 9.5' and folds down to 42" for storage and transport. The stand will handle up to 22 lb and is topped with a removable 5/8" spigot with 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threads. It has a wide footprint of 52" for greater stability. Air cushioning gently lowers the light when making height adjustments to protect equipment and fingers.

Using a disc holder or one of the 3/8" sockets, place your flash or constant light behind the suspended disc for soft, flattering light with open shadows.The 5-in-1 reflector has handy convenience features that make it easy to use and deliver impressive results, while saving space by folding down to approximately one third of its open size. Impact's smart design provides ergonomic handgrips that allow you to hold the disc in a flat or U-shaped position, or in any way that gets the job done. Each of the grips has additional 3/8"-16 threaded sockets for attachment to accessories or grip equipment. The 5-in-1 Reflector comes with a carry/storage case.The surfaces are available on two removable, reversible sleeves that slip over the disc. Silver offers very high reflective qualities that render a snappy high-contrast look with a cool color bias. Just the opposite, the Gold surface reflects a very warm quality; similar to late afternoon or sunset light. The Black fabric subtracts light from the subject, and can be used to block out unwanted light or to greatly reduce reflections on shiny or reflective surfaces. Finally, the flat White surface provides neutral reflectance with a soft quality of light.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This two-handle 32" 5-1 Circular Collapsible Reflector with Handles from Impact adds a polished-looking quality of light to your photos or videos. The reflector is built around a translucent disc which doesn't reflect as much as the solid white surface, but does exhibit soft neutral reflection. Its primary purpose, however, is as a diffuser that will tame contrast by being held over a subject's head in the harsh noon-day sun. The disc can also be used in situations where you'd use a softbox. Using a disc holder or one of the 3/8" sockets, place your flash or constant light behind the suspended disc for soft, flattering light with open shadows.

The 5-in-1 reflector has handy convenience features that make it easy to use and deliver impressive results, while saving space by folding down to approximately one third of its open size. Impact's smart design provides ergonomic handgrips that allow you to hold the disc in a flat or U-shaped position, or in any way that gets the job done. Each of the grips has additional 3/8"-16 threaded sockets for attachment to accessories or grip equipment. The 5-in-1 Reflector comes with a carry/storage case.

The surfaces are available on two removable, reversible sleeves that slip over the disc. Silver offers very high reflective qualities that render a snappy high-contrast look with a cool color bias. Just the opposite, the Gold surface reflects a very warm quality; similar to late afternoon or sunset light. The Black fabric subtracts light from the subject, and can be used to block out unwanted light or to greatly reduce reflections on shiny or reflective surfaces. Finally, the flat White surface provides neutral reflectance with a soft quality of light.

OVERVIEW: Part of the Varidrive system for easy raising and lowering of seamless paper, the Varidrive with Silver Metal Chain from Impact has adjustable inserts that tightly grip each side of the various sized seamless paper rolls. The Varidrive is then inserted into hooks like the IMME122, IMME123 or the three hook IMVPDH3W. With the exception of IMME122 which fits in a Super Clamp, the other hook sets are bolted onto the wall.You can load three rolls for example, onto the IMVPDH3W. Each roll requires a Varidrive kit. The Varidrive can handle seamless rolls measuring up to 12' wide and weighing up to 42 lb. To strengthen large coreless rolls and prevent bowing, Cross Poles (IMVPC5) are available.

OVERVIEW: The Impact Octacool-6 Fluorescent 2-Light Kit with Softboxes and Bag was put together by B&H for photographers and videographers who want the unique quality of light provided by octagonal softboxes in the studio or on the road. The kit contains two Octacool light fixtures, each with a removable reflector and six 32W fluorescent lamps. Two 29.5" octagonal softboxes provide flattering light and natural looking catchlights and it all fits in the included wheeled kit case.

OVERVIEW: A useful and versatile addition to any lighting kit, the Deluxe Umbrella Mount with Adjustable Shoe from Impact is designed to maximize the utility small lights or shoe-mount flashes while the heavy-duty mount has a socket that can support umbrellas up to 60" in diameter.Able to tilt 180-degrees and swivel 360-degrees, the anodized black aluminum Umbrella Mount can be installed on any industry-standard light stand with a 5/8" top stud from either end of the mount. Additional 5/8" holes are tapped into to unit to allow you to mount it vertically or horizontally for maximum versatility. The Deluxe Umbrella Mount includes removable 3/8"-16 and 1/4"-20 brass stud adapters to support accessories. One of them, for example, fastens a cold shoe with a knurled locking knob for a secure connection to your flash.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: Offering versatility and a wide range of mounting options, the  Impact 20" Pivot Arm with Super Clamp Kit was put together by B&H to provide photographers and videographers with a space-saving alternative to a light stand, with an extensive variety of adjustments. The kit includes one Pivot Arm with a locking wheel and two 5/8" pins. The included Super Clamp has a ratcheting handle for tightening in close quarters and a removable 5/8" hex pin with 1/4"-20 male threads. It also comes with a wedge for better grip on flat surfaces.

OVERVIEW:
The Impact Background Support System White Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers and videographers a portable setup for the image making in studio or the field. The kit is comprised of a 12' crossbar and two 10.5' stands to support it. A 10 x 12' white muslin background is included for neutral color and a pleasant high-key look. The background has a looped hem for the crossbar.

The kit also includes two READY COOL fluorescent fixtures. Each comes with two daylight-balanced 55W lamps and a 10' air-cushioned light stand to support it.

OVERVIEW:
The HPC-A30 Closed-Back Studio Monitor Headphones from Polsen are designed for monitoring audio in studio, field, mobile, and DJ applications. They feature 50mm drivers that provide a frequency response of 18Hz to 22kHz for accurate reproduction of your audio. 
The ear cups on the HPC-A30 have an around-ear (circumaural), closed-back design, allowing for the increased isolation often desired while tracking or monitoring playback. Additionally, the ear cups can be pivoted for single-ear monitoring. The headphones have a collapsible folding mechanism for compact storage and transport. A padded and adjustable headband provides comfort during extended use. The 32 ohm impedance allows for ample volume when used with mobile devices. The headphones have a single-sided, 9.8-foot cable that terminates in a 3.5mm stereo connector. A 1/4" adapter is included for additional compatibility.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The HPC-A30 Closed-Back Studio Monitor Headphones from Polsen are designed for monitoring audio in studio, field, mobile, and DJ applications. They feature 50mm drivers that provide a frequency response of 18Hz to 22kHz for accurate reproduction of your audio.

The ear cups on the HPC-A30 have an around-ear (circumaural), closed-back design, allowing for the increased isolation often desired while tracking or monitoring playback. Additionally, the ear cups can be pivoted for single-ear monitoring. The headphones have a collapsible folding mechanism for compact storage and transport. A padded and adjustable headband provides comfort during extended use. The 32 ohm impedance allows for ample volume when used with mobile devices. The headphones have a single-sided, 9.8-foot cable that terminates in a 3.5mm stereo connector. A 1/4" adapter is included for additional compatibility.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen OLM-10 Omnidirectional Lavalier Microphone is an all-in-one solution for recording hands-free audio to both channels of your camcorder or DSLR, as well as most devices with a 3.5mm mic-level input that cannot supply phantom power. It is a self-powered clip-on electret condenser mic designed for accurate voice reproduction in home and video webcasting applications such as presentations, interviews, dictation, and corporate video. The microphone's small, 21-mm long lightweight body allows for discrete placement with the included tie-clip while its 20-foot long cable gives you ample distance from your recording device. 
 Featuring a 3.5mm dual-mono TRS output connector, the mic sends audio to both the left and right channels of your recorder. Thanks to its omnidirectional polar pattern, the OLM-10 provides a uniform response that will not cause the bass-boosting proximity effect common with cardioid patterns, while allowing you to move freely without off-axis rejection causing a drop in volume. The in-line power switch allows you to quickly mute the microphone as well as preserve battery life when not in use. A windscreen for reduced noise and plosives, 1/4" adapter, and LR44 battery are included.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

It is a self-powered clip-on electret condenser mic designed for accurate voice reproduction in home and video webcasting applications such as presentations, interviews, dictation, and corporate video. Featuring a 3.5mm dual-mono TRS output connector, the mic sends audio to both the left and right channels of your recorder. Thanks to its omnidirectional polar pattern, the OLM-10 provides a uniform response that will not cause the bass-boosting proximity effect common with cardioid patterns, while allowing you to move freely without off-axis rejection causing a drop in volume. The in-line power switch allows you to quickly mute the microphone as well as preserve battery life when not in use. A windscreen for reduced noise and plosives, 1/4" adapter, and LR44 battery are included.

OVERVIEW:
The  ULW-16-HL from Polsen is a 16-channel UHF camera-mountable wireless system with a handheld microphone transmitter for capturing audio. It can be used in various environments for applications such as broadcast TV, live stage, ENG (electronic news gathering), public speaking, and more. It features an impressive 102 dB signal-to-noise ratio and can deliver pristine audio over a 100' distance with a simple to use interface.

The ULW-16-HL receiver has other features such as LED indicators and LCD displays to visually monitor channels and RF signals. It is built with a headphone jack that has a separate volume control, which allows you to monitor the audio signal. This receiver is powered by two AA alkaline or rechargeable batteries and can be easily accessed from the front panel of the unit. It will run approximately 8 hours on a fully charged battery.

The all-metal Polsen transmitter is built rugged and is designed to endure the rigors of the road. It features a dynamic handheld capsule with a cardioid polar pattern. The frequency response is 60 Hz to 18 kHz. The channel selector button makes it easy to switch between the unit's 16 selectable UHF channels. The dual-purpose integrated foam windscreen under the mic grille minimizes vocal pops and wind noise, but also protects the mic capsule from moisture.

The ULW-16-HL camera-mountable system comes with all accessories needed to get you operating, such as a 1/8" to XLRM line output cable, 1/8 to 1/8" cable for camera-level inputs, a shoe mount, four AA batteries, and a protective carrying case.

OVERVIEW:
The SBP-10 5-Section 10' Telescoping Aluminum Boompole from Polsen features 5 telescoping sections that can provide 2.8' to 10.5' of extension for your shotgun microphone. It is designed to allow you to get your microphone as close as possible to the source while still remaining off camera. When not in use, the pole can be collapsed to 2.5' for compact storage.
The boompole has a 3/8" thread, and a 5/8" adapter is included to provide compatibility with a broad range of mounts. It is constructed from lightweight aluminum and features a padded neoprene handle for maximum comfort in the field. The 5 telescoping sections have quick twist locks for stability. The SBP-10 provides wire management in the form of touch-tab straps. The pole's threaded bottom cap can be removed to allow access to a cable pass-through for installing your own cable.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen MO-PL1 is an omnidirectional lavalier microphone that delivers high-quality audio for mobile devices. The microphone's sensitivity has been optimized for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch devices, thus providing proper signal levels, resulting in a significant improvement in the audio quality of your recordings. The MO-PL1 is also impedance matched to ensure compatibility with your mobile device. The mic enables the voice to be "up front" even when recording video from a distance. The included tie clip discreetly hides the microphone and provides hands-free simplicity during presentations or interviews. 

Easy to use with no batteries or power supply needed, the MO-PL1 works with many audio and video recording apps to capture clear and natural sound for lectures, dictations, and online videos. The omnidirectional polar pattern provides excellent off-axis response even if the subject's head turns while speaking. The 12-foot cable provides the flexibility of getting longer-distance camera shots with up-close audio. The MO-PL1 is an excellent tool for recording professional-quality sound on mobile devices.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen HDR-10 is a handheld omnidirectional dynamic microphone that uniformly captures sound on- or off-axis. This makes it ideal for audio and video applications like ENG and interviews, because it can pick up sound in a 360° pattern. The frequency response is tailored for speech, resulting in a natural
sound with clear dialogue intelligibility. 


The capsule is isolated in rubber to reduce handling noise, and the integrated metal mesh windscreen and included foam windscreen lower wind noise and plosive sounds. The body of the microphone is constructed from cast aluminum alloy to provide durability and a professional appearance.

This makes it ideal for audio and video applications like ENG and interviews, because it can pick up sound in a 360° pattern. The frequency response is tailored for speech, resulting in a natural sound with clear dialogue intelligibility.

The capsule is isolated in rubber to reduce handling noise, and the integrated metal mesh windscreen and included foam windscreen lower wind noise and plosive sounds. The body of the microphone is constructed from cast aluminum alloy to provide durability and a professional appearance.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen SCL-1075 is a camera mount condenser shotgun microphone that allows you to capture clear, natural audio with your DSLR or camcorder. 



The SCL-1075 attaches to your camera's shoe mount or to a boom pole and plugs into the camera's audio input jack. A switch allows you to change between normal (cardioid) and tele (supercardioid) modes, giving the microphone a wider or a more directional polar pattern to optimize the sound capture for different environments. 

Designed to reject ambient noise and focus on the subject in front of the microphone, the SCL-1075 is perfect for "run-and-gun" productions like recording interviews and events indoors and in the field.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

A switch allows you to change between normal (cardioid) and tele (supercardioid) modes, giving the microphone a wider or a more directional polar pattern to optimize the sound capture for different environments.

Designed to reject ambient noise and focus on the subject in front of the microphone, the SCL-1075 is perfect for "run-and-gun" productions like recording interviews and events indoors and in the field.

OVERVIEW: The Polsen CAM-2WC is a 2-channel wireless microphone system that is designed for hands-free mobility in a wide variety of applications including video production, electronic news gathering (ENG), electronic field productions (EFP), and classroom and presentation applications. It is a reliable, easy-to-use solution for wireless sound transmission. The CAM-2WC includes a cardioid microphone (PL-2WC), which is ideal for video applications where background noise can be problematic such as trade show floors or sporting events. It is also good for live presentation applications, such as lectures, since cardioid microphones are less susceptible to feedback. The CAM-2WC system was designed with two switchable frequencies to avoid interference while operating at a range of up to 100 feet (300 feet in optimal conditions). A durable and flexible antenna that can be positioned for the best possible reception is included. Audio can be monitored in real time with the included earphone. A tie clip for wardrobe placement and a windscreen that reduces wind noise and vocal plosives are also included. The CAM-2WC system is a compander-free system for delivering high-quality audio. In most wireless systems, the audio signal is compressed in the transmitter and then expanded in the receiver causing undesirable artifacts such as pumping and breathing. Compander-free systems don't exhibit these artifacts making them a favored solution among filmmakers around the world.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The CAM-2WC system was designed with two switchable frequencies to avoid interference while operating at a range of up to 100 feet (300 feet in optimal conditions).

A durable and flexible antenna that can be positioned for the best possible reception is included. Audio can be monitored in real time with the included earphone. A tie clip for wardrobe placement and a windscreen that reduces wind noise and vocal plosives are also included.

The CAM-2WC system is a compander-free system for delivering high-quality audio. In most wireless systems, the audio signal is compressed in the transmitter and then expanded in the receiver causing undesirable artifacts such as pumping and breathing. Compander-free systems don't exhibit these artifacts making them a favored solution among filmmakers around the world.

Featuring an omnidirectional polar pattern, the PL-2W lavalier is ideal for a variety of applications including video production, electronic news gathering (ENG), electronic field productions (EFP), and classroom and presentation applications. Because omnidirectional microphones are less susceptible to wind noise and vocal plosives (pops) than cardioid microphones, the PL-2W is suitable for indoor or outdoor use. The PL-2W provides flexible placement options and allows for head movement without affecting the sound. 

The PL-2W comes packaged with a tie clip for securing the mic to the talent's clothing, as well as a windscreen for further reducing wind noise and vocal plosives.

This three-pack of HPC-A30 Closed-Back Studio Monitor Headphones from Polsen are designed for monitoring audio in studio, field, mobile, and DJ applications. They feature 50mm drivers that provide a frequency response of 18Hz to 22kHz for accurate reproduction of your audio. 


The ear cups on the HPC-A30 have an around-ear (circumaural), closed-back design, allowing for the increased isolation often desired while tracking or monitoring playback. Additionally, the ear cups can be pivoted for single-ear monitoring.

It is designed to provide convenient storage and charging for the ULW-16T transmitter and ULW-16R body-pack receiver components of the ULW-16 Wireless System. This charging station saves time since the batteries do not need to be removed from the transmitter or receiver in order to recharge them.

OVERVIEW:
The HPA-4X2 4-Channel Stereo Reference Headphone Amplifier from Polsen features a durable and compact design and can be used for a variety of professional and project applications including studio recording and stage monitoring, or any application that requires multiple headphone connections. Each of its four channels features independent volume control in the form of a volume knob as well as independent amp circuits, allowing for a wide frequency response of 20 Hz to 20 kHz and low distortion at high volumes, while assuring no signal loss when all 4 headphone outputs are used simultaneously. Thanks to its Link feature, you can daisy chain multiple HPA-4X2s together to cater to your needed headphone count.

The unit features a 1/4" stereo TRS input, and stereo RCA inputs. It mono button allows for mono signal compatibility. For its headphone outputs, it features four 1/4" TRS connectors. To assure compatibility with a variety of headphones, Polsen includes four 1/8" to 1/4" adapters as well as a stereo mini cable that, when used with one of the included adapters, allows you to connect a device with a 1/8" output.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen VM-101 is a compact and sturdy directional condenser microphone that delivers high-quality sound to a DSLR camera, camcorder, or audio recorder. It features an integrated shock mount that can be mounted on a camera or boompole, and is ideal for interviews, ENG and more. 

Unlike omni-directional microphones built into most cameras and recorders, the high-quality, directional condenser capsule of the VM-101 will decrease ambient noise while recording sound with greater clarity. The built-in windscreen will also minimize noise caused by moving air. Solid ABS construction and integrated shock mount assure that sudden movements will not detract from the recording. 

The VM-101 includes a foam windscreen and simulated fur wind cover that helps to decrease vocal plosives and wind noise when recording dialog. With additional features like an integrated shoe mount adapter, a threaded socket for boom pole attachment, and an included carry pouch, the VM-101 is an ideal tool for a variety of recording projects whether at home or on the go.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen PL-5 is a replacement microphone for Polsen's ULW-16 wireless system. It is also compatible with other wireless transmitters with a standard 1/8" microphone input, or devices that have a 1/8" (3.5 mm) input with plug-in power. 

Featuring an omnidirectional polar pattern, the PL-5 is optimized to accurately capture speech. It provides clear and natural sound ideal for ENG, EFP, and DSLR video applications. Because omnidirectional microphones are less susceptible to wind noise and vocal plosives (pops) than cardioid microphones, the PL-5 is suitable for indoor or outdoor use.

The miniature 0.14" head diameter offers a variety of options for discreet microphone placement, allowing the PL-5 to be easily concealed on wardrobe or costumes without sacrificing sound quality. The PL-5 comes packaged with a tie clip for securing the mic to the talent's clothing, as well as a windscreen for further reducing wind noise and vocal plosives.

Designed for recording interviews, the  OLM-20 Dual Omnidirectional Lavalier Microphone from Polsen is comprised of two of the well-received OLM-10 omnidirectional lavalier microphones. It terminates in a single 1/8" stereo connector, with each microphone recording to a discrete channel on your DSLR, camcorder, or audio recorder with a microphone input. Not limited to just interview applications, the OLM-20 can be used for presentations, podcasts, webcasts, or any situation where more than one subject needs to be recorded. 
The OLM-20's dual electret condenser capsules are designed to deliver clear and natural sound, with their omnidirectional polar pattern providing off-axis response, even if the subject turns their head while talking. Both mics offer low sensitivity to wind and handling noise, as well as vocal plosives. 
Thanks to its battery-operated design, the OLM-20 can be used with any camera or recorder that supports a 1/8" stereo mic level input, without the need for additional equipment or adapters. Each microphone records to a discrete channel, and the microphones themselves are labeled left and right. Its 13.5' cable provides 10' of distance between each microphone for comfortable placement, while the included tie clips allow for hands-free use.

OVERVIEW:
Providing both voice amplification and MP3 playback in a handheld, portable package, the MP-25 25W Megaphone with Siren, MP3 Player and Detachable Microphone from Polsen is capable of over 1,500 yards of audible range, making it ideal for use in high-noise areas and large open spaces. Featuring both a handheld microphone with a coiled cable as well as a built-in microphone, the MP-25 can be used in scenarios where you need to face a different direction than the megaphone, as well as one-handed applications.

Thanks to its built-in MP3 player, which can play files from either a USB flash drive or SD memory card, the MP-25 can be used to play music, or pre-recorded messages. Additionally, a 3.5mm auxiliary input allows you to connect a smart phone or MP3 player directly to the MP-25. Whether using the MP3 player or auxiliary input, the megaphone's microphone still functions, allowing you to talk over your music or message as needed.

The MP-25 features sturdy ABS construction, allowing for use both indoors and out, and can be carried with the included shoulder strap. Eight C-size batteries (not included) provide up to 5 hours of use.

OVERVIEW:
Giving journalists, podcasters, and musicians the ability to record high-quality audio on their mobile device in the studio or the field, the  HH-IC Handheld Condenser Microphone for iOS and Android Devices from Polsen is designed to plug directly into the 1/8" input jack of your iOS or Android device. Its built-in 1/8" headphone jack provides real-time monitoring and playback from your device. 
The microphone's 16mm back electret capsule is designed to provide improved audio quality compared to that of your device's built-in microphone. Its cardioid polar pattern provides a high level of off-axis rejection, optimizing it for use recording speech as well as instruments and vocals. Its 6' long cable provides you plenty of length for placing your device, while the included mic clip and desktop stand allows you to use the HH-IC hands-free.

OVERVIEW:
Providing professional-sounding audio to your DSLR, video camera, or audio recorder, the VM-180M DSLR/Video Microphone from Polsen is a compact condenser microphone with a selectable cardioid or supercardioid polar pattern that connects to your recording device of choice with its 8" long, 3.5mm mini-plug cable. A 3.5mm microphone input provides additional flexibility and miking options while only sending one connection to your recording device. 
The microphone input allows you to connect a second microphone (not included) to your set up without the need for a mixer or summing device. This additional functionality provides you with a wide range of recording options, including adding a lavalier microphone for close up recording of a subject while the VM-180M handles ambient tracking duties. With a 2 mic set up, each channel of audio is routed to a discrete channel (right or left) upon reaching your recording device. 
You can easily monitor your audio via the microphone's built-in 3.5mm headphone output, so you always know exactly what is being sent to your recorder. Its integrated shockmount helps prevent the microphone from picking up handling noise, and its shoe mount with 1/4"-20 socket allows you to attach it to your camera or mount it on a boom pole. A selectable low-cut filter at 300 Hz helps eliminate low rumble and wind noise that can plague many location recordings, while the selectable 10 dB boost is ideal for use when trying to capture quieter subjects.
 A foam windscreen is included to help eliminate wind noise from your recordings. The mic is powered by a single AA battery (included) for up to 100 hours.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
Designed to provide a variety of recording options for your iOS device, the IAI-500 iOS Audio Interface from Polsen features an XLR input with selectable phantom power and adjustable input level, as well as a 1/4" instrument input for DI recording of your guitar or bass. It connects to your iOS device directly via its 1/8" input, allowing it to work with a variety of recording apps. 
The IAI-500 has a 1/8" headphone output that allows you to monitor your audio in real time while recording with a compatible app. It is powered by 2x AA batteries (not included) for portability.

OVERVIEW:
The ULW-16-HHT from Polsen is an all-metal, 16-channel UHF wireless dynamic handheld transmitter for capturing audio. It can be used in various environments when paired with the Polsen ULW-16 receiver for applications such as broadcast TV, live stage, public speaking, and more. The transmitter capsule is offered in a cardioid polar pattern, which is ideal when background noise needs to be minimized. 
The ULW-16-HHT transmitter has several features such as 102 dB signal-to-noise ratio and a wide frequency response of 60 Hz to 18 kHz. It is built with a channel selector button and allows you to switch between the units 16 UHF channels. The dual-purpose integrated foam windscreen is designed to minimize vocal pops and wind noise but also to protect the mic capsule from moisture. Heavy-duty metal construction assures the ULW-16-HHT can withstand the rigors of transportation and field recording.

The handheld transmitter is powered by two AA alkaline or rechargeable batteries and can operate approximately 8 hours. The ULW-16-HHT operates between frequencies 584.400 to 602.450 MHz and has a transmitting distance of over 100'.

OVERVIEW:
Do you wish to use your iOS or Android smartphone for recording interviews, but can't due to its limited mic inputs? Then check out the Polsen 2-Person Smartphone Interview Kit from B&H. It consists of 2 Polsen MO-PL1 omnidirectional lavalier mics, a Rode SC6 dual TRRS input and headphone output adapter, and a pair of Polsen HPC-A30 closed-back studio monitor headphones. 
 The Polsen MO-PL1 lavalier mics are designed to provide optimal sensitivity and impedance for your iOS device, and are compatible with most Android devices as well. The omnidirectional polar pattern and clear sound quality are a significant improvement over the built-in mic in your smart device. Using the Rode SC6, you can connect both mics to your device simultaneously, while using its headphone output to monitor the interview with the included Polsen HPC-A30 headphones.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen UHF ENG Handheld and Lavalier Microphone Kit from B&H is intended for portable wireless operation and can be used in several environments for applications such as electronic new gathering (ENG), DSLR video, broadcast TV, houses of worship, classroom presentations, corporate boardrooms, and more. 

The kit includes a Polsen ULW-16-HHT 16-channel handheld wireless transmitter (584.400 to 602.450 MHz), a ULW-16 16-channel camera-mountable UHF wireless receiver, a ULW-16 wireless bodypack transmitter, and a PL-4 omnidirectional lavalier microphone with a 1/8" (3.5mm) connector. In addition, several accessories are also included such as a line to mic attenuator cable, a line-level output cable, a carrying case, and four AA alkaline batteries.

OVERVIEW: This B&H Kit consists of three pairs of Polsen HPC-A30 Closed-Back Circumaural Headphones as well as one Polsen HMA-41 4-Channel Stereo Headphone Amplifier. The headphone amplifier connects to your audio source via the back panel 1/4" stereo input and the three pairs of headphones connect to the amplifier via the amplifier's front panel 1/4" stereo outputs with the included 1/4" to 1/8" stereo adapters. The amplifier provides individual volume control sliders for each listener and the closed back design of the headphones is suitable for recording musicians who are tracking together or delivering audio at different levels to three different listeners.

OVERVIEW: The SDC-2150 from  Polsen is a small-diaphragm cardioid condenser microphone for capturing high-quality audio. It features an accurate and fast response to transient levels and can be used in several applications for recording acoustic instruments such as close-miking pianos, kick drums, cymbals, snares, and more. In addition, it can be used as a drum-overhead mic.Featuring a tailored frequency response, with slightly accentuated mid-highs, this microphone captures sound naturally and can handle high sound-pressure level (SPL) with no distortion. The solid-metal construction provides durability and will withstand use in the most demanding environments.The SDC-2150 Small-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone is versatile and includes a mic clip with a 5/8" threaded socket and a 3/8" adapter, which makes it suitable for mounting on a mic stand or a boompole.

OVERVIEW: The Polsen XLR-USB-48 is a compact and easy-to-use XLR to USB interface that allows users to connect an XLR microphone directly to a computer via the USB port. It’s an ideal tool for singer/songwriters, podcasters, or musicians who need a simple yet high-quality solution for recording with an XLR microphone directly to a laptop or desktop computer.Connecting the adapter to an XLR microphone and to your computer’s USB port is all that’s needed to start recording. Due to the plug-and-play capability, no drivers are needed, and the computer will instantly recognize the adapter allowing for quick and easy setup. The adapter features selectable phantom power for condenser microphones, and the 1/8” headphone output allows for input monitoring and playback.Polsen’s XLR-USB-48 is an all-in-one adapter that allows the musician or podcaster to set up quickly and record high-quality audio easily and affordably.

Connecting the adapter to an XLR microphone and to your computer’s USB port is all that’s needed to start recording. Due to the plug-and-play capability, no drivers are needed, and the computer will instantly recognize the adapter allowing for quick and easy setup. The adapter features selectable phantom power for condenser microphones, and the 1/8” headphone output allows for input monitoring and playback.

Polsen’s XLR-USB-48 is an all-in-one adapter that allows the musician or podcaster to set up quickly and record high-quality audio easily and affordably.

OVERVIEW: The Polsen GPMK-22 is an audio production kit that is made specifically for the GoPro HERO4, HERO3+, and HERO3 cameras. The kit includes a stereo microphone and a shotgun microphone, which attach to the GoPro when used with the Revo Quick-Release Frame (sold separately). These two microphones provide superior sound capturing capabilities compared to the omnidirectional microphones built into GoPros. They offer numerous creative options for delivering superb audio to any production.The supercardioid shotgun microphone is optimized to focus on the sound directly in front of it while rejecting off-axis sound. This provides great clarity and focus when recording dialog or voices. The stereo microphone features two condenser capsules arranged in an X/Y pattern. Ideal for recording live action, dialog, or soundscapes, it delivers wide sonic imaging and a natural stereo sound. For extra control when capturing a quiet or distant subject, or when recording in a high-noise environment, this microphone includes a high/low gain sensitivity selector to further ensure proper recording levels for professional-quality sound.No external power or batteries are necessary for operation. Both microphones are powered by the GoPro camera via the Mini-USB cable. The production kit includes an adjustable bracket that easily attaches directly to the three-prong GoPro mount. These lightweight and compact microphones will not weigh down your setup or extend out into the picture frame.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The supercardioid shotgun microphone is optimized to focus on the sound directly in front of it while rejecting off-axis sound. This provides great clarity and focus when recording dialog or voices. For extra control when capturing a quiet or distant subject, or when recording in a high-noise environment, this microphone includes a high/low gain sensitivity selector to further ensure proper recording levels for professional-quality sound.

No external power or batteries are necessary for operation. Both microphones are powered by the GoPro camera via the Mini-USB cable. The production kit includes an adjustable bracket that easily attaches directly to the three-prong GoPro mount. These lightweight and compact microphones will not weigh down your setup or extend out into the picture frame.

OVERVIEW:
The HPD-I50 Drum Isolation Headphones from Polsen feature 50mm neodymium drivers in a closed-back design. They employ a tight over-the-ear seal that significantly reduces outside ambient noise, provides protection against hearing loss, and allows drummers to clearly hear music, vocals, and click tracks. 

The headphones provide isolation from the drum kit and have a rugged build to withstand the rigors of repeated use. With features like the padded adjustable headband and thick earpads, the HPD-I50 headphones will offer comfort throughout the lengthy rehearsal, recording studio, and live-stage applications.

OVERVIEW:
The RC-77-U USB Retro Condenser Microphone from  Polsen is a large-diaphragm, cardioid USB microphone with a stylish eye-catching retro look that features a headphone output, a mute button, and has LED indicators to monitor the microphone's status. It can be used by singers, songwriters, and podcasters to capture high-quality audio directly to a Mac or Windows computer.

With a built-in USB port, the microphone needs no drivers, power supply, or audio interface to begin recording. Launch your DAW software, plug in the microphone, and you're ready to record. An integrated dual-stage grille minimizes pops and vocal plosives while protecting the capsule from corrosive moisture, and the cardioid polar pattern focuses the source in front of the mic to minimize off-axis sound, which is excellent for recording vocals.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen SMS-45A Mini Shotgun Stereo Condenser Microphone is a compact, lightweight, and durable stereo microphone designed for recording stereo audio directly into a DSLR camera, camcorder, or portable recorder. Engineered for videography, sound field recording and broadcast, the SMS-45A features two cardioid condenser capsules arranged in an X-Y pattern for capturing pristine audio with realistic stereo and spatial imaging. Its small frame makes it perfect for camera mount use.




The microphone is powered by one LR44 button cell battery (not included), or with plug-in power when used with cameras or portable recorders that provide it. A switchable high-pass filter helps reduce low-end rumble caused by handling and vibration. The mic comes with a rubber lined, isolated microphone holder that helps absorb vibration, and allows you to adjust the angle of the mic.


 

The SMS-45A can be used for any recording application requiring a boom pole, and it can also attach to a camera's shoe mount, making it a versatile and sturdy tool for a variety of field and studio recording projects. The mic also comes with a desktop mic stand, great for standalone tabletop microphone placement, a foam windscreen, and a travel pouch.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Polsen SMS-45A Mini Shotgun Stereo Condenser Microphone is a compact, lightweight, and durable stereo microphone designed for recording stereo audio directly into a DSLR camera, camcorder, or portable recorder. Engineered for videography, sound field recording and broadcast, the SMS-45A features two cardioid condenser capsules arranged in an X-Y pattern for capturing pristine audio with realistic stereo and spatial imaging. Its small frame makes it perfect for camera mount use.

The microphone is powered by one LR44 button cell battery (not included), or with plug-in power when used with cameras or portable recorders that provide it. A switchable high-pass filter helps reduce low-end rumble caused by handling and vibration. The mic comes with a rubber lined, isolated microphone holder that helps absorb vibration, and allows you to adjust the angle of the mic.

The SMS-45A can be used for any recording application requiring a boom pole, and it can also attach to a camera's shoe mount, making it a versatile and sturdy tool for a variety of field and studio recording projects. The mic also comes with a desktop mic stand, great for standalone tabletop microphone placement, a foam windscreen, and a travel pouch.

OVERVIEW: The Polsen ULW-16 is a 16-channel camera-mountable UHF wireless system designed to transmit audio up to 300'. It is engineered to be exceptionally quiet, and with many professional features like headphone monitoring, line input, and frequency agility, the ULW-16 is ideal for EFP (electronic field production), DSLR, and many other video applications. With its impressive 105 dB signal-to-noise ratio, the ULW-16 delivers pristine audio transmission for broadcast-quality recordings. It has 16 channels to choose from to help avoid interference. Up to five systems (or more in optimum conditions) can be used simultaneously in the same location.The transmitter features a variable-level control that adjusts the level of transmission. It’s also equipped with a line input that enables the transmission of devices such as an audio mixer. The receiver features an 1/8" line output and included XLR cable for professional cameras. It also includes a cable for DSLR and consumer camcorders that have a 1/8” mic input. A headphone jack and volume control allows you to monitor the transmission signal in real time at a comfortable volume. This ULW-16 system includes a PL-4 omnidirectional 0.20" lavalier microphone for flexible positioning options and excellent wind-noise rejection. The included windscreen can be used to reduce vocal plosives (pops) and wind noise.The system operates in the UHF 500 MHz bandwidth, assuring that it is “future proof” and meets current and known future FCC regulations.With features like easy-to-read LED indicators, front-panel access to batteries, and included accessories to support operation, Polsen’s ULW-16 is designed with the user in mind. Professionals and enthusiasts alike will benefit from its ease of operation, sensible ergonomics, and portability.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Polsen ULW-16 is a 16-channel camera-mountable UHF wireless system designed to transmit audio up to 300'. It is engineered to be exceptionally quiet, and with many professional features like headphone monitoring, line input, and frequency agility, the ULW-16 is ideal for EFP (electronic field production), DSLR, and many other video applications. 

With its impressive 105 dB signal-to-noise ratio, the ULW-16 delivers pristine audio transmission for broadcast-quality recordings. It has 16 channels to choose from to help avoid interference. Up to five systems (or more in optimum conditions) can be used simultaneously in the same location.

The transmitter features a variable-level control that adjusts the level of transmission. It’s also equipped with a line input that enables the transmission of devices such as an audio mixer. The receiver features an 1/8" line output and included XLR cable for professional cameras. It also includes a cable for DSLR and consumer camcorders that have a 1/8” mic input. A headphone jack and volume control allows you to monitor the transmission signal in real time at a comfortable volume. 

This ULW-16 system includes a PL-4 omnidirectional 0.20" lavalier microphone for flexible positioning options and excellent wind-noise rejection. The included windscreen can be used to reduce vocal plosives (pops) and wind noise.

The system operates in the UHF 500 MHz bandwidth, assuring that it is “future proof” and meets current and known future FCC regulations.

With features like easy-to-read LED indicators, front-panel access to batteries, and included accessories to support operation, Polsen’s ULW-16 is designed with the user in mind. Professionals and enthusiasts alike will benefit from its ease of operation, sensible ergonomics, and portability.

OVERVIEW:
The HPC-A30 Closed-Back Headphones and Handheld Condenser Microphone Kit from  B&H features Polsen HPC-A30 closed-back studio monitor headphones, a 1/4" adapter, a Polsen HH-IC handheld condenser microphone for iOS and Android devices, a mic clip, and a desktop mic stand. This kit can be utilized to capture audio directly into the 1/8" input jack of your iOS or Android smartphone or tablet device.

The headphones have a frequency response of 18 Hz to 22 kHz for accurate reproduction of audio and have an around-ear (circumaural) closed-back design. They have a collapsible mechanism for compact storage and transport, and the padded and adjustable headband provides comfort during extended use. In addition, the headphones have a single-sided, 9.8' cable that terminates in a 1/8" stereo connector and comes with a 1/4" adapter for additional compatibility.

The Polsen HH-IC microphone gives journalists, podcasters, and musicians the ability to record audio on their mobile smartphones. The mic has a built-in 1/8" headphone jack, which provides real-time monitoring and playback from your portable device or tablet. Featuring a cardioid polar pattern, the microphone is great for recording speech as well as instruments and vocals, and it has a high level of off-axis rejection.

OVERVIEW:
The  ULW-16-BT Beltpack Transmitter for the ULW-16 Wireless System from  Polsen is a replacement transmitter for Polsen's ULW-16 16-channel camera-mountable UHF wireless system. It's designed to transmit an audio signal to the ULW-16-BR transmitter more than 100 feet away. Engineered to be exceptionally quiet, and with many professional features like line input and frequency agility, the ULW-16-BT is ideal for EFP (electronic field production) and video applications for professionals and enthusiasts alike.

With its impressive 105 dB signal-to-noise ratio, the ULW-16-BT delivers pristine audio transmission for broadcast-quality recordings. It has 16 channels to choose from to help avoid interference. Up to five systems (or more in optimum conditions) can be used simultaneously in the same location.

The wireless transmitter features a volume control that adjusts the level of transmission. It is also equipped with a line input that enables instrument level devices to be plugged in without overload of the circuit.

The system operates in the UHF 500 MHz bandwidth assuring that it is "future proof" and meets current and known future FCC regulations. It will not be affected by the planned FCC auction of the 600 MHz band.

OVERVIEW: The Polsen HDR-10 Omnidirectional Handheld Dynamic Mic & Pouch Kit from B&H includes a Polsen HDR-10 handheld mic, a mic clip, a 5/8" thread and 3/8" reducer bushing, and an Auray zippered pouch for handheld microphones. The mic is tailored for speech and can be used for audio and video applications, such as ENG (Electronic News Gathering) and interviews.This mic can pick up sound in a 360° pattern and its capsule is isolated in rubber to reduce handling noise. It is built with an integrated metal mesh windscreen, and the foam windscreen lowers wind noise and plosive sounds.Furthermore, the Auray zippered case is a soft, protective microphone pouch that will fit most handheld microphones. It is made of tough 600D ballistic nylon, with soft 6mm foam padding and a faux fur interior lining. It is ideal for transport and storage.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Polsen HDR-10 Omnidirectional Handheld Dynamic Mic & Pouch Kit from B&H includes a Polsen HDR-10 handheld mic, a mic clip, a 5/8" thread and 3/8" reducer bushing, and an Auray zippered pouch for handheld microphones. The mic is tailored for speech and can be used for audio and video applications, such as ENG (Electronic News Gathering) and interviews.

This mic can pick up sound in a 360° pattern and its capsule is isolated in rubber to reduce handling noise. It is built with an integrated metal mesh windscreen, and the foam windscreen lowers wind noise and plosive sounds.

Furthermore, the Auray zippered case is a soft, protective microphone pouch that will fit most handheld microphones. It is made of tough 600D ballistic nylon, with soft 6mm foam padding and a faux fur interior lining. It is ideal for transport and storage.

OVERVIEW:
The Polsen HDR-10 ENG Interviewing Microphone with iOS Mic Preamp Kit from  B&H showcases a handheld omnidirectional dynamic microphone, an IK Multimedia iRig PRO Universal Audio and MIDI interface, an XLR microphone cable, a Duracell 9V alkaline battery, an Auray WMC-100 Wide Mouth microphone case, and an Auray Square Microphone Flag. In addition, the accessories include a foam windscreen, a microphone clip with 5/8" thread and 3/8" reducer bushing, a drawstring pouch, and downloadable software to get you up and running quickly.

Featuring a capsule that is isolated in rubber to reduce handling noise, the ENG mic has an integrated metal-mesh windscreen and a foam windscreen to lower wind noise and plosive sounds. It is constructed of a cast-aluminum alloy to provide durability and a professional appearance. The mic captures sound on -or off-axis, which makes it suitable for video applications.

Furthermore, the iRig PRO works with your Mac or compatible iOS device and features a single combination XLR/TS input and preamp that provides 48-volt phantom power for condenser mics. It has an input gain control knob to dial up just the right amount of gain to give your sound and tones the right amount of sparkle, thump, and headroom.

Finally, the HDR-10 ENG Interviewing Mic with iOS Mic Preamp Kit has everything you need to get up and running for your audio and video applications.

OVERVIEW: The Vello BG-C1 is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Canon EOS XS, XSi, and T1i digital SLR cameras. It accepts up to 2 LP-E5 batteries to effectively double the camera's battery life. The included AA battery holder allows you to use 6 AA batteries for added convenience (rechargeable batteries recommended). The BG-C1 offers an alternate shutter release button, aperture/exposure compensation button, AF point selection/magnify button, AE lock/FE lock/Index/reduce button, and main dial to facilitate shooting in a vertical orientation.

The BG-C1 offers an alternate shutter release button, aperture/exposure compensation button, AF point selection/magnify button, AE lock/FE lock/Index/reduce button, and main dial to facilitate shooting in a vertical orientation.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Batteries sold separately.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello BC-N1 Battery Chamber Cover is a replacement battery cover designed to work specifically with the Vello BG-N1 and BG-N8 Battery Grips. This cover clips onto the battery, keeping it securely in place. If the batteries are removed from the grip for charging, the cover keeps the grip clean and free of debris.

In addition to being compatible with the Vello battery grip, the BC-N1 can also be used with the Nikon MB-40 and MB-D10 multi-power battery packs for the ENG-EL4 and EN-EL4a batteries. When using the BC-N1 with the optional EN-EL4a battery, faster continuous shooting speeds of up to 8fps are possible.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Lens Mount Adapter - Nikon F Lens to Canon EOS Camera allows you to mount a Nikon F lens to a Canon EOS camera body. Besides for making financial sense, this allows you to use your favorite lens across different camera platforms. The lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Vello Lens Mount Adapter - Nikon F Lens to Canon EOS Camera allows you to mount a Nikon F lens to a Canon EOS camera body. Besides for making financial sense, this allows you to use your favorite lens across different camera platforms. The lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Although the lens will fit physically, autofocus, automatic diaphragm (AE metering), and other functions dependent on communication between camera body and lens will be disrupted by the lens adapter. You will need to focus manually, and to set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority (stop-down) mode. If the lens does not have a manual aperture collar, the aperture will be stopped down to its smallest f/stop. Focusing to infinity is retained.

It features optical-quality glass elements to achieve this. The adapter increases the focal length by 1.25x and reduces the lens aperture by 1 f/stop.

OVERVIEW:
The QuickDraw Rotating Flash Bracket from Vello positions your flash unit well above the camera body and can quickly and smoothly rotate the flash 90º as you switch from horizontal to vertical shooting. With the flash detached from the body you are less likely to get red-eye effect, and with the rotating mechanism the flash is always above the lens, eliminating side shadows and providing a balanced and effective illumination.
Five mounting holes on the camera platform allow for almost any camera to utilize the bracket. Choose the hole that best balances your camera and tighten it in place with the mounting knob. Attach the flash unit to the bracket's accessory shoe by loosening the red knob, inserting the flash into the accessory shoe and tightening. Connect your flash cable to the flash unit and wrap it around or secure it to the bracket arm and you are ready to shoot.
The flash arm rotates 180º with a smooth and easy flip for when you need to shoot vertical. The padded grip is a comfortable way to stabilize your camera when shooting and is strong enough to be used as a handle for the entire system when not shooting. 
The accessory shoe can be positioned in one of two locations or unscrewed and removed to accommodate the Nikon SC-28 and SC-29 or other off-camera shoe cords.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The QuickDraw Rotating Flash Bracket from Vello positions your flash unit well above the camera body and can quickly and smoothly rotate the flash 90º as you switch from horizontal to vertical shooting. With the flash detached from the body you are less likely to get red-eye effect, and with the rotating mechanism the flash is always above the lens, eliminating side shadows and providing a balanced and effective illumination.

Five mounting holes on the camera platform allow for almost any camera to utilize the bracket. Choose the hole that best balances your camera and tighten it in place with the mounting knob. Attach the flash unit to the bracket's accessory shoe by loosening the red knob, inserting the flash into the accessory shoe and tightening. Connect your flash cable to the flash unit and wrap it around or secure it to the bracket arm and you are ready to shoot.

The flash arm rotates 180º with a smooth and easy flip for when you need to shoot vertical. The padded grip is a comfortable way to stabilize your camera when shooting and is strong enough to be used as a handle for the entire system when not shooting. 

The accessory shoe can be positioned in one of two locations or unscrewed and removed to accommodate the Nikon SC-28 and SC-29 or other off-camera shoe cords.

OVERVIEW:
The Speedy Camera Rotating Flash Bracket from Vello is a quick, simple way to switch between vertical and horizontal view with your camera using a shoe mount flash, without missing a shot or changing the look of your light. The Speedy Bracket smoothly rotates your camera, easily switching between horizontal and vertical positions, while keeping your flash stationary and centered above the lens at all times. It will rotate any camera with a height of up to 5.75". It is designed so that you can use your camera's own grip to shoot photos. The Speedy Bracket's cushioned bracket arm can also double as a comfortable carrying handle.
The cold shoe can be positioned in multiple locations or removed altogether, to better accommodate Nikon SC-28 & SC-29 and other similar off-camera shoe cords.

The Speedy Bracket's cushioned bracket arm can also double as a comfortable carrying handle.

The cold shoe can be positioned in multiple locations or removed altogether, to better accommodate Nikon SC-28 & SC-29 and other similar off-camera shoe cords.

OVERVIEW: The Vello CB-600 Straight Flash Bracket is a durable horizontal flash bracket that provides an additional shoe and 1/4"-20 screw that allow you to mount accessories such as lights, microphones, remote control, etc. alongside your camera. It has a 1/4"-20 screw to attach the bracket to the camera, a 1/4" socket to mount the bracket on a tripod, and a 1/4"-20 male screw with a shoe on top to attach a flash, LED light, microphone or any other shoe mount accessory. You can remove the top shoe to mount any accessory with a 1/4" socket. The camera mounting screw has a 3" adjustable rail, and the top of the bracket has a rubber surface to keep the camera from slipping.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Vello CB-600 Straight Flash Bracket is a durable horizontal flash bracket that provides an additional shoe and 1/4"-20 screw that allow you to mount accessories such as lights, microphones, remote control, etc. alongside your camera. It has a 1/4"-20 screw to attach the bracket to the camera, a 1/4" socket to mount the bracket on a tripod, and a 1/4"-20 male screw with a shoe on top to attach a flash, LED light, microphone or any other shoe mount accessory. You can remove the top shoe to mount any accessory with a 1/4" socket. The camera mounting screw has a 3" adjustable rail, and the top of the bracket has a rubber surface to keep the camera from slipping.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Universal Accessory Shoe Mount With 1/4" Screw and Knob is a convenient, adjustable cold shoe that's designed to provide a secure fit for a wide variety of proprietary accessory shoes. A low-profile 1/4" screw with a low-profile knob is included for use with flash brackets.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Vello Universal Accessory Shoe Mount With 1/4" Screw and Knob is a convenient, adjustable cold shoe that's designed to provide a secure fit for a wide variety of proprietary accessory shoes. A low-profile 1/4" screw with a low-profile knob is included for use with flash brackets.

OVERVIEW:
The Universal Accessory Shoe Mount from Vello is a convenient and adjustable cold-shoe mount. Small and useful - this shoe provides a secure mounting option for virtually any type of shoe-mounted device - radio slaves, speedlights, light meters, etc. 
 Belying its true capabilities, this seemingly innocuous accessory part will lie harmlessly at the bottom of your gear bag, or in the corner of a parts box. It won't take up much room, nor will it weigh you down. Remaining nearly invisible amongst a cornucopia of accumulated photographic gadgetry, this clever shoe is just waiting for an opportunity to spring into action and save the day. By providing a simple yet effective mounting solution in the blink of an eye - this pint-sized gizmo is worth its weight in gold. 
 Constructed from durable aluminum bar-stock, and finished with a discreet semi-matte black anodized coating - the Universal Shoe Mount is a reliable covert interface between your shoe-mounted device and the intended mounting platform. 

The bottom plate is machined flat with a relief cut to ensure strength and a secure fit to almost any flat surface. The mounting hole features the ubiquitous 1/4"-20 thread that's so commonly and conveniently found on photographic equipment. An oversized knurled plastic knob that can be visualized with ease in less than ideal lighting conditions graces the side of this fine mounting solution - turning it adjusts the spring-tensioned side-piece to accommodate various sized shoes and mounts.

OVERVIEW: The Vello 1/4"-20 Camera Screw - 11mm Long (2-Pack) provides two screws that can be used to secure your camera to a tripod, or to attach accessories for a DSLR rig system, using the 1/4"-20 thread. Each screw has a 1/4"-20 male thread stud on top, a 1/4"-20 female thread on the bottom and a knurled plastic knob for tightening. Each screw is 11mm (0.43") long.

Each screw has a 1/4"-20 male thread stud on top, a 1/4"-20 female thread on the bottom and a knurled plastic knob for tightening. Each screw is 11mm (0.43") long.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Lens Mount Adapter - Nikon F Mount Lens to Micro 4/3 Camera allows you to mount a Nikon F lens to a Micro 4/3 camera body. Besides for making financial sense, this allows you to use your favorite lens across different camera platforms. The lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Vello Lens Mount Adapter - Nikon F Mount Lens to Micro 4/3 Camera allows you to mount a Nikon F lens to a Micro 4/3 camera body. Besides for making financial sense, this allows you to use your favorite lens across different camera platforms. The lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Although the lens will fit physically, autofocus, automatic diaphragm (AE metering), and other functions dependent on communication between camera body and lens will be disrupted by the lens adapter. You will need to focus manually, and to set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority (stop-down) mode. If the lens does not have a manual aperture collar, the aperture will be stopped down to its smallest f/stop. Focusing to infinity is retained.

OVERVIEW: The black Vello ActionPan Professional Grade Stabilizing Action Grip allows you to hold your camera down low when filming skiing, snowboarding, skateboarding, auto racing, motocross, BMX/FMX and even when boating. Besides just facilitating a novel filming perspective, the ActionPan will steady your shot as well. It can be used with most SLR cameras or camcorders (with max height of 4.5") that feature a 1/4"-20 tripod mount. The 1/4"-20 screw on the bracket is adjustable, to better accommodate cameras of different configurations. The ActionPan features a shock-proof rubber handle that alleviates stress by offering a comfortable, secure grip. There's also a finger groove for securing grip, as well as non-slip rubber rails for further securing your camera to the mount. As an added bonus, the ActionPan is equipped with a removable accessory shoe mount on the top, which can hold your video light, camera flash or external microphone. If you plan to capture action sports from any angle, especially low angles, the ActionPan is a must have.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Universal Bounce Diffuser is designed to increase the quality of light from your shoe mounted flash unit. The Bounce Diffuser creates a soft diffused light with soft shadows. It fits most shoe mounted flash units, and is held in place with the built-in elastic band. You can use it with the flash in the vertical or horizontal position. The Bounce Diffuser folds flat to conveniently fit in your gear bag.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Mini Softbox is designed to increase the quality of light from your shoe mounted flash unit. The softbox has a silver interior lining that increases contrast, and the white diffuser front creates a soft diffused light with soft shadows. It fits most shoe mounted flash units, and is held in place with the built-in elastic band. You can also use it without the diffuser front for a bare bulb effect. The softbox folds flat to conveniently fit in your gear bag.

OVERVIEW: The Vello LCD Screen Protector (Optical Acrylic) is designed to protect your camera's screen from scratches, dings, and life's daily grind. Made from optical acrylic, this protector applies to your camera's LCD with ease. Make a small investment in your gear and shoot worry-free.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Vello LCD Screen Protector (Optical Acrylic) is designed to protect your camera's screen from scratches, dings, and life's daily grind. Made from optical acrylic, this protector applies to your camera's LCD with ease. Make a small investment in your gear and shoot worry-free.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Environments with excessive heat and/or humidity will shorten the useful life of the adhesive.
Since not all manufacturers use the same width to height ratio for 3.0 screens, please double-check your particular model to see how well the protector will fit your screen. The exact measurements of this screen are: 1.9 x 2.6" (4.8 x 6.6 cm) (HxW).

OVERVIEW: The Vello Bounce Dome (Diffuser) for Canon 270EX & 270EX II Speedlight will diffuse the light output of the flash, producing softer shadows and a softer, more natural glow rather than the harsher effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame.The lightweight, compact Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the flash with custom fitting, without the need for touch fastener tabs.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello Bounce Dome (Diffuser) for Canon 270EX & 270EX II Speedlight will diffuse the light output of the flash, producing softer shadows and a softer, more natural glow rather than the harsher effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame.

The lightweight, compact Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the flash with custom fitting, without the need for touch fastener tabs.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon 380EX Speedlite softens the light output of a flash, reducing harsh shadows that are often the result when using direct illumination. The dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format as well as their equivalent in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello ES-62 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 50mm f/1.8 II lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: With the Vello Duo TTL Off-Camera Flash Cord you can set up a single flash for off-camera lighting and retain your entire camera's TTL (through the lens) flash functions. Multiple contact pins support TTL-compatible flashes used with Canon, Nikon, Fujifilm, Pentax and some Samsung digital cameras. The off-camera hot shoe can mount to accessory shoes or 1/4" 20 threaded studs on tripods, booms, or light stands.In Manual mode (non-TTL function) you can use two flashes together, both synchronized with your shutter release to create amazing lighting effects and two-light setups. Each terminal has a hot shoe so you can still keep one flash on the camera while setting up the other flash somewhere else.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
With the Vello Duo TTL Off-Camera Flash Cord you can set up a single flash for off-camera lighting and retain your entire camera's TTL (through the lens) flash functions. Multiple contact pins support TTL-compatible flashes used with Canon, Nikon, Fujifilm, Pentax and some Samsung digital cameras. The off-camera hot shoe can mount to accessory shoes or 1/4" 20 threaded studs on tripods, booms, or light stands.

In Manual mode (non-TTL function) you can use two flashes together, both synchronized with your shutter release to create amazing lighting effects and two-light setups. Each terminal has a hot shoe so you can still keep one flash on the camera while setting up the other flash somewhere else.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Flash units must be compatible with each other (if using two) and with the camera for synchronization to take place. TTL functions work only in single flash setups.
