OVERVIEW: The Vello Nikon D5100 & D5200 Accessory Kit provides you with useful items for your Nikon D5100 and D5200. All practical, you'll wonder how you ever shot before without these accessories. The lens cap holder is insurance against losing your lens cap. The battery grip and the additional battery allow you to shoot longer, potentially saving you from disaster; while the wireless remote shutter enhances your creativity, giving you the flexibility to be in the picture or set the camera up for hands-free shooting, such as when taking long exposures. An LCD screen protector is also included to protect against fingerprints, smudges and other incidental damage to your LCD.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello EW-60CT Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 28-80mm f/3.5-5.6, II, III, IV, V, EF 18-55mm IS, IS II, and EF 28-90mm lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-C5.2 Battery Grip for Canon EOS Rebel T2i, T3i, T4i & T5i Cameras from Vello is a battery grip designed for use specifically with Canon EOS Rebel T2i, T3i, T4i, and T5i Digital SLR cameras and accepts one or two Canon LP-E8 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. In addition, the BG-C5.2 can utilize 6 AA batteries and comes with a battery tray designed to hold 6 AA/LR6 batteries as well as one for the LP-E8 batteries.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. And the BG-C5.2 comes with an alternate shutter release button, aperture/exposure compensation button, AF Point Selection/Magnify button, AE Lock/FE Lock/Index/Reduce button and main dial to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The BG-C5.2 contains a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod and a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The 2.7" LCD Hood from Vello fits most camcorders with a 2.7" LCD display. It can also be used with digital point and shoot and SLR cameras that feature a fold-out (side-articulating) LCD screen. The LCD Hood protects against annoying glare caused by direct sunlight on the LCD display. It provides a clear, easy-to-see display for recording and reviewing your video and still images.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Universal Bounce Diffuser and Mini Softbox Kit from B&H Photo gives you two different ways to increase the quality of light from your shoe-mounted flash unit. It includes a Bounce Diffuser that creates a soft diffused light with soft shadows. A Mini Softbox with a silver interior lining gives you another option for diffused light with more contrast. They both fit most shoe-mounted flash units, and each is held in place with a built-in elastic band.
You can use the bounce diffuser with the flash in the vertical or horizontal position. The softbox has a white diffuser front that can create a soft diffused light with soft shadows, or use the softbox without the diffuser front for a bare bulb effect. The bounce diffuser and the mini softbox both fold flat to conveniently fit in your gear bag.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The bounce diffuser and the mini softbox both fold flat to conveniently fit in your gear bag.

OVERVIEW: Add another flash to your wireless radio lighting kit with the FreeWave Aviator Wireless Flash Receiver from Vello. Dedicated to Canon's E-TTL II system and compatible with the separately available FreeWave Aviator Transceiver, users will have full functionality with modern automatic flash settings. Also, operation is reliable due to the Aviator's use of a 2.4 GHz radio frequency to provide a range of up to 300' without the need for line-of-sight. The Aviator Receiver has access to 4 different channels to avoid interference with other users and the wireless technology set up in your venue. Users will also have access to 3 different groups with which to organize their flashes (A, B, C). The group controls of the Aviator allow for separate adjustment of the flashes in either TTL or manual modes as well as the ability to set group ratios in A:B or A:BC configurations. Users can also utilize high-speed sync for shutter speeds up to 1/8000 second. Setting up the Aviator is simple users simply need to slide their flash into the top hot shoe, while the base has a locking cold shoe as well as a 1/4"-20 thread for mounting to a light stand or umbrella bracket. For ease of use, the receiver also has a standard 3.5mm port, a threaded PC sync port, and a mini-USB port for firmware updates. It runs on two AA batteries.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW_NOTE: Only flash units using E-TTL II are compatible, older flash units using E-TTL (original ver.) are not supported in TTL mode

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello ES-79II Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 85mm f/1.2L, II, and EF 80-200 f/2.8L lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The dedicated Vello EW-88 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens.

Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: The Vello T Mount Lens to Sony E-Mount Camera Adapter allows you to attach a T mount lens to a Sony E-mount (NEX or full-frame) camera body. You can also use it to mount your camera onto a telescope that has a T mount. The lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed. Featuring all-metal construction, it has a secondary ring inside it with three positioning screws enabling adjustments to make sure your lens is straight.Automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no mechanical linkage between camera body and lens. You will need to set exposures manually. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello T Mount Lens to Sony E-Mount Camera Adapter allows you to attach a T mount lens to a Sony E-mount (NEX or full-frame) camera body. You can also use it to mount your camera onto a telescope that has a T mount. The lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed. Featuring all-metal construction, it has a secondary ring inside it with three positioning screws enabling adjustments to make sure your lens is straight.

Automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no mechanical linkage between camera body and lens. You will need to set exposures manually. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Canon EF/EF-S Lens to Sony E-Mount Camera Adapter allows you to mount an EF/EF-S lens to a Sony E-mount (NEX or full-frame) camera body (except for PXW-FS7 XDCAM camcorder). The all-metal adapter is designed to fit the lens securely, yet can still be removed easily when not needed. A tripod collar with a 1/4"-20 mount enables you to shift the center of gravity for easier handling with heavy lenses, and relieve strain on the camera lens assembly.
Autofocus, automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no electrical communication between camera body and lens. You will need to focus manually and set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority mode. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.

OVERVIEW: The ShutterBoss II Timer Remote Switch for Canon with Sub Mini Connection from Vello is a remote shutter release that provides photographers with enhanced levels of exposure control. Featuring specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting, the ShutterBoss II is a huge asset to keep in your camera bag. This particular ShutterBoss is compatible with cameras that have a sub-mini connection, for example: Canon EOS Digital Rebels and 70D, G3 X, G5 X, Contax N and 645, Pentax K series, Sigma SD, and Samsung GX series. With the ShutterBoss you can set timer delays, exposure times and intervals up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds in one-second increments. You can also select from 1 to 399 continuous shots or set the device to take an unlimited number of photos. Since you can set exposures without touching the camera you will capture clear, blur-free images. This remote has a 4-line backlit LCD status display for easy viewing of timer and exposure settings. The backlight can be locked to remain on when shooting in low light conditions. The ShutterBoss is great for time lapse series of blooming flowers, sunsets or the night sky. It can also function without batteries as a simple manual remote shutter release. Simply establish the camera's settings and push the remote's shutter button halfway to focus and fully to shoot. In bulb mode, slide the shutter release button forward to lock and the shutter will stay open until you release it. The ShutterBoss II has added two features that will offer easier control over the remote's settings. First is a Power Off option which gives you the ability to power down the remote to conserve battery life and also a Reset option allows the ShutterBoss' settings to be completely reset to default settings with just the hold of two buttons. A default reset is a time-saver to avoid changing each setting individually. Whether it's for simple shutter release, extended self-timer options, continuous shooting, long exposures, or time-lapse shooting, the ShutterBoss II Remote puts creative camera control in the palm of your hand.

OVERVIEW: The ESP-DSLR Eyeshade from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for select Pentax cameras that provides a large, oval eyecup for more comfortable viewing through the viewfinder. The large shape of the eyecup improves the image quality in the viewfinder by sealing out all extraneous light. It can rotate 360º to accommodate both the left and right eye and horizontal and vertical shooting positions. The eyecup extends from the viewfinder, blocking stray light and providing a clearer image. The soft yet durable rubber design is comfortable for those who do not wear eyeglasses and will not scratch or damage the glasses of those who do. It mounts easily and securely to the camera's viewfinder.

OVERVIEW: The ESC-EF Eyeshade from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for select Canon cameras that provides a large, oval eyecup for more comfortable viewing through the viewfinder. The large shape of the eyecup improves the image quality in the viewfinder by sealing out all extraneous light. It can rotate 360º to accommodate both the left and right eye and horizontal and vertical shooting positions. The eyecup extends from the viewfinder, blocking stray light and providing a clearer image. The soft yet durable rubber design is comfortable for those who do not wear eyeglasses and will not scratch or damage the glasses of those who do. It mounts easily and securely to the camera's viewfinder.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Bounce Dome for Canon 580EX II Flash will diffuse the light output of the flash, producing softer shadows and a softer, more natural glow rather than the harsher effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame, and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format (and equal in other formats as well).

The Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the flash with custom fitting, without the need for touch fastener tabs.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello Bounce Dome for Canon 580EX II Flash will diffuse the light output of the flash, producing softer shadows and a softer, more natural glow rather than the harsher effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame, and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format (and equal in other formats as well).

The Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the flash with custom fitting, without the need for touch fastener tabs.

OVERVIEW: The 3.0" LCD Hood from Vello fits most camcorders with a 3.0" LCD display. It can also be used with digital point and shoot and SLR cameras that feature a fold-out (side-articulating) LCD screen. The LCD Hood protects against annoying glare caused by direct sunlight on the LCD display. It provides a clear, easy-to-see display for recording and reviewing your video and still images.

The LCD Hood protects against annoying glare caused by direct sunlight on the LCD display. It provides a clear, easy-to-see display for recording and reviewing your video and still images.

OVERVIEW: The Vello T Mount Lens to Pentax K Camera Adapter allows you to attach a T mount lens to a Pentax K camera body. You can also use it to mount your camera onto a telescope that has a T mount. The all-metal lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed. It has a secondary ring inside it with three positioning screws enabling adjustments to make sure your lens is straight.Automatic exposure will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no mechanical linkage between camera body and lens. You will need to set exposures manually. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello T Mount Lens to Pentax K Camera Adapter allows you to attach a T mount lens to a Pentax K camera body. You can also use it to mount your camera onto a telescope that has a T mount. The all-metal lens adapter is designed to fit securely to the lens, yet can still be removed easily when not needed. It has a secondary ring inside it with three positioning screws enabling adjustments to make sure your lens is straight.

Automatic exposure will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no mechanical linkage between camera body and lens. You will need to set exposures manually. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.

You can also use it to mount your camera onto a telescope that has a T mount. The all-metal adapter is designed to fit the lens securely, yet can still be removed easily when not needed. It has a secondary ring inside with three positioning screws enabling adjustments to make sure your lens is straight. Focusing to infinity is retained.

OVERVIEW: The Vello M42 Mount Lens to Canon EOS Camera Adapter allows you to attach an M42 mount lens to a Canon EOS camera body. The all-metal adapter is designed to fit the lens securely, yet can still be removed easily when not needed.Automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no electrical communication between camera body and lens. You will need to set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority mode. If the lens does not have a manual aperture collar, the aperture will be stopped down to its smallest f/stop. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello M42 Mount Lens to Canon EOS Camera Adapter allows you to attach an M42 mount lens to a Canon EOS camera body. The all-metal adapter is designed to fit the lens securely, yet can still be removed easily when not needed.

Automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no electrical communication between camera body and lens. You will need to set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority mode. If the lens does not have a manual aperture collar, the aperture will be stopped down to its smallest f/stop. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated white Vello ET-74W Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 70-200mm f/4L, and EF 70-200mm f/4L IS lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: The EPN-DK17 Eyepiece for Select Nikon Cameras from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for select Nikon SLR and DSLR cameras. The eyepiece provides a comfortable frame with which to utilize the camera's viewfinder and blocks unwanted light from entering the viewfinder. Made from soft and durable rubber, it also prevents scratching and damage to eyeglasses. It mounts easily and securely to the viewfinder and is compatible with select Nikon cameras.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The EPN-DK17 Eyepiece for Select Nikon Cameras from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for select Nikon SLR and DSLR cameras. The eyepiece provides a comfortable frame with which to utilize the camera's viewfinder and blocks unwanted light from entering the viewfinder. Made from soft and durable rubber, it also prevents scratching and damage to eyeglasses. It mounts easily and securely to the viewfinder and is compatible with select Nikon cameras.

OVERVIEW: The Bounce Dome (Diffuser) for Nikon SB-N5 Speedlights from Vello will diffuse the light output of the flash, producing softer shadows and a softer, more natural glow rather than the harsher effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame.The lightweight, compact Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the flash with custom fitting, without the need for touch fastener tabs or adhesive.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Bounce Dome (Diffuser) for Nikon SB-N5 Speedlights from Vello will diffuse the light output of the flash, producing softer shadows and a softer, more natural glow rather than the harsher effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame.

The lightweight, compact Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the flash with custom fitting, without the need for touch fastener tabs or adhesive.

OVERVIEW:
Set up elaborate time-lapses, perform long exposures, or simply trigger your camera remotely with the Wireless ShutterBoss II Remote Switch with Digital Timer from Vello. This kit has release cables that are compatible with Olympus E-1, E-3, and E-5 cameras, as well as cameras with a Canon sub-mini connection, and it features a 2.4 GHz frequency along with a 250' range. The transmitter also has access to 99 channels and features specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting. 
Multiple time settings can be accessed from the transmitter's backlit LCD screen, such as the ability to set a number of shots from 1-999 or to infinitely take photos. The duration of an exposure can also be set all the way up to 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds in one-second increments.

The ShutterBoss II does work as a dual-function release, allowing users to press halfway to focus or press full to trigger the shutter. It can also be set to take multiple photos with a single press of the shutter and has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure. The ShutterBoss II can also function both wired or wirelessly to better fit your particular setup. Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and the transmitter operates with two AAA batteries.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
TheVello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release Kit (Canon & Select Olympus) is a complete lightweight remote control outfit that provides a way to trip your camera's shutter while avoiding any possible unwanted camera movement. The FreeWave Plus works in either wired or wireless mode. This is ideal for photographing wildlife, and for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Simply by switching release cables, you can use this remote control with a vast number of different cameras. With the release cables included in this kit, you can use Canon, Contax, Samsung, Pentax and Olympus cameras (see camera compatibility list).
With the dual function release, press halfway to focus, then press all the way to trigger the shutter. A four-second delay function makes it easy to produce self-portraits. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100 m))--you don't need to have line-of-sight alignment, either, as radio waves will pass through walls, windows and floors.
This remote control will work with virtually any major brand of camera--just switch the dedicated release cable. LED indicators confirm pre-focus and exposure when in wireless mode. The FreeWave Plus is capable of multiple exposures with a single press of the trigger, and you can control the length of long exposures remotely, also. Compatible cameras include:
 Canon EOS: Elan series, Digital Rebel (300D), XT (350D), XTi (400D), XSi (450D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), T3 (1100D), T3i (600D), T4i (650D), T5i (700D), SL1 (100D) and XS (1000D), 60D & 70D; PowerShot G10, G11, G12, G15 & G1 X
 Contax: N and 645
 Fujifilm: X-E1, X-E2; X-100 (original version)
 Hasselblad: H series
 Pentax: K100D, K110D, K200D, K-5, K-7, K10D, K20D, K30, *istDS, DS2, DS, DL2, DL, and D
 Samsung: NX10 & NX100; GX-1S, GX-1L, GX-10 & GX-20
 Sigma: SD1, SD9, SD10, SD14 & SD15

OVERVIEW:
The Vello FreeWave Fusion Wireless Remote Flash Trigger Kit (Canon/Olympus) from B&H Photo is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 300 feet away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple light groups requires additional FreeWave Fusion Receivers (available separately).
The FreeWave Fusion also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100 m)) - you don't need to have line-of-sight alignment, either, as radio waves will pass through walls, windows and floors.
The included cable releases are compatible with the following cameras:
 Canon EOS: Elan series; 60D, Digital Rebel (300D), XT (350D), XTi (400D), XSi (450D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), and XS (1000D); PowerShot G10, G11, G12 & G1 X Contax: N, 645 Pentax:K100D, K110D, K200D, K10D, K20D; *istDS, DS2, DS, DL2, DL, and D Samsung: GX-S1, GX-1L, GX-10, and GX-20
 Olympus: E-1, E-3 & E-5
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello FreeWave Fusion Wireless Remote Flash Trigger Kit (Canon/Olympus) from B&H Photo is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 300 feet away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple light groups requires additional FreeWave Fusion Receivers (available separately).

The FreeWave Fusion also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100 m)) - you don't need to have line-of-sight alignment, either, as radio waves will pass through walls, windows and floors.

The included cable releases are compatible with the following cameras:
Canon EOS: Elan series; 60D, Digital Rebel (300D), XT (350D), XTi (400D), XSi (450D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), and XS (1000D); PowerShot G10, G11, G12 & G1 X
Contax: N, 645
Pentax:K100D, K110D, K200D, K10D, K20D; *istDS, DS2, DS, DL2, DL, and D
Samsung: GX-S1, GX-1L, GX-10, and GX-20
Olympus: E-1, E-3 & E-5
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Since the FreeWave Fusion does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.

The FreeWave Fusion is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for flash wake-up functionality and/or high shutter speeds, you will need full Canon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion trigger.

OVERVIEW:
Whether capturing images in the studio or on location, the Vello FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release Kit (Canon/Olympus/Pentax) from B&H Photo adds flexibility and versatility to your shooting style. Photography unplugged - shooters can interact with a model, view the scene or set from alternate angles, or set a camera by a stream to capture an image of a bear hunting while you remain at a safe distance away - all this and more without missing a beat, a shot, or a moment.
This particular FreeWave unit is compatible with cameras with a sub-mini connection, i.e. Canon EOS Rebel series, 60D, & PowerShot G1 X, Contax N and 645, Pentax K and DS series, Samsung GX series DSLRs, and Olympus E-1, E-3, and E-5 cameras.
This versatile shutter release features Smart Code technology which allows it to be configured to operate on up to 16 million possible radio channels. You can easily switch channels to "zero in" on a frequency that provides optimal range and functionality.
The FreeWave operates with radio frequency (RF) technology, therefore a direct line of sight is not necessary; radio waves pass through objects such as windows and walls. It is unlike other wireless remotes on the market that operate on an Infrared (IR) system and require a direct line of sight between transmitter and receiver to make things work.
Since touching the camera even lightly while capturing an image can create a blurred image, the FreeWave eliminates this by tripping the shutter without any disturbances. This is critical when photographing subjects close up, and for long-exposures and macros. It is also extremely valuable when photographing nature, wildlife and other subjects that are difficult for you to get close to.
Compatible cameras: 

 Canon EOS: Elan series, Digital Rebel (300D), XT (350D), XTi (400D), XSi (450D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), T3 (1100D), T3i (600D), T4i (650D), T5 (1200D), T5i (700D), SL1 (100D) and XS (1000D), 60D & 70D; PowerShot G10, G11, G12, G15, G16, G1 X & G1 X Mark II, SX50 HS
 Contax: N and 645
 Fujifilm: X-E2 and X-T1
 Hasselblad: H series
 Pentax: K10D, K20D, K100D, K110D, K200D, K-3, K-5, K-5 II, K-7, K30, K-50, K-500, *istDS, DS2, DS, DL2, DL, and D
 Samsung: NX10 & NX100; GX-1S, GX-1L, GX-10 & GX-20
 Sigma: SD1, SD9, SD10, SD14 & SD15


 Olympus: E-1, E-3 & E-5

OVERVIEW:
The Shutter Release Cable for BG-N12, BG-N9, BG-N6 & BG-N5 Battery Grips from Vello is a replacement or spare shutter release cable that connects the Vello BG-N16 Battery Grip to the Nikon D5500, the Vello BG-N13 Battery Grip to the Nikon D5300, the Vello BG-N12 Battery Grip to the Nikon D3100, D3200 and D3300, the BG-N9 Battery Grip to the Nikon D3100 and D3200, the BG-N6 Battery Grip to the Nikon D5100 and D5200, and the BG-N5 Battery Grip to the Nikon D3100. The battery grips hold up to two EN-EL14 batteries to supply the camera with extra power and also provide a vertical position shutter button. The shutter release cable connects from the socket on the battery grip to the remote release port on the camera body and transmits the shutter release signal from battery grip to the camera.
Having a spare cable in your camera bag is a good idea in case the original, which comes with the grip, is lost while on vacation or assignment.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Shutter Release Cable for BG-N12, BG-N9, BG-N6 & BG-N5 Battery Grips from Vello is a replacement or spare shutter release cable that connects the Vello BG-N16 Battery Grip to the Nikon D5500, the Vello BG-N13 Battery Grip to the Nikon D5300, the Vello BG-N12 Battery Grip to the Nikon D3100, D3200 and D3300, the BG-N9 Battery Grip to the Nikon D3100 and D3200, the BG-N6 Battery Grip to the Nikon D5100 and D5200, and the BG-N5 Battery Grip to the Nikon D3100. The battery grips hold up to two EN-EL14 batteries to supply the camera with extra power and also provide a vertical position shutter button. The shutter release cable connects from the socket on the battery grip to the remote release port on the camera body and transmits the shutter release signal from battery grip to the camera.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello SH108 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Sony's 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 DT and 18-70mm f/3.5-5.6 DT lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Nikon D800, D800E & D810 from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive. This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D800, D800E & D810 digital camera.

This screen protector is specifically designed for the Canon 5D Mark III, 5D Mark IV, 5DS & 5DS R digital camera.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Canon 5D Mark III, 5D Mark IV, 5DS & 5DS R from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive.

This screen protector is specifically designed for the Canon 5D Mark III, 5D Mark IV, 5DS & 5DS R digital camera.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-C9 Battery Grip for Canon 5D Mark III, 5DS & 5DS R from Vello is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Canon EOS 5D Mark III, 5DS and 5DS R digital SLR cameras, and accepts one or two Canon LP-E6 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. In addition, the BG-C9 can utilize 6 AA batteries and comes with a battery tray designed to hold 6 AA/LR6 batteries.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. And the BG-C9 comes with an alternate shutter release button, AF start button, AF point selection, AE lock/FE lock button, multi-controller button, multi-function button and main dial to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The BG-C9 is designed with anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod and a wonderful touch: a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The BG-C9 Battery Grip for Canon 5D Mark III, 5DS & 5DS R from Vello is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Canon EOS 5D Mark III, 5DS and 5DS R digital SLR cameras, and accepts one or two Canon LP-E6 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. In addition, the BG-C9 can utilize 6 AA batteries and comes with a battery tray designed to hold 6 AA/LR6 batteries.

The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. And the BG-C9 comes with an alternate shutter release button, AF start button, AF point selection, AE lock/FE lock button, multi-controller button, multi-function button and main dial to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The BG-C9 is designed with anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod and a wonderful touch: a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Batteries sold separately.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-N7 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D800, D800E and D810 DSLR cameras and accepts one Nikon EN-EL15 battery. With one battery in the grip and one in the camera, your shooting time is effectively doubled. The BG-N7 can also hold and utilize 8 AA batteries. Two battery trays, one for the EN-EL15 and one for the 8 AAs, are included.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N7 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The shutter button offers a lock position to prevent accidental release. In addition, the BG-N7 has an alternate AF-ON button, multi selector and main and sub-command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The EPPN-DK17 Padded Eyepiece for Select Nikon Cameras from Vello is an alternate or replacement cushioned viewfinder eyepiece for select Nikon cameras. It is designed for photographers who use eyeglasses when shooting and its soft yet durable foam prevents scratching and smudging of eyeglasses. Its padded, slightly thicker design improves the viewfinder image quality by sealing out stray light. It mounts securely on the camera's viewfinder and is compatible with select Nikon cameras.

Its padded, slightly thicker design improves the viewfinder image quality by sealing out stray light. It mounts securely on the camera's viewfinder and is compatible with select Nikon cameras.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-S1 Battery Grip for Sony A77, A77 II & A99 II Digital Camera from Vello is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Sony A77, A77 II, and A99 II (not original version) digital cameras, and accepts one or two NP-FM500H lithium-ion batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. It will reduce wrist and hand fatigue when shooting vertically for extended periods of time. The BG-S1 has an alternate shutter release button designed for ergonomic access when shooting vertically and anti-slip rubber gripping to further improve handling. In addition, the BG-S1 has an alternate AF start button, smart teleconverter/focus magnifier, Fn/image rotation button, AEL/slow sync/image index button, AF/MF/enlarge button, exposure compensation buttons, a Multi selector and a main dial. It also features a tripod socket, a strap lug for attaching a hand strap to the camera and a convenient internal slot to fit the camera's battery door when the grip is attached. A battery tray is included to house the NP-FM500H batteries within the grip.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

It also features a tripod socket, a strap lug for attaching a hand strap to the camera and a convenient internal slot to fit the camera's battery door when the grip is attached. OVERVIEW:

With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. More so, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave Fusion Wireless Flash Trigger & Remote Control for Sony/Minolta SLR from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 320 feet away. It is compatible with Sony DSLR cameras, flash units and studio lights. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple light groups requires additional FreeWave Fusion Receivers (available separately).
The FreeWave Fusion also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100 m)) - you don't need to have line-of-sight alignment, either, as radio waves will pass through walls, windows and floors.
Since the FreeWave Fusion does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: This remote does not provide high-voltage sync protection, and is not recommended for use with flash units that have a trigger voltage of more than 6V.

OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave Fusion Receiver Only (for Sony/Minolta) from Vello is a receiver for the versatile FreeWave Fusion kit that controls off-camera lights from up to 320 feet away. You can use this receiver to trigger additional groups of off-camera flashes and/or studio lights. It is compatible with Sony and Minolta cameras, flashes and studio lights. You'll need the FreeWave Fusion Remote Control kit (available separately) to activate lights using this receiver. Alternatively, when using the FreeWave Fusion as a camera remote control, this extra receiver will allow you to trigger multiple cameras instantaneously.
Since the FreeWave Fusion does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The FreeWave Fusion Receiver Only (for Sony/Minolta) from Vello is a receiver for the versatile FreeWave Fusion kit that controls off-camera lights from up to 320 feet away. You can use this receiver to trigger additional groups of off-camera flashes and/or studio lights. It is compatible with Sony and Minolta cameras, flashes and studio lights. You'll need the FreeWave Fusion Remote Control kit (available separately) to activate lights using this receiver. Alternatively, when using the FreeWave Fusion as a camera remote control, this extra receiver will allow you to trigger multiple cameras instantaneously.

Since the FreeWave Fusion does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.

OVERVIEW: The IRM-C IR Remote Mini for Select Canon Cameras from Vello is a pocket-size infrared remote control that lets you wirelessly take photos with your camera from up to ten feet away. When your camera is in remote triggering mode, the IR Remote Mini works by simply pressing the central button while aiming it at your camera. Be sure that there are no obstructions between your camera and the remote as an infrared remote needs line-of-sight communication to function properly.

Be sure that there are no obstructions between your camera and the remote as an infrared remote needs line-of-sight communication to function properly.

OVERVIEW:
The IR-C2 Infrared Remote Control for Select Canon Cameras from Vello is a wireless remote control that lets you take photos and videos with your Canon camera from up to fifteen feet away. The Vello IR-C2 is especially useful for preventing camera shake during long exposures, and for taking self-portraits. It can also be used to trigger a remote camera when shooting events. For photo applications, it offers two options to release the shutter, the S button which fires your camera immediately and the 2S button which fires the camera after a 2-second delay. For shooting video on video compatible cameras, set the camera to video mode, establish your frame and focus, enable the camera's remote function and press the 2S button on the remote to start recording video and press it again to stop the recording. You can shoot a still photo during video recording by pressing the S button.
To successfully use the infrared remote, your camera must be set on the remote trigger function and the IR-C2 remote needs to point directly at the camera with no physical obstructions between the camera and remote.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The IR-C2 Infrared Remote Control for Select Canon Cameras from Vello is a wireless remote control that lets you take photos and videos with your Canon camera from up to fifteen feet away. The Vello IR-C2 is especially useful for preventing camera shake during long exposures, and for taking self-portraits. It can also be used to trigger a remote camera when shooting events. For photo applications, it offers two options to release the shutter, the S button which fires your camera immediately and the 2S button which fires the camera after a 2-second delay. For shooting video on video compatible cameras, set the camera to video mode, establish your frame and focus, enable the camera's remote function and press the 2S button on the remote to start recording video and press it again to stop the recording. You can shoot a still photo during video recording by pressing the S button.

To successfully use the infrared remote, your camera must be set on the remote trigger function and the IR-C2 remote needs to point directly at the camera with no physical obstructions between the camera and remote.

OVERVIEW: The IR-O1 Infrared Remote Control for Select Olympus Cameras from Vello is a wireless remote control that lets you take photos and videos with your Olympus camera from up to fifteen feet away. The Vello IR-O1 is especially useful for preventing camera shake during long exposures and for taking self-portraits. It can also be used to trigger a remote camera when shooting events. On cameras with zoom capability, you can use the IR-O1 to zoom in and out and in playback mode and you can advance from image to image or go back to previous images.To successfully use the infrared remote, your camera must be set on the remote trigger function and the IR-O1 remote needs to point directly at the camera with no physical obstructions between the camera and remote. When your frame and focus is established simply aim the IR-O1 and press the S button to immediately release the camera's shutter. For zoom function, press the W and T buttons and for playback control use the + and - buttons.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The IR-O1 Infrared Remote Control for Select Olympus Cameras from Vello is a wireless remote control that lets you take photos and videos with your Olympus camera from up to fifteen feet away. The Vello IR-O1 is especially useful for preventing camera shake during long exposures and for taking self-portraits. It can also be used to trigger a remote camera when shooting events. On cameras with zoom capability, you can use the IR-O1 to zoom in and out and in playback mode and you can advance from image to image or go back to previous images.

To successfully use the infrared remote, your camera must be set on the remote trigger function and the IR-O1 remote needs to point directly at the camera with no physical obstructions between the camera and remote. When your frame and focus is established simply aim the IR-O1 and press the S button to immediately release the camera's shutter. For zoom function, press the W and T buttons and for playback control use the + and - buttons.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Infrared Remote Control for Multiple Cameras is a pocket-size infrared remote control that lets you trigger select Olympus, Sony, Nikon, Pentax and Canon cameras wirelessly from up to 15' away. With your camera in remote triggering mode, the IR-M trips the shutter by simply pressing the "S" button while aiming it at your camera. 

Besides shutter release capability with all of the cameras mentioned above, each brand, with the exception of Nikon has other specific remote capabilities. The IR-M offers select Olympus cameras wide to telephoto zoom, video on/off and playback/rewind ability. The IR-M can control remote video on/off, shutter release and 2 a second delay option on select Sony cameras. The delay allows vibration to subside when shooting on a tripod. Select Pentax cameras are capable of remote lens zooming, and video on/off, as are Canon DC DSLRs. Finally, the IR-M can control video on/off and 2 second delay triggering on select Canon SLRs and DSLRs.

Please see Specifications for compatible cameras.

OVERVIEW:
The IR-STV IR Remote with Playback Control for Select Sony Cameras from Vello is a pocket-size infrared remote control that lets you take photos wirelessly with your camera from up to 15' away. When your camera is in remote triggering mode, the IR-STV trips the shutter by simply pressing the "S" button while aiming it at your camera. There's also a 2 second delayed shutter function that allows time for vibration to cease when your camera is tripod-mounted. 

The IR-STV not only has a Stop/Start video button for your camera, but allows full display control when your camera is jacked into a TV. You can enlarge or shrink a selected image as well as rotate it or delete it completely. Start a slide show of selected images and use your PictBridge-compliant printer to print an image remotely. There are even on-screen histogram and index displays. Please see Specifications for compatible cameras.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Accessory Kit for Nikon D3100 provides you with a number of beneficial accessories for your D3100 DSLR camera. Make the most of your shooting experience with the included battery grip, wireless remote, LCD protector, and a lens cap holder.

With two batteries installed, the BG-N5 Battery Grip effectively doubles your shooting time. More so, when one battery is drained, it can be removed quickly and attached to a charger while you continue shooting with the other battery. The FreeWave remote control works in either wired or wireless mode. This is ideal for photographing wildlife, and for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture.

Keep your display protected with the Vello screen protector, and help prevent lost lens caps with the Pearstone CAPKEEPER 2. One end of the holder has an elastic band which fits around the lens barrel, and the other end fastens to the lens cap via the adhesive-backed disc. The cap remains tethered while shooting and is easily retrieved when finished.

Not only will you be protecting your large investment, but also making your experience in photography easier for yourself. Focus on your pictures, and let the items in this kit take care of the rest.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Fastener Strips for Portable Flashes are a set of four replacement strips that use an adhesive backing to attach to any flash for connecting portable flash accessories. These strips are compatible with accessories that use a hook-and-loop method of connection.

Note: These strips' surface is the loop component to the hook-and-loop connection system; they are compatible with accessories that have the hook component to the system.

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Canon 60D camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

OVERVIEW:
The Universal White Balance Handheld Disc from Vello provides a quick and easy way to set precise custom white balance on your digital camera or video recorder. Accurate white balance settings will result in consistently faithful colors in your images. 
Able to work with any digital camera that has custom white balance settings, the white balance disc is portable, easy to hold and works with any lens diameter up to 95mm. With your camera on manual focus mode and the desired aperture set, simply hold the Universal White Balance Handheld Disc in front of your lens, point the camera toward the same light illuminating your subject, and shoot. Use this image as the reference when setting white balance on the custom white balance function in your camera's menu.
This disc can be used to set white balance in-camera or when you are adjusting color in post-production. With a large handle, strap hole, and wide diameter, the Universal White Balance Handheld Disc is easy to use, and being lightweight, flat and sturdy, it stores and transports easily.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Universal White Balance Handheld Disc from Vello provides a quick and easy way to set precise custom white balance on your digital camera or video recorder. Accurate white balance settings will result in consistently faithful colors in your images. 

Able to work with any digital camera that has custom white balance settings, the white balance disc is portable, easy to hold and works with any lens diameter up to 95mm. With your camera on manual focus mode and the desired aperture set, simply hold the Universal White Balance Handheld Disc in front of your lens, point the camera toward the same light illuminating your subject, and shoot. Use this image as the reference when setting white balance on the custom white balance function in your camera's menu.

This disc can be used to set white balance in-camera or when you are adjusting color in post-production. With a large handle, strap hole, and wide diameter, the Universal White Balance Handheld Disc is easy to use, and being lightweight, flat and sturdy, it stores and transports easily.

OVERVIEW: The Vello 2.7" Glass LCD Screen Protector is a sheet of 0.02" (0.5mm) ultra-thin optical glass used to protect your LCD monitor. The glass features 6 layers of protective material that protect your display screen from dirt, scratches, sweat and oily fingerprints. The glass also blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Vello 2.7" Glass LCD Screen Protector is a sheet of 0.02" (0.5mm) ultra-thin optical glass used to protect your LCD monitor. The glass features 6 layers of protective material that protect your display screen from dirt, scratches, sweat and oily fingerprints. The glass also blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Environments with excessive heat and humidity will shorten the useful life of the adhesive on the glass.
Since not all manufacturers use the same width to height ratio for 2.7" screens, please double-check your particular model to see how well the protector will fit your screen. The exact measurements of this screen are: 58 x 45mm (WxH).

OVERVIEW: The Vello BG-N4.2 Battery Grip for Nikon D7000 is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Nikon D7000 digital SLR camera. It accepts a single EN-EL15 battery (includes battery chamber). In addition, the included AA battery holder allows you to use 6 AA batteries for added convenience. The BG-N4.2 Battery Grip offers an alternate shutter release button, main and sub command dials, multi selector, and an AE-L/AF-L button to facilitate shooting in a vertical orientation.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello BG-N4.2 Battery Grip for Nikon D7000 is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Nikon D7000 digital SLR camera. It accepts a single EN-EL15 battery (includes battery chamber). In addition, the included AA battery holder allows you to use 6 AA batteries for added convenience.

The BG-N4.2 Battery Grip offers an alternate shutter release button, main and sub command dials, multi selector, and an AE-L/AF-L button to facilitate shooting in a vertical orientation.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Batteries sold separately.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Fusion Pro Wireless Flash Trigger and Remote Control for Canon DSLRs from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 600' away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple lights requires separate purchase of additional FreeWave Fusion Pro Receivers. The FreeWave Fusion Pro also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4 GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range up to 600', and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight. Four RF channels are available to prevent interference from other users. The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units, and studio lights. The transmitter connects to the hot shoe of the camera. In case the hot shoe is needed for another function, the transmitter can alternatively connect to the camera's PC plug via its 3.5mm sync plug (PC cable not included). The transmitter also features a top hot shoe, which fully supports E-TTL metering when used with Canon TTL compatible components. This allows you to keep a TTL flash mounted on top of the camera, while using the transmitter to control off-camera flash units (in manual mode) via radio signal.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The FreeWave Fusion Pro Wireless Flash Trigger and Remote Control for Canon DSLRs from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 600' away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple lights requires separate purchase of additional FreeWave Fusion Pro Receivers.

The FreeWave Fusion Pro also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4 GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range up to 600', and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight. Four RF channels are available to prevent interference from other users.

The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units, and studio lights. The transmitter connects to the hot shoe of the camera. In case the hot shoe is needed for another function, the transmitter can alternatively connect to the camera's PC plug via its 3.5mm sync plug (PC cable not included). The transmitter also features a top hot shoe, which fully supports E-TTL metering when used with Canon TTL compatible components. This allows you to keep a TTL flash mounted on top of the camera, while using the transmitter to control off-camera flash units (in manual mode) via radio signal.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Since the FreeWave Fusion Pro does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.
The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for flash wake-up functionality and/or high shutter speeds, you will need full Canon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion Pro trigger.
This remote does not provide high-voltage sync protection, and is not recommended for use with flash units that have a trigger voltage of more than 6V.

The complete system is capable of handling 3 groups of flashes or cameras with 7 group combinations. Simultaneous triggering of additional lights or cameras requires separate purchase of a receiver for each additional device. 

The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for flash wake-up functionality and/or high shutter speeds, you will need full Canon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion Pro trigger.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello EW-88C Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 24-70mm f/2.8L II USM lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution. Also, this hood has an improved durable metal release button mechanism for fast and reliable removal.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Folding Pop-Up Flash Diffuser quickly slides into your camera's hot shoe and softens the light from your pop-up flash. This reduces the harsh shadows and hot spots common with direct flash and creates a more flattering light for your subjects. This diffuser is extremely lightweight at just 0.2 ounces and folds to 2.7" for easy storage and use. Additionally, it has an adjustable angle for compatibility with most SLR cameras and pop-up flash units.

This reduces the harsh shadows and hot spots common with direct flash and creates a more flattering light for your subjects. This diffuser is extremely lightweight at just 0.2 ounces and folds to 2.7" for easy storage and use. Additionally, it has an adjustable angle for compatibility with most SLR cameras and pop-up flash units.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Manual Extensions Tube Set for Canon EF/EF-S-Mount allows your lens to focus closer than its normal minimum focusing distance. By placing distance between your camera body and lens, the focusing distance is shortened and magnification is increased. Extension tubes enable macro performance for lenses not otherwise able to focus that close, and are also suited for close-up portraiture. The Manual Extension Tube Set for Canon EF/EF-S-mount contains three extension tubes of 7mm, 14mm, and 28mm lengths, as well as dedicated camera mount and lens mount tubes. The extension tubes can be used individually or together in seven distinct combinations to create the desired magnification. For closer focusing use the larger extension tube or stack the tubes together. Extension tubes have no optical elements so do not degrade the quality of your lenses. These tubes are manual tubes and do not communicate electronic functions, such as autofocus or auto exposure control, between your camera body and mounted lens; both manual focusing and manual exposure control must be used. Since Canon EF/EF-S lenses do not feature a built-in aperture ring, exposure can only be controlled by changing the camera's shutter speed, while maintaining the native preset aperture of the lens. With Canon EF/EF-S lenses, this will be the largest f/stop. Due to the screw-in design of the manual extension tubes, the lens may not sit directly upright but will, however, function normally. Do not to over-tighten screw-in tubes to ensure easy removal of each tube. Additionally, when using the extension tubes, you will lose the ability to focus to infinity.

The Manual Extension Tube Set for Nikon F-mount contains three extension tubes of 7mm, 14mm, and 28mm lengths, as well as dedicated camera mount and lens mount tubes. The extension tubes can be used individually or together in seven distinct combinations to create the desired magnification. For closer focusing use the larger extension tube or stack the tubes together. Extension tubes have no optical elements so do not degrade the quality of your lenses.

These tubes are manual tubes and do not communicate electronic functions, such as autofocus or auto exposure control, between your camera body and mounted lens; both manual focusing and manual exposure control must be used. When used with lenses without a manual aperture ring, exposure can only be controlled by changing the camera's shutter speed while maintaining the native preset aperture of the lens (this will be the smallest f/stop on Nikon G lenses). Due to the screw-in design of the manual extension tubes, the lens may not sit directly upright but will, however, function normally. Do not to over-tighten screw-in tubes to ensure easy removal of each tube. Additionally, when using the extension tubes, you will lose the ability to focus to infinity.

OVERVIEW: The Low Profile Bubble Level from Vello is a bull's-eye bubble level that slides snugly into your camera's hot shoe mount. This conveniently placed bubble level helps you to align your camera for level horizontal shooting. Because it fits into your camera's hot shoe mount, it also serves to protect the shoe's electronic contacts from dust, oils, moisture and accidental impact, thus prolonging their effectiveness.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Low Profile Bubble Level from Vello is a bull's-eye bubble level that slides snugly into your camera's hot shoe mount. This conveniently placed bubble level helps you to align your camera for level horizontal shooting. Because it fits into your camera's hot shoe mount, it also serves to protect the shoe's electronic contacts from dust, oils, moisture and accidental impact, thus prolonging their effectiveness.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Bounce Dome Diffuser for Nikon R1C1/SB-R200 Speedlights (Set of 2) softens the light output of a flash, reducing harsh shadows that are often the result when using direct illumination. The dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format as well as their equivalent in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Warm Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon Speedlite 580EX II softens the light output of the flash, reducing harsh shadows that are often the result when using direct flash. The dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format as well as their equivalent in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.This dome has an amber tint to match the color emitted by tungsten halogen and incandescent bulbs. With the dome on your flash, simply set your camera to tungsten balance. Additionally, the diffuser can be used outdoors to lend warmth to skin tones in open shade or to match the light balance of a sunset or sunrise portrait.

OVERVIEW: Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Nikon D3200 from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive. This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D3200 digital camera.

OVERVIEW:
To give you the best experience with your Nikon D800, D800E or D810 DSLR camera, B&H Photo has put together this Nikon D800/D800E & D810 Accessory Kit to make your picture taking experiences more enjoyable.

The Battery Grip is designed specifically for the Nikon D800 and D810 DSLR cameras and accepts one EN-EL15 battery. With one battery in the camera and one in the grip, your shooting time is effectively doubled.

Alongside the battery grip, the kit also has a wireless remote shutter release, snap-on LCD screen protector, lens cap holder, and lithium-ion battery pack. These additional accessories will get you shooting from day one with nearly everything you need for a great day of shooting.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Alongside the battery grip, the kit also has a wireless remote shutter release, snap-on LCD screen protector, lens cap holder, and lithium-ion battery pack. These additional accessories will get you shooting from day one with nearly everything you need for a great day of shooting.

OVERVIEW:
When you purchase a new digital camera, there are usually a few items you need to round out the camera's included accessory package. With that in mind, B&H Photo has put together this Nikon D3200 Accessory Kit to make your photography experience more enjoyable.

The Vello BG-N9 Battery Grip for Nikon D3100 and D3200 is designed specifically for Nikon D3100 and D3200 DSLR cameras, and it accepts one or two EN-EL14 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled, and in addition to that: when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other.

Vello's FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release is a complete lightweight remote control outfit that provides a way to trip your camera's shutter while avoiding any possible unwanted camera movement. The FreeWave works in either wired or wireless mode. This is ideal for photographing wildlife, and for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin an image.

The Vello Glass LCD Screen Protector for Nikon D3000, D3100 & D3200 DSLR cameras is a sheet of 0.02" (0.5mm) ultra-thin optical glass used to protect your camera's LCD monitor. The glass features 6 layers of protective material that protect your display screen from dirt, scratches, sweat and oily fingerprints. The glass also blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. The protector is easy to install and remove.

Never lose another lens cap thanks to the Sensei Cap Keeper. It keeps your lens cap close at hand with an elastic band which attaches securely around the lens barrel, and the other end fastens to the lens cap via the adhesive-backed disc. The cap remains tethered while shooting and is easily retrieved when finished.

In addition to any standard accessories included by the manufacturer with the Nikon D3200 DSLR Camera, this Accessory Kit includes a compatible battery grip, one battery, a wireless remote, glass LCD screen protector and a lens cap holder.

OVERVIEW:
Accessories can add up when you purchase a new camera, so to give you the best experience with yours B&H Photo has put together a Vello Accessory Kit for Canon EOS Rebel T4i & T5i DSLR Cameras to make your picture taking experiences more enjoyable. This cost-effective kit provides a number of items that will get you up and running like a pro from day one, without breaking the bank. The kit includes a spare battery, battery grip, wireless shutter release system, Screen protector and a lens cap holder.

The included battery grip is specifically designed for use with Canon EOS Rebel T4i or T5i DSLR cameras, and accepts one or two Canon LP-E8 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery.

Alongside the battery grip, the kit also has a wireless remote for hands-free shooting and reduced camera shake, and a LCD screen protector that prevents scratches and blocks UV rays. A lens cap holder keeps your lens cap within arms reach, and prevents it from being lost, and an included lithium-ion battery pack provides one of the two batteries that the grip can hold. All of these accessories will provide you with better image quality, longer runtime and greater protection for your equipment.

OVERVIEW: The BG-N10 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for Nikon D600 and D610 DSLR cameras and accepts one Nikon EN-EL15 battery. With one battery in the grip and one in the camera, your shooting time is effectively doubled. The BG-N10 can also hold and utilize 6 AA batteries. Two battery trays, one for the EN-EL15 and one for the 6 AAs, are included.The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N10 integrates an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The shutter button offers a lock position to prevent accidental release. In addition, the BG-N10 has an alternate AE-L/AF-L button, multi selector and main and sub-command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.

The BG-N10 can also hold and utilize 6 AA batteries. Two battery trays, one for the EN-EL15 and one for the 6 AAs, are included.

The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N10 integrates an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The shutter button offers a lock position to prevent accidental release. In addition, the BG-N10 has an alternate AE-L/AF-L button, multi selector and main and sub-command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Canon 6D camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

OVERVIEW: The Vello White Balance Card Set for Digital Photography is an excellent tool for achieving perfect color balance in your photos. You can use it under any lighting condition, both pre- and post-production. This set includes an 18% grey card, a white card and a black card, as well as a detachable lanyard that will keep it handy at all times and an easy-to-follow user's guide to aid in proper usage. The cards within the medium set measure 5.1 x 3.9" / 130 x 99mm.
