OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Micro Wireless Remote Shutter Release for Select Nikon DSLRs from Vello is a miniaturized, reliable remote control kit that will trigger your 10-pin Nikon DSLR from up to 328' away. Ideal for sports, wildlife photos or self-portraits, the kit contains a transmitter and receiver that are small enough to easily fit in a shirt pocket. The system works on the 2.4 GHz frequency for reduced radio interference and extended operating range, and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight.Simply lock the tiny receiver into the 10-pin port and select 1 of 16 channels for use. No connecting wires are necessary - the receiver is powered by the camera. The handheld transmitter has a channel selector corresponding to the receiver's as well as Focus, Shutter and Shooting Alarm color-coded confirmation LEDs. The transmitter runs on one easily-sourced AAA battery, while the receiver is powered by the camera itself. Included is also a removable lanyard for use as a wrist strap.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The FreeWave Micro Wireless Remote Shutter Release for Select Nikon DSLRs from Vello is a miniaturized, reliable remote control kit that will trigger your 10-pin Nikon DSLR from up to 328' away. Ideal for sports, wildlife photos or self-portraits, the kit contains a transmitter and receiver that are small enough to easily fit in a shirt pocket. The system works on the 2.4 GHz frequency for reduced radio interference and extended operating range, and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight.

Simply lock the tiny receiver into the 10-pin port and select 1 of 16 channels for use. No connecting wires are necessary - the receiver is powered by the camera. The handheld transmitter has a channel selector corresponding to the receiver's as well as Focus, Shutter and Shooting Alarm color-coded confirmation LEDs. The transmitter runs on one easily-sourced AAA battery, while the receiver is powered by the camera itself. Included is also a removable lanyard for use as a wrist strap.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Triple Shoe V-Bracket (6.5" Wide) mounts onto a camera's accessory shoe in order to provide three additional accessory shoes for mounting lights, monitors, microphones, or other accessories. In addition to the shoe mount, a 1/4"-20 thread is also available for attaching the bracket to a tripod, rig, or other bracket featuring a 1/4"-20-threaded mount. The bracket is constructed from rigid, yet lightweight single-piece aluminum alloy, and the mounting shoes are machined out of the same piece as the bracket, for additional strength. The accessory shoes also feature backstops for greater security when attaching accessories. The bottom shoe that attaches to the camera features a locking pin, which keeps the shoe in place and prevents the shoe from rotating during use.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello Triple Shoe V-Bracket (6.5" Wide) mounts onto a camera's accessory shoe in order to provide three additional accessory shoes for mounting lights, monitors, microphones, or other accessories. In addition to the shoe mount, a 1/4"-20 thread is also available for attaching the bracket to a tripod, rig, or other bracket featuring a 1/4"-20-threaded mount.

The bracket is constructed from rigid, yet lightweight single-piece aluminum alloy, and the mounting shoes are machined out of the same piece as the bracket, for additional strength. The accessory shoes also feature backstops for greater security when attaching accessories. The bottom shoe that attaches to the camera features a locking pin, which keeps the shoe in place and prevents the shoe from rotating during use.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello CB-510 Dual Shoe Bracket with Silicon Rubber Grip is a side bracket that attaches to the bottom of your camera and provides two cold shoes, one on top and one on the side, for attaching lights and other accessories. An included dual-purpose thumbscrew enables mounting the bracket along with a camera onto a tripod, fluid head, ball head or other gear. The thumbscrew features a 1/4" stud on top and a 1/4" female thread underneath. A silicon rubber grip will serve as an effective handle when you use this bracket solely with a camera, and as a pan handle when you mount it on a tripod. 

The two shoe mounts will let you light your subjects from the side and will also free up your camera's shoe mount. The bracket is 4.5" wide, 5" in height, and is compatible with most camcorders and DSLRs. The thumbscrew is adjustable 2.5" along the width.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello CB-510 Dual Shoe Bracket with Silicon Rubber Grip is a side bracket that attaches to the bottom of your camera and provides two cold shoes, one on top and one on the side, for attaching lights and other accessories. An included dual-purpose thumbscrew enables mounting the bracket along with a camera onto a tripod, fluid head, ball head or other gear. The thumbscrew features a 1/4" stud on top and a 1/4" female thread underneath. A silicon rubber grip will serve as an effective handle when you use this bracket solely with a camera, and as a pan handle when you mount it on a tripod.

The two shoe mounts will let you light your subjects from the side and will also free up your camera's shoe mount. The bracket is 4.5" wide, 5" in height, and is compatible with most camcorders and DSLRs. The thumbscrew is adjustable 2.5" along the width.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: A TTL cord is strongly recommended when using a flash combined with a DSLR. The bracket might not sufficiently support a typical hot shoe flash attached directly.

OVERVIEW: The HGS-3 Hand Grip Strap from Vello is designed for DSLR cameras with attached vertical battery grips. As an alternative to having your camera dangling from a long strap, it lets you keep your camera firmly in your hand--so that when you see a shot, all you have to do is raise the camera to eye level and capture it. The strap itself is constructed from nylon. The padded hand cushion has a durable leather outside and a soft, non-slip velvet inside for long-term comfort and a secure hold--without sacrificing maneuverability. When your fingers get fatigued, you can relieve them without having to put down the camera.The hand grip strap attaches by threading through your camera's shoulder strap loop and the hand strap mount on the bottom of your grip. It is easy to install and remove, and its buckle enables adjustment of overall tension and length. Additionally, you can tuck the excess length of the strap into the grip's pockets.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon Speedlite 90EX from Vello will diffuse the light output of the Canon Speedlite 90EX flash, producing softer shadows and a more natural glow rather than the harsher light effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame.The lightweight, compact Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the Canon Speedlite 90EX with customized fitting, and without the need for touch fastener tabs.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon Speedlite 90EX from Vello will diffuse the light output of the Canon Speedlite 90EX flash, producing softer shadows and a more natural glow rather than the harsher light effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser provides even coverage across the entire frame.

The lightweight, compact Bounce Dome simply slides onto and off the Canon Speedlite 90EX with customized fitting, and without the need for touch fastener tabs.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello 1/4"-20 Camera Screw - 14mm Long (2-Pack) is a set of two dual-purpose replacement thumbscrews for Vello's CB series mounting brackets, such as the CB-100, CB-200, and CB-600. 

These screws feature a 1/4" stud on top and a 1/4" female thread underneath. The stud attaches the mounting bracket to the bottom of a camera, and the female thread enables mounting the bracket and camera to a tripod, fluid head, ball head, or other gear. You can also use these screws to attach accessories to camera rigs. 

Each screw is 14mm long and has a knurled knob for tightening.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello 1/4"-20 Camera Screw - 14mm Long (2-Pack) is a set of two dual-purpose replacement thumbscrews for Vello's CB series mounting brackets, such as the CB-100, CB-200, and CB-600.

These screws feature a 1/4" stud on top and a 1/4" female thread underneath. The stud attaches the mounting bracket to the bottom of a camera, and the female thread enables mounting the bracket and camera to a tripod, fluid head, ball head, or other gear. You can also use these screws to attach accessories to camera rigs.

Each screw is 14mm long and has a knurled knob for tightening.

OVERVIEW: The BG-N11 Battery Grip For Nikon D7100 & D7200 from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D7100 and D7200 DSLR camera and accepts one Nikon EN-EL15 battery. With one battery in the grip and one in the camera, shooting time is effectively doubled. The BG-N11 can also hold and utilize 6 AA batteries. Two battery trays, one for the EN-EL15 and one for the 6 AAs, are included.The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N11 integrates an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The shutter button offers a lock position to prevent accidental release. In addition, the BG-N11 has an alternate AE-L/AF-L button, multi selector and main and sub-command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a space for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The BG-N11 Battery Grip For Nikon D7100 & D7200 from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D7100 and D7200 DSLR camera and accepts one Nikon EN-EL15 battery. With one battery in the grip and one in the camera, shooting time is effectively doubled. The BG-N11 can also hold and utilize 6 AA batteries. Two battery trays, one for the EN-EL15 and one for the 6 AAs, are included.

The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N11 integrates an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The shutter button offers a lock position to prevent accidental release. In addition, the BG-N11 has an alternate AE-L/AF-L button, multi selector and main and sub-command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a space for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Fluorescent Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon Speedlite 600EX-RT softens the light output of a flash, reducing harsh shadows that are often the result when using direct illumination. The dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in the 35mm format as well as their equivalents in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.This dome has a green tint to match the color emitted by fluorescent lights that is sometimes not readily visible to the eye but can be seen in your photo. With the dome on your flash, simply set your camera to fluorescent balance.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello Fluorescent Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon Speedlite 600EX-RT softens the light output of a flash, reducing harsh shadows that are often the result when using direct illumination. The dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in the 35mm format as well as their equivalents in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.

This dome has a green tint to match the color emitted by fluorescent lights that is sometimes not readily visible to the eye but can be seen in your photo. With the dome on your flash, simply set your camera to fluorescent balance.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Warm Bounce Dome Diffuser for Canon Speedlite 600EX-RT softens the light output of the flash, reducing harsh shadows that are often the result when using direct flash. The dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format as well as their equivalent in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.This dome has an amber tint to match the color emitted by tungsten halogen and incandescent bulbs. With the dome on your flash, simply set your camera to tungsten balance. Additionally, the diffuser can be used outdoors to lend warmth to skin tones in open shade or to match the light balance of a sunset or sunrise portrait.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Wireless Shutterboss Kit for Nikon from B&H combines the multi-functional wireless remote control with connection for select Nikon cameras with a second 10-pin cable that is compatible with more Nikon, Fujifilm and Kodak cameras.The Wireless Shutterboss offers remote control of your camera's shutter as well as self-timer, interval timer, long exposure timer functions, and the ability to control the number of continuous shutter releases. One transmitter can trigger multiple receivers and if offers 99 channels. It can function within a range of 250' (80 m).With both cables included in this kit, the Wireless Shutterboss is compatible with the following cameras: Nikon: D4, D3, D3x, D3s, D2, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D1, D1H, D1X, D200, D300, D300x, D300s, D700, D800 & D800E, D90, D600, D3100, D3200, D5000, D5100, D5200, D7000 & D7100
 Fuji: S3 and S5
 Kodak: DCS-14N
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello Wireless Shutterboss Kit for Nikon from B&H combines the multi-functional wireless remote control with connection for select Nikon cameras with a second 10-pin cable that is compatible with more Nikon, Fujifilm and Kodak cameras.

The Wireless Shutterboss offers remote control of your camera's shutter as well as self-timer, interval timer, long exposure timer functions, and the ability to control the number of continuous shutter releases. One transmitter can trigger multiple receivers and if offers 99 channels. It can function within a range of 250' (80 m).

With both cables included in this kit, the Wireless Shutterboss is compatible with the following cameras:

Nikon: D4, D3, D3x, D3s, D2, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D1, D1H, D1X, D200, D300, D300x, D300s, D700, D800 & D800E, D90, D600, D3100, D3200, D5000, D5100, D5200, D7000 & D7100
Fuji: S3 and S5
Kodak: DCS-14N

OVERVIEW: The Nikon D600 & D610 Accessory Kit from B&H bundles a handful of accessories that fit the Nikon D600 & D610 DSLR and together, allow for enhanced performance and longevity from the D600 or D610. A battery grip offers extended shooting time and a secondary shutter button and several controls positioned to make shooting in the vertical position stable and comfortable. An additional battery extends shooting time and a wireless remote shutter release offers 16 channels and control over numerous camera functions. A glass LCD protector blocks UV rays and protects your LCD from scratches and damage and lens cap holder sticks to your lens cap and allows it to hang from your lens while shooting, so as not to lose it.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The Nikon D600 & D610 Accessory Kit from B&H bundles a handful of accessories that fit the Nikon D600 & D610 DSLR and together, allow for enhanced performance and longevity from the D600 or D610. A battery grip offers extended shooting time and a secondary shutter button and several controls positioned to make shooting in the vertical position stable and comfortable. An additional battery extends shooting time and a wireless remote shutter release offers 16 channels and control over numerous camera functions. A glass LCD protector blocks UV rays and protects your LCD from scratches and damage and lens cap holder sticks to your lens cap and allows it to hang from your lens while shooting, so as not to lose it.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello LH-DC60 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's PowerShot SX50 HS, SX40 HS, and SX30 IS cameras.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello AB003 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Tamron's 18-270mm and 17-50mm f/2.8 XR Di II VC lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution. This lens hood features anti-reflective ridges on its interior.

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Canon EOS Rebel SL1 camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. The protector enables touchscreen operation. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

OVERVIEW: Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Nikon D600 & D610 from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive. This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D600 & D610 digital camera.

OVERVIEW: The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Micro Four Thirds Mount from Vello allows your lens to focus closer than its normal minimum focus distance. By placing distance between your camera body and lens, focusing distance is shortened and the effect of magnifying your subject is created. Extension tubes enable macro performance for lenses not otherwise able to focus that close, and are also suited for close-up portraiture. The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Micro Four Thirds mount contains two extension tubes of 10mm and 16mm lengths. They can be used individually or together to create the desired magnification effect. For closer focusing use the larger extension tube or stack the tubes together. It is even possible to stack these two tubes with others from another set. Extension tubes have no optical elements so they do not degrade the quality of your lenses. These are fully automatic extension tubes in that they are able to communicate all electronic functions from lens to camera including autofocus and auto exposure. They are built with metal lens mounts for durability and longevity and enable you to convert almost any lens into a macro lens at a fraction of the cost while maintaining the lens' original optical quality.

OVERVIEW: The Auto Lens Adapter - Four Thirds Lens to Micro Four Thirds Camera from Vello allows you to mount an Olympus or Panasonic Four Thirds lens to any Panasonic, Olympus, or Black Magic Micro Four Thirds camera body. This metal adapter retains the full functionality of your Micro Four Thirds camera, including auto-focus, auto-exposure, and touch screen capability, when using Four Thirds lenses.

OVERVIEW: Create beautiful lighting and take advantage of your shoe-mounted flash's true potential with the FreeWave Aviator Wireless Flash Trigger Transceiver from Vello. Dedicated to Canon's E-TTL II system, users will have full functionality with modern automatic flash settings. This transceiver is also able to function as either a master transmitter/trigger or a slave receiver for maximum versatility. Operation is reliable as well due to the Aviator's use of a 2.4 GHz radio frequency to provide a range of up to 300' without the need for line-of-sight. The Aviator Transceiver has access to 16 different channels, ensuring limited interference with other users and the wireless technology set up in your venue. Users will also have access to 3 different groups with which to organize their flashes (A, B, C). The group controls of the Aviator allow for separate adjustment of the flashes in either TTL or manual modes as well as the ability to set group ratios in A:B or A:BC configurations. Setting up the Aviator is simple as it easily slides into your camera's hot shoe to receive TTL information and also offers top hot shoe for adding another flash to the mix. For ease of use, all information is accessible via a backlit LCD screen and it has a standard 3.5mm sync port. Also, it has high-speed sync and a mini-USB port for firmware updates. It runs on two AA batteries.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

It runs on two AA batteries.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Only flash units using E-TTL II are compatible; older flash units using E-TTL (original ver.) are not supported in TTL mode

OVERVIEW:
The Vello FreeWave Viewer VL Wireless Live View Remote consists of a 2.4GHz radio transmitter, and a monitor receiver with a 3.5" Live View TFT-LCD screen. Together, the transmitter and receiver provide a wireless viewing system that enables remote shutter control from a distance of up to 328'/100m. The main feature of this unit is that it can also start and stop video recording on select Canon cameras by means of the optional FW-IRC IR cable.

The live view monitor features a 3.5" display with a 320 x 240 resolution that is able to provide a view of what your camera is seeing. A removable pop-up shade allows for improved viewing when shooting in direct sunlight or brightly lit situations. The monitor's design integrates a remote shutter release button that supports half-press control for pre-focusing. A dedicated button allows switching between AV (live view) and CCTV modes for different perspectives of monitoring, and a channel switch button permits changing between different transmitter channels. A 1/4"-20 tripod mount is located on the bottom of the unit for hands free viewing. Both the brightness and contrast of the display can be manually controlled.

The transmitter can be attached to the camera via its hot shoe, and connects to the camera using a required data cable. The AV connection provides the live view signal for remote viewing on the monitor and the shutter release connection allows for wirelessly triggering the shutter from the monitor. A CCTV camera is integrated into the transmitter's design and incorporates a 45mm lens (35mm equivalent focal length) to provide another perspective for viewing subjects in front of the camera. The CCTV camera is especially useful to monitor when a moving subject is about to enter the frame for situations when you're using a telephoto or long lens to photograph. Additionally this camera's functionality is ideal for use when the connected camera does not support live view or if trying to conserve the camera's battery life for extended viewing sessions. The 2.4GHz radio transmitter has four selectable channels for greater control when more than one unit is being used within 328' proximity.In order to use the FreeWave Viewer VL, the purchase of the correct camera-compatible data cable for your camera is required.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Vello Auto Lens Adapter for Canon EF/EF-S Lenses to Canon EOS M Camera enables you to use your Canon EF and EF-S lenses with the Canon EOS M mirrorless digital camera system, which uses an EF-M lens mount. It is fully compatible with all lens functions, including image stabilization, electronic aperture control, and autofocus. A tripod adapter is provided for reducing strain on the camera when using heavier lenses. This mount can be removed for using longer telephoto lenses that feature their own tripod collar. And, included with the adapter are front and rear caps for storage.

OVERVIEW: The TC-N1 Tripod Collar for Nikon 70-200mm f/4 G Lens from Vello is designed for the Nikon 70-200mm f/4 G telephoto lens and attaches directly to the lens to provide a stable and well-balanced mount when lens and camera are attached to tripod. The built-in tripod collar improves balance and reduces pressure on the lens mount when shooting with long lenses because it attaches directly to the lens. The ring design and thumbscrews make rotating your lens easier and vertical alignment marks help when changing the orientation from horizontal to vertical. With the included bushing, either a 3/8" or a 1/4" tripod mount can be used.

The built-in tripod collar improves balance and reduces pressure on the lens mount when shooting with long lenses because it attaches directly to the lens. OVERVIEW: This pack of Anti-Static Screen Cleaning Wipes from Vello contains 5 individually-wrapped, antibacterial wipes that remove dust, dirt, fingerprints and residues from LCDs and other screens. They're safe for various display types, though not recommended for use on optical glass. The wipes are made of soft, tissue-like paper with a degreasing agent and a special coating to prevent scratches. For best results, clean your screen using small, circular motions.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello FreeWave Fusion Wireless Remote Kit with 2 Receivers for Canon is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 320' away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple light groups requires separate purchase of additional FreeWave Fusion Receiver.
The FreeWave Fusion also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures. The FreeWave Fusion uses the 2.4GHz frequency for you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320'/100 m).
 Included Shutter Release Cables Support:
 Canon EOS: Elan series, Digital Rebel (300D), XT (350D), XTi (400D), XSi (450D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), T3 (1100D), T3i (600D), T4i (650D), T5 (1200D), T5i (700D), T6i (750D), T6s (760D), SL1 (100D) and XS (1000D), 60D & 70D
10D, 20D, 30D, 40D, 50D, 5D, 5D Mark II, 5D Mark III, 6D, 7D, 7D Mark II, 1D, 1D Mark II, 1D Mark II N, 1D Mark III, 1D Mark IV, 1Ds, 1Ds Mark II, 1Ds Mark III, 1D X and 1D C
PowerShot G10, G11, G12, G15, G16 & G1 X; SX50, SX60
 Contax: N and 645
 Hasselblad: H series
 Pentax: K10D, K20D, K100D, K110D, K200D, K-3, K-5, K-5 II, K-7, K30, K-50, K-500, *istDS, DS2, DS, DL2, DL, and D
 Samsung: NX10 & NX100; GX-1S, GX-1L, GX-10 & GX-20
 Sigma: SD1, SD9, SD10, SD14 & SD15

OVERVIEW:
The  Vello FreeWave Fusion Wireless Remote Kit with 2 Receivers for Nikon from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 320 feet away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple light groups requires additional FreeWave Fusion Receivers (available separately).
The FreeWave Fusion also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures. The FreeWave Fusion operates the 2.4GHz frequency for reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100 m).

OVERVIEW:
The Vello FreeWave Fusion Pro Kit with 2 Receivers for Canon DSLRs put together by B&H is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 600' away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple lights requires separate purchase of additional FreeWave Fusion Pro Receivers.The FreeWave Fusion Pro also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range up to 600', and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight.
The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. The transmitter connects to the hot shoe of the camera. In case the hot shoe is needed for another function, the transmitter can alternatively connect to the camera's PC plug via its 3.5mm sync plug (PC cable not included). The transmitter also features a top hot shoe, which fully supports E-TTL metering when used with Canon TTL compatible components. This allows you to keep a TTL flash mounted on top of the camera, while using the transmitter to control off-camera flash units (in manual mode) via radio signal.
Note!Since the FreeWave Fusion Pro does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually. 
The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for flash wake-up functionality and/or high shutter speeds, you will need full Canon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion Pro trigger.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Viewer VL AV & Shutter Release Cable for Nikon D3100, D90, and D7000 from Vello will connect your camera to the FreeWave Viewer VL transmitter and allow the transmitter to send a live preview feed to the viewer. One end of the cable connects to the transmitter, and the other end to the camera. The side of the cable that connects to the camera splits in two; one side is a 3.5mm AV connection for sending the video signal to your viewer, and the other is a DC2 connection for the shutter release to fire the camera.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello White Balance Large/Medium/Small Card Kit contains three sizes of cards to cover a variety of shooting situations. The sets measure 10 x 7.9", 5.1 x 3.9" and 3.25 x 2.0". Each set comes with a neutral white card, medium gray card and a black card. The two smaller sizes included a removable lanyard to wear the set around your neck.

The white card is usually used to establish neutral color balance. You can take a pre-production reading off of it and save the reading in your camera's white balance presets for later use in the same lighting situation. The gray card will give you an average exposure. Alternatively, you can include both cards in a test shot and tweak the color and exposure in post-production. The white and black cards can also be used to establish absolute white and black in Photoshop.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Fluorescent and Warming Bounce Dome Diffusers Kit for Canon 430EX/II Flash from B&H contains two separate bounce diffusers to help soften the light from your external flash while balancing its color temperature with the surrounding indoor lighting conditions. Both diffusers easily slip onto the Canon 430EX or 430EX II flash without the need of any kind of fastener and work to effectively soften and diffuse the light emitted from the flash, helping to minimize harsh shadows within the scene. The fluorescent diffuser has a green tint to balance the flash's color with the color balance of fluorescent light, and the warming diffuser has an amber tint in order to match it to the color temperature of tungsten light sources.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Wireless ShutterBoss Timer Remote Kit for Select Sony Camerasfrom B&H combines the ShutterBoss wireless remote with the release cables that enable the remote to work with most Sony cameras that will accept a remote shutter release. 
The Wireless Shutterboss doesn't just trip your shutter wirelessly. It's also equipped to handle a long list of timer functions: self-timer, interval timer, long exposure timer, as well as controlling the number of continuous shutter releases. The transmitter works at distances up to 250' (80 m) on any one of 99 channels over a reliable 2.4GHz frequency. Timer delays, exposure times, and intervals can be set for up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds, in one-second increments. You can also choose anywhere from 1 to 99 continuous shots or you can set the ShutterBoss to take an unlimited number of photos. The receiver uses a CR2 lithium battery, and the transmitter uses 2x AAA batteries, which can last up to 4 years on standby. 
 This remote model includes the release cable needed for Nikon 10-pin type cameras and provides compatibility as such. However, because the remote also fits on Sony's Multi-Interface shoe and because this kit also includes the Sony 3 Pin (Alpha) type and Sony Multi-Terminal type shutter release cables, this kit is now compatible with the following Sony cameras:

Sony A3000, A5000, A6000, A7, A7R, A77 II, HX300, HX400, HX50v, RX100 Mark II, RX100 Mark III, SLT-A58, & SLT-A99

OVERVIEW:
The Vello FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release Kit for Select Sony Cameras from B&H combines the versatile FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release with the release cables that enable the remote to work with most Sony cameras that will accept a remote shutter release.
The Freewave Wireless Remote allows you to shoot your camera from a distance of up to 320' and because it uses radio frequency technology a direct line of sight is not necessary. Shooting with a remote is beneficial for numerous photographic applications from shooting wildlife, where getting too close is a problem, to macro shooting, when even touching the camera poses difficulties, to working with a model where constant eye contact is important.
This remote model includes the release cables needed for most Canon cameras and provides compatibility as such. However, because the remote also fits on Sony's Multi-Interface shoe and because this kit also includes the Sony 3 Pin (Alpha) type and Sony Multi-Terminal type shutter release cables, this kit is now compatible with the following Sony cameras:
Sony A3000, A5000, A6000, A7, A7R, A77 II, HX300, HX400, HX50v, RX100 Mark II, RX100 Mark III, SLT-A58, & SLT-A99

OVERVIEW: This B&H Kit is configured specifically for the Sony A99 and includes the Vello FreeWave Fusion Wireless Flash Trigger Remote Control for Nikon DSLRs and a Camera Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras.The remote can trigger flash units and studio lights up to 320' and configure up to three separate light groups. In addition, the FreeWave Fusion acts as a remote control for your camera's shutter release allowing you to fire your camera from up to 320' away. Because the remote works on radio waves it will transmit through walls, windows and even floors. Its 2.4GHz frequency offers reduced radio interference and the extended range. This Freewave Fusion model is designed for select Nikon cameras and includes the cabling for Nikon compatibility but because it will also fit on Sony's Multi-Interface Shoe and is supplied with the FreeWave Camera Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras, this exclusive B&H kit is entirely compatible with Sony's flagship SLT-A99 DSLR.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This B&H Kit is configured specifically for the Sony A99 and includes the Vello FreeWave Fusion Wireless Flash Trigger Remote Control for Nikon DSLRs and a Camera Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras.

The remote can trigger flash units and studio lights up to 320' and configure up to three separate light groups. In addition, the FreeWave Fusion acts as a remote control for your camera's shutter release allowing you to fire your camera from up to 320' away. Because the remote works on radio waves it will transmit through walls, windows and even floors. Its 2.4GHz frequency offers reduced radio interference and the extended range. 

This Freewave Fusion model is designed for select Nikon cameras and includes the cabling for Nikon compatibility but because it will also fit on Sony's Multi-Interface Shoe and is supplied with the FreeWave Camera Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras, this exclusive B&H kit is entirely compatible with Sony's flagship SLT-A99 DSLR.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Since the FreeWave Fusion does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.

The FreeWave Fusion is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for flash wake-up functionality and/or high shutter speeds, you will need full Nikon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion trigger.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release Kit for Select Sony Cameras from B&H combines the FreeWave Plus wireless remote with the release cables that enable the remote to work with most Sony cameras that will accept a remote shutter release.The FreeWave Plus works in either wired or wireless mode and will fire your camera from a distance of up to 320'. This is ideal for photographing wildlife, and for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. The dual function release allows you to focus by pressing the release button halfway and is capable of multiple exposures and long exposures as well.
This remote model includes the release cables needed for most Canon cameras and provides compatibility as such. However, because the remote also fits on Sony's Multi-Interface shoe and because this kit also includes the Sony 3 Pin (Alpha) type and Sony Multi-Terminal type shutter release cables, this kit is now compatible with the following Sony cameras:
 Sony: Alpha A100, A200, A300, A330, A350, A500, A550, A560, A580, A700, A850, A900, SLT A33, SLT A35, SLT A37, SLT A55, SLT A57, SLT A65, SLT A77 and SLT A99; a58, a77 II, a3000, a5000, a6000, a7, a7 II, a7R, a7R II, a7S, a7S II; DSC-RX1R II, RX10, RX10 II, RX100 II, RX100 III, RX100 IV, HX50V, HX90V, HX300, HX400, HX400V
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The Compact Shoe Stand for Universal Shoe Mount Accessories from Vello features three different positions for you to mount most speedlights and cold-shoe accessories, such as a flash, a remote trigger, and a microphone. It can be mounted to stands or clamps via the secure metal 1/4"-20 female thread on the bottom of the mount. The shoe stand is compatible with standard shoe mounts including the Nikon SB-910, but excluding the Nikon SB-900, Sony/Minolta iISO, Sony Multi-Interface, and Pentax flashes.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Nikon F Mount Lens to C-Mount Camera Adapter allows you to attach a Nikon F mount lens, including Ai type lenses, to a C-mount camera body. Thread the all-metal adapter onto your C-mount camera and then mount your lens. You can adjust the alignment of the witness mark orientation without affecting the flange focus distance by loosening three small screws on the adapter and rotating the lens to the desired position. Autofocus, automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no electrical communication between camera body and lens. You will need to focus manually, and to set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority mode. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Vello Nikon F Mount Lens to C-Mount Camera Adapter allows you to attach a Nikon F mount lens, including Ai type lenses, to a C-mount camera body. Thread the all-metal adapter onto your C-mount camera and then mount your lens. You can adjust the alignment of the witness mark orientation without affecting the flange focus distance by loosening three small screws on the adapter and rotating the lens to the desired position.

Autofocus, automatic aperture and AE metering will be disabled by the lens adapter as there will be no electrical communication between camera body and lens. You will need to focus manually, and to set exposures manually or meter in aperture priority mode. The lens will retain its ability to focus to infinity.

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Canon 70D and 80D camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. The protector enables touchscreen operation. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Fluorescent and Warming Bounce Dome Diffusers Kit for Canon 600EX-RT & Yongnuo YN600EX-RT Flash from B&H contains two separate bounce dome diffusers to help soften the light output of the flash while also balancing the flash's color temperature with the surrounding lights. Each dome provides even coverage across the entire frame and is ideal for use with lenses from 15mm to 200mm in 35mm format as well as their equivalent in other formats. Since each Bounce Dome is custom made for the flash, it slips on and off without the need for touch fastener tabs.

For balancing the color temperature of your flash this kit includes both fluorescent and tungsten diffusers. The fluorescent diffuser has a green tint to balance the flash's color with fluorescent light, and the warming diffuser has an amber tint in order to match it to tungsten light sources. Additionally, the warming diffuser can be used outdoors to lend warmth to skin tones in open shade or to match the light balance of a sunset or sunrise portrait.

OVERVIEW: The BG-C10 Battery Grip for Canon 70D & 80D from Vello is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Canon EOS 70D or 80D DSLR camera, and accepts one or two Canon LP-E6 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. The BG-C10 can also run off of 6 AA batteries, when using the included AA battery tray (rechargeable batteries recommended).The design of the grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. To facilitate shooting when held vertically, the BG-C10 comes with a vertical shutter release button, as well as AF control buttons, and a main dial. The BG-C10 is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, and a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod or mounting plate. The grip also includes a drawstring pouch to protect whichever battery holder is not in use.The BG-C10 will not work with Duracell brand alkaline batteries.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The BG-C10 Battery Grip for Canon 70D & 80D from Vello is a battery grip designed for use specifically with the Canon EOS 70D or 80D DSLR camera, and accepts one or two Canon LP-E6 batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. The BG-C10 can also run off of 6 AA batteries, when using the included AA battery tray (rechargeable batteries recommended).

The design of the grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. To facilitate shooting when held vertically, the BG-C10 comes with a vertical shutter release button, as well as AF control buttons, and a main dial. The BG-C10 is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, and a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod or mounting plate. The grip also includes a drawstring pouch to protect whichever battery holder is not in use.

The BG-C10 will not work with Duracell brand alkaline batteries.

OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave Fusion Basic Receiver from Vello is an additional receiver for use in multi-light or multi-camera setups, in which all devices are being triggered by the FreeWave Fusion Basic transmitter. It features a frequency of 433 MHz for non-line-of-sight triggering of flashes up to 50' away or cameras up to 150' away. It also can be set to one of sixteen available channels to limit interference and supports flash sync speeds of up to 1/200 second. Additionally, multiple receivers can be triggered by one transmitter, as long as they are set to the same channel.

The receiver features a female hot shoe on top for attaching an on-camera flash and features two sync ports for connecting to either a studio strobe or a camera. Mounting the receiver is done through the use of a cold shoe on the base that also has a 1/4"-20 thread. It includes a 2.5mm to 3.5mm cable, a 2.5mm to PC cable, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter, as well as two AAA batteries for power.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The FreeWave Fusion Basic Receiver from Vello is an additional receiver for use in multi-light or multi-camera setups, in which all devices are being triggered by the FreeWave Fusion Basic transmitter. It features a frequency of 433 MHz for non-line-of-sight triggering of flashes up to 50' away or cameras up to 150' away. It also can be set to one of sixteen available channels to limit interference and supports flash sync speeds of up to 1/200 second. Additionally, multiple receivers can be triggered by one transmitter, as long as they are set to the same channel.

The receiver features a female hot shoe on top for attaching an on-camera flash and features two sync ports for connecting to either a studio strobe or a camera. Mounting the receiver is done through the use of a cold shoe on the base that also has a 1/4"-20 thread. It includes a 2.5mm to 3.5mm cable, a 2.5mm to PC cable, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter, as well as two AAA batteries for power.

OVERVIEW: Remotely trigger your camera's shutter with the Bluetooth ShutterBoss Advanced Intervalometer from Vello. The intervalometer works with most Canon DSLR cameras, and allows you to control your camera from a compatible iOS smart device. In addition to the intervalometer mode, you can also trigger the shutter in single shot mode, continuous mode, bulb mode, or self-timer mode. The Bluetooth ShutterBoss is ideal for shooting time lapse videos, star trails, or any other image where you need to remotely trigger your camera. Remotely triggering your camera can help capture sharp images by preventing you from actually pressing the shutter button on the camera. The iOS app makes it easy to set all of your required settings for the given situation, upload them to the ShutterBoss, and let the trigger do the rest. Whether it's for simple shutter release, extended self-timer options, continuous shooting, long exposures, or time-lapse shooting, the Bluetooth ShutterBoss is the ideal tool for the job.

OVERVIEW: This B&H Kit is configured specifically for the Sony A99 and A77 II (not original A77 model) and includes the Vello FreeWave Fusion Pro Wireless Flash Trigger & Remote Control for Nikon DSLRs and a Camera Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras. The Fusion Pro is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 600' away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple lights requires separate purchase of additional FreeWave Fusion Pro Receivers.The FreeWave Fusion Pro also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range up to 600' and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight.Optional shutter release cables are available to make the remote control function compatible with other brand camera models.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This B&H Kit is configured specifically for the Sony A99 and A77 II (not original A77 model) and includes the Vello FreeWave Fusion Pro Wireless Flash Trigger & Remote Control for Nikon DSLRs and a Camera Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras.

The Fusion Pro is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 600' away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple lights requires separate purchase of additional FreeWave Fusion Pro Receivers.

The FreeWave Fusion Pro also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range up to 600' and since radio signals pass through obstructions you don't need to position them in line-of-sight.

Optional shutter release cables are available to make the remote control function compatible with other brand camera models.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Since the FreeWave Fusion Pro does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.

The FreeWave Fusion Pro is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for Nikon flash wake-up functionality you will need full Nikon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion Pro trigger.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello EW-83L Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 24-70mm f/4L IS USM lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The dedicated Vello EW-83L Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 24-70mm f/4L IS USM lens.

Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Olympus E-M5 camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. The protector enables touchscreen operation. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. The protector enables touchscreen operation. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

OVERVIEW: Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Nikon D7100 from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive. This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D7100 digital camera.

A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive.

This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D7100 digital camera.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello HB-53 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Nikon's 24-120mm f/4 ED VR lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The dedicated Vello HB-53 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Nikon's 24-120mm f/4 ED VR lens.

Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello Speedy Camera Rotating Flash Bracket with TTL Off-Camera Flash Cord for Canon EOS Cameras (1.5') Kit from B&H Photo combines a lightweight flash bracket and flash cord to give you the benefits of setting up an off-camera flash with full TTL capabilities.The Speedy Bracket is a quick, simple way to switch between vertical and horizontal view with your camera using a shoe mount flash, without missing a shot or changing the look of your light. The bracket smoothly rotates your camera, easily switching between horizontal and vertical positions, while keeping your flash stationary and centered above the lens at all times. It is designed so that you can use your camera's own grip to shoot photos. The Speedy Bracket's cushioned bracket arm can also double as a comfortable carrying handle.

The included Canon EOS compatible TTL off-camera flash cord provides photographers with the ability to fire off-camera Canon compatible speedlights. Mounting a camera on the Speedy Bracket with the TTL cord removes harsh shadows when shooting in portrait mode, and reduces red-eye altogether, while maintaining TTL capabilities.

One side of the TTL cord fits directly into the camera's hot shoe to ensure that all of the camera's exposure data is maintained. The other side fits onto the Speedy Bracket, where your flash will be attached.

This coiled cord measures 1.5' (0.5 m), which is an ideal distance to accommodate the Speedy Bracket.

OVERVIEW: The Vello V-Rig 4.1" Triple Shoe Bracket mounts onto a camera's accessory shoe in order to provide three additional accessory shoes for mounting lights, monitors, microphones, or other accessories. In addition to the shoe mount, a 1/4"-20 thread is also available for attaching the bracket to a tripod, rig, or other bracket featuring a 1/4"-20-threaded mount. The bracket is constructed from rigid, yet lightweight single-piece aluminum alloy, and the mounting shoes are machined out of the same piece as the bracket, for additional strength. The accessory shoes also feature backstops for greater security when attaching accessories. The bottom shoe that attaches to the camera features a locking pin, which keeps the shoe in place and prevents the shoe from rotating during use.

OVERVIEW:
The 6.5" wide CB-4850 V-Bar Triple Shoe Bracket from Vello mounts onto a hot or cold shoe and provides three additional accessory cold shoe mounts for attaching lights, monitors, microphones, recorders or other accessories. The shoes are well spaced, with one in the center, one left and one right, and the bracket's tiered design positions them at different levels--low, middle and high--so that mounted accessories will not interfere with one another.

Slide the base of the bracket into the camera's shoe, and then turn the knurled locking knob to tighten it onto the camera's shoe for security. As an alternative, you can connect the bracket's 1/4"-20 threaded mount to a standard 1/4"-20 screw on a tripod, rig, or other bracket.

To ensure a more secure hold on accessories, the CB-4850 features backstops on all three shoes. Additionally, it has a locking pin on the bottom to prevent rotation. The bracket is constructed from several pieces of sturdy aluminum.

OVERVIEW: This Vello Accessory Kit for Canon 70D & 80D DSLR Camera from B&H Photo bundles a spare LP-E6 lithium-ion battery pack, the Vello BG-C10 Battery Grip, a wireless remote shutter release, an ultra-thin LCD screen protector, and a lens cap holder. Extend your shooting time with your Canon 70D or 80D while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, offering wireless shutter release capability for clear, shake-free images from hundreds of feet away. Additionally, shield your LCD monitor against dirt, scratches, smudges and more, and prevent the loss of your lens caps.The Vello BG-C10 Battery Grip can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to 2 LP-E6 batteries or 6 AAs. It also offers alternate shutter release, AF and main dial controls for easier operation when shooting in the vertical orientation.The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, offers 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. You can also remotely control the length of long exposures. The release's 2.4GHz frequency reduces radio interference and extends the usable range to 320'.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Vello Accessory Kit for Canon 70D & 80D DSLR Camera from B&H Photo bundles a spare LP-E6 lithium-ion battery pack, the Vello BG-C10 Battery Grip, a wireless remote shutter release, an ultra-thin LCD screen protector, and a lens cap holder. Extend your shooting time with your Canon 70D or 80D while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, offering wireless shutter release capability for clear, shake-free images from hundreds of feet away. Additionally, shield your LCD monitor against dirt, scratches, smudges and more, and prevent the loss of your lens caps.

The Vello BG-C10 Battery Grip can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to 2 LP-E6 batteries or 6 AAs. It also offers alternate shutter release, AF and main dial controls for easier operation when shooting in the vertical orientation.

The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, offers 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. You can also remotely control the length of long exposures. The release's 2.4GHz frequency reduces radio interference and extends the usable range to 320'.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Captain Wireless TTL Flash Trigger and Remote TTL Shutter Release System for Canon E-TTL SLRs from Vello is a multi-purpose 2.4 GHz, 4-channel digital E-TTL radio system that gives wireless freedom from a PC cord plus the convenience of accurate exposures through wireless communication with your camera's E-TTL flash technology. Imagine the near impossibility of running 300' lengths of PC cord to shoot outdoors, then imagine the wireless freedom of remote triggered, camera control with auto exposure in a radius up to 300'. Using 2 shoe mount E-TTL flashes and an assistant you'd have enough mobility to light groups, demos, shows, portraits and events on location, on-the-fly. And the benefits aren't limited to flash photography either. You can also use the receiver with the included camera cord and handhold the transmitter to wirelessly trigger your camera in single shot, continuous shot, bulb, and timer modes. This is of paramount importance in situations where a subject, such as wildlife, may be difficult to approach. Additionally, the wireless function of the device reduces the potential of camera shake when doing macro, close-up, and long exposure photography. The Captain system can also be combined with the non-TTL FreeWave Fusion LR system, and additional FreeWave Fusion LR receivers can be integrated into the Captain system. The Vello FreeWave Wireless TTL Captain's High Speed Sync and Second Curtain Sync functions create easy to control lighting effects and other creative options such as stop-action shooting and a wide degree of background or ambient light control.

The Vello FreeWave Wireless TTL Captain's High Speed Sync and Second Curtain Sync functions create easy to control lighting effects and other creative options such as stop-action shooting and a wide degree of background or ambient light control.

OVERVIEW: The  FreeWave Captain Wireless TTL Receiver for Nikon i-TTL from Vello is part of a multi-purpose 2.4 GHz, 4-channel digital TTL radio system that gives wireless freedom from a PC cord plus the convenience of accurate exposures through wireless communication with your camera's i-TTL flash technology. Coupled with a separately purchased FreeWave Captain Wireless TTL Transmitter, the system not only enables remote triggering but also camera control with auto exposure in a radius up to 300'. Solo shooters can add depth to portraits and group shots by attaching a receiver to an i-TTL flash mounted on a stand for hands-free shooting. Using 2 shoe mount flashes, an additional receiver and an assistant you'd have enough mobility to light groups, demos, shows, portraits and events on location, on-the-fly. And the benefits aren't limited to flash photography either. You can also use the receiver with the included camera cord and handhold an optional transmitter to wirelessly trigger your camera in single shot, continuous shot, bulb, and timer modes, with or without flash. This is of paramount importance in situations where a subject, such as wildlife, may be difficult to approach. Additionally, the wireless function of the device reduces the potential of camera shake when doing macro, close-up, and long exposure photography. The Vello FreeWave Captain Wireless TTL Receiver's High Speed Sync and Second Curtain Sync functions create easy to control lighting effects and other creative options such as stop-action shooting and a wide degree of background or ambient light control.

OVERVIEW: The Vello FreeWave Viewer VL Wireless Live View Remote Kit with AV/Shutter & Infrared Cables for Select Canon Cameras from B&H is a transmitter and 3.5" monitor kit that includes a FreeWave Viewer VL AV/Remote Cable designed for use with the Canon SL1 (100D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), T3i (600D), T4i (650D), T5 (1200D), T5i (700D), 60D, and 70D cameras for attaching the transmitter to the camera for proper operation. Also included is the infrared cable that allows for starting and stopping video recording on these cameras. This system allows for wireless viewing and remote shutter triggering of your compatible DSLR camera. The Vello FreeWave Viewer VL Wireless Live View Remote consists of a 2.4GHz radio transmitter, and a monitor receiver with a 3.5" Live View TFT-LCD screen. Together, the transmitter and receiver provide a wireless viewing system that enables remote shutter control from a distance of up to 328'/100m. The live view monitor features a 3.5" display with a 320 x 240 resolution that is able to provide a view of what your camera is seeing. A removable pop-up shade allows for improved viewing when shooting in direct sunlight or brightly lit situations. The monitor's design integrates a remote shutter release button that supports half-press control for pre-focusing. A dedicated button allows switching between AV (live view) and CCTV modes for different perspectives of monitoring, and a channel switch button permits changing between different transmitter channels. A 1/4"-20 tripod mount is located on the bottom of the unit for hands free viewing. Both the brightness and contrast of the display can be manually controlled. The transmitter can be attached to the camera via its hot shoe, and connects to the camera using the included Y-cable. The AV connection provides the live view signal for remote viewing on the monitor, and the shutter release connection allows for wirelessly triggering the shutter from the monitor. A CCTV camera is integrated into the transmitter's design and incorporates a 45mm lens (35mm equivalent focal length) to provide another perspective for viewing subjects in front of the camera. The CCTV camera is especially useful to monitor when a moving subject is about to enter the frame for situations when you're using a telephoto or long lens to photograph. Additionally this camera's functionality is ideal for use when the connected camera does not support live view or if trying to conserve the camera's battery life for extended viewing sessions. The 2.4GHz radio transmitter has four selectable channels for greater control when more than one unit is being used within 328' proximity.

A CCTV camera is integrated into the transmitter's design and incorporates a 45mm lens (35mm equivalent focal length) to provide another perspective for viewing subjects in front of the camera. The CCTV camera is especially useful to monitor when a moving subject is about to enter the frame for situations when you're using a telephoto or long lens to photograph. Additionally this camera's functionality is ideal for use when the connected camera does not support live view or if trying to conserve the camera's battery life for extended viewing sessions. The 2.4GHz radio transmitter has four selectable channels for greater control when more than one unit is being used within 328' proximity.

OVERVIEW:
Convert your shoe-mounted flash into a diffuse ring light with the Ringbox from Vello. The portable, collapsible softbox produces an even, soft light that encircles the lens well-suited to close-up fashion, macro, and medical photography. It is compatible with most DSLR and flashes since it attaches to lenses up to 3.9" in diameter with adjustable elastic cords in center opening and secures to the flash head via a strap with hook-and-loop fasteners. 

For maximum portability the Ringbox collapses down to an 8" disc and slides into an included zippered carrying bag. Magnetic rods positioned around the ring allow for quickly collapsing or opening the softbox. Additionally, it weighs 1 lb.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-N12 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D3100, D3200, and D3300 DSLR cameras and accepts one or two EN-EL14 or EN-AL14A batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. More so, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N12 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. In addition, it is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod and a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.The included shutter release cable connects from the socket on the battery grip to the remote release port on the camera body and transmits the shutter release signal from battery grip to the camera.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The BG-N12 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. In addition, it is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod and a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.

The included shutter release cable connects from the socket on the battery grip to the remote release port on the camera body and transmits the shutter release signal from battery grip to the camera.

OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave LR Wireless Flash Trigger and Remote Control from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 600' away. The 2.4 GHz frequency provides reduced radio interference and an extended range without the need for line-of-sight alignment as the radio waves will pass through some walls, windows, and floors. The system is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which offer manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe flash units are not compatible.

Eight different channels let you trigger only chosen specific receivers, or an "all channels" button will trigger all receivers simultaneously. The transmitter's tilting joint allows it to be mounted vertically or horizontally onto your camera's hot shoe.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The receiver is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which offer manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe flash units are not compatible. 

Eight user-selectable channels allow you to control which flashes you want to fire, and LED indicators help you see the selected channel in difficult lighting.

The 2.4 GHz frequency provides reduced radio interference and an extended range without the need for line-of-sight alignment as the radio waves will pass through some walls, windows, and floors. The receiver is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which offer manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe flash units are not compatible.

Eight user-selectable channels allow you to control which flashes you want to fire, and LED indicators help you see the selected channel in difficult lighting.

OVERVIEW: The Vello FreeWave Viewer Video Cable for Canon 5D Mark II enables users to connect their camera to the FreeWave Viewer Wireless Live View Transmitter for remote viewing of their images. It features a gold-plated end that plugs into the transmitter for good conductivity and resistance to corrosion. The other end plugs into the AV port available on the Canon 5D Mark II.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated black Vello LH-X100B Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Fujifilm's X100/X100S cameras.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The LH-X100B is designed with a threaded filter adapter to accept additional 49mm filters.

The LH-X100B is designed with a threaded filter adapter to accept additional 49mm filters.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello BG-N13 Battery Grip for Nikon D5300 enhances shooting capabilities of the Nikon D5300 DSLR camera by providing double the battery power along with increased comfort while using the camera in a vertical shooting position. It features the ability to hold two EN-EL14 or EN-EL14A rechargeable battery packs and has a vertical position shutter release button. The grip also features an anti-slip rubber grip to ensure you will keep a good hold on the camera at all times.

The base of the BG-N13 battery grip incorporates a built-in mounting loop for a hand strap as well as a 1/4"-20 tripod socket for mounting the camera with the grip installed. Also, there is a camera battery door holder to keep you from losing the door when not in use. A shutter release cable is included for providing full functionality of the vertical position shutter release button.

The grip also features an anti-slip rubber grip to ensure you will keep a good hold on the camera at all times.

The base of the BG-N13 battery grip incorporates a built-in mounting loop for a hand strap as well as a 1/4"-20 tripod socket for mounting the camera with the grip installed. Also, there is a camera battery door holder to keep you from losing the door when not in use. A shutter release cable is included for providing full functionality of the vertical position shutter release button.

OVERVIEW:
This Vello Accessory Kit for Canon EOS Rebel T5 DSLR Camera from B&H Photo bundles the Vello BG-C7 Battery Grip with a spare lithium-ion battery pack, a wireless remote shutter release, and a lens cap holder. Extend the shooting time with your Rebel T5 DSLR while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, offering wireless shutter release capability for clear, shake-free images from hundreds of feet away.

The BG-C7 Battery Grip from Vello can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to two LP-E10 lithium-ion batteries, while also affording extra comfort and control when shooting in the vertical orientation. It offers an alternate shutter release button designed for ergonomic access when shooting vertically, and an anti-slip rubber grip for a more secure hold.

The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, has 16 channels and operates on the 2.4GHz frequency for reduced radio interference and an extended range of up to 320'. Capture multiple exposures with a single press of the trigger and remotely control the length of long exposures. Benefit from a convenient delay function, as well.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello HB-69 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Nikon's AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR II lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Sony E Mount from Vello allows your full-frame or APS-C lens to focus closer than its normal minimum focus distance. By placing distance between your camera body and lens, focusing distance is shortened and the effect of magnifying your subject is created. Extension tubes enable macro performance for lenses not otherwise able to focus that close, and are also suited for close-up portraiture. The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Sony E mount contains two extension tubes of 10mm and 16mm lengths. They can be used individually or together to create the desired magnification effect. For closer focusing use the larger extension tube or stack the tubes together. It is even possible to stack these two tubes with others from another set. Extension tubes have no optical elements so they do not degrade the quality of your lenses. These are fully automatic extension tubes in that they are able to communicate all electronic functions from lens to camera including autofocus and auto exposure. They are built with metal lens mounts for durability and longevity and enable you to convert almost any lens into a macro lens at a fraction of the cost while maintaining the lens' original optical quality.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Extension tubes enable macro performance for lenses not otherwise able to focus that close, and are also suited for close-up portraiture.
