OVERVIEW: This Vello D7100 & D7200 Accessory Kit from B&H Photo bundles a spare lithium-ion battery pack, a Vello BG-N11 Battery Grip, a Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release, an LCD screen protector and a lens cap holder. Extend your shooting time with your Nikon D7100 or D7200 DSLR while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, offering wireless shutter release capability for clear, shake-free images from hundreds of feet away. Additionally, shield your LCD monitor against dirt, scratches, smudges and more, and prevent the loss of your lens caps.The Vello BG-N11 Battery Grip effectively doubles your shooting time, holding an extra EN-EL15 battery to supplement the one in your camera. It can also accept 6 AA batteries. The grip offers a comfortable and secure way to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position, and features alternate shutter release, AE-L/AF-L, multi-selector, and main and sub-command dial controls.The Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release, which can also work in wired mode, provides 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. You can also remotely control the length of long exposures. The unit's 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range of up to 320'.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Vello D7100 & D7200 Accessory Kit from B&H Photo bundles a spare lithium-ion battery pack, a Vello BG-N11 Battery Grip, a Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release, an LCD screen protector and a lens cap holder. Extend your shooting time with your Nikon D7100 or D7200 DSLR while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, offering wireless shutter release capability for clear, shake-free images from hundreds of feet away. Additionally, shield your LCD monitor against dirt, scratches, smudges and more, and prevent the loss of your lens caps.

The Vello BG-N11 Battery Grip effectively doubles your shooting time, holding an extra EN-EL15 battery to supplement the one in your camera. It can also accept 6 AA batteries. The grip offers a comfortable and secure way to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position, and features alternate shutter release, AE-L/AF-L, multi-selector, and main and sub-command dial controls.

The Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release, which can also work in wired mode, provides 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. You can also remotely control the length of long exposures. The unit's 2.4GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range of up to 320'.

OVERVIEW: The optical acrylic Vello LCD Screen Protector for Canon Rebel T5 & T6 is designed to protect your camera's screen from scratches, dings, sweat, oily fingerprints, and life's daily grind. Made of 1mm thick polycarbonate this protector guards your valuable camera's screen from dirt, scratches and oily fingerprints. Plus, it blocks UV rays while allowing 92% visible light transmission for clear and bright images. The protector is easily mounted to your camera's LCD screen with an adhesive backing. Once it is properly aligned, the screen should be smoothed down with a clean cloth.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The optical acrylic Vello LCD Screen Protector for Canon Rebel T5 & T6 is designed to protect your camera's screen from scratches, dings, sweat, oily fingerprints, and life's daily grind. Made of 1mm thick polycarbonate this protector guards your valuable camera's screen from dirt, scratches and oily fingerprints. Plus, it blocks UV rays while allowing 92% visible light transmission for clear and bright images. The protector is easily mounted to your camera's LCD screen with an adhesive backing. Once it is properly aligned, the screen should be smoothed down with a clean cloth.
OVERVIEW_NOTE: Environments with excessive heat and/or humidity will shorten the useful life of the adhesive.

OVERVIEW: The EPN-DK25 Eyepiece from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for Nikon D3200, D3300, D5200, D5300 and D5500 cameras. The eyepiece provides a comfortable frame with which to utilize the camera's viewfinder and blocks unwanted light from entering the viewfinder. Made from soft and durable rubber, it also prevents scratching and damage to eyeglasses. It mounts easily and securely to the viewfinder.
OVERVIEW_RAW: The EPN-DK25 Eyepiece from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for Nikon D3200, D3300, D5200, D5300 and D5500 cameras. The eyepiece provides a comfortable frame with which to utilize the camera's viewfinder and blocks unwanted light from entering the viewfinder. Made from soft and durable rubber, it also prevents scratching and damage to eyeglasses. It mounts easily and securely to the viewfinder.

OVERVIEW: The Macrofier Reverse Mount Adapter and Extension Tube for Canon EF/EF-S Lenses from Vello allows you to reverse mount any Canon EF or EF-S lens to your Canon DSLR camera, facilitating extremely close-focus macro and micro photography. An economical alternative to purchasing macro lenses, this all-metal item can also function as a standard auto extension tube, with the ability to add an unlimited number of tube extensions.The Macrofier's integrated circuitry cable enables your lens to communicate with your camera, even with the mounting reversed, allowing for automatic control of the aperture and focus. When used as a reverse mounted lens, the camera will focus using contrast-detect AF and live view, or manual focusing. Alternatively, when mounted as simply an extension tube, both phase detection AF and contrast-detect AF with the camera's live view are supported along with manual focus.With the dual use functions and integrated electronics, the Macrofier is an effective accessory for those interested in an economical option for close-up, macro photography.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The Macrofier Reverse Mount Adapter and Extension Tube for Canon EF/EF-S Lenses from Vello allows you to reverse mount any Canon EF or EF-S lens to your Canon DSLR camera, facilitating extremely close-focus macro and micro photography. An economical alternative to purchasing macro lenses, this all-metal item can also function as a standard auto extension tube, with the ability to add an unlimited number of tube extensions.

The Macrofier's integrated circuitry cable enables your lens to communicate with your camera, even with the mounting reversed, allowing for automatic control of the aperture and focus. When used as a reverse mounted lens, the camera will focus using contrast-detect AF and live view, or manual focusing. Alternatively, when mounted as simply an extension tube, both phase detection AF and contrast-detect AF with the camera's live view are supported along with manual focus.

With the dual use functions and integrated electronics, the Macrofier is an effective accessory for those interested in an economical option for close-up, macro photography.

OVERVIEW:
Control multiple cameras remotely and set up elaborate long exposures or time-lapses with this Wireless ShutterBoss II Receiver from Vello. This additional receiver is compatible with ShutterBoss versions I and II and features the same 2.4 GHz frequency with a 250' range for reliable wireless functionality. The unit also has access to 99 channels and is compatible with the variety of functions built into the system, such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting.

The ShutterBoss II system does work as a dual-function release, allowing users to press halfway to focus or press full to trigger the shutter. It can also be set to take multiple photos with a single press of the shutter and has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure. The ShutterBoss II can also function both wired or wirelessly to better fit your particular setup. Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and easily mounts to the camera via a locking shoe or a 1/4"-20 thread.

OVERVIEW: Set up elaborate time-lapses, perform long exposures, or simply trigger your camera remotely with the Wireless ShutterBoss II Remote Switch with Digital Timer from Vello. This version is compatible with select Canon, Contax, Pentax, Samsung, Sigma, and Hasselblad cameras, and it features a 2.4 GHz frequency along with a 250' range. The transmitter also has access to 99 channels and features specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting. Multiple time settings can be accessed from the transmitter's backlit LCD screen, such as the ability to set a number of shots from 1-999 or to infinitely take photos. The duration of an exposure can also be set all the way up to 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds in one-second increments. The ShutterBoss II does work as a dual-function release, allowing users to press halfway to focus or press full to trigger the shutter. It can also be set to take multiple photos with a single press of the shutter and has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure. The ShutterBoss II can also function both wired or wirelessly to better fit your particular setup. Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and the transmitter operates with two AAA batteries.

Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and the transmitter operates with two AAA batteries.

OVERVIEW:
This Universal Inflatable Softbox from Vello fits around the head of most hot shoe flashes, and is held in place with an elastic drawstring and a thick rubber band. The softbox diffuses your flash's light, producing softer shadows while reducing its output by approximately 1.5 stops.

The shape of the softbox allows most flash's auto-focus assist beams to remain functional, allowing you to focus in low light. It is easily inflated and deflated, for quick setup. When deflated, the softbox folds up small enough to slide into a camera bag's pocket.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-N14 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon Df DSLR camera and accepts one or two Nikon EN-EL14 or EN-EL14a batteries. With the grip and two batteries your shooting time is effectively doubled.

The design of the grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your camera when shooting in portrait orientation. An alternate shutter-release button facilitates shooting when held vertically, and triggers the camera via the included shutter-release cable. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is located on the underside of the grip, and a holder for the camera's battery door prevents its loss when the grip is on the camera. The BG-N14 is also compatible with the Nikon EP-5A AC power supply, for extended in-studio use.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The BG-N14 is also compatible with the Nikon EP-5A AC power supply, for extended in-studio use.

OVERVIEW: Trigger your camera's shutter wirelessly with the FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release from Vello, a lightweight remote control system that will help you avoid unwanted camera movement. This 2.4 GHz model is compatible with Sony Multi Terminal cameras and will work both wired and wirelessly up to 320', depending on your own needs and setup. This makes it useful for photographing wildlife or for macro and long exposures where it is necessary to eliminate any chance of camera shake. The FreeWave system also has access to 16 channels for triggering multiple receivers and has an internal antenna that will be protected from any accidental damage. Multiple features are available for shooting, such as a four-second delay as well as multi-exposure and long exposure modes. The device also has a dual function release, enabling focus on half press and triggering the shutter release on a full press. Additionally, it has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure while in wireless mode and the receiver and transmitter each run on two AAA batteries.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Canon EOS Rebel T5 and T6 camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

OVERVIEW: Set up elaborate time-lapses, perform long exposures, or simply trigger your camera remotely with the Wireless ShutterBoss II Remote Switch with Digital Timer from Vello. This version is compatible with Sony's Multi-Terminal connection found on the latest Alpha series mirrorless and DSLR cameras, and it features a 2.4 GHz frequency along with a 250' range. The transmitter also has access to 99 channels and features specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting. Multiple time settings can be accessed from the transmitter's backlit LCD screen, such as the ability to set a number of shots from 1-999 or to infinitely take photos. The duration of an exposure can also be set all the way up to 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds in one-second increments. The ShutterBoss II does work as a dual-function release, allowing users to press halfway to focus or press full to trigger the shutter. It can also be set to take multiple photos with a single press of the shutter and has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure. The ShutterBoss II can also function both wired or wirelessly to better fit your particular setup. Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and the transmitter operates with two AAA batteries.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
The TC-DB-II Tripod Collar D from Vello is designed for the Canon EF 100mm f/2.8L Macro IS USM Lens. It makes rotating your camera faster, and improves balance by attaching the lens, rather than the camera, to your tripod or monopod. The thumbscrew on the collar has a built-in locking feature so that it cannot be accidentally opened when you loosen it to rotate your camera.

Alignment marks on the collar allow for quickly changing the orientation from portrait to landscape. You can use either a 3/8"-16 or a 1/4"-20 tripod mount using the included bushing adapter.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-C11 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for the Canon EOS Rebel SL1 DSLR. It holds one or two LP-E12 batteries, and therefore can effectively double the camera's normal shooting time.

The design of the battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR in the vertical position. The BG-C11 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. When the included shutter release cable is connected to your camera, it activates the alternate two-step shutter release button that is conveniently placed for shooting in portrait orientation. An on/off button allows you to disengage the grip's shutter button to prevent accidental firing.

The included IR remote can An included IR remote triggers the camera's shutter through either the sensor on the grip, or using the camera body's sensor when in IR mode, from up to 15'. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A battery door holder prevents you from losing the door when the grip is in use.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: The 3' Vello Off-Camera TTL Flash Cord provides creative photographers with the ability to remotely fire Pentax flashes with P-TTL capabilities . Removing the flash from the camera's hot shoe allows the photographer to create unique and dramatic lighting styles that are not possible with a traditional shoe-mounted strobe. This coiled cord measures 3', which is enough distance to accommodate hand-held lighting styles, or when keeping the flash mounted on a compact flash bracket. Also, off-camera lighting reduces the harsh shadows commonly encountered with direct on-camera flashes and gives your photographs a more natural look. One side of the TTL cable fits directly into the camera's hot shoe to ensure that all of the camera's exposure data is maintained. The other side can be attached to any stand, tripod, or device with a standard 1/4"-20 threaded stud or flash shoe mount and the shoe has a locking knob to ensure your equipment is secure.

The extension's shoe mount also includes a 3/8" threaded male bolt with 1/4"-20 female threads for alternate mounting options.

OVERVIEW: This Vello Accessory Kit for Nikon D3200 DSLR Camera from B&H Photo bundles a spare lithium-ion battery pack, the Vello BG-N12 Battery Grip, a wireless remote shutter release, an ultra-thin LCD screen protector, and a lens cap holder. Extend your shooting time with your Nikon D3200 while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system for clear, shake-free images from hundreds of feet away. Additionally, shield your LCD monitor against dirt, scratches, and smudges, and prevent the loss of your lens caps.The Vello BG-N12 Battery Grip can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to 2 EN-EL14 or EN-AL14A batteries. It also offers an anti-slip rubber grip and an alternate shutter release button to facilitate easy, comfortable shooting when held vertically.The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, offers 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. You can also remotely control the length of long exposures. The release's 2.4GHz frequency reduces radio interference and extends the usable range to 320'.

OVERVIEW: The 33' Vello Off-Camera TTL Flash Cord provides creative photographers with the ability to remotely fire Canon flashes with E-TTL / E-TTL II capabilities . Removing the flash from the camera's hot shoe allows the photographer to create unique and dramatic lighting styles that are not possible with a traditional shoe-mounted strobe. This straight cord measures 33', which will accommodate users who want to work with a flash mounted to a light stand or placed a distance away from the camera.. Also, off-camera lighting reduces the harsh shadows commonly encountered with direct on-camera flashes and gives your photographs a more natural look. One side of the TTL cable fits directly into the camera's hot shoe to ensure that all of the camera's exposure data is maintained. The other side can be attached to any stand, tripod, or device with a standard 1/4"-20 threaded stud or flash shoe mount and the shoe has a locking knob to ensure your equipment is secure.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-P1 Battery Grip from Vello is designed for use specifically with the Panasonic Lumix GH3 and GH4. The grip holds one DMW-BLF19 battery while another is in the camera, thereby effectively doubling your shooting time.

The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-P1 has an alternate shutter release button, AF/AE lock, white balance, ISO, EV, and Function buttons, plus front and rear command dials to facilitate shooting when held vertically. It is designed with anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, and a metal mount for attaching a camera strap. Storage spots on the top of the grip help ensure that you won't lose the camera's rubber contact cover, or the grip's contact cover.

OVERVIEW:
To help get the most out of your camera, B&H Photo has put together this Nikon D5300 Accessory Kit. It includes a battery grip, an extra EN-EL14A battery, an LCD screen protector, a wireless shutter release, and a lens cap holder.

The battery grip is designed specifically for the Nikon D5300. It holds two EN-EL14/A batteries, effectively doubling your shooting time, while also providing increased comfort while using the camera in a vertical shooting position.

Also included is a lightweight wireless remote that allows you to trigger your camera's shutter while avoiding any possible unwanted camera movement from up to 320' away. The remote can also worked wired if preferred.

To protect your LCD screen, this kit includes a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass that uses a static adhesion method which leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. It is shatter-proof and blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. A lens cap holder is also included to keep your lens cap handy while preventing you from losing it.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello ET-63 Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS STM lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: Whether you are shooting in the studio or outdoors, the Vello RS-S2II Wired Remote Switch provides photographers using select Sony cameras that feature the Multi-Terminal connection with a simple way to control exposures and an easy-to-use tool to create more "keepers". The device is larger and more comfortable to use than many other remote devices, with a thick, sturdy cord. The RS-S2II is compatible with autofocusing, continuous shooting or single image capture, and long exposures. It will autofocus on a half press of the button and trigger the shutter with a full press. Also, users can press the button and slide it forward to lock it for long exposures. Since you can trigger exposures without touching the camera, you will capture sharp, blur-free images. Additionally, the unit does not require batteries as it draws its power from the camera, making it an extremely useful tool to keep in your studio or gear bag.

OVERVIEW: The Vello Accessory Kit for Nikon D3300 from B&H provides users with a variety of accessories to add functionality and protect your DSLR camera. Included in the kit is a BG-N12 Battery Grip, a 2.4 GHz FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release for Nikon, a glass LCD Screen Protector Ultra, a cap keeper, and a spare EN-EL14A Li-ion battery pack.

OVERVIEW:
Your eyes will welcome the improved comfort and view provided by the Long Rubber Eyepiece Upgrade from Vello for your Fujifilm X-T1 Viewfinder. The extended-length of the soft, thick rubber conforms to the shape of your eye to create a tighter and more comfortable fit. In turn, this fit helps block unwanted stray light from the viewfinder, resulting in better contrast, reduced glare, and an overall enhanced user experience.

Just like your original eyepiece, this easy-to-install upgrade mounts with a simple slide and click. In addition, the Long Rubber Eyepiece Upgrade is compatible with eyeglasses, and helps prevent scratches and smudges.

Just like your original eyepiece, this easy-to-install upgrade mounts with a simple slide and click. In addition, the Long Rubber Eyepiece Upgrade is compatible with eyeglasses, and helps prevent scratches and smudges.

OVERVIEW:
This B&H Kit includes the Vello FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release for Sony Alpha Cameras and the Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras with Multi-Terminal. This Vello FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release is compatible with the Sony Alpha A100, A200, A300, A350, A500, A550, A560, A580, A700, A850, A900, SLT A33, SLT A35, SLT A37, SLT A55, SLT A57, SLT A65, and SLT A77cameras. It is also compatible with the Minolta 7D, 5D, 7i, 7, A1, and A2 camera models.
The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras with Multi-Terminal allows the included Vello FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release to be used with the Sony a3000, a5000, a6000, a7, a7R, a7S, HX300, HX400, HX50v, RX100 Mark II, RX100 Mark III, and a58 cameras. 
Whether capturing images in the studio or on location, the Vello FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release adds flexibility and versatility to your shooting style. This shutter release can allow you to interact with a model, view the scene or set from alternate angles, or set a camera by a stream to capture an image of a bear hunting while you remain at a safe distance away - all this and more without missing a beat, a shot, or a moment. This particular FreeWave unit is directly compatible with the Sony Alpha series of DSLRs. It can also be adapted to other camera systems by simply switching the connection cable. 
The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a FreeWave remote shutter release receiver or other receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Sony cameras.

It is also compatible with the Minolta 7D, 5D, 7i, 7, A1, and A2 camera models.

OVERVIEW:
This B&H Kit includes the Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release - 2.4 GHz (for Sony Alpha) and the Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras with Multi-Terminal. This Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release for cameras with a Sony Alpha connection is compatible with the Sony Alpha A100, A200, A300, A350, A500, A550, A560, A580, A700, A850, A900, SLT A33, SLT A35, SLT A37, SLT A55, SLT A57, SLT A65, and SLT A77 cameras. It is also compatible with the Minolta 7D, 5D, 7i, 7, A1, and A2 camera models.
The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras with Multi-Terminal allows the included Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release to be used with the Sony a3000, a5000, a6000, a7, a7R, a7S, HX300, HX400, HX50v, RX100 Mark II, RX100 Mark III, and a58 cameras. 
Vello's FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release - 2.4 GHz is a complete lightweight remote control outfit that provides a way to trip your camera's shutter while avoiding any possible unwanted camera movement. The FreeWave Plus works in either wired or wireless mode. This is ideal for photographing wildlife, and for macro and close-up photos, or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. 
With the dual function release, press halfway to focus, then press all the way to trigger the shutter. A four-second delay function makes it easy to produce self-portraits. Working on the 2.4 GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100 m))--you don't need to have line-of-sight alignment, either, as radio waves will pass through walls, windows and floors. 
This remote control will work with virtually any major brand of camera--just switch the dedicated release cable. LED indicators confirm pre-focus and exposure when in wireless mode. The FreeWave Plus is capable of multiple exposures with a single press of the trigger, and you can control the length of long exposures remotely.
The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a FreeWave remote shutter release receiver or other receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Sony cameras.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
This B&H Kit includes the Vello Wireless ShutterBoss Timer Remote (Sony Alpha Connection) and the Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras with Multi-Terminal. This Vello Wireless ShutterBoss Timer Remote is compatible with the Sony Alpha A100, A200, A300, A350, A500, A550, A560, A580, A700, A850, A900, SLT A33, SLT A35, SLT A37, SLT A55, SLT A57, SLT A65, and SLT A77 cameras. It is also compatible with the Minolta 7D, 5D, 7i, 7, A1, and A2 camera models.

The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable for Select Sony Cameras with Multi-Terminal allows the included Vello Wireless ShutterBoss Timer Remote to be used with the Sony a3000, a5000, a6000, a7, a7R, a7S, HX300, HX400, HX50v, RX100 Mark II, RX100 Mark III, and a58 cameras. 

Vello's Wireless ShutterBoss Timer Remote (Sony Alpha Connection) doesn't just trip your shutter wirelessly. It's also equipped to handle a long list of timer functions: self-timer, interval timer, long exposure timer, as well as controlling the number of continuous shutter releases. It works with a vast array of different cameras--just swap out the camera release cable for the correct camera. The transmitter works at distances up to 250' (80m) on any one of 99 channels over a reliable 2.4 GHz frequency. 

Timer delays, exposure times, and intervals can be set for up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds, in one-second increments. You can also choose anywhere from 1 to 99 continuous shots or you can set the ShutterBoss to take an unlimited number of photos. The receiver uses a CR2 lithium battery, and the transmitter uses 2x AAA batteries, which can last up to 4 years on standby. 

The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a FreeWave remote shutter release receiver or other receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Sony cameras.

Timer delays, exposure times, and intervals can be set for up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds, in one-second increments. You can also choose anywhere from 1 to 99 continuous shots or you can set the ShutterBoss to take an unlimited number of photos. The receiver uses a CR2 lithium battery, and the transmitter uses 2x AAA batteries, which can last up to 4 years on standby.

The Vello FreeWave 2.5mm Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a FreeWave remote shutter release receiver or other receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Sony cameras.

OVERVIEW: Diffuse the light output of your Nikon SB-500 Speedlight with this Vello Bounce Dome Diffuser, producing softer shadows and a more natural glow rather than the harsher light effect when using a direct flash. The diffuser also helps provide even coverage across the entire frame. Additionally, the Bounce Dome Diffuser is lightweight and compact, easily sliding on and off the SB-500 with a custom fitting that eliminates the need for touch fastener tabs.

Additionally, the Bounce Dome Diffuser is lightweight and compact, easily sliding on and off the SB-500 with a custom fitting that eliminates the need for touch fastener tabs.

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Fujifilm X100T camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive. This screen protector is specifically designed for the Canon 7DII digital camera.

OVERVIEW:
Extend your shooting time with your Nikon Df DSLR Camera while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, all thanks to this Vello Accessory Kit from B&H Photo. This package bundles an extra lithium-ion battery pack, a battery grip, a wireless remote shutter release, an LCD screen protector, and a lens cap holder.

The Vello BG-N14 Battery Grip can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to 2 EN-EL14 or EN-EL14a batteries. The design of the grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your camera in the vertical orientation, providing an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature. Additionally, an alternate shutter-release button facilitates shooting in this position. The BG-N14 is also compatible with the Nikon EP-5A AC power supply for extended in-studio use.

The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, offers 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. You can also control the length of the exposure remotely. Working on the 2.4GHz frequency, the shutter release gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range of up to 320'.

OVERVIEW: Extend your shooting time with your Canon EOS Rebel SL1 DSLR Camera while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, all thanks to this Vello Accessory Kit from B&H Photo. This package bundles an extra lithium-ion battery pack, a BG-C11 battery grip, a wireless remote shutter release, an LCD screen protector, and a lens cap holder.The Vello BG-C11 Battery Grip can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to 2 LP-E12 batteries. The design offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR in the vertical orientation, providing an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature. Additionally, an alternate shutter release button facilitates shooting in this position. An included IR remote triggers the camera's shutter via the sensor on the grip or the one on the camera body.The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, enables clear image capture by eliminating camera shake. Press halfway to focus, then all the way to trigger the shutter. The release offers 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, and a convenient delay function. OVERVIEW:
The Vello BG-S2 Battery Grip is designed specifically for the Sony Alpha a7, a7R, and a7S cameras and holds one or two NP-FW50 batteries. With two batteries in the grip your shooting time is effectively doubled. The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your camera, especially in the vertical position.

The BG-S2 has an alternate shutter-release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. In addition, the grip has an alternate AF/MF/AEL button, rear and main control dials, a C1 custom button, and a grip power On/Off switch. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. The grip screws into the camera's tripod mount, and it has another tripod mount on its bottom for attaching to a camera support. A metal mount allows you to attach a camera strap to the BG-S2.

OVERVIEW: This Vello 3.5mm Remote Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a Vello remote shutter release receiver or other remote receiver with a 3.5mm jack to select Olympus cameras.

OVERVIEW: The Vello FWIRC-C FreeWave IR TTL Flash Commander for Canon is the nexus of your wireless flash setup, enabling you to set and control all functions of your wireless slave flash units. Equipped with an infrared transmitter, it provides the freedom of remote IR triggering for multiple flashes, and full compatibility with Canon's E-TTL metering and flash ratio systems for total wireless E-TTL control. It also offers high-speed sync with compatible Canon E-TTL flashes, allowing you to use shutter speeds higher than your camera's top flash sync speed. Three groups and four independent channels deliver enhanced wireless operation, even in busy environments, and the Commander itself can be rotated 180° atop your camera for easy line-of-sight positioning. Your FreeWave Commander is powered by 2 (not included) AA batteries. For storage, your FreeWave comes with a drawstring pouch.

OVERVIEW:
The BG-N15 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D750 DSLR camera and accepts one Nikon EN-EL15 battery. With one battery in the grip and one in the camera, your shooting time is effectively doubled. The BG-N15 can also hold and utilize 6 AA batteries. Two battery trays, one for the EN-EL15 and one for the AAs, are included.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N15 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. The shutter button offers a lock position to prevent accidental release. In addition, the grip has an alternate AE-L / AF-L button, multi selector and main and sub-command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.

It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover so as not to lose it when it has been removed to install the battery grip.

OVERVIEW:
Dedicated to enhancing the use of your Panasonic GH4 Mirrorless Micro Four Thirds Camera, this Accessory Kit from B&H combines a host of accessories to extend your shooting time, protect your camera, and enable remote shooting capabilities.

The Vello BG-P1 Battery Grip can be used on either the GH4 or GH3, and is able to hold an additional lithium-ion battery for doubling your shooting times. The battery grip's design also incorporates additional camera controls and an alternate shutter release button for easier handling when shooting in the vertical orientation. Enabling the use of this grip, or also available as a spare, this kit also includes a Watson DMW-BLF19 lithium-ion battery pack.

For added protection and security, an optical glass LCD screen protector from Vello is included and maintains the touchscreen capabilities of the camera's monitor. A Sensei lens cap holder is also included to ensure you'll never lose your cap while shooting. Finally, the kit also includes a Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release, along with a dedicated cable for Panasonic cameras, to afford up to a 320' working range and 16 channels for remotely triggering your camera's shutter.

The battery grip's design also incorporates additional camera controls and an alternate shutter release button for easier handling when shooting in the vertical orientation. Enabling the use of this grip, or also available as a spare, this kit also includes a Watson DMW-BLF19 lithium-ion battery pack.

For added protection and security, an optical glass LCD screen protector from Vello is included and maintains the touchscreen capabilities of the camera's monitor. Finally, the kit also includes a Vello FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release, along with a dedicated cable for Panasonic cameras, to afford up to a 320' working range and 16 channels for remotely triggering your camera's shutter.

OVERVIEW:
Designed for the Canon 7D Mark II, the BG-C12 Battery Grip from Vello holds one or two LP-E6 batteries, effectively doubling your camera's shooting time. The grip also comes with a tray to hold six AA batteries (rechargeable batteries recommended).

The BG-C12 adds comfort and stability when shooting in the portrait orientation, and it provides an alternate shutter button, AF start, AF point selection, AE lock/FE lock, and multi-function buttons. A multi-controller and a main dial are also located on the grip, adding convenience when shooting vertically. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. The grip screws into the camera's tripod mount, and it has another tripod mount on its bottom for attaching to a camera support.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Designed for the Canon 7D Mark II, the BG-C12 Battery Grip from Vello holds one or two LP-E6 batteries, effectively doubling your camera's shooting time. The grip also comes with a tray to hold six AA batteries (rechargeable batteries recommended).

The BG-C12 adds comfort and stability when shooting in the portrait orientation, and it provides an alternate shutter button, AF start, AF point selection, AE lock/FE lock, and multi-function buttons. A multi-controller and a main dial are also located on the grip, adding convenience when shooting vertically. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. The grip screws into the camera's tripod mount, and it has another tripod mount on its bottom for attaching to a camera support.

OVERVIEW:
Set up elaborate time-lapses, perform long exposures, or simply trigger your camera remotely with the Vello Wireless ShutterBoss II Remote Switch with Digital Timer Kit from B&H. This kit includes two cables, one is compatible with Sony's Multi-Terminal connection found on the latest Alpha series mirrorless and DSLR cameras while the other is compatible with the older Sony/Minolta style terminal. The ShutterBoss II features a 2.4 GHz frequency along with a 250' range. The transmitter also has access to 99 channels and features specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting.

Multiple time settings can be accessed from the transmitter's backlit LCD screen, such as the ability to set a number of shots from 1-999 or to infinitely take photos. The duration of an exposure can also be set all the way up to 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds in one-second increments. The delay and interval features have the same options for timing, but the interval function has a minimum setting of 1 second.

The ShutterBoss II does work as a dual-function release, allowing users to press halfway to focus or press full to trigger the shutter. It can also be set to take multiple photos with a single press of the shutter and has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure. The ShutterBoss II can also function both wired or wirelessly to better fit your particular setup. Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and the transmitter operates with two AAA batteries.

OVERVIEW: The red Vello ActionPan Professional Grade Stabilizing Action Grip allows you to hold your camera down low when filming skiing, snowboarding, skateboarding, auto racing, motocross, BMX/FMX and even when boating. Besides just facilitating a novel filming perspective, the ActionPan will steady your shot as well. It can be used with most SLR cameras or camcorders (with max height of 4.5") that feature a 1/4"-20 tripod mount. The 1/4"-20 screw on the bracket is adjustable, to better accommodate cameras of different configurations. The ActionPan features a shock-proof rubber handle that alleviates stress by offering a comfortable, secure grip. There's also a finger groove for securing grip, as well as non-slip rubber rails for further securing your camera to the mount. As an added bonus, the ActionPan is equipped with a removable accessory shoe mount on the top, which can hold your video light, camera flash or external microphone. If you plan to capture action sports from any angle, especially low angles, the ActionPan is a must have.

OVERVIEW: Use an older-style shoe-mounted flash unit on a modern digital camera body with this HSA-PVU Hot Shoe Adapter with Safe Voltage Conversion from Vello. It works with voltages up to 60V and reduces it to less than 6V to protect the delicate circuits of your camera system. This adapter also offers a PC terminal for connecting the camera to another flash or studio light. Additionally, it runs on a CR2032 battery and has a battery check button with an LED indicator light that lights up when the adapter is working.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Use an older-style shoe-mounted flash unit on a modern digital camera body with this HSA-PVU Hot Shoe Adapter with Safe Voltage Conversion from Vello. It works with voltages up to 60V and reduces it to less than 6V to protect the delicate circuits of your camera system. This adapter also offers a PC terminal for connecting the camera to another flash or studio light. Additionally, it runs on a CR2032 battery and has a battery check button with an LED indicator light that lights up when the adapter is working.

OVERVIEW: Take a Sony/Minolta style flash and mount it onto a camera featuring the newer Multi-Interface Shoe with the HSA-CSMSA Multi-Interface to Sony/Minolta Shoe Adapter from Vello. It has full support for Sony's TTL metering system to ensure complete flash functionality and offers a PC terminal on the side for triggering additional flashes or studio strobe units.

OVERVIEW: Extend the length of your wired shutter release by 10' with this Remote Shutter Extension Cable for Nikon 10-Pin Connection from Vello. Compatible with Nikon cameras and remotes that utilize the 10-pin connection, this cable allows users to trigger their shutter from further away than was previously possible, enabling more secure mounting when the camera is positioned in more difficult or elaborate positions.

OVERVIEW: For reliable flash triggering with full Canon E-TTL / E-TTL II support, this Vello FreeWave Captain Wireless TTL Triggering System Kit from B&H comes with a transmitter and two receivers, as well as flash cables and a shutter release cable, to greatly expand your off camera lighting capabilities with multiple speedlites. The system utilizes a 2.4 GHz frequency for reduced interference and provides a working range of up to 300'. Also, it has 4 channels and can sync at shutter speeds up to 1/8000 second (in TTL mode). And the benefits aren't limited to flash photography either. You can also use the receiver with the included camera cord and handhold the transmitter to wirelessly trigger your camera in single shot, continuous shot, bulb, and timer modes. This is of paramount importance in situations where a subject, such as wildlife, may be difficult to approach. Additionally, the wireless function of the device reduces the potential of camera shake when doing macro, close-up, and long exposure photography. The Captain system can also be combined with the non-TTL FreeWave Fusion Basic system, and additional FreeWave Fusion Basic receivers can be integrated into the Captain system. The Vello FreeWave Wireless TTL Captain's High Speed Sync and Second Curtain Sync functions create easy to control lighting effects and other creative options such as stop-action shooting and a wide degree of background or ambient light control.  Compatibility: Canon EOS: Digital Rebel (300D), XT (350D), XTi (400D), XSi (450D), T1i (500D), T2i (550D), T3 (1100D), T3i (600D), T4i (650D), T5 (1200D), T5i (700D), T6i (750D), T6s (760D), SL1 (100D) and XS (1000D), 60D, 70D & 80D 10D, 20D, 30D, 40D, 50D, 5D, 5D Mark II, 5D Mark III, 6D, 7D, 7D Mark II, 1D, 1D Mark II, 1D Mark II N, 1D Mark III, 1D Mark IV, 1Ds, 1Ds Mark II, 1Ds Mark III, 1D X and 1D C PowerShot: G10, G11, G12, G15, G16, G1 X & G1 X Mark II, SX50 HS

OVERVIEW: Set up elaborate time-lapses, perform long exposures, or simply trigger your camera remotely with the Wireless ShutterBoss II Remote Switch with Digital Timer from Vello. This version is compatible with select Canon cameras, and it features a 2.4 GHz frequency along with a 250' range. The transmitter also has access to 99 channels and features specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting. Multiple time settings can be accessed from the transmitter's backlit LCD screen, such as the ability to set a number of shots from 1-999 or to infinitely take photos. The duration of an exposure can also be set all the way up to 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds in one-second increments. The ShutterBoss II does work as a dual-function release, allowing users to press halfway to focus or press full to trigger the shutter. It can also be set to take multiple photos with a single press of the shutter and has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure. The ShutterBoss II can also function both wired or wirelessly to better fit your particular setup. Additionally, the receiver runs on one 3V CR2 battery and the transmitter operates with two AAA batteries.

OVERVIEW: This Vello 2.5mm Remote Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a Vello remote shutter release receiver or other remote receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Fujifilm cameras.
OVERVIEW_RAW: This Vello 2.5mm Remote Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a Vello remote shutter release receiver or other remote receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Fujifilm cameras.

OVERVIEW: Add an ergonomic grip to your camera with the CB-800 Universal Pistol Grip with Shutter Release from Vello. The CB-800 is designed for compact cameras weighing up to 2.5 lb, and connects via the camera's 1/4"-20 tripod mount. Grooves allow your fingers to comfortably wrap around the grip, and a trigger under your index finger acts as a shutter button with the use of an optional 2.5mm shutter release cable. The shutter can be locked for continuous or bulb shooting. A 1/4"-20 female threaded socket on the bottom of the grip enables a variety of mounting options.

OVERVIEW: This Vello Fabric Softbox with Cinch Strap Kit from B&H pairs the medium softbox for portable flashes with a cinch strap for easy attachment and removal. The softbox's 6 x 8" front diffusion area softens and diffuses the light from a flash unit for more flattering light. It also reduces hot spots from the beam of light and folds flat for easy storage. The included cinch strap benefits this accessory by easily wrapping around the flash head, eliminating the need for self-adhesive loops.

OVERVIEW: Reduce the harshness of your on-camera flash unit and soften shadows by equipping it with this medium Octa Softbox for Portable Flash from Vello, which measures 8" in diameter. This convenient modifier produces a soft, almost wrap-around quality of light that is useful in a wide variety of situations, such portraiture, weddings, food, and more. Along with this, the octagonal shape will produce circular catchlights that are very pleasing to the eyes. It also features a foldable inner diffuser for further softening of the light and a reflective silver interior that evenly distributes light while maintaining maximum light output. Setting up the softbox is simple with an integrated elastic strap with a touch tab fastener that secures around the flash head. Also, it has a strap loop and rubberized mounting tabs that will ensure that the softbox remains securely attached. When not in use, the modifier will fold down flat, and a zippered carrying case is included for travel and storage.

OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave Fusion Basic Receiver for Sony Cameras with Multi Interface Shoe from Vello is an additional receiver for use in multi-light or multi-camera setups, in which all devices are being triggered by the FreeWave Fusion Basic transmitter. It features a frequency of 433 MHz for non-line-of-sight triggering of flashes up to 50' away or cameras up to 150' away. It also can be set to one of sixteen available channels to limit interference and supports flash sync speeds of up to 1/200 second. Additionally, multiple receivers can be triggered by one transmitter, as long as they are set to the same channel.

The receiver features a female hot shoe on top for attaching an on-camera flash and features two sync ports for connecting to either a studio strobe or a camera. Mounting the receiver is done through the use of a cold shoe on the base that also has a 1/4"-20 thread. It includes a 2.5mm to 3.5mm cable, a 2.5mm to PC cable, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter, as well as two AAA batteries for power.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

The receiver features a female hot shoe on top for attaching an on-camera flash and features two sync ports for connecting to either a studio strobe or a camera. Mounting the receiver is done through the use of a cold shoe on the base that also has a 1/4"-20 thread. It includes a 2.5mm to 3.5mm cable, a 2.5mm to PC cable, and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter, as well as two AAA batteries for power.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Fusion Basic Wireless Flash Trigger System for Sony Cameras with (MIS) Multi Interface Shoe from Vello provides the ability to wirelessly trigger a hot shoe or studio flash unit up to 50' away or a camera's shutter up to 150' away. This allows you to work with more freedom as the FreeWave Fusion Basic does not require line-of-sight alignment. The devices operate on the 433 MHz frequency and have 16 channels to ensure there is no interference from other units. The FreeWave features a flash sync speed of up to 1/200 of a second and can trigger multiple flashes simultaneously with the use of additional receivers, available separately. Also, when using it as a shutter release trigger it is possible to work with multiple cameras. The trigger button has dual-functionality, half-press for focusing and full-press for triggering the shutter. The transmitter has modes for flash triggering, camera triggering, or a five-second camera delay. The system will also function with your camera's single shot, continuous shooting, bulb, and self-timer modes. Both the transmitter and receiver feature LED indicator lights to inform you of the system's current status. This system also includes for working with Sony Cameras with (MIS) Multi Interface Shoe's compatible cameras, as well as 2.5mm to 3.5mm and 2.5mm to PC flash sync cords and a 3.5mm to 1/4" phono adapter. Two AAA alkaline batteries and one 23A 12V alkaline battery are included for powering the devices.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

Two AAA alkaline batteries and one 23A 12V alkaline battery are included for powering the devices.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello EW-73B-F Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF-S 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS USM, EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS, and STM lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.This lens hood features a filter access panel that allows you to easily reach and adjust rotating filters without the need to remove the hood from the lens. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The dedicated Vello EW-73B-F Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF-S 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS USM, EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS, and STM lenses.

Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

This lens hood features a filter access panel that allows you to easily reach and adjust rotating filters without the need to remove the hood from the lens. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello BG-S3 Battery Grip is designed specifically for the Sony Alpha a7 II, a7S II, and a7R II cameras. The grip holds one or two NP-FW50 batteries which effectively doubles your shooting time when both batteries are installed. The design of the grip provides a comfortable way to hold and shoot your camera in the vertical position.

The BG-S3 has a vertical-position shutter-release button, an alternate AF/MF/AEL button, three custom buttons, rear and main control dials, and an on/off switch. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. The grip screws into the camera's tripod mount, and it has another tripod mount on its bottom for attaching to a camera support. A metal mount allows you to attach a camera strap to the BG-S3 for convenient carrying.

OVERVIEW:
The Battery Grip from Vello is made exclusively for the Fujifilm X-T1 mirrorless digital camera. It holds one NP-W126 Li-ion battery, effectively doubling your shooting time, and provides a comfortable grip when shooting in portrait orientation.

The grip has an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically with a lock to prevent accidental release. In addition, the grip has extra AE-L, AF-L, and FA buttons, as well as front and rear command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover.

OVERVIEW: Create beautiful lighting and take advantage of your shoe-mounted flash's true potential with this 2-Transceiver Kit from B&H which packages together two Vello FreeWave Aviator Wireless Flash Trigger Transceivers for phenomenal features and performance. Dedicated to Canon's E-TTL II system, users will have full functionality with modern automatic flash settings. This transceiver is also able to function as either a master transmitter/trigger or a slave receiver for maximum versatility. Operation is reliable due to the Aviator's use of a 2.4 GHz radio frequency to provide a range of up to 300' without the need for line-of-sight. The Aviator Transceiver has access to 16 different channels, limiting interference with other users and the wireless technology set up in your venue. Users will also have access to 3 different groups with which to organize their flashes (A, B, C). The group controls of the Aviator allow for separate adjustment of the flashes in either TTL or manual modes as well as the ability to set group ratios in A:B or A:BC configurations. Setting up the Aviator is simple as it easily slides into your camera's hot shoe to receive TTL information and also offers top hot shoe for adding another flash to the mix. For ease of use, all information is accessible via a backlit LCD screen, and it has a standard 3.5mm sync port. Also, it has high-speed sync and a mini-USB port for firmware updates. It runs on two AA batteries. It has been tested for compatibility with the EOS Rebel T5, T6s, SL1, 5D Mark II, 5D Mark III, 6D, 7D, 60D & 70D.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW_NOTE: Only flash units using E-TTL II are compatible; older flash units using E-TTL (original ver.) are not supported in TTL mode

OVERVIEW: Create beautiful lighting and take advantage of your shoe-mounted flashes' true potential with the FreeWave Aviator Wireless Flash Trigger System from Vello, which is available here in a B&H Kit with one transceiver & one receiver. Dedicated to Canon's exceptional E-TTL II system, users will have full functionality with modern automatic flash settings. Operation is reliable as well due to the Aviator's use of a 2.4 GHz radio frequency to provide a range of up to 300' without the need for line-of-sight. The Aviator Transceiver has access to 4 channels when syncing with the included receiver for avoiding interference with other users and the wireless technology set up in your venue. Users will also have access to 3 different groups with which to organize their flashes (A, B, or C). The group controls of the Aviator allow for separate adjustment of the flashes in either TTL or manual modes as well as the ability to set group ratios in A:B or A:BC configurations. Setting up the Aviator Transceiver as a master is simple because it easily slides into your camera's hot shoe to receive TTL information and also offers top hot shoe for adding another flash to the mix. For ease of use, all information is accessible on the Transceiver via a backlit LCD screen and both have a standard 3.5mm sync port, while the transceiver adds a threaded PC sync port for more versatility. Also, they have high-speed sync and a mini-USB port for firmware updates. And, each transceiver or receiver runs on two easy-to-find AA batteries.

OVERVIEW:
To help get the most out of your camera, B&H Photo has put together this Nikon D750 Accessory Kit. It includes a battery grip, an extra EN-EL15 battery, an LCD screen protector, a wireless shutter release, and a lens cap holder.

The battery grip is designed specifically for the Nikon D750. It holds one EN-EL15 battery in addition to the one in your camera, effectively doubling your shooting time, while also providing increased comfort while using the camera in a vertical shooting position.

Also included is a lightweight wireless remote that allows you to trigger your camera's shutter while avoiding any possible unwanted camera movement from up to 320' away. The remote can also work wired if preferred.

To protect your LCD screen, this kit includes a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass that uses a static adhesion method which leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. It is shatter-proof and blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. A lens cap holder is also included to keep your lens cap handy while preventing you from losing it.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
To help get the most out of your camera, B&H Photo has put together this Nikon D750 Accessory Kit. It includes a battery grip, an extra EN-EL15 battery, an LCD screen protector, a wireless shutter release, and a lens cap holder.

The battery grip is designed specifically for the Nikon D750. It holds one EN-EL15 battery in addition to the one in your camera, effectively doubling your shooting time, while also providing increased comfort while using the camera in a vertical shooting position.

Also included is a lightweight wireless remote that allows you to trigger your camera's shutter while avoiding any possible unwanted camera movement from up to 320' away. The remote can also work wired if preferred.

To protect your LCD screen, this kit includes a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass that uses a static adhesion method which leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. It is shatter-proof and blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. A lens cap holder is also included to keep your lens cap handy while preventing you from losing it.

OVERVIEW: Quickly create a soft, diffused light with your on-camera flash by using the 8 x 12" FlexFrame Softbox for Portable Flash from Vello. By using a durable fiberglass frame, users just unfold and lock in the jointed rods to have the softbox ready to go. Along with this, it has a removable front diffuser that dramatically reduces the harshness of the flash and softens shadows. For even distribution of light with minimal loss, the interior is a reflective silver, which can also be used as a standard reflector when the front diffuser is removed. Attachment is simple with a touch-fastener cinch strap that fits most flash heads and mounting tabs on the softbox that attach to the strap. Additionally, it comes with a drawstring carrying case.

Attachment is simple with a touch-fastener cinch strap that fits most flash heads and mounting tabs on the softbox that attach to the strap. Additionally, it comes with a drawstring carrying case.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Mini-Stand Flash Trigger Set from Vello combines a hot shoe stand with a built-in 2.4 GHz radio receiver. This high 2.4 GHz frequency easily passes through objects giving you the ability to place lights behind them and around corners. The lightweight transmitter has a low profile that won't get in the way of any operational controls. The receiver-stand allows the flash to be positioned quickly on any flat surface. You can also use the 1/4"- 20 female thread to mount it on a tripod, light stand, or boom arm for maximum flexibility. For studio situations, the included 3.5mm sync cord and 1/4" phono adapter further expand the Mini-Stand's compatibility to include most studio monolights and power packs.Taking just seconds to pair the transmitter with additional receivers, the Mini-Stand gives photographers who want to work with multiple lights the freedom of not being limited by the number or type of flash that can be used while shooting.The FreeWave Mini-Stand Flash Trigger Set is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes with manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe are not compatible.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The FreeWave Mini-Stand Flash Trigger Set from Vello combines a hot shoe stand with a built-in 2.4 GHz radio receiver. This high 2.4 GHz frequency easily passes through objects giving you the ability to place lights behind them and around corners. The lightweight transmitter has a low profile that won't get in the way of any operational controls. The receiver-stand allows the flash to be positioned quickly on any flat surface. You can also use the 1/4"- 20 female thread to mount it on a tripod, light stand, or boom arm for maximum flexibility. For studio situations, the included 3.5mm sync cord and 1/4" phono adapter further expand the Mini-Stand's compatibility to include most studio monolights and power packs.

Taking just seconds to pair the transmitter with additional receivers, the Mini-Stand gives photographers who want to work with multiple lights the freedom of not being limited by the number or type of flash that can be used while shooting.

The FreeWave Mini-Stand Flash Trigger Set is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes with manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe are not compatible.

OVERVIEW: Used with the separately purchased Mini-Stand transmitter, the FreeWave Mini-Stand Receiver from Vello combines a hot shoe stand with a built-in 2.4 GHz radio receiver. This high 2.4GHz frequency easily passes through objects giving you the ability to place lights behind them and around corners.The receiver-stand allows the flash to be positioned quickly on any flat surface. You can also use the 1/4"- 20 female thread to mount it on a tripod, light stand, or boom arm for maximum flexibility. For studio situations, the included 3.5 mm sync cord and 1/4" phono adapter further expand the Mini-Stand's compatibility to include most studio monolights and power packs. Just add a Mini-Stand for each flash unit. With multiple lights, you can do it all from create memorable portraits, persuasive products, or just bring life to an otherwise dull room. Your creative possibilities are endless with the FreeWave Mini-Stands.The FreeWave Mini-Stand Receiver is compatible with most major manufacturers shoe mount flash with manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe are not compatible.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Used with the separately purchased Mini-Stand transmitter, the FreeWave Mini-Stand Receiver from Vello combines a hot shoe stand with a built-in 2.4 GHz radio receiver. This high 2.4GHz frequency easily passes through objects giving you the ability to place lights behind them and around corners.

The receiver-stand allows the flash to be positioned quickly on any flat surface. You can also use the 1/4"- 20 female thread to mount it on a tripod, light stand, or boom arm for maximum flexibility. For studio situations, the included 3.5 mm sync cord and 1/4" phono adapter further expand the Mini-Stand's compatibility to include most studio monolights and power packs. Just add a Mini-Stand for each flash unit. With multiple lights, you can do it all from create memorable portraits, persuasive products, or just bring life to an otherwise dull room. Your creative possibilities are endless with the FreeWave Mini-Stands.

The FreeWave Mini-Stand Receiver is compatible with most major manufacturers shoe mount flash with manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe are not compatible.

OVERVIEW: Insert some creativity into your flash photography with this EZ-Flip Gel Set from Vello. Compatible with most on-camera flash units, this gel holder utilizes a strap with hook-and-loop fasteners to securely attach to the flash head and will then offer users a convenient slot for sliding in one of the thirty included gels. The assortment of different gels will allow you to take control of the color of your flash's light output, and multiple gels can be used simultaneously to create unique effects. The holder will also flip up and out of the way when you don't need the gel, and it comes with a reversible silver reflector/black flag insert that can be used to further control the light while using bounce techniques. Additionally, all of these items can be stored in the included nylon carrying case.

OVERVIEW: The IR Selfie Trigger for Select Canon Cameras from Vello is a compact infrared remote control that lets you wirelessly take photos with your camera from up to sixteen feet away. Ideal for taking selfies, group portraits, and long exposures at close to mid-range, its compact design makes it easy to carry and a go to remote for the spontaneous photographer. When your camera is in remote triggering mode the IR Selfie Trigger works by simply pressing the central button while aiming at your camera remote sensor. Be sure that there are no obstructions between your camera and the remote as infrared triggers needs line-of-sight to function.

OVERVIEW: Take long exposures and selfies with ease by picking up the pocketable IR Selfie Trigger Plus from Vello for select Canon cameras. With a range of 16' and an invisible beam, this trigger offers a single, intuitive button for remotely taking a photo. At its most basic, it has access to single-shot and bulb modes for most shooting needs, though users looking to further steady their shot can access a two-second delay timer. Videographers can benefit from the device as well with start/stop recording capabilities. To top it all off, the super compact device can run on a single battery for up to 3 years.

OVERVIEW:
Remotely trigger your camera from up to 16' away with the simple and pocketable Universal IR Selfie Trigger Plus from Vello. Using an invisible infrared beam, this universal model can be set to trigger cameras form Canon, Sony, Pentax, and Nikon, and being a Plus model has other features to expand your capabilities. At its core, users will be able to use single-shot and bulb modes at the click of a button, ideal for capturing both selfies and long exposures.

Canon and Sony users will get additional help with modes for a delay timer and to start and stop video recording. Pentax also has a unique feature set that enables zoom in/out with select point-and-shoots and remote access to the programmable function setting. Finally, the exceptionally compact tool will last for up to 3 years or 20,000 exposures on a single battery, meaning you won't need to worry about running out of power.

OVERVIEW: Mount the latest model flashes on the hot shoes of older Sony/Minolta cameras with the HSA-CSASM Sony/Minolta to Sony Multi-Interface Shoe Adapter from Vello. This adapter provides full support for Sony's ADI/P-TTL metering system to ensure complete flash functionality. Photographers will appreciate the compact size, lightweight, and sturdy build quality of this adapter. Well-designed, the HSA-CSASM features an auto-lock base for a secure connection. The adapter is compatible with all cameras that have the older Sony/Minolta hot shoe.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Fusion Basic FWB-24 Wireless Trigger System for Canon from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger your camera, shoe mount flash, and studio lights from up to 328' away. Sixteen discrete channels give you the ability to avoid interference from other users while maximizing your creative potentialUse the system to expand the capabilities of your shoe mount flash or studio lights without the hassle of tangled PC cords. The FreeWave system is also great for capturing wildlife. Simply place your camera on a tripod and use your FreeWave Fusion trigger as a remote camera release from a distance. Macro work is yet another use. Release your camera's shutter remotely to avoid unwanted camera vibration. The 2.4GHz radio signal will pass through walls, windows, floors, and other obstructions.The FreeWave Fusion Basic 2.4 GHz Flash Trigger Set is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes with manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe are not compatible. Each unit runs off two AAA batteries (not included).

OVERVIEW: The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Nikon 1 Mount from Vello allows your lens to focus closer than its normal minimum focus distance. By placing distance between your camera body and lens, focusing distance is shortened and the effect of magnifying your subject is created. Extension tubes enable macro performance for lenses not otherwise able to focus that close, and are also suited for close-up portraiture. The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Nikon 1 mount contains two extension tubes of 10mm and 16mm lengths. They can be used individually or together to create the desired magnification effect. For closer focusing use the larger extension tube or stack the tubes together. It is even possible to stack these two tubes with others from another set. Extension tubes have no optical elements so they do not degrade the quality of your lenses. These are fully automatic extension tubes in that they are able to communicate all electronic functions from lens to camera including autofocus and auto exposure. They are built with metal lens mounts for durability and longevity and enable you to convert almost any lens into a macro lens at a fraction of the cost while maintaining the lens' original optical quality.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: Outfit your flash or speedlight with a variety of different light shaping tools with this Vello Speedlight Accessory Starter Kit from B&H. The bundle packs together all of your most common lighting accessories: a medium fabric softbox, a bounce card/flag, a 1/4" honeycomb grid, and an 8" combo snoot/reflector. The softbox will dramatically soften light output while the grid will limit spill and narrow the beam. The light shaper offers a white side for bouncing light forward towards your subject as well as a black side that can be used to flag off some unwanted light on your subject. Finally, the 8" snoot reflector offers a highly reflective silver side for bounce and can be rolled up for use as a snoot. A cinch strap, as well as touch tab fasteners, are included for simple mounting to your portable flash unit.

A cinch strap, as well as touch tab fasteners, are included for simple mounting to your portable flash unit.

OVERVIEW: The 3' Vello Off-Camera TTL Flash Cord provides creative photographers with the ability to remotely fire Sony flashes with ADI / P-TTL capabilities and the Multi Interface Shoe. Removing the flash from the camera's hot shoe allows the photographer to create unique and dramatic lighting styles that are not possible with a traditional shoe-mounted strobe. This coiled cord measures 3', which is enough distance to accommodate hand-held lighting styles, or when keeping the flash mounted on a compact flash bracket. Also, off-camera lighting reduces the harsh shadows commonly encountered with direct on-camera flashes and gives your photographs a more natural look. One side of the TTL cable fits directly into the camera's hot shoe to ensure that all of the camera's exposure data is maintained. The other side can be attached to any stand, tripod, or device with a standard 1/4"-20 threaded stud or flash shoe mount and the shoe has a locking knob to ensure your equipment is secure.

Also, off-camera lighting reduces the harsh shadows commonly encountered with direct on-camera flashes and gives your photographs a more natural look.
