OVERVIEW:
The BG-N16 Battery Grip for Nikon D5500 & D5600 from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D5500 or D5600 DSLR camera and accepts one or two EN-EL14 or EN-EL14A batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. More so, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. An on/off switch has also been added to the BG-N16 to disable the grip's built-in vertical shutter release button, which prevents users from accidentally triggering the shutter when photographing in the landscape orientation.
The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N16 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. In addition, it is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod, and a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.The included shutter release cable connects from the socket on the battery grip to the remote release port on the camera body and transmits the shutter release signal from battery grip to the camera.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The BG-N16 Battery Grip for Nikon D5500 & D5600 from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D5500 or D5600 DSLR camera and accepts one or two EN-EL14 or EN-EL14A batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. More so, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. An on/off switch has also been added to the BG-N16 to disable the grip's built-in vertical shutter release button, which prevents users from accidentally triggering the shutter when photographing in the landscape orientation.

The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N16 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. In addition, it is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod, and a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.

The included shutter release cable connects from the socket on the battery grip to the remote release port on the camera body and transmits the shutter release signal from battery grip to the camera.

OVERVIEW:
Timing is everything and if you've ever tried to photograph lightning or wildlife in its natural environment you know it's not easy. The FreeWave Stryker Lightning & Motion Trigger Kit for Select Nikon & Sony Cameras from Vello is a solution for both situations in a lightweight, user-friendly package.

Operation is easy. It's important to start with fully charged batteries for maximum performance. The Stryker can be mounted directly to the camera via its cold shoe, or it can be mounted to any bracket, rig, or light stand that features a 1/4"-20 screw. The unit comes supplied with two Nikon-compatible cables which connect to the camera's remote control socket. Cables are also available for most other brand SLR cameras. In Lightning Mode simply point the camera and sensor in the direction of the subject and adjust the unit's sensitivity dial until the red light extinguishes. Start with a long exposure, about 10 seconds, and adjust the time as needed. Make sure that your camera is in manual focus mode and focus on infinity. Individual camera shutter lag and exposure settings will determine how fast your camera fires.

For Motion Mode follow the same method as above but manually focus your camera lens on the area where you expect activity. The Stryker uses a Passive Infrared Sensor (PIR) to detect IR heat sources such as humans or animals from up to 16.4' away.

So whether you're interested in wildlife, motion-stopping experimentation or sports you'll find the FreeWave Stryker useful and enjoyable. You may even discover who's raiding the fridge late at night.

 Compatibility:
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e and D810
Df, D90, D600, D610, D750, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5000, D5100, D5200, D5300, D7000, D7100 and D7200; COOLPIX P7800
 Fuji: S3 and S5
 Kodak: DCS-14N
 Sony: Alpha a58, a77 II, a3000, a5000, a6000, a7, a7 II, a7R, a7R II, a7S, a7S II; DSC-RX1R II, RX10, RX10 II, RX100 II, RX100 III, RX100 IV, HX50V, HX90V, HX300, HX400, HX400V

OVERVIEW:
Designed specifically for the Canon EOS Rebel T6i and T6s DSLR cameras, the BG-C13 Battery Grip from Vello will help shooters dramatically extend their shooting time as well as offer additional comfort and controls for vertical, or portrait, orientation shooting. The BG-C13's biggest advantage is that it can hold up to two LP-E17 series battery packs, effectively doubling the battery capacity. Also, it features a vertical position shutter release along with aperture value/exposure compensation, AF point selection/magnify, and AE lock/FE lock/index/reduce buttons, as well as a main dial to make vertical shooting feel natural.

To further increase usability, the BG-C13 has a hand strap mount as well as a 1/4"-20 tripod socket, which aligns with the lens mount for balance. Additionally, this battery grip has a built-in holder for the camera's battery chamber door. This combination of features can dramatically improve ergonomics and make shooting faster and more intuitive.

OVERVIEW:
Vello's Wireless ShutterBoss Timer Remote Kit for Nikon & Fuji doesn't just trip your shutter wirelessly. It's also equipped to handle a long list of timer functions: self-timer, interval timer, long exposure timer, as well as controlling the number of continuous shutter releases. It works with a vast array of different cameras--just swap out the camera release cable for the correct camera. The transmitter works at distances up to 250' on any one of 99 channels over a reliable 2.4 GHz frequency.Timer delays, exposure times, and intervals can be set for up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds, in one-second increments. You can also choose anywhere from 1 to 99 continuous shots or you can set the ShutterBoss to take an unlimited number of photos. The receiver uses a CR2 lithium battery, and the transmitter uses 2x AAA batteries, which can last up to 4 years on standby.

 Compatibility: 
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e, and D810
 Fuji: X30, X-A1, X-A2, X-E2, X-M1, XQ1, XQ2, X-T1, FinePix S1, X100T, S3 and S5
 Kodak: DCS-14N

OVERVIEW:
Trigger your camera's shutter wirelessly with the FreeWave Plus Kit For Select Nikon & Fuji Cameras from Vello, a lightweight remote control system that will help you avoid unwanted camera movement. This 2.4 GHz model is compatible with Nikon & Fuji cameras and will work both wired and wirelessly up to 320', depending on your own needs and setup. This makes it useful for photographing wildlife or for macro and long exposures where it is necessary to eliminate any chance of camera shake. The FreeWave system also has access to 16 channels for triggering multiple receivers and has an internal antenna that will be protected from any accidental damage. Multiple features are available for shooting, such as a four-second delay as well as multi-exposure and long exposure modes. The device also has a dual function release, enabling focus on half press and triggering the shutter release on a full press. Additionally, it has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure while in wireless mode and the receiver and transmitter each run on two AAA batteries.

 Compatibility: 
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e and D810 Df, D90, D600, D610, D750, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5000, D5100, D5200, D5300, D5500, D7000 and D7100; COOLPIX P7800

OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave Fusion Kit for Select Nikon & Fuji Cameras from Vello is a versatile, reliable remote control kit that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio lights from up to 300 feet away. It can be used to configure up to three different light groups, which can be triggered individually or simultaneously, for a total of seven different combinations, using its multiple groups feature. Simultaneous triggering of multiple light groups requires additional FreeWave Fusion Receivers (available separately).
The FreeWave Fusion also provides the convenience of a wireless camera shutter release, ideal for photographing wildlife, and also for macro and close-up photos or long exposures, where the slightest camera movement can ruin a picture. Working on the 2.4 GHz frequency gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range (up to 320' (100m)) - you don't need to have line-of-sight alignment, either, as radio waves will pass through walls, windows and floors.

 Compatibility:
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e and D810
Df, D90, D600, D610, D750, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5000, D5100, D5200, D5300, D5500, D7000 and D7100; CoolPix P7800
 Fuji: X30, X-A1, X-A2, X-E2, X-M1, XQ1, XQ2, X-T1, FinePix S1, X100T, S3 and S5
 Kodak: DCS-14N

OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Since the FreeWave Fusion does not transmit TTL settings, use of a flash or light unit with full manual control is recommended. You will need to set the power output manually.

The FreeWave Fusion is compatible with most cameras, flash units and studio lights. However, for flash wake-up functionality and/or high shutter speeds, you will need full Nikon TTL support via your camera, flash and FreeWave Fusion trigger.
This remote does not provide high-voltage sync protection, and is not recommended for use with flash units that have a trigger voltage of more than 6V.

OVERVIEW:
Whether capturing images in the studio or on location, the FreeWave Remote Shutter Release Kit for Select Nikon & Fuji Cameras adds flexibility and versatility to your shooting style. Photography unplugged - shooters can interact with a model, view the scene or set from alternate angles, or set a camera by a stream to capture an image of a bear hunting while you remain at a safe distance away - all this and more without missing a beat, a shot, or a moment. This particular FreeWave kit is compatible with cameras equipped with a Nikon 10-pin connection, i.e. Nikon D1, D2, D3, and D4 series DSLRs and can be used with select Fuji cameras via the included 2.5mm Fuji cable.This versatile shutter release features Smart Code technology which allows it to be configured to operate on up to 16 million possible radio channels. You can easily switch channels to "zero in" on a frequency that provides the optimal range and functionality.The FreeWave operates with radio frequency (RF) technology, therefore a direct line of sight is not necessary; radio waves pass through objects such as windows and walls. It is unlike other wireless remotes on the market that operate on an Infrared (IR) system and require a direct line of sight between transmitter and receiver to make things work.Since touching the camera even lightly while capturing an image can create a blurred image, the FreeWave eliminates this by tripping the shutter without any disturbances. This is critical when photographing subjects close up, and for long-exposures and macros. It is also extremely valuable when photographing nature, wildlife, and other subjects that are difficult for you to get close to.

 Compatibility: 
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e, and D810
 Fuji: X30, X-A1, X-A2, X-E2, X-M1, XQ1, XQ2, X-T1, FinePix S1, X100T, S3 and S5
 Kodak: DCS-14N
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Whether capturing images in the studio or on location, the FreeWave Remote Shutter Release Kit for Select Nikon & Fuji Cameras adds flexibility and versatility to your shooting style. Photography unplugged - shooters can interact with a model, view the scene or set from alternate angles, or set a camera by a stream to capture an image of a bear hunting while you remain at a safe distance away - all this and more without missing a beat, a shot, or a moment. This particular FreeWave kit is compatible with cameras equipped with a Nikon 10-pin connection, i.e. Nikon D1, D2, D3, and D4 series DSLRs and can be used with select Fuji cameras via the included 2.5mm Fuji cable.

This versatile shutter release features Smart Code technology which allows it to be configured to operate on up to 16 million possible radio channels. You can easily switch channels to "zero in" on a frequency that provides the optimal range and functionality.

The FreeWave operates with radio frequency (RF) technology, therefore a direct line of sight is not necessary; radio waves pass through objects such as windows and walls. It is unlike other wireless remotes on the market that operate on an Infrared (IR) system and require a direct line of sight between transmitter and receiver to make things work.

Since touching the camera even lightly while capturing an image can create a blurred image, the FreeWave eliminates this by tripping the shutter without any disturbances. This is critical when photographing subjects close up, and for long-exposures and macros. It is also extremely valuable when photographing nature, wildlife, and other subjects that are difficult for you to get close to.

Compatibility:
Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e, and D810
Fuji: X30, X-A1, X-A2, X-E2, X-M1, XQ1, XQ2, X-T1, FinePix S1, X100T, S3 and S5
Kodak: DCS-14N

OVERVIEW:
Timing is everything and if you've ever tried to photograph lightning or wildlife in its natural environment you know it's not easy. The FreeWave Stryker Lightning & Motion Trigger Kit for Select Nikon & Fuji Cameras from Vello is a solution for both situations in a lightweight, user-friendly package.

Operation is easy. It's important to start with fully charged batteries for maximum performance. The Stryker can be mounted directly to the camera via its cold shoe, or it can be mounted to any bracket, rig, or light stand that features a 1/4"-20 screw. The unit comes supplied with two Nikon-compatible cables which connect to the camera's remote control socket. Cables are also available for most other brand SLR cameras. In Lightning Mode simply point the camera and sensor in the direction of the subject and adjust the unit's sensitivity dial until the red light extinguishes. Start with a long exposure, about 10 seconds, and adjust the time as needed. Make sure that your camera is in manual focus mode and focus on infinity. Individual camera shutter lag and exposure settings will determine how fast your camera fires.

For Motion Mode follow the same method as above but manually focus your camera lens on the area where you expect activity. The Stryker uses a Passive Infrared Sensor (PIR) to detect IR heat sources such as humans or animals from up to 16.4' away.

So whether you're interested in wildlife, motion-stopping experimentation, or sports you'll find the FreeWave Stryker useful and enjoyable. You may even discover who's raiding the fridge late at night.

 Compatibility:
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e and D810
Df, D90, D600, D610, D750, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5000, D5100, D5200, D5300, D7000, D7100, and D7200; COOLPIX P7800
 Fuji: X30, X-A1, X-A2, X-E1, X-E2, X-M1, XQ1, XQ2, X-T1, FinePix S1, X100T, S3, and S5
 Kodak: DCS-14N

OVERVIEW: Reinventing the standard flash cord, the Vello Flexible TTL Rod provides additional stability and control over placement of your flash, without requiring the use of a bulky bracket. This model is compatible with Nikon's i-TTL system and will allow users to move their flash off-camera and place it in a more appropriate position in order to create a more flattering light. The 13.5" flexible gooseneck makes it ideal for macro where you want the flash close to the subject, as well as portrait photography and can help create a more natural or dramatic look. Additionally, the rod has a locking foot in order to make sure it is secured to your camera.

OVERVIEW: The ShutterBoss II Timer Remote Switch for Sony Multi-Terminal from Vello is a remote shutter release that provides photographers with enhanced levels of exposure control. Featuring specialized functionality such as continuous shooting, self-timer, long time exposures, and interval shooting, the ShutterBoss II is a huge asset to keep in your camera bag. This particular ShutterBoss is compatible with cameras that have a Sony Multi-Terminal connection, for example: Sony Alpha a58, a77 II, a3000, a5000, a6300, a7, RX10, and RX100 series cameras. With the ShutterBoss you can set timer delays, exposure times and intervals up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds in one-second increments. You can also select from 1 to 399 continuous shots or set the device to take an unlimited number of photos. Since you can set exposures without touching the camera you will capture clear, blur-free images. This remote has a 4-line backlit LCD status display for easy viewing of timer and exposure settings. The backlight can be locked to remain on when shooting in low light conditions. The ShutterBoss is great for time lapse series of blooming flowers, sunsets or the night sky. It can also function without batteries as a simple manual remote shutter release. Simply establish the camera's settings and push the remote's shutter button halfway to focus and fully to shoot. In bulb mode, slide the shutter release button forward to lock and the shutter will stay open until you release it. The ShutterBoss II has added two features that will offer easier control over the remote's settings. First is a Power Off option which gives you the ability to power down the remote to conserve battery life and also a Reset option allows the ShutterBoss' settings to be completely reset to default settings with just the hold of two buttons. A default reset is a time-saver to avoid changing each setting individually. Whether it's for simple shutter release, extended self-timer options, continuous shooting, long exposures, or time-lapse shooting, the ShutterBoss II Remote puts creative camera control in the palm of your hand.

OVERVIEW:
Breathe new life into your Canon EF/EF-S mount lenses with this Vello Auto Lens Adapter that enables you to mount Canon glass to a full-frame or APS-C Sony E-mount mirrorless camera body and retain full automatic functionality. Users will have auto exposure functionality as well as the ability to control the aperture from the camera body. Image stabilization is also supported and will work in tandem with most in-body stabilization systems. All Canon lenses will even be able to communicate Exif data through the adapter to the camera.

The mount is designed for long-term use with a durable metal construction and it has a matte black interior that will help reduce reflections for optimal image quality. Additionally, it has a removable tripod foot with a 1/4"-20 socket that can be used to reduce stress on the camera's lens mount when using larger lenses.

Breathe new life into your Canon EF/EF-S mount lenses with this Vello Auto Lens Adapter that enables you to mount Canon glass to a full-frame or APS-C Sony E-mount mirrorless camera body and retain full automatic functionality. Users will have auto exposure functionality as well as the ability to control the aperture from the camera body. Image stabilization is also supported and will work in tandem with most in-body stabilization systems. All Canon lenses will even be able to communicate Exif data through the adapter to the camera.

The mount is designed for long-term use with a durable metal construction and it has a matte black interior that will help reduce reflections for optimal image quality. Additionally, it has a removable tripod foot with a 1/4"-20 socket that can be used to reduce stress on the camera's lens mount when using larger lenses.
OVERVIEW_NOTE:
Please note that compatibility is very specific, Please make sure to check this manufacturer's compatibility chart prior to purchase. Some lenses work better in phase detect AF mode.
Note: AF function was tested for photo, video will not work properly.

OVERVIEW:
This Vello Nikon F Lens to Sony E-Mount Camera Adapter allows a Nikon F-mount lens to be used with a full-frame or APS-C format Sony E-mount camera. It is designed to support focusing to infinity, and is constructed from zinc-alloy along with an aluminum-alloy lens mounting ring to provide a durable, yet lightweight camera-to-lens connection.

The Vello LA-NEX-NGII Lens Adapter does not support electronic communication between an attached camera and lens. To help determine the amount of light that enters a Sony E-mount camera when using this adapter and a Nikon F-mount lens, an eight-stop aperture dial is built into the Lens Adapter. The aperture dial is designed to provide aperture control with half-stop increments for Nikon G-type lenses which do not have an aperture ring. Nikon AI or many post-Nikon AI lenses can have their aperture settings widened or narrowed using their built-in aperture control rings if preferred. Nikon E-type lenses will physically fit, but the manual aperture ring function is not supported with these fully-electronic lenses. 

When an image is taken with the adapter, a matte black internal coating minimizes the potential for reflections inside the adapter barrel, which could otherwise result in unwanted glare within the image. To help prevent stress on the camera mount if the supported camera and lens combination is to be placed on a tripod, the adapter includes a detachable tripod foot that features 1/4"-20 threads.

When an image is taken with the adapter, a matte black internal coating minimizes the potential for reflections inside the adapter barrel, which could otherwise result in unwanted glare within the image. To help prevent stress on the camera mount if the supported camera and lens combination is to be placed on a tripod, the adapter includes a detachable tripod foot that features 1/4"-20 threads.

OVERVIEW: Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Nikon D750 from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive. This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D750 digital camera.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
Protect your camera's LCD from scratches, dirt, and other unwanted residue with this Snap-On Glass LCD Screen Protector for the Nikon D750 from Vello. A sheet of clear, optical glass is laminated with 6 layers of protective material, which blocks UV rays while allowing visible light to pass through. The snap-on design provides easy attachment and detachment from the camera body using no adhesive.

This screen protector is specifically designed for the Nikon D750 digital camera.

OVERVIEW:
This Vello Accessory Kit for the Fujifilm X-T1 Mirrorless Digital Camera from B&H is intended to enhance your use of that camera model while helping to ensure that its rear LCD is protected from damage. Included within this kit are a battery grip, a remote shutter release that can be used wirelessly, a shutter release cable, an LCD screen protector, a cap keeper to prevent loss of your lens cap, and a battery pack that can be used as a replacement or spare for the Fujifilm X-T1's included battery.

The Vello BG-F1 Battery Grip is made exclusively for the Fujifilm X-T1 mirrorless digital camera. It holds one battery, effectively doubling your shooting time, and provides a comfortable grip when photographing in portrait orientation.

The grip has an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically, with a lock to prevent accidental release. In addition, the grip has extra AE-L, AF-L, and FA buttons, as well as front and rear command dials. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and a firm curvature to further improve handling. A tripod socket is included as is a holder for the camera's contact cover.

Trigger your camera's shutter wirelessly with the included FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release from Vello, a lightweight remote control system that will help you avoid unwanted camera movement. This 2.4 GHz model is compatible with the Fujifilm X-T1 mirrorless digital camera and will work wired, or wirelessly up to 320', depending on your own needs and setup. This makes it useful for photographing wildlife or for macro and long exposures where it is necessary to eliminate any chance of camera shake.

The FreeWave system also has access to 16 channels for triggering multiple receivers and has an internal antenna that will be protected from any accidental damage. Multiple features are available for shooting, such as a four-second delay as well as multi-exposure and long exposure modes. The device also has a dual function release, enabling focus on half press and triggering the shutter release on a full press. Additionally, it has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure when in wireless mode, while the receiver and transmitter each run on two AAA batteries.

The included Vello 2.5mm Remote Shutter Release Cable is a coiled cable for connecting a Vello remote shutter release receiver or other remote receiver with a 2.5mm jack to select Fujifilm cameras such as the Fujifilm X-T1.

The Vello LCD Screen Protector Ultra for Fujifilm X-T1 Camera is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Fujifilm X-T1 camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles, and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

The Cap Keeper Plus Lens Cap Holder from Sensei prevents the loss of lens caps. An adhesive-backed disc secures the lens cap to the elastic leash which wraps around a lens barrel. With the lens cap removed from the lens while shooting, it hangs out of the way but secure and within reach for easy retrieval. The Cap Keeper Plus is made with tough and extremely secure elastic.

The included lithium-ion battery pack is small, lightweight, and can be charged or discharged at any time without developing a memory effect.

OVERVIEW:
This Vello Accessory Kit for the Sony Alpha a77 II DSLR Camera from B&H is intended to enhance your use of that camera model while helping to ensure that its rear LCD is protected from damage. Included within this kit are a battery grip, a remote shutter release that can be used wirelessly, an LCD screen protector, a cap keeper to prevent the loss of your lens cap, and a battery pack that can be used as a replacement or spare for the Sony Alpha a77 II's included battery.

The Vello BG-S1 Battery Grip for Sony Alpha a77 & a77 II Digital Cameras is a battery grip designed for use specifically with those digital camera models, and accepts one or two batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. Moreover, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery.

The design of this battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. It will reduce wrist and hand fatigue when shooting vertically for extended periods of time. The BG-S1 has an alternate shutter release button designed for ergonomic access when shooting vertically and anti-slip rubber gripping further improves handling. In addition, the BG-S1 has an alternate AF start button, smart teleconverter/focus magnifier, Fn/image rotation button, AEL/slow sync/image index button, AF/MF/enlarge button, exposure compensation buttons, a Multi selector, and a main dial. It also features a tripod socket, a strap lug for attaching a hand strap to the camera and a convenient internal slot to fit the camera's battery door when the grip is attached. A battery tray is included to house the batteries within the grip.

Trigger your camera's shutter wirelessly with the included FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release from Vello, a lightweight remote control system that will help you avoid unwanted camera movement. This 2.4 GHz model is compatible with Sony Multi-Terminal cameras and will work wired, or wirelessly up to 320', depending on your own needs and setup. This makes it useful for photographing wildlife or for macro and long exposures where it is necessary to eliminate any chance of camera shake.

The FreeWave system also has access to 16 channels for triggering multiple receivers and has an internal antenna that will be protected from any accidental damage. Multiple features are available for shooting, such as a four-second delay as well as multi-exposure and long exposure modes. The device also has a dual function release, enabling focus on half press and triggering the shutter release on a full press. Additionally, it has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure when in wireless mode, while the receiver and transmitter each run on two AAA batteries.

The Kenko LCD Monitor Protection Film for the Sony a77 II offers maximum protection against fingerprints, smudges, and other incidental damage to your camera's LCD monitor. The film features an anti-reflection coating to minimize flare while increasing viewing comfort and image transmission. The hard coating of this film is comprised of multiple layers and is easy to apply using a removable film applicator tab.

The Cap Keeper Plus Lens Cap Holder from Sensei prevents the loss of lens caps. An adhesive-backed disc secures the lens cap to the elastic leash which wraps around a lens barrel. With the lens cap removed from the lens while shooting, it hangs out of the way but is secure and within reach for easy retrieval. The Cap Keeper Plus is made with tough and extremely secure elastic.

The included lithium-ion battery pack is small, lightweight, and can be charged or discharged at any time without developing a memory effect.

OVERVIEW: For capturing short-lived scenes and unpredictable objects, a dedicated device such as the FreeWave Stryker II Motion/Sound/Lighting Trigger from Vello will help photographers by triggering a Nikon camera after detecting motion, sound, or a lightning flash. The portable unit features a passive IR sensor with a 16.4' range to detect motion and has an angle of view of 94° H x 82° V, allowing fast-moving subjects to be captured with ease. Also, for items that make a distinct noise, like a popping balloon, a microphone is incorporated into the unit to detect sound from up to 6.5' away when outdoors. Along with this, a light sensor can be used to help capture lightning by registering bright flashes of light and triggering within 0.1 ms. In order to adjust sensitivity, dials for lightning and sound are available on each side of the unit. It easily connects to a camera using the included 2.5mm remote cables. Also, it mounts via a locking foot or a 1/4"-20 thread, permitting use on camera, stand, or other support system. Included with the camera is a mounting arm, which slides into the camera's hot shoe and extend the trigger's sensors to avoid interference. Additionally, it runs on two AAA batteries.

OVERVIEW:
The FreeWave Orbit from Vello is a programmable motorized pan head which allows the user to capture full 360° panoramic photographs or still or moving product photos.

The Orbit is fully programmable allowing the user to determine the degree angle of rotation, the number of shots taken within that range, the panning speed, and the direction of capture for panoramic photos. Placement of the camera and head is entirely your choice, as the head may be mounted on top of a tripod via the integrated 3/8"-16 female thread or seated on a flat surface using the anti-slip bottom pad.

An ideal tool for the budding 360° panoramic or VR photographer, the Orbit is capable of automatically producing batches of images which may be easily combined to form traditional or interactive media. Operating as a panoramic head and trigger, the Orbit can be programmed to make linear adjustments in up to 360° patterns while automatically triggering the shutter every time the camera pauses. These images can then be stitched together to form multi-image panoramas or immersive 360° virtual tours. Additionally, this function may be used with the optional product plate to create interactive, rotating product tours. 

Included with the Orbit is a 2.4 GHz wireless remote capable of communicating with the head from up to 100' away. Programmable to one of 16 available channels, the user can prevent troublesome radio interference with other electronics or use two Orbit heads in close proximity without issue.

The remote may also be used atop the camera as a camera control unit, capable of triggering the camera's shutter when it is not placed on the Orbit head. Previously mentioned, a common use for this function would be 360° product photography with the optional 8" product plate—a rotating stage which can allow a camera in a fixed position to take multiple photos of a small object from up to 72 angles.

The Orbit head is powered by a rechargeable Nikon-type EN-EL3e lithium-ion battery and the remote is powered by two AAA batteries.

OVERVIEW:
Pair your existing Nikon F-mount full-frame lenses with a modern Sony E-mount mirrorless camera and experience the coveted "full-frame look" on APS-C format sensors with the Accelerator Lens Adapter from Vello. By using a specialized 4 element in 4 group optical design, this adapter is able to increase a lens' angle of view by a factor of 0.71x while simultaneously increasing the maximum aperture by one whole stop. This allows a 50mm f/1.4 lens on an APS-C camera to maintain an angle of view close to 50mm while providing it with an f/1.0 equivalent aperture. This setup means full-frame lenses can be adapted to APS-C sensors, or full-frame cameras in APS-C crop mode, without losing the desired natural look of a full-frame system. Along with this, the adapter features a manual aperture ring with an 8-stop range in 1/2-stop increments.

Along with these capabilities the durable metal adapter features a removable tripod foot with 1/4"-20 socket for use on a tripod or support system, alleviating strain on the lens mount. Additionally, the purely mechanical adapter has a matte black interior to prevent reflections from interfering with image quality.

OVERVIEW_NOTE: Using the adapter with telephoto lenses or zoom lenses at longer focal lengths may produce minimal vignetting.

OVERVIEW_RAW:
This Vello Accessory Kit for the Sony Alpha a7 II Mirrorless Digital Camera from B&H is intended to enhance your use of that camera model while helping to ensure that its rear LCD is protected from damage. Included within this kit is a battery grip, a remote shutter release that can be used wirelessly, an LCD screen protector, and a cap keeper to prevent the loss of your lens cap.

The Vello BG-S3 Battery Grip is designed for the Sony Alpha a7 II camera and holds one or two batteries. With two batteries in the grip, your shooting time is effectively doubled. The design of the battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your camera, especially in the vertical position.

The BG-S3 has a vertical-position shutter-release button, an alternate AF/MF/AEL button, three custom buttons, rear and main control dials, and an on/off switch. It is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip and a firm curvature to further improve handling. The grip screws into the camera's tripod mount, and it has another tripod mount on its bottom for attaching to a camera support. A metal mount allows you to attach a camera strap to the BG-S3 for convenient carrying.

Trigger your camera's shutter wirelessly with the included FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release from Vello, a lightweight remote control system that will help you avoid unwanted camera movement. This 2.4 GHz model is compatible with Sony Multi-Terminal cameras and will work wired, or wirelessly up to 320', depending on your own needs and setup. This makes it useful for photographing wildlife or for macro and long exposures where it is necessary to eliminate any chance of camera shake.

The FreeWave system also has access to 16 channels for triggering multiple receivers and has an internal antenna that will be protected from any accidental damage. Multiple features are available for shooting, such as a four-second delay as well as multi-exposure and long exposure modes. The device also has a dual function release, enabling focus on half press and triggering the shutter release on a full press. Additionally, it has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure when in wireless mode, while the receiver and transmitter each run on two AAA batteries.

The included Vello LCD Screen Protector Ultra is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Sony Alpha a7, a7S, a7R, or a7 II camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles, and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

The Cap Keeper Plus Lens Cap Holder from Sensei prevents the loss of lens caps. An adhesive-backed disc secures the lens cap to the elastic leash which wraps around a lens barrel. With the lens cap removed from the lens while shooting, it hangs out of the way but secure and within reach for easy retrieval. The Cap Keeper Plus is made with tough and extremely secure elastic.

OVERVIEW: A simple, effective, and versatile bracket for close-up lighting applications, the CB-900 Flexible Macro Flash Bracket from Vello features an L-shaped design with a flexible arm for positioning a flash closer to the subject. The arm is padded for a comfortable grip and incorporates a cold shoe on top to accept shoe-mounted speedlights or video lights. The straight base features an Arca-style design for a seamless fit within Arca-style tripod heads, and a 1/4"-20 stud with D-ring is included for securely attaching your camera to the bracket. The plate also has a rubberized top surface to prevent your camera from slipping during use.
OVERVIEW_RAW: A simple, effective, and versatile bracket for close-up lighting applications, the CB-900 Flexible Macro Flash Bracket from Vello features an L-shaped design with a flexible arm for positioning a flash closer to the subject. The arm is padded for a comfortable grip and incorporates a cold shoe on top to accept shoe-mounted speedlights or video lights. The straight base features an Arca-style design for a seamless fit within Arca-style tripod heads, and a 1/4"-20 stud with D-ring is included for securely attaching your camera to the bracket. The plate also has a rubberized top surface to prevent your camera from slipping during use.

OVERVIEW: The Vello 8" MPH-P8 Plate for Pan Head attaches to any manual or motorized pan head with a 1/4"-20 camera screw and allows your product to be seen at the best angle in its best light. The plate size is great for jewelry and small objects while its matte surface renders a soft detail-less look free from distracting reflections. A rotation of 360 degrees is possible with most pan heads.

The plate size is great for jewelry and small objects while its matte surface renders a soft detail-less look free from distracting reflections. A rotation of 360 degrees is possible with most pan heads.

OVERVIEW: Keep a pair of Canon EF/EF-S lenses at your side for rapid lens swaps with the Rapid Lens Changer from Vello. Equipped with two locking Canon EF/EF-S-mounts and easily accessed release switches, photographers will be able to quickly swap out their lenses while on the go. The mounts are made of metal and are designed to ensure that the lenses will be held with confidence. Also, bundled with a removable 1.5" wide shoulder strap and equipped with two sturdy strap lugs, this device allows shooters to forgo the hefty camera bag for a pared down, lightweight approach. The strap even features an adjustable length of 14 to 30" for added comfort.

OVERVIEW: The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Fujifilm X Mount from Vello allows your lens to focus closer than its normal minimum focus distance. By placing distance between your camera body and lens, focusing distance is shortened and the effect of magnifying your subject is created. Extension tubes enable macro performance for lenses not otherwise able to focus that close, and are also suited for close-up portraiture. The Deluxe Auto Focus Extension Tube Set for Fujifilm X mount contains two extension tubes of 10mm and 16mm lengths. They can be used individually or together to create the desired magnification effect. For closer focusing use the larger extension tube or stack the tubes together. It is even possible to stack these two tubes with others from another set. Extension tubes have no optical elements so they do not degrade the quality of your lenses. These are fully automatic extension tubes in that they are able to communicate all electronic functions from lens to camera including autofocus and auto exposure. They are built with metal lens mounts for durability and longevity and enable you to convert almost any lens into a macro lens at a fraction of the cost while maintaining the lens' original optical quality.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW_NOTE: Not compatible with Fujifilm 35mm f/2 WR & 23mm f/2 R WR lenses

OVERVIEW:
Breathe new life into your Nikon F-mount lenses with this Vello Auto Lens Adapter that enables you to mount Nikon glass to a full-frame or APS-C Sony E-mount mirrorless camera body and retain full automatic functionality (depending on lens/camera combination). When using supported G-type and E-type lenses from Nikon, users will have auto exposure as well as the ability to control the aperture from the camera body. Autofocus can be utilized as well and is fastest and most accurate when used with Sony cameras that use focal-plane phase-detect AF systems. Image stabilization is also supported and will work in tandem with compatible in-body stabilization systems. Users of compatible D-type lenses will have access to auto exposure capabilities and all Nikon lenses will be able to communicate Exif data through the adapter to the camera.

The mount is designed for long-term use with a durable metal construction and it has a matte black interior that will help reduce reflections for optimal image quality. Additionally, it has an integrated tripod foot with a 1/4"-20 socket that can be used to reduce stress on the camera's lens mount when using larger lenses.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW:
This Vello Bluetooth ShutterBoss Advanced Intervalometer Kit from B&H contains four remote shutter cables which allow the included receiver to work with most Canon cameras that can accommodate a wired remote shutter release, as well as with select Sony or Minolta cameras. Once connected, this intervalometer kit allows you to control a camera from a compatible iOS smart device. In addition to the intervalometer mode, you can also trigger the shutter in single shot mode, continuous mode, bulb mode, or self-timer mode.

The Bluetooth ShutterBoss is ideal for capturing time lapse videos, star trails, or any other image where you need to remotely trigger your camera. Remote triggering can help capture steady video, or sharp images while using low shutter speeds, by preventing you from actually pressing the shutter button and accidentally creating camera shake. The iOS app makes it easy to set all of your required settings for the given situation, upload them to the ShutterBoss, and let the trigger do the rest.

Whether it's for simple shutter release, extended self-timer options, continuous shooting, long exposures, or time-lapse shooting, the Bluetooth ShutterBoss is the ideal tool for the job.

Vello 3.5mm Remote Shutter Release Cables are included to connect the Bluetooth ShutterBoss to select Canon cameras that utilize a Canon N3-series remote or a Canon E3-series remote. For select Sony cameras that are compatible with a Sony RM-SPR1 Remote Commander and select Sony or Minolta cameras that are compatible with a Sony RM-L1AM Alpha Remote, individual Vello 3.5mm Remote Shutter Release Cables are provided as well.
OVERVIEW_RAW:

OVERVIEW: Improve your handheld GoPro videos with the black Vello ActionPan Stabilizing Action Grip/Handle with Smartphone Mount. This B&H Kit lets you attach your GoPro to the ActionPan handle thanks to an included 1/4"-20 to 3-prong GoPro mount adapter. The handle helps to stabilize your camera and hold in down low, which is ideal for filming a wide range of action activities, such as skateboarding, snowboarding, and skiing. In addition to your GoPro, it can also be used with most DSLRs and camcorders up to 4.5" tall, and features a removable shoe mount on top for attaching an LED, microphone, or other accessory.
OVERVIEW_RAW: Improve your handheld GoPro videos with the black Vello ActionPan Stabilizing Action Grip/Handle with Smartphone Mount. This B&H Kit lets you attach your GoPro to the ActionPan handle thanks to an included 1/4"-20 to 3-prong GoPro mount adapter. The handle helps to stabilize your camera and hold in down low, which is ideal for filming a wide range of action activities, such as skateboarding, snowboarding, and skiing. In addition to your GoPro, it can also be used with most DSLRs and camcorders up to 4.5" tall, and features a removable shoe mount on top for attaching an LED, microphone, or other accessory.

OVERVIEW: Improve your smartphone videography with the black Vello ActionPan Stabilizing Action Grip/Handle with Smartphone Mount Kit from B&H. This kit lets you attach your smartphone to the ActionPan handle thanks to a SHILL smartphone mount with a 1/4"-20 standard tripod thread. The handle helps to stabilize your device and lower it to change perspective in multiple mounting configurations. It has removable shoe mount for mics and lights. The mount accepts devices up to 3.25" wide.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello HB-36F Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Nikon's AF-S VR Zoom-NIKKOR 70-300mm f/4.5-5.6G IF-ED lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.This lens hood features a filter access panel that allows you to easily reach and adjust rotating filters without the need to remove the hood from the lens. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The dedicated Vello HB-36F Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Nikon's AF-S VR Zoom-NIKKOR 70-300mm f/4.5-5.6G IF-ED lens.

Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.

This lens hood features a filter access panel that allows you to easily reach and adjust rotating filters without the need to remove the hood from the lens. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW: B&H has put together this Vello FreeWave LR Kit with 2 Receivers to bring the benefits of wireless triggering to photographers in the field. The kit includes 1 FreeWave LR Transmitter and 2 FreeWave LR Receivers.TransmitterThe FreeWave LR Transmitter is a versatile, reliable remote control that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio heads from up to 600' away. The 2.4 GHz frequency provides reduced radio interference and an extended range without the need for line-of-sight alignment as the radio waves will pass through most walls, windows, and floors. Eight different channels let you trigger only specific Receivers of your choice, or an "all channels" button will trigger all Receivers simultaneously. The Transmitter's tilting joint allows it to be mounted vertically or horizontally onto your camera's hot shoe. A hot shoe on top of the Transmitter allows you to use the transmitter and a flash mounted to it simultaneously. The receiver is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which offer manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe flash units are not compatible. ReceiverPart of the FreeWave radio system, the FreeWave LR Wireless Receiver triggers off-camera flash units at up to 600' away from the system's transmitter. The 2.4 GHz frequency provides reduced radio interference and an extended range without the need for line-of-sight alignment. Eight user-selectable channels allow you to control which flashes you want to fire, and LED indicators help you see the selected channel in difficult lighting.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
B&H has put together this Vello FreeWave LR Kit with 2 Receivers to bring the benefits of wireless triggering to photographers in the field. The kit includes 1 FreeWave LR Transmitter and 2 FreeWave LR Receivers.

Transmitter

The FreeWave LR Transmitter is a versatile, reliable remote control that will trigger off-camera flash units and studio heads from up to 600' away. The 2.4 GHz frequency provides reduced radio interference and an extended range without the need for line-of-sight alignment as the radio waves will pass through most walls, windows, and floors. Eight different channels let you trigger only specific Receivers of your choice, or an "all channels" button will trigger all Receivers simultaneously. The Transmitter's tilting joint allows it to be mounted vertically or horizontally onto your camera's hot shoe. A hot shoe on top of the Transmitter allows you to use the transmitter and a flash mounted to it simultaneously. The receiver is compatible with most major manufacturers' shoe-mount flashes which offer manual power control. Pentax, Sony/Minolta, and Sony Multi-Interface Shoe flash units are not compatible.

Receiver

Part of the FreeWave radio system, the FreeWave LR Wireless Receiver triggers off-camera flash units at up to 600' away from the system's transmitter. The 2.4 GHz frequency provides reduced radio interference and an extended range without the need for line-of-sight alignment. Eight user-selectable channels allow you to control which flashes you want to fire, and LED indicators help you see the selected channel in difficult lighting.

OVERVIEW: The ESS-A7 Eyeshade from Vello is a replacement eyepiece for Sony a7 series cameras that provides a large, oval eyecup for more comfortable viewing through the viewfinder. The large shape of the eyecup improves the image quality in the viewfinder by sealing out all extraneous light. It can rotate 360º to accommodate both the left and right eye and horizontal and vertical shooting positions. The eyecup extends from the viewfinder, blocking stray light and providing a clearer image. The soft yet durable rubber design is comfortable for those who do not wear eyeglasses and will not scratch or damage the glasses of those who do. It mounts easily and securely to the camera's viewfinder.

OVERVIEW:
B&H has put together this Vello Accessory Kit for Canon T6i/T6s to give photographers the ability to focus and trigger their camera remotely and wirelessly. The kit contains a battery grip for the camera, LCD screen protector, FreeWave Plus Wireless Shutter Release for Canon, and a cap keeper.

Vello Battery Grip

Designed specifically for the Canon EOS Rebel T6i and T6s DSLR cameras, the BG-C13 Battery Grip from Vello will help shooters dramatically extend their shooting time as well as offer additional comfort and controls for vertical, or portrait, orientation shooting. The BG-C13's biggest advantage is that it can hold up to two LP-E17 series battery packs, effectively doubling the battery capacity. Also, it features a vertical position shutter release along with aperture value/exposure compensation, AF point selection/magnify, and AE lock/FE lock/index/reduce buttons, as well as a main dial to make vertical shooting feel natural. 

To further increase usability, the BG-C13 has a hand strap mount as well as a 1/4"-20 tripod socket, which aligns with the lens mount for balance. Additionally, this battery grip has a built-in holder for the camera's battery chamber door. This combination of features can dramatically improve ergonomics and make shooting faster and more intuitive.



Screen Protector

The Vello Glass LCD Screen Protector is a sheet of 0.02" (0.5mm) ultra-thin optical glass used to protect your camera's LCD monitor. The glass features 6 layers of material that protect your display screen from dirt, scratches, sweat, and oily fingerprints. The glass also blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. The protector is easy to install and remove.

FreeWave Wireless Remote Shutter Release

Trigger your camera's shutter wirelessly with the FreeWave Plus Wireless Remote Shutter Release from Vello, a lightweight remote control system that will help you avoid unwanted camera movement. This 2.4 GHz model is compatible with Canon cameras and will work both wired and wirelessly up to 320', depending on your own needs and setup. This makes it useful for photographing wildlife or for macro and long exposures where it is necessary to eliminate any chance of camera shake. 

The FreeWave system also has access to 16 channels for triggering multiple receivers and has an internal antenna that's protected from any accidental damage. Multiple features are available for shooting, such as a four-second delay as well as multi-exposure and long exposure modes. The device also has a dual function release, enabling focus on half press and triggering the shutter release on a full press. Additionally, it has LED indicators to confirm pre-focus and exposure while in wireless mode. The receiver and transmitter each run on two AAA batteries.


Cap Keeper

The Cap Keeper Plus Lens Cap Holder from Sensei prevents the loss of lens caps. An adhesive-backed disc secures the lens cap to the elastic leash which wraps around the lens barrel. With the lens cap removed from the lens while shooting, it hangs out of the way but secure and within reach for easy retrieval. The Cap Keeper Plus is made with tough and extremely secure elastic.

OVERVIEW:
B&H has put together this Vello Accessory Kit for the Nikon D5500 Accessory Kit to give photographers the ability to focus and trigger their camera remotely and wirelessly. The kit contains a battery grip for the D5500, a lithium-ion battery pack,
LCD screen protector, FreeWave Plus Wireless Shutter Release for Nikon, and a cap keeper.

Vello Battery Grip

The BG-N16 Battery Grip from Vello is designed specifically for the Nikon D5500 DSLR camera and accepts one or two EN-EL14 or EN-EL14A batteries. With two batteries installed, your shooting time is effectively doubled. More so, when one battery is drained, it can be removed and recharged while you continue shooting with the other battery. An on/off switch has also been added to the BG-N16 to disable the grip's built-in vertical shutter release button, which prevents users from accidentally triggering the shutter when photographing in the landscape orientation.

The design of a battery grip offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR, especially in the vertical position. The BG-N16 comes with an alternate shutter release button to facilitate shooting when held vertically. In addition, it is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling, a tripod socket to mount your camera directly to a tripod, and a holder for the camera's battery door so as not to lose it when the battery grip is installed.

Li-Ion Battery

The Watson EN-EL14A Lithium-Ion Battery Pack works with the same cameras as the Nikon EN-EL14A. This replacement battery pack features a capacity of 1150mAh, 7.2V of output power, and 8.28 watt-hours. Small and lightweight, lithium-ion batteries can be charged or discharged at any time without developing memory effect.

OVERVIEW:
Use a mobile device or desktop computer to remotely control your DSLR with the Extendá Wi-Fi DSLR Remote Control from Vello. The Extendá will create an ad-hoc Wi-Fi network with a range of 164', allowing users to connect wirelessly with a mobile device or desktop computer and then make adjustments to a Nikon or Canon DLSR's settings and functions via an app. This includes making changes to ISO, shutter, speed, aperture, exposure compensation, and more. A Live View mode is also available which provides a feed of your camera's view on your device, enabling Touch Focus and many other functions.

Not just useful for taking photos and video, the Extendá can automatically stream photos to your mobile device, permitting a client to review images as you work. These images can be directly downloaded to your device for immediate upload to other services and applications. Along with these features, the Extendá offers other functions to help you shoot more difficult shots, including a focus stacking mode and an intervalometer with bulb shooting. Additionally, the device is powered by a built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery and can be used to charge mobile devices via the USB output.

OVERVIEW: The FreeWave Mini-Stand Flash Trigger Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers a quick and easy means to wirelessly trigger a two-light setup from distances up to 200'. The kit includes a radio transmitter, 2 stands with built-in receivers for on-camera flashes, and connectors to use the system with studio flashes.The receivers work on a high 2.4 GHz frequency that easily passes through objects, giving you the ability to place lights behind you and around corners. The lightweight transmitter has a low profile with a flash shoe foot that won't get in the way of any operational controls. The receiver stand allows the flash to be positioned quickly on any flat surface. You can also use the 1/4"- 20 female thread to mount it on a tripod, light stand, or boom arm for maximum flexibility. For studio situations, the included 3.5 mm sync cord and 1/4" phono adapter further expand the Mini-Stand's compatibility to include most studio monolights and power packs.
OVERVIEW_RAW:
The FreeWave Mini-Stand Flash Trigger Kit was put together by B&H to offer photographers a quick and easy means to wirelessly trigger a two-light setup from distances up to 200'. The kit includes a radio transmitter, 2 stands with built-in receivers for on-camera flashes, and connectors to use the system with studio flashes.

The receivers work on a high 2.4 GHz frequency that easily passes through objects, giving you the ability to place lights behind you and around corners. The lightweight transmitter has a low profile with a flash shoe foot that won't get in the way of any operational controls. The receiver stand allows the flash to be positioned quickly on any flat surface. You can also use the 1/4"- 20 female thread to mount it on a tripod, light stand, or boom arm for maximum flexibility. For studio situations, the included 3.5 mm sync cord and 1/4" phono adapter further expand the Mini-Stand's compatibility to include most studio monolights and power packs.

OVERVIEW: The 3' Vello Off-Camera TTL Flash Cord provides creative photographers with the ability to remotely fire Olympus/Panasonic flashes with TTL capabilities . Removing the flash from the camera's hot shoe allows the photographer to create unique and dramatic lighting styles that are not possible with a traditional shoe-mounted strobe. This coiled cord measures 3', which is enough distance to accommodate hand-held lighting styles, or when keeping the flash mounted on a compact flash bracket. Also, off-camera lighting reduces the harsh shadows commonly encountered with direct on-camera flashes and gives your photographs a more natural look. One side of the TTL cable fits directly into the camera's hot shoe to ensure that all of the camera's exposure data is maintained. The other side can be attached to any stand, tripod, or device with a standard 1/4"-20 threaded stud or flash shoe mount and the shoe has a locking knob to ensure your equipment is secure.

OVERVIEW: Timing is everything and if you've ever tried to photograph lightning or wildlife in its natural environment you know it's not easy. The FreeWave Stryker Lightning & Motion Trigger for Select Canon Cameras from Vello is a solution for both situations in a lightweight, user-friendly package. Operation is easy. It's important to start with fully charged batteries for maximum performance. The Stryker can be mounted directly to the camera via its cold shoe, or it can be mounted to any bracket, rig, or light stand that features a 1/4"-20 screw. The unit comes supplied with two Canon-compatible cables which connect to the camera's remote control socket. Cables are also available for most other brand DSLR cameras. In Lightning Mode simply point the camera and sensor in the direction of the subject and adjust the unit's sensitivity dial until the red light extinguishes. Start with a long exposure, about 10 seconds, and adjust the time as needed. Make sure that your camera is in manual focus mode and focus on infinity. Individual camera shutter lag and exposure settings will determine how fast your camera fires. For Motion Mode follow the same method as above but manually focus your camera lens on the area where you expect activity. The Stryker uses a Passive Infrared Sensor (PIR) to detect IR heat sources such as humans or animals from up to 16.4' away.So whether you're interested in wildlife, motion-stopping experimentation, or sports you'll find the FreeWave Stryker useful and enjoyable. You may even discover who's raiding the fridge late at night.

OVERVIEW_RAW:
Extend your shooting time with your Canon EOS 7D Mark II DSLR Camera while benefiting from a convenient remote capture system, thanks to this Vello Accessory Kit from B&H Photo. The package bundles the BG-C12 Battery Grip, an extra lithium-ion battery pack, a wireless remote shutter release, an LCD screen protector, and a lens cap keeper plus cap holder.

Vello's BG-C12 grip can effectively double your shooting time, holding up to two LP-E6/N batteries. The design offers a comfortable and secure way in which to hold your DSLR in the vertical orientation, providing an anti-slip rubber grip and firm curvature. Additionally, alternate shutter release, AF start, AF point selection, AE lock/FE lock, and multi-function buttons facilitate shooting in this position.

The wireless remote shutter release, which can also work in wired mode, enables clear image capture by eliminating camera shake. Press halfway to focus, then all the way to trigger the shutter. The release offers 16 channels, a multi-exposure function, a long exposure mode, and a convenient delay function. Working on the 2.4 GHz frequency, the device gives you reduced radio interference and an extended range of up to 320'.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello EW-73D Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS USM lens.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW:
Timing is everything and if you've ever tried to photograph lightning or wildlife in its natural environment you know it's not easy. The FreeWave Stryker Lightning & Motion Trigger Kit for Select Nikon, Olympus, & Panasonic Cameras from Vello is a solution for both situations in a lightweight, user-friendly package.

Operation is easy. It's important to start with fully charged batteries for maximum performance. The Stryker can be mounted directly to the camera via its cold shoe, or it can be mounted to any bracket, rig, or light stand that features a 1/4"-20 screw. The unit comes supplied with two Nikon-compatible cables which connect to the camera's remote control socket. Cables are also available for most other brand SLR cameras. In Lightning Mode simply point the camera and sensor in the direction of the subject and adjust the unit's sensitivity dial until the red light extinguishes. Start with a long exposure, about 10 seconds, and adjust the time as needed. Make sure that your camera is in manual focus mode and focus on infinity. Individual camera shutter lag and exposure settings will determine how fast your camera fires.

For Motion Mode follow the same method as above but manually focus your camera lens on the area where you expect activity. The Stryker uses a Passive Infrared Sensor (PIR) to detect IR heat sources such as humans or animals from up to 16.4' away.

So whether you're interested in wildlife, motion-stopping experimentation, or sports you'll find the FreeWave Stryker useful and enjoyable. You may even discover who's raiding the fridge late at night.

 Compatibility:
 Nikon: D1, D1H, D1X, D2, D200, D2H, D2Hs, D2X, D2Xs, D3, D300, D300s, D3s, D3x, D4, D4s, D700, D800, D800e and D810
Df, D90, D600, D610, D750, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5000, D5100, D5200, D5300, D7000, D7100, and D7200; COOLPIX P7800
 Fuji: S3 and S5
 Olympus: OM-D E-M10 Mark II, E-M5 Mark II; E-PL5, E-PL6, E-PL7; Stylus 1s
 Panasonic: DMC-FZ100, DMC-FZ150, DMC-FZ200, DMC-G1, DMC-G10, DMC-G2, DMC-G3, DMC-G5, DMC-G6, DMC-GF1, DMC-GH1, DMC-GH2, DMC-GH3, DMC-GH4, DMC-GX1, DMC-GX7, DMC-L1, and DMC-L10
 Leica: V-Lux 4

OVERVIEW: This LCD Screen Protector Ultra from Vello is a sheet of ultra-thin (0.02") optical glass used to protect the LCD monitor of a Fujifilm X-Pro2 camera. Its static adhesion method leaves no sticky residue behind on your screen. Multiple layers of protective material shield your display from dirt, scratches, sweat, smears, and light impact. The shatter-proof glass blocks UV rays while allowing visible light in. It is easy to install without trapping any air bubbles and is just as simple to remove. The protector can be easily cleaned using the supplied microfiber cloth and wet wipe.

Breathe new life into your Nikon F-mount lenses with version 4 of this Vello Auto Lens Adapter that enables you to mount Nikon glass to a full-frame or APS-C Sony E-mount mirrorless camera body and retain full automatic functionality (depending on lens/camera combination). When using supported G-type and E-type lenses from Nikon, users will have auto exposure as well as the ability to control the aperture from the camera body. Autofocus can be utilized as well (only for photography, not video) and is fastest and most accurate when used with Sony cameras that use focal-plane phase-detect AF systems. Version 4 brings with it optimized autofocus and auto exposure performance among a larger range of lenses. Image stabilization is also supported and will work in tandem with compatible in-body stabilization systems. Users of compatible D-type lenses will have access to auto exposure capabilities and all Nikon lenses will be able to communicate Exif data through the adapter to the camera.

The mount is designed for long-term use with a durable metal construction and it has a matte black interior that will help reduce reflections for optimal image quality. Additionally, it has an integrated tripod foot with a 1/4"-20 socket that can be used to reduce stress on the camera's lens mount when using larger lenses.

The following Nikon lenses and Sony cameras have been tested with the Vello LAE-SE-NF lens adapter for photo compatibility, some with operational limitations. If a lens is not listed, it might not work properly. We'll be testing more lenses and cameras and adding them to this table, so check back for future updates and firmware upgrades.

OVERVIEW: The dedicated Vello EW-83M-F Lens Hood is specifically designed for use with Canon's EF 24-105mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM and EF 24-105mm f/4L IS II USM lenses.Lens hoods are primarily designed to prevent unwanted stray light from entering the lens by extending and shading the end of the lens. A dedicated lens hood is designed to perfectly match the specific focal length of the lens it was designed for. Moreover, this hood features a non-glare matte finish on the interior surface to further prevent or limit lens flare. Also, since the end of the lens is extended, you get the added benefit of some extra protection from accidental impact.This lens hood features a filter access panel that allows you to easily reach and adjust rotating filters without the need to remove the hood from the lens. The "petal" shape of this lens hood maximizes the amount of hood coverage for the minimum amount of weight and hood area. The bayonet mount is designed to also work in the reversed position, allowing the hood to be placed backwards over the lens for a more compact storage solution.

OVERVIEW:
The Vello BG-S4 Battery Grip is designed specifically for the Sony Alpha a6300 camera. The grip holds one or two NP-FW50 batteries which effectively doubles your shooting time when both batteries are installed. It works through the use of a dedicated battery adapter and the design of the grip provides a comfortable way to hold and shoot your camera in the vertical position. The BG-S4 also has a vertical-position shutter-release button for portrait orientation shooting which works through the use of an included Multi-Terminal cable. It even has an on/off switch that deactivates the shutter release when it is not needed, preventing accidentally release when performing activities such as shooting video. 

The BG-S4 is designed with an anti-slip rubber grip to further improve handling. The battery grip screws into the camera's tripod mount, and it has another tripod mount on its bottom for attaching to a camera support. A metal mount allows you to attach a camera strap to the BG-S4 for convenient carrying.

Pair your existing Canon EF-mount full-frame lenses with a modern Sony E-mount mirrorless camera and experience the coveted "full-frame look" on APS-C format sensors with the Accelerator AF Lens Adapter from Vello. By using a specialized 4 element in 4 group optical design, this adapter is able to increase a lens' angle of view by a factor of 0.71x while simultaneously increasing the maximum aperture by one whole stop. This allows a 50mm f/1.4 lens on an APS-C camera to maintain an angle of view close to 50mm while providing it with an f/1.0 equivalent aperture. This setup means full-frame lenses can be adapted to APS-C sensors, or full-frame cameras in APS-C crop mode, without losing the desired natural look of a full-frame system. Along with this, the adapter features electronic coupling, enabling autofocus, auto exposure, and other functions during use.

Automatic capabilities of the lens are fully maintained, allows for auto exposure, autofocus, and aperture control from the camera body. The adapter will also transfer Exif data to the camera for appropriate tagging of metadata for easier organization and editing. Along with all of these functions the durable metal adapter sports a removable tripod foot with 1/4"-20 socket for use on a tripod or support system, alleviating strain on the lens mount. Additionally, it has a matte black interior to prevent reflections from interfering with image quality.

Note: AF function was tested for photo, video will not work properly
